result.title: Introducing SmartCash to 5 Ghanaian Universities for Massive Adoption and Usage
result.summary:
Education-based marketing is probably the most effective method to advertise a new product. This project is therefore focused on bringing innovative ideas from undergraduate and postgraduate students in Ghanaian Universities based on their knowledge in marketing, technology, journalism, finance,accounting, communication etc. 

Our target is to organize workshops/conferences in all 5 selected Universities to educate and practically train students and lecturers for massive adoption and usage of SmartCash as a medium of exchange and all the benefits and advantages of using SmartCash against any other cryptocurrency. The workshops/conferences shall be open to all interested persons including CEOs of businesses, investors, the media (TV, Radio, online & print) and the general public at large. 

The project will see two meet ups/training, a 30 minute radio discussion program, a meeting with the Student Representative Council (SRC), establishment of merchant centers, and creating online platforms in all the 5 selected Universities. Each of these meet ups are expected to record at least 100 participants whereas the radio discussions will be heard by about 40,000 people with phone in sessions for questions and answers. SmartCash tokens will be given to participants at each campus and listeners who phone in and answer questions during the radio programs.

The motivation behind this project is to promote SmartCash through education and marketing for massive adoption and usage in Ghana and Africa at large.
result.description:
Ghana is a relatively large country with an estimated population of over 27 million people. The youth plays a major role in the development of any country. Unfortunately, there is a continues increase in graduate unemployment in the country giving students the need to leverage available opportunities against the web of unemployment hence students take keen interest in speculative returns in SmartCash towards accumulating capital to start businesses after school.  The good news is that, most students in Ghana are involved in mini-importation such as smart phones, laptops and accessories. Most of these students have over the years resorted to Bitcoin for online shopping. However, Bitcoin transaction fee and confirmation time have most of them seeking better alternatives as bank payments is also very expensive process. This thus, provides an appropriate platform to actually promote SmartCash through the youth who are mostly in the Universities.

The training will be held in five (5) different university campuses across the country. More than 100 participants are expected to attend the workshops/conferences at each selected campus ( University of Ghana https://www.ug.edu.gh/ , Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST)https://www.knust.edu.gh/, University for Development Studies (Tamale)https://www.uds.edu.gh/ , University of Cape Coast https://www.ucc.edu.gh/ and the University of Education (Winneba) http://www.uew.edu.gh/

We have successfully organized meetups on Smartcash in Ghana. Check it out here https://imgur.com/a/p9ofP , https://imgur.com/a/JB0DA

Action Plans: All participants would be trained on how to set up SmartCash wallets and how they can also promote it through their social media accounts and also bringing more ideas to promoting SmartCash. In addition, Ten (10) Participants from each university who seems active and demonstrate excellent understanding of the blockchain technology and SmartCash technology would be selected to serve as campus Ambassadors for SmartCash. Below is the planned activity for them:-

Event Plan

  1. 30 minutes radio presentation on SmartCash in all 5 university campuses.
  1. All participants will receive;
  1. 5 minutes training on the blockchain technology. Presentation by (Speaker 1)
  2. 10 minutes training on Cryptocurrencies. Bitcoin, ethereum, etc. Presentation by (Speaker 2)
  3. 30 minutes training on SmartCash. Presentation by (Speaker 3)
    • how to download and setup SmartCash wallets
    • key features of SmartCash ie Smart forums, SmartRewards,SmartVoting, Smartnodes etc
    • how to purchase/buy SmartCash from local and international exchanges via CoinExchange,Cryptobridge,HitBTC etc and
    • Advantages of using SmartCash for their daily transactions like payments of goods and services, payment of fees/bills, receiving remittances and many more.

$5 worth of SMART will be given to the first 50 participants at each university and have them send some of it to other participants. This will make them feel the speed and convenience with SmartCash and also give them experience in using SmartCash immediately. Students will therefore be encouraged to use their savings to purchase SmartCash to accumulate capital and wealth using SmartCash and SmartRewards as store of value in the long term to realize their entrepreneurial goals, further education, etc.

     2. Participants will also be trained on Digital marketing, Business Planning & Execution, proposal writing, and how they can achieve their entrepreneurial goals through wealth creation by accumulating capital through SmartCash and SmartRewards in the long term. Finally, Students will be allowed to submit business ideas for mentorship and execution.

 

     3. Ten (10) students from each university who attained outstanding skills in the workshop will be trained to promote SmartCash among colleague students and lecturers as campus Ambassadors for SmartCash. We will also establish campus clubs in their respective university campuses. These groups will be trained to teach students on how to make use of SmartCash and SmartRewards as store of value to realize their entrepreneurial ideas after successful graduation.They will be provided $500 worth of SmartCash as support to organize school-based and cluster-based workshops in their respective campuses. The clubs will also be supported to educate management, the Student Representative Council (SRC) and other campus based groups and associations to start accepting SmartCash for payment of fees and/or other association dues. SmartCash may have to sponsor some of their activities to gain more popularity on each university campus.

 

     4. Finally, Ambassadors of SmartCash will be trained to be merchants that trade in SmartCash in Ghana for extra income. Their extra duties are to convince households, business associations and professional groups such as teachers, nurses, accountants, lawyers in Ghana to buy and hold SmartCash for the long term.

Timeline:

  1. University for Development Studies (Tamale)                                                           2days workshop (1st week)
  2. University of Ghana                                                                                               2days workshop (2nd week)
  3. Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology(KNUST)                                2days workshop (3rd week)
  4. University of Cape Coast                                                                                        2days workshop (4th week)
  5. University of Education (Winneba)                                                                           2days workshop (5th week)

 

BUDGET
Transportation cost to and within all 5 universities for 5 weeks  - $1100
Hotel accommodation & feeding for 5 weeks - $2400
Hiring of Venue for workshops for all 5 universities - $1500
Feeding Cost of Participants for all 10 workshops/conferences - $400
Tokens for participants for all 10 workshops/conferences - $600
Printing of SmartCash shirts, stikers, fliers etc for participants across all 5 universities- $1400
SmartCash Club Fund  for all 5 university clubs - $2500
Media Engagement with 5 radio stations across all 5 universities  - $1000
Banners, website publications for all 5 universities - $250
Communication and data calls  for organizing all 10 workshops/conferences - $100
Cameraman for videos of workshops for all 10 workshops/conferences - $500
Contingency - $250
Total - $12,000
We(SmartCash TeamGh) are therefore asking for $12,000/equivalent amount of SMART to be able to carry out this project.

 

JUSTIFICATIONS: 
a. Videos, pictures and reports of this project will be sent to the SmartCash community and also circulated on social media platforms as ads.
b. Each campus Club will present and execute action plans for their respective duties in their schools
c. Team members are self-motivated and selected by merit.

d. All universities are selected on merit with regards to their population (30,000 plus) respectively and their influence on the Ghanaian society.

result.title: SMARTCASH ROADSHOW, MERCHANT INTEGRATION AND BUSINESS ADDOPTION
result.summary: This proposal is an extension of my current smartcash roadshow project currently in its third month in the northern part of Ghana with an addition of merchant and business integration. The roadshow has been successful in the two regions with participants mainly worried about how to get smartcash and where to spend it and this has necessitated incorporating businesses and merchant adoption into the roadshow activities. The roadshow will continue from the southern part of Ghana which is also the business hub starting from Accra in the coming months. Each region will still see two meet ups/conferences, two radio discussion and a TV discussion with a minimum of 40 participants per meet up and business presentations to bring businesses and merchants on board and to equip participants with the knowledge of what smartcash is, how to get started, how to trade in smartcash using exchanges and other online portal and the benefits of holding smartcash for longer period.
result.description:
Hello smartcash family! My name Mohammed Awal Sani known as Cryptowall on the smartcash discord page, from Ghana West Africa. I am submitting this proposal as my smartcash roadshow extension and to embark on extra activities on businesses and merchant adoption. The first phase of the smartcash roadshow in Ghana has been successfully done covering upper east, northern region and upper west region which constitute the northern part of Ghana. Videos and pictures of the first phase can be found here on my YouTube channel @cryptowall55, https://www.facebook.com/smartcashgh/ and @cryptowall55 on twitter.
I have since 2016 supported cryptotraveler in advocating cryptocurrency through meet ups and conferences under the umbrella of our free markets and liberty think tank: Center for Liberty and Entrepreneurship - www.cleghana.org. This project will be one of the best project for smartcash in Ghana and Africa.
The second phase of Smartcash will be geared towards the southern part of Ghana. The roadshow will go beyond meet ups, radio discussions and Television discussion. This will see business and merchants approach to get merchants and businesses to accept smartcash and make it an alternative medium of exchange to the Ghanaian cedis. Each of these meet ups are expected to record not less than 40 participants each and Smartcash tokens will be given to newbie’s and their addresses submitted to the community. The radio and TV discussions will feature call inn sessions for questions and answers and Smartcash tokens given to listeners who call to ask questions and or contribute. The radio discussions will be heard by over 20,000 people every week and over 1000,000 viewers to the TV discussions. At least 10 businesses and merchants will accept smartcash in the shot to medium term. The success of the roadshow in the northern part of Ghana so far has made smartcash one of the popular digital currencies in Ghana and the current extension aims at making smartcash the first cryptocurrency to have physical store front and kiosks and businesses where smartcash holders can exchange and/or use their fiat for smart and smart for fiat and for purchase of goods and services in Africa.

The aim of this proposal is to extend the current smartcash roadshow and to also introduce merchants and business integration to smartcash in another three regions of Ghana in the next three months with the aim of using existing MOBILE MONEY/MPESA agents to incoporate smartcash into their operations.

This cycle of the project will start from march and end in May. This will start in the national capital (Greater Accra region) to the Ashanti region and end in the Brong Ahafo region with each region getting at least five mobile money agents recruited and trained to exchange smartcash for fiat and fiat for smartcash.Meetings will be held with at least two business to push the agenda to get some businesses start accepting smartcash as a medium of payment for goods and services in Ghana.

This project will contribute significantly in pushing smartcash to be the best digital currency interms of addoption and usage and a perfect alternative to the fiat currency. 

I am asking for US$19866 every month for the next three months to cover three region, Greater Accra, Ashanti and Brong Ahafo region then I will roll inn for another cycle in other to cover the entire country with the smartcash roadshow and business adoption campaign.

BUDGET

Transportation to and within each region for one month                        $3000.00
Accommodation for 8days a month for 5 people                                   $4000.00
Feeding for team                                                                               $2000.00
Smartcash T-shirts for participants in a region                                      $1200.00
Conference room for two meet ups in a region                                      $1200.00
Refreshment for participants in a region                                               $1920.00
Two smartcash radio discussion                                                           $1000.00
One TV discussion in a region                                                              $1500.00
Background smartcash drop down banner                                             $150.00
Smartcash stickers and fliers                                                                $150.00
Cost of photograph services                                                                  $500.00
Tokens for participants a month                                                            $300.00
Token for team and volunteers                                                              $2000.00
SUB-TOTAL                                                                                          $18920
Contingency (5%of 18920)                                                                   $946.00
GRAND TOTAL                                                                                   $19866

 

Justification

proof of work will be shown through pictures and video coverage of each activity through out the proposal cycle and links shared with the community to evaluate the progress of the project each month before the preceeding month activities start. Meet ups and radio dicussions will be covered live on facebook and twitter for the community to follow in realtime

Also there will media coverage such as radio, print and electronic media campaign and marketing through out the cycle but social media such as facebook, twitter and youTube will be used to publish pictures and videos. Radio stations will be used to market merchants and businesses that will accept smartcash for exchange of goods and services

result.title: SmartCash Telegram Refferal Bonus
result.summary: Grow the SmartCash Telegram group by 10.000 members with a refferal bonus
result.description:
Dear SmartCash community, 

My name is Roberto H. from the Netherlands and on the SmartCash forum I am known as Wolfyr (and on Telegram R.A.E.H.).

Together with the SmartCash member who is known as Vlad on the SmartCash forum, we want to initiate a refferal program to grow the SmartCash telegram community by 10.000 members.

As you may or may not know, Telegram has over 100Mln active monthly users and it is the preffered chat app in the cryptocurrency market, that gets used the most.

 

Why this is a big deal for SmartCash:

A lot of crypto investors will not invest in a coin if there is no big Telegram community that comes along with it.

As of now SmartCash doesn't have a Telegram group that helps to attract new people into our community.

It's also to small to win events like the Binance vote (as we recently saw) and this is hurting SmartCash and it's community.

Since we are a community coin, an active, big and growing community is the thing we need the most, because that is what we preach and where all our great ideas and implementation will come from.

A few weeks back the biggest SmartCash Telegram group only had 100 members and there where several diffrent groups.

This is no way for a community coin to be represented on the biggest chat platform of the market!

Since then I made all the different groups join into one larger group: http://t.me/SmartCash_cc.

I appointed good admins to help monitor the new SmartCash telegram group and together we have grown the Telegram community to +- 1000 members and now it's to ramp thing up.

 

How will we grow exponentially?

Vlad and I will intoroduce the refferal program for the SmartCash Telegram community. We will publish it on the forum and pinn a message it the already existing Telegram group.

If the admins allow it we would also like and article on the official SmartCash Steemit to promote the refferal program to our communtiy.

 

How will the refferal program work?

  1. Register with the SmartCash refferal bot on Telegram @smartcashrefferal_bot
  2. Submit your SmartCash address with the bot to receive your refferal bonuses
  3. Start adding users to the SmartCash Telegram group by clicking on "Add member"
  4. Get paid for your refferals to the SmartCash Telegram group

 

Refferal program rules en conditions:

  • You earn 2 SmartCash for every refferal
  • Minimum of 3 refferal to be eligible for a payout
  • After 20.000 SmartCash is paid in refferal bonuses the program will stop
  • Every refferal needs to be added one by one otherwise the bot will not count them as a refferal
  • All refferals will be checked after 7 days, if the refferal left the Telegram group within that time it will not count as a refferal
  • Payouts will be done once a week by Vlad and myself (with a limit of 750 induvidual payments a week, if there are more payments to be done, they will be moved to the next week because of the time it will take processing them)
  • Once a week Vlad an I will publish all results + payments of that week on Telegram and on the SmartCash forum

 

Total costs for SmartCash refferal program:

  • 20.000 SMART in refferal bonuses
  • 1.000 SMART for the creation of the Smartcash refferal bot (Made by Vlad already completed)
  • 5.000 SMART for processing the payments
  • 500 SMART for the proposal paymemt and preparations

Total: 26.500 SMART

result.title: SmartCash California
result.summary: Request for funding to start a Smartcash California Chapter and spread awareness in Silicon Valley, San Francisco, Sacramento, Los Angeles and San Diego.
result.description:
Goal

Our goal is to encourage mass adoption of blockchain technology, bring awareness to the market and help people understand the many use cases.

Objectives

  1. Increase merchant adoption in California
  2. Increase user adoption in California by targeting students on University Campuses
  3. Raise awareness and offer technical support for adoption

Funding

Request for 50,000 SMART to help start the chapter and to fund activities throughout California for 2018.

Specifications

The California Chapter will host Smartcash activities and events in California to bring awareness to the technology. These activities include but are not limited to Information tables, Community BBQ’s, Community Happy Hours and Public Meetups.

Activities

     I.          Set up Smartcash Information Events at Universities

One event per University per year

  • University of California Berkeley
  • University of California Los Angeles
  • University of California San Diego
  • Sanford University

   II.          Create Smartcash Brochures

Develop a Smartcash marketing brochures to distribute to the public.

  • Design, print and distribute 5000 Smartcash brochures

III.          Email List Sign Up

Create a email list for mass marketing.

IV.          Host BBQ’s for the Smartcash Community

Provide food for the Smartcash Community and the general public

  • Host 4 BBQ’s per year in cities throughout California
  • Host a BBQ at Balboa Park, Golden Gate Park, and Lake Hollywood Park

  V.          Host Coffee Shop Meet Ups

The purpose of the meet up is to offer a incentive for coffee shops to accept Smartcash. We would help bring people into the coffee shop. We might possible offer coffee shop owners SMARTS as a donation to help bring awareness and offer support.

VI.          Smartcash Chapter Merchandise

Design and sell Smartcash chapter merchandise to help fund event and activities for the future.

result.title: Smart Cash Instagram Presence
result.summary: This proposal is for services to grow a large, organic following for the Smart Cash Instagram account.
result.description:
As many of us know, Social Media is a great way to get the word out about great currencies like Smart Cash.

Twitter has been an incredible source of information for me personally when it comes to Smart Cash and other Cryptocurrencies. Although Twitter is great, I spend more of my time on Instagram.

I would love to see Smart Cash grow a large following on Instagram. Instagram has over 800 million monthly active users and is still growing rapidly. There is a great opportunity for Smart Cash to reach thousands or even tens of thousands via Instagram.

Goal/Who I am: My name is Andy Dew. I currently manage over 30 Instagram accounts and grow targeted followings on each account. I would love to do this for Smart Cash at a fraction of the cost it would be to outsource to someone who isn’t invested and a part of the Smart Cash community. I own a Smart Node and I’m active in the Smart Cash discord (@CryptoDino) and really believe in this project.

I log into these Instagram accounts and follow, occasionally like, and unfollow based off things like followings of similar/competitor accounts, hashtags, and locations. This eventually generates around 800-1,500+ new followers per month (the number varies quite a bit based off things like quality of content posted on the account). Engagment also increases on the acount (higher number of likes and comments per post). I’ve grown my personal account (@AndyDew) to over 49k followers. Feel free to look at my content and check out my interaction and engagement levels.

Other Instagram accounts I currently manage: 

@JohnmHo

@justinbrownfit

@marektarkowski555

Feel free to ask me on Discord or DM me on Instagram if you'd like to see examples of other accounts I manage.

There is no reason Smart Cash shouldn't have one of the largest and most active followings on Instagram, for a community focused Cryptocurrency.

Here is the timeline and milestones I am proposing:

Initial TimeLine: 3 Months

Amount to be paid in Smart Cash dollar equivalent: $450 ($150/month).

The cost goes toward:

software costs ($40/Month), daily time spent monitoring account and generating monthly reports ($10/hr). 
This service is soley for growing the Instagram account. The current person managing the Smart Cash Instagram will continue to post content as usual.

Timeline: 3 months: I will produce a progress report each month, showing the growth/progress of the account. 

As of March 2nd 2018, Smart Cash has 799 followers. The last 5 posts have an average of 76 likes per post.

Milestone number 1 (Arpil 18): Average growth of 400+ new followers per month and over 100 likes on every post. 

Milestone number 2 (May 18): Average growth of 600+ new followers per month and over 150 likes on every post.

Milestone number 3 (June 18): Average growth of 900+ new followers per month and over 200 likes on every post.

After three months a new proposal will be generated for something more long-term (6-12 months) and the community can decide if the Smart Cash spent is worth the following that is generated from this service.

Total hours expected for project completion: 25-40 hours.

I look forward to seeing Smart Cash generate a larger, more establsihed Instagram presence. 

-Andy

result.title: Building the SmartCash community in the Netherlands
result.summary:
Smartport.cc, The Dutch Connection
Increasing the number of SmartCash users in the Netherlands. The objective is to build a strong SmartCash community in the Netherlands by:
Year 1
•	Building a community of dedicated people
•	Building a community of smartcash merchants
•	Facilitation of SmartCashTrade
•	Writing articles about cryptos in general and on SmartCash specific
•	Perform as a speaker on several events (goal 20-100 per year)
•	Education of the community members so they can perform as a speaker themselves
•	Build a site on Smartport.cc
result.description:
Building a community of dedicated people

SmartCash promotion on social media
Do a lot of SmartCash promotion on social media/short movies/trailers for events/building facebook/linkedin groups. Smartport wants to appoint one person who will do this on a part-time basis.
$ 4.000 per month/ $ 48.000,00 in Year 1

Community building events
Organise 4 community building-events to learn people about SmartCash, make them enthousiast and get them active as SmartCash ambassadors. Everyone who joins the Ambassador Network gets rewarded in Smart.
$ 10.000,00 per event/$ 40.000,00 in Year 1

Building a community of smartcash merchants
Every ambassodor on his turn should promote SmartCash amongs (web) shopholders, restaurants, bars etc to accept SmartCash as a mean of payment.

Smartport needs a budget per merchant. Smartmerchants get listed on Smartport.cc, get support on organising the payments in Smart and will be invited to the ambassador community. The individual ambassador has to be rewarded for his or her efforts. The needed budget depends on the size of the merchant. The size of the merchant is measured on the number of cashdecks. Webshops are rated by the number of yearly visitors.
Needed budget: $ 2.000,00 per Cashdeck. Webshop, $ 1,00 per yearly visitor.

Facilitation of SmartCashTrade
On Smartport.cc will be a possibility to buy and sell Smart, peer to peer. In the beginning it can be very simple. Through the year there will be a continuous development of the site. It is neccessary for the growth of SmartCash, that people can buy Smart directly, without first buying BTC.

Writing articles about cryptos in general and on SmartCash specific
Write several articles about cryptocurrencies in general and Smart Cash specific. In every generic article the word SmartCash will be used at least one time. In the specific articles aspect of SmarCash, like Smart Rewards, Smart Governance etcetera will be described more specific.
Some examples for articles
• How to open a cryptocurrency wallet;
• Who owns your crypotocoins?;
• Hashing, the blockchain secret;
• How does blockchain work?;
• What is an ICO?;
• What currency to buy;
• How big are cryptocurrencies;
• Mining the new banking;
• Everyone a banker;
• Crypto safety;

• What is SmartCash?
• The smart hyve.
• Renew your Wallet
• Smart Rewards
• Smart Governance
• Smart Budgets

Needed budget: $ 20.000,00

Perform as a speaker on several events (goal 20-100 per year)
Needed Budget: $ 2.000,00 per occasion

Education of the community members so they can perform as a speaker themselves
Organising 4 training days to educate other SmartCash ambassadors. These days will cost a lot of preparation/promotion/hiring a site etc. Needed budget $ 6.000,00 per training day.

Build a site on Smartport.cc
SmartPort.cc will play an important role in the promotion of SmartCash in the Netherlands. First it will be a portal where the merchants get listed an where SmartCash can be bought. Through the year and the years to follow, the site will get more and more sophisticated. Merchants can build a webshop on the site, SmartCash can be bought and sold, maybe we can even list other currencies on the site.
The development of the site should be an ongoing process. Needed budget in Year 1: $ 80.000,00.

result.title: Creation of SmartStudent ecosystems: Stage 1 by CoachDigi
result.summary:
This is stage 1 of the creation of SmartStudent ecosystem. We'll be focused in starting a SmartStudent community in two different universities in 2 different cities of Mexico: Universidad Anahuac Cancun at Cancun and Universidad de las Americas Puebla at Cholula, we will also start spreading the SmartCash word to highschool students.
We will creat the SmartStudent ecosystem with food schoolarships to some students and athletes from the universities.  The students will receive weekly SmartCash so they can pay their food in different restaurants/establishments that are part of our SmartRestaurants club.  This restaurants will receive SmartCash as payment.

For creating the SmartStudent ecosystem we first have to create a SmartStudent community involving Students, restaurants and universities adminsitrations.

The objective of Stage 1 is:
a) to convince at least 5 restaurants/establishmenst to accept SmartCash as payment in every city
b)Know what can the universities contribute to SmartCash (SmartCash ATM, SmartCash branding in campus, SmartCash meetups, SmartCash campus radio, SmartCash sport tickets payment, etc) and what SmartCash can contribute to the universities (Sponsorship of: Sports teams, conferences, students activites, Blockchain courses, etc)
c)Know what students need (how they receive their monthly budget, what restaurants/establishments the students go, etc)

How we will do it?
With 8 meetups in 3 different cities (Cancun, Cholula and Mexico city)
With meetings with universities personel and restaurant/establishment owners

When?
stage 1 first month: from march 28th to april 29th

Budget: $7,515.00 USD
result.description:
Who am I?
I´m Coach Digi and I live with Oremor (my wife) in Cancún, México. I´m a public highschool teacher and a college american football coach. I´m also an industrial engineer with a masters degree in mkt.
I´m a Bitcuner (Cancún crypto community) and had been promoting cryptos for the last months by doing monthly meetups. this meetups have been focused in highschool and college students of Cancún.
I new about SmartCash in november, thanks to @oucan ´s and @Eiky SmartCash Meetup in Cancun and bought my first SmartCash.
I started minning SmartCash with some GPUs and also I have a Smartnode.

Why a SmartStudent ecosystem?

  • The young generations are the ones who will adopt cryptos in the future, so introducting SmartCash to highschool and university students, will help masive SmartCash adoption

What is a SmartStudent ecosystem_

  • Foreign and international Students can receive their monthly budget from their parents in SmartCash.
  • Students can pay in the school cafeteria, restaurants and establishments with SmartCash and use their SmartCard
  • SmartCash is a sponsor of universities activities like, sports, culture, tech conferences, etc, and are paid with SmartCash

How will we create a Smartstudent ecosystem?

  • We will start the Smartstudent ecosystem by sponsoring students and sports teams of the university,
  • with food schoolarships.
  • The students will receive an amount of SmartCash weekly, so they can buy their meals at the School cafeteria and other restaurants and establishments.
  • Also each student with a schoolarship will invite a different friend weekly to eat in a restaurant,
  • the friend will receive some SmartCash so he can pay his meal and keep some SmartCash in his wallet.

Where?
Cancun, Quintana Roo Mexico:
We will start with the Anáhuac University campus Cancun. even do is a small university (2000 students) Anahuac University has more than 5 campus in Mexico.
Hihgschool CBTIS #111 (2800 students) I teach here.

Cholula, Puebla, Mexico:
We will start at the Universidad de las Americas-Puebla.. It´s one of the university that more appears and news coverage has in Mexico (10,000) students.

Both universities have an american football and sports teams (I played in th UDLAP and coached at Anáhuac Cancún) and both have foreign and international students.

When?
We divided this proyect in 4 stages, the first stage will start in March.
Stage 1: Conception of a SmartStudent community in the college campus.
Stage 2: Birth of a SmartStudent Ecosystem.
Stage 3: Growth of the SmartStudent Ecosystem.
Stage 4: Reproduction of a SmartStudent Ecosystem.

Stage 1: Concepcion (2 months: part of march, april and may). : Create a SmartStudent Community

We will do a marketing research, so we can know the needs of the SmartStudent Ecosystem’s elements. ( restaurants/establishments, students and authorities).

Restaurante owners:

  • We will start some SmartCash presentations to restaurants and establishments owners, so they can know about SmartCash and how they can accept SmartCash as payment.
  • We will do Meetups in the food establishments. (I had already talk to some in Cancun and Cholula and are ready to participate).
  • We need at least 5 restaurants that accepts SmartCash in each town for stage 2.
  • We will create the SmartRestaurant Club, only for restaurants and establishments that accept SmartCash.

Students:

  • We will start doing SmartStudents meetups so they can know how to use SmartCash as payment in establishments.
  • In the first meetup we will ask for volunteers that can help us promote the next SmartStudents meetups, so in a future they will be the ones who will do the SmartStudents meetup.

University authorities:

  • We will start talking and presenting SmartCash to the university authorities.
  • First we will talk with the head coaches of the football teams, so they can introduce us with other university authorities.
  • We will talk with the universities cafeterias about SmartCash.

** 8 Meetups in 3 Cities.**

City Place Month day Meetups Attendees

Cancún, México CBTIS #111 March 19-23 4 140
México City Crisanta April 3 1 30
Puebla Karma Bagels April 5 1 30
Cancún, México Crypto Club April 21 1 30
Puebla Karma Bagels April 27 1 30
total 8 260

Budget and milestones

TOTAL Budget: $7,515.00 USD
