result.title: Talent Land México SponsorShip 30k attendees event.
result.summary:
MEXICO FINTECH FRIENDLY

The opportunity that is presented to us in Mexico is one that we should not lose since the Fintech law was recently passed.

This new law will allow a real expansion of the innovative projects of financial technology and digital currencies with the consent of the governmental, financial and regulatory institutions for the optimal performance of the financial ideas in favor of a population of 140 million people.

Guadalajara, the second most important city in Mexico, is today a leader in technology and an important point in this field when considering the Silicon Valley of Latin America.

In Guadalajara, the most important technology event will take place, the Talent Land http://2018.talent-land.mx/3 , where 30,000 people, including business executives, students, representatives of the Ministry of Economy and academic institutions, will seek to have a relationship with innovative projects including those of blockchain and therefore it is the greatest opportunity to present SmartCash to this new generation that seeks solutions to humanity.
result.description:
Please visit the pre-proposal link
https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/talent-land-mexico-sponsorship/3616

MEXICO FINTECH FRIENDLY

The opportunity that is presented to us in Mexico is one that we should not lose since the Fintech law was recently passed.
http://www.senado.gob.mx/sgsp/gaceta/63/3/2017-10-12-1/assets/documentos/Iniciativa_Ejecitvo_Federal.pdf2

Mexico's Congress passes FinTech Law
 
This new law will allow a real expansion of the innovative projects of financial technology and digital currencies with the consent of the governmental, financial and regulatory institutions for the optimal performance of the financial ideas in favor of a population of 140 million people.

This fintech law now allows Mexico to place itself in a privileged position with respect to all emerging countries, since it accepts that cryptocurrencies are a good of exchange of value. Mexico is a leader in investment in startups since 3 years ago and ranks first in technological projects in Latin America.

Guadalajara, the second most important city in Mexico, is today a leader in technology and an important point in this field when considering the Silicon Valley of Latin America.

In Guadalajara, the most important technology event will take place, the Talent Land http://2018.talent-land.mx/3 , where 30,000 people, including business executives, students, representatives of the Ministry of Economy and academic institutions, will seek to have a relationship with innovative projects including those of blockchain and therefore it is the greatest opportunity to present SmartCash to this new generation that seeks solutions to humanity.

It is the largest innovation and entrepreneurship event that takes place for the entire talent community that interacts throughout the year to share knowledge and strengthen its development.

This is the most important appointment based in Mexico, where talents, investors, recruiters and institutions meet to bond.

The team from Mexico is willing to collaborate as we did in Anarchapulco and Anarchaforko with the same vision of making known in this forum the advantages of our technology.

This event will allow us to have a space for direct dialogue with people who are interested in technology as a solution to the problems of humanity and introduce the idea of ??decentralization and new means of commerce.

With a presentation before this type of public we are sure that we will leave a precedent in the mind of this entire community.

BACKGROUND
The team that is promoting and that was the initial idea of ??@oucan also support it with the commitment to carry it out @thewalk_er @eiky and @pest.

The four of us have shown our effort to the community.

@oucan and @eiky with their proposal of “Smart Fridays” for the southeast region of Mexico with results to date in meetups that take place every Friday in order to introduce them first the blockchain technology and then teach them how SmartCash is an alternative for decentralized payments, in a safe and fast way.

@pest collaborating in Mexico City to create an economy based on SmartCash, trading its products in smart and presenting the already approved proposal of the SmartCash promotion in mixed martial arts events.

@thewalk_er producing informative videos and tutorials on YouTube with the SmartVlog channel which shows news in addition to the management of the online community with @oucan with the Facebook channels on their fan page and the Facebook group, Twitter, WhatsApp and lately Telegram, answering the questions of the people who enter the different channels.

THE PROPOSAL

Talen Land is the platform where SmartCash will have the largest exposure it has had so far.

 
Jalisco Talent Land 2018

Talent land is an event where 30,000 people meet, our goal is to present SmartCash within “Future Land” a section for fintech and blockchain projects.

 
Descubre cada tierra que conforma Jalisco Talent Land
 facebook.com

Talent Network

El mayor evento de Talento y Tecnología del Mundo estará en Jalisco por muchos años. Con las alianzas más potentes y los contenidos más innovadores. Jalisco Talent Land.

 
 

We will participate through a Level 3, “BRONZE PLUS sponsorship membership” at a cost of USD 16,010 ($300,000 MXN).
What is included in the membership

Marketing Promotion
1x Conference and Workshop
There will be a conference given by @Thewalk_er, @Octoleaks (Invited from Costa Rica, admin SmartCash Latam) and @oucan, about SmartCash, the basics, what we are doing and what is coming (the RoadMap)

Idea Challenge * talent contest
There will be a dynamic in which we summon young people to give ideas of adoption of SmartCash technology, as well as technological, social and marketing proposals as well as possible alliances.

HR marketing campaign
We will evaluate the skills of the attendees and invite them to the smartcash community, with suggested tasks.

Online and Offline Marketing
1x Logo Sponsor web
10x Posts on Talent Network Campaign
1x Logo printed material
1x News letter of talent network content
20 Standard Tickets
We will make a contest via facebook to give away 10 tickets.
4x VIP tickets

Institutional
Logo on Inauguration, Closure and Final report

This membership offers a space Stand / Booth of 6x3 Meters, 18 m2 (193.75 square feet)
We will have printed SmartCash advertising throughout the booth
Two p2p training tables with qualified people to teach attendees from the basics to the advanced smartcash. (what is smartcash / open wallets)
A person in charge of training merchant adopters using smartcard, if it is via online support with training to use the plug in coinpayments / woocommerce in their online store sites.
A person distributing stickers, key rings, shirts and paper wallets throughout the event.
Have a Smart / MXN mini exchange (sale only) After the event If there are still smarts available we will donate them to a local Cancer Foundation, as well as the proceeds from Mexican Pesos will also be used to donate to the foundation.

Please see here the Budget Document for a clear view of the the following items

docs.google.com1

General Budget

Please see here the Budget Document for a clear view of the the following items

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1NATZqa5O3NxRKTMkpAY4i71MOTCuORtHMa66X7KnZW4


And here you have the detailed budget.

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wOlWvVbRgVKdSPQYAfnKnikotaekEvv5

With the printing of 200 SmartCash t-shirts.
400 printed 3D keychains.
8 meters of printed vinyl sticker, logos, merchant adopters.

Due to the great physical and psychological work involved in the event and the number of people attending we will need at least 9 people, we will rotate to meet the strategies mentioned above, it is important for us to have elements that are physically and emotionally well, achieve efficiency in the tasks. For which we will pay 90 USD per person per day.

Due to the fact that it is an event with a duration of 5 days, we will provide accommodation for the STAFF members.
We will print, flyers and canvases to increase the visibility of smartcash at the event.

@Octoleaks a Venezolan pioneer member of smartcash in Spanish speaking countries, member of the MonkeyCoin Exchange and founder and administrator of smartcashlatam on Facebook and Living in Costa Rica. We will pay his round trip plane ticket as well as accommodation and we will give you 700 USD for personal expenses during his stay.

Likewise, the 9 members of the Staff will receive the cost of their roundtrip plane tickets which we estimate at 200 USD, that is 1800 USD in total.

Transportation costs
To move the printed materials, shirts, stickers. We will use the UBER platform or a local equivalent.

Unexpected expenses
One of the key elements of a planning is the prevention for which we consider $700 dollars to cover any unexpected event.

In addition to the exhibition, what will we offer?

Every day we will broadcast live.
We will publish content via twitter
Reports
Interviews
Daily reports on the activities carried out.
A final report with everything done to provide total transparency.

We thank everyone because we know that with this proposal we will give a boost to the project without precedent.

Any suggestions from the Community are very welcomed so we can introduce them in the Final Proposal.

Sincerely

Omar Ucan (Oucan), Ignacio Figueroa (TheWalk_er), Alexander Pest (Pest), Eiky

 

Please visit the pre-proposal link
https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/talent-land-mexico-sponsorship/3616

result.title: SmartEvent in top French Business School with 4 000 students
result.summary:
I will introduce Smartcash to a Top 5 French Business School with 4 000 students from which 1/3 comes from abroad, with the help of another Smartie, @Math, the 28th of March.
We'll meet in my Business School to play some "Smartgames" with students and explain them what makes Smartcash unique in the crypto world: 
-	The Hive
-	The community funds
-	The voting system
result.description:
Click here to read a more beautiful - with pictures - and more detailed version of this proposal

 

About me

I discovered Smartcash in early January and I got involved since then.

To help coordinate Smartcash’s communication, I founded the “Communication Task Force” with @blockchainrelations in late January.

Apart from Smartcash, I’m studying business and management in a top 5 French Business School called EDHEC.

 

2 students associations I’m a member of organize our green event of the year. We call it “the sustainable week”. From the 26th to the 28th of March, we’ll be gathering hundreds of international students and several local entrepreneurs involved in green business.

Each day has a topic and day 3 focuses on sustainable technologies. I’ll add Smartcash to the party.

 

 

During the event

The public will mostly be composed of students, and they’re not all used to crypto. So I’ll start with a conference:

“What can crypto currencies be used for ? What is the difference between Smartcash and Bitcoin ?”

I’ll take them to the Smartcash website, show its forum, and discord channel to illustrate the active community + show them how they can also get involved. I’ll explain how the common found and the proposals works, showcase how easy and fast it is to pay with Smartcash, and also the roadmap including the new payment card prototype.

After this conference, we’ll do a quiz about Smartcash to test their newly acquired knowledge. Best scores will win amazing Smartcash goodies !

Click here to see the images of the Smartgoodies students will win !

Thanks to @simplifylife for networking and @camakin for the original design.

 

Finally we’ll play some fun games on the Smartcash theme (we’re currently working on the games) and I’ll keep distributing goodies.  

For this special occasion, Math - another cool smartie I met on this forum - will come from Chartres, another French city, to my business school so he can assist me on the event and illustrate that being a smartie is being a member of a community.

Thanks to Smartcash participating in our event with a conference, a quiz and some games with awesome goodies, hundreds of students will know and feel positive about it at the end of the day.

 

 

After the event

To get the best results from this event even when it'll be over, I’ll make sure students keep hearing about Smartcash.

To reach this goal, I’ll make Smartcash a partner of 2 students associations of my business school. I can do this because I’m the partnership department manager of these 2 associations.

As our official partner, Smartcash will benefit from year round communication. We will publish articles about it on our online channels and also exhibit Smartcash’s logo on all our events + our associations jackets.

These associations are “Ecothink” and “Oikos International”. You can find more info on them at the end of this proposal.

 

 

Sum up

We offer:

  • 20 minutes conference + 10 minutes QnA about Smartcash
  • Quizzes and games where students can win our branded goodies
  • Official partnership with our 2 student associations, Ecothink and Oikos
  • Access to asso websites + social networks targeting students of EDHEC Business School for regular articles about Smartcash
  • Photos of the event and maybe videos

 Total costs of the event: $949 (or 769 €). Find the breakdown of the costs in the link below.

 

By saying yes to this proposal, you support the international student adoption plan and more precisely you:

  • Instantly build massive Smartcash brand awareness in a top 5 French Business school called EDHEC
  • Encourage long lasting notoriety in this school through 2 partnerships with student associations
  • Participate to the French part of the international student adoption plan

 

Useful links

Link to breakdown of the costs

Link to a more beautiful - with pictures - and more detailed version of this proposal

Link to the pre-proposal page

Link to the Communication Task Force Page

 

 

Additional links

Link to the official EDHEC Business School website

Link to the Ecothink student association website

Link to the Oikos International association website

result.title: Decentralized Future web series | Sponsorship
result.summary:
With the support of Smart Cash community, we will produce a webserie called Decentralized Future, with more than 30 hours long content talking about the disruptive technologies of the cryptosphere that will change the world, with the most relevant people and companies available on the brazilian market.

This will be a game changer for the entire cryptosphere. For years all brazilian media use a bad narrative about cryptocurrency. To fight back, we will interview the best brazilian companies and specialist of the cryptosphere (including the renomaded RSK from Argentina) and show to millions of brazilians that there are very serious companies and people behind it, working for a better future.

The web serie will also bring in a more mature audience of professionals working on the main sectors of the economy.

There is no high quality content talking about cryptos in Brazil, neither talking about SmartCash project, this is a important step to achieve mass adoption, and we need your support to make it possible.
result.description:
Goal:

  • To produce the first Brazilian web series about the cryptosphere with cinematographic quality.

  • Reach more than 1 Million people to watch the - Decentralized Future - web series:

    30.000 brazilian stock market professionals;
    400.000 non-investors of all economic sectors.
    1.400.000 brazilian cryptocurrency investors;

     

    Web serie link - https://www.300traders.com.br/webnario-futuro-descentralizado

 

Benefit to SmartCash:

These webserie allow SmartCash to get exposure and reputation to thousands of serious brazilian people and companies.

 

Structure:

Each main episode will be around 1 hour in length. It will start with the SmartCash logo as the Sponsor.

Plus the full interviews, about 30 hours. It will finish with the SmartCash logo as the Sponsor.

 

Who we are:

300 Traders is a new Brazilian company, specialized in courses and training for traders and Brazilian investors, focused on the crypto-currency market.

The teachings within our courses combine the principles of trading and traditional economics to the use of cutting-edge technologies and strategies in the crypto-currency market.

Leandro Lima, Co-Founder of the 300 Traders.

Former Ex-Investor of fixed income assets of Brazil during the years of 2012 to 2015.

In cryptocurrencies since beginning 2014 - full time since ending 2016.

Our main goal is to empower mass adoption.I am new on Smart Cash community, since I’ve discovered, I decide to become a holder and active promote it.

Linkedin
https://www.linkedin.com/in/leandro-lima-ba4814141

Edson Beux, Co-Founder of the 300 Traders.

Formerly Ex-autonomous variable income asset trader at BMF-Bovespa, from 2013 to 2017.

Worked as a futures trader at Propex in the city of Sydney, Australia, from 2016 to 2017, trading the US and Australia treasures.

Active in cryptocurrencies since beginning 2017

Also a teacher of the 300 Traders.

Linkedin
https://www.linkedin.com/in/édson-beux-76a8a496/1

 

The webserie:

300 Traders will produce a webserie called Decentralized Future, the largest brazilian cinema-produced crypto-coin series with people that we consider references in their respective areas of expertise.

The narrative of the webserie will be;

  • Recent Brazilian Economic Crises (hyperinflation and blockade of access to money);
  • Birth of Bitcoin, its development and evolution;
  • Scalability and altcoins solutions;
  • Developments in technologies from various sectors of the global economy for the next years;
  • The Decentralized Future.

 

Example of filming style:

Our model is the “Código da Riqueza (Wealth Code)“ webseries
You can watch it here :

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=73X8gIxB-Gg

The format is documentary.

And Brasil Parelelo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f_RG5zkfdgk

 

List of CONFIRMED speakers:

We are currently in contact with more than 30 serious persons/companies on the Brazilian crypto community to participate on this project. The confirmed persons and companies are listed below:

Carl Amorim - Executive Representative at Blockchain Research Institute

Business Consultant with a focus on developing new network based business models, helping companies move from industrial age models for the knowledge society by applying concepts such as social networks, cloud computing, collaborative work and networking.
With 25 years experience in sales and marketing on several models and business, from consumer goods manufacturing to services. 8 years working with networks and business models on the internet.

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/carlamorim/

Thiago Lima - Co-Founder of Embarcados

Embarcados is a website that has more than 150.000 thousand accesses p/month talking about Internet of Things, hardware and software, in addition to doing more than 50 lectures per year all over Brazil. He speaks openly that he invests in crypto-coins and believes in it’s potential for the future.

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/tplima/

Manrik Martins

20 years of experience in the area of variable income with passages by areas of trading, analysis and investor relations. Specialized in the area of Dynamic Hedging.
Extensive international experience for 10 years in the USA, where he had obtained his academic training and worked for Bozano Bank, Simonsen in NY.

Linkedin:https://www.linkedin.com/in/marink-martins-9b9b681/

Thiago Cesar- CEO at Transfero Swiss AG

Transfero Swiss AG is specialized in cryptocurrencies and digital assets investment products, including the safekeeping of digital tokens. Based in Switzerland at the heart of the crypto-valley, it customers can expect a frictionless experience when investing in cryptocurrencies, not having to worry about mobile wallets, private key backups and other technical complications that are inherent to the digital assets market.

Linkedin:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/thiacesar/

RSK

RSK is the first open-source smart contract platform with a 2-way peg to Bitcoin that also rewards the Bitcoin miners via merge-mining, allowing them to actively participate in the Smart Contract revolution. RSK goal is to add value and functionality to the Bitcoin ecosystem by enabling smart-contracts, near instant payments and higher-scalability.

Gabriel Aleixo

Member of the advisory board of Equilibrium Entreprises in the field of Innovation. A* Star Business Developer. Co-creator and presenter of the Bitcoin webseries in Portuguese. He was the project director at FGV Júnior Consultoria & Finanças, where he led consultants responsible for entrepreneurship and strategic planning of the company. Researcher at ITS Rio, acting since 2013 on the fronts of Bitcoin, blockchain technology, digital security and online education.

Linkedin
https://www.linkedin.com/in/gabriel-aleixo/

 

Budget:

  • Transportation: $2200 (Airplane tickets for 2 people to 3 cities (Rio de Janeiro, São Paulo, Buenos Aires)

  • Production and Post-Production: $4000 (full-time working on the webserie for 3 months, will be around 30 hours of interviews)

  • Marketing: $3000

        Sponsored posts on websites of relevance.

        Youtube Ads

  • Accomodation: $0 (we will stay at known people houses in São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro and in a hostel in Argentina);

  • Speakers Payment: FREE (all of them agreed to speak for free);

 

Total Investment Amount = $9200

 

Payment schedule:

  • Payment $2200 (paid in advance for the costs of airplane tickets)

  • Payment $2000 (paid in advance for the costs of production)

  • Payment $2000 (paid after the production and post-production is complete)

  • Payment $3000 (paid after the post-production is complete to start marketing campaigns)

 

Deliverables:

  • 15th April - Start the production and filming of the webserie and be back to our Headquarter before 5th May to start the post-production

    4 days in Rio de Janeiro
    2 weeks in São Paulo
    2 days in Buenos Aires - Argentina (RSK)

  • 5th May - The post production it will take 1 month - it involves legal processes, authorizations of images, audiovisual editing, etc… it’s the most complex process and takes time.

  • 10th June - Start the pre-launch of the webseries, working on teasers and organic networking to prepare the people for whats coming.

  • 10th July - Release of the Decentralized Future webserie.

 

As you can see most of money will be spent on airplane travel, filming, edition making and marketing.

There is no high quality content talking about cryptos in Brazil, neither talking about SmartCash project, this is a important step to achieve mass adoption, and we need your support to make it possible.

 

Please visit the pre-proposal link

https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/decentralized-future-sponsorship/3651

result.title: Videos and Social Media in Spanish for Latin America 2.0
result.summary:
This is a continuation of the Previously Approved “Proposal for SmartCash expansion within Mexico with Social Media and videos”

Hello Smarties,

After creating a Pre-Proposal and hearing the comments from the Community, I am Presenting this Proposal before you with the changes suggested in Discord.

I am @thewalk_er my name is Ignacio Figueroa and I live in Mexico, I have been working in the community for 6 months now, helping to spread the word about SmartCash in Spanish.

For the last four months I have been producing informative videos, tutorials and interviews on several events in the Youtube Channel “SmartVlog”
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6any6NuctZ3R7roopbARwA/videos21,
And working as well with the help of @oucan with the social media channels and creating the community in Mexico.

The previous Proposal ends on March 31st. And in order to continue the efforts I am submitting this new Proposal upgraded from the previous one with more content and services and which I have called the version 2.0
This can start with your help on April through July.
result.description:
Introduction
We have a population of 650 Million people living in all Latin America, most of them are new to this new technology, the blockchain.

We are an emergent continent with a lot of potential in tech-industry and leading new fintech endeavors and blockchain initiatives, who are waiting to discover new ways of decentralization and economic freedom.

Spanish is the Second most used language in the world only after Mandarin by native speakers and communicating about SmartCash to all these population is a challenge, that is why I have decided to continue this effort, now with the expansion to Latin America countries, which for so many reasons are far away from knowing what the blockchain is and what SmarCash is, now it is time to achieve new goals and break the borders to reach even more people.

Proposal Goals
The proposal includes the following but not limited to:

Video Production
• Continue with the production of SmartVlog YouTube Channel
• This time I am increasing the quality of the videos and adding a cinematic production.
• 90% of all the income from the previous proposal went directly on buying new equipment such as Professional Video Cameras, Audio Systems, wireless microphones, recorders, Lighting, Livestreaming Equipment, and Hardware for Post Production.

Since I own a Photography Service Company I also have an array of lenses, reflectors, flashes, backgrounds, tripods, stands and all type of gear needed.

• In the previous proposal it was agreed to create at least 4 videos per month, in this proposal I am increasing to 6 videos per month minimum.

So I am increasing the number of videos for the same previously budget approved.

• To visit at least 4 Latin American Countries where events about SmartCash are hold, record the events, make the interviews and make livestreaming on social media.

-Suggestions of countries to visit are: Colombia, Venezuela, El Salvador, Brazil

• To assist to every event in Mexico related with SmartCash to record and create the content for promotion.

Social Media
• To keep managing the Mexico Group for Facebook with a total of 1,676 community members.
• To keep Managing the Twitter account for Mexico and the WhatsApp group.
• Managing the community is a challenge since this has to be done in a very respectful way and giving a follow up on all the questions that might rise.
-A constant follow up on this social media is key for bringing more users to the platform.
-Answering the questions and connecting the people also to our official twitter account @scashofficial and the website smartcash.cc
• Graphics Design needed for Facebook and Twitter
• Creation of Ads for Facebook and Twitter campaigns

At the end of the project, a compile of experiences and documents will be created for future initiatives in other regions.

Amount
Breakdown

Video Production
• 115 hours per month on pre-production, traveling, production and post-production.
Price per hour $24.50 USD (it includes wages and equipment previously mentioned)
Video Production= 115*24.50 =$2,817.50 USD

• Air travel expenses per month =$800 USD

One trip per month to a different country

It was suggested by the community to add the costs of food and hotels while traveling
*Hotel, food and local transportation $500 USD

Social Media Management
• 60 hours per month on social media management at $10 USD per hour
Subtotal $600 USD

SubTotal $4,717.50 USD per month

Total $18,870 USD

If the community believes that the proposal length can be increased from 4 to 6 months I can keep the same monthly budget. Adding Argentina and Chile.

Please note, that with the same amount approved previously I am adding four international trips and two more videos per month (6 videos per month).

So no increase in the budget but offering more results, and a very competitive budget, this is the way to maintain the trust in the community by giving more and contributing to this project.

Payments are due at the end of every month after deliverying the report.
Videos are uploaded as soon as are edited.
Social Media Management its run 7 days a week.

By voting YES on this proposal you are giving the opportunity to many to know about our project in Latin America.

Best
Ignacio Figueroa
Mexico Ambassador

result.title: Building the SmartCash community in the Netherlands (Stage 1=3 months)
result.summary:
Smartport.cc, The Dutch Connection
Increasing the number of SmartCash users in the Netherlands. The objective is to build a strong SmartCash community in the Netherlands by:
Stage 1
•	Building site on SmartPort cc including promotion on social media
•	Facilitation of SmartCashTrade
•	Building a community of smartcash merchants
•	Perform as a speaker on several events, goal 20 per Year
result.description:
Build a site on Smartport.cc

SmartPort.cc will play an important role in the promotion of SmartCash in the Netherlands. First it will be a portal where the merchants get listed and where SmartCash can be bought. Through the year and the years to follow, the site will get more and more sophisticated. Merchants can build a webshop on the site, SmartCash can be bought and sold, maybe we can even list other currencies on the site.
The development of the site should be an ongoing process. Stage 1 will be used to design the site, get it working for buying Smart, so the Public can download a wallet and buy Smart directly, without first buying BTC. In this stage the first merchants who accept SmartCash will be listed. If the budget is sufficient, there will be built in a peer to peer selling facility as well. For this stage a budget is needed of $ 20,000.

Together with that comes the promotion of Smart on social media. A serious campagn costs around $ 300,000 a Year. We will keep it simple, but we need one person who will dedicate at least 20 hrs a week for the campagn. Budget needed: $ 4,000 a month ($ 12,000 stage 1)

 

Building a community of smartcash merchants

We will put a big effort in convincing (web) shopholders, restaurants, bars etc to accept SmartCash as a mean of payment. We will list the merchants on Smartport.cc. We will support the merchants in programming their website in order to be able to accept SmartCash and we will support other merchants to facilitate payments in SmartCash in their shop or restaurant.

Smartport needs a budget per merchant. Smartmerchants get listed on Smartport.cc, get support on organising the payments in Smart and will be invited to the ambassador community. The needed budget depends on the size of the merchant. The size of the merchant is measured on the number of cashdecks. Webshops are rated by the number of yearly visitors.
Needed budget: $ 2.000,00 per Cashdeck. Webshop, $ 1,00 per yearly visitor.

 

Perform as a speaker on several events (goal 5 in stage 1)

Needed Budget: $ 2.000,00 per occasion. This is the fixed fee, and will be used to cover travel expensel/ hotel costs, promotion material, booking costs etcetera. The events will be used to promote SmartCash, to build the community of ambassadors and merchants. If there is spoken on less occasions, off course these occasions won't be declared.

The first occasion to come is the following: https://www.facebook.com/events/225631331328013/.

result.title: Reach Millions of People with News Networks throughout the World and Maintain Ongoing Engagement
result.summary: We put together this comprehensive media relations initiative by combining our years of experience and valuable relationships with the input received from the community via two different surveys and ongoing discussions on Discord. For more than 12 weeks, there will be ongoing dissemination of SmartCash content to a vast audience.
result.description:
The most effective strategies involve laying a strong foundation, proper delivery of news, guaranteed follow-up articles with mass distribution, third-party voices via social media network, reaching out to writers/journalists as buzz grows, ongoing engagement with multiple methods of communication, and steady branding to new audiences with shared interests.

Live Webinar (Recorded for Future Viewing)

A live webinar is scheduled for Sunday (3/18/18) at 5pm ET (9pm GMT) to demonstrate how everything comes together visually. To join, visit the following link at the appointed time: https://zoom.us/j/285837818. A recorded version will be made available within 24 hours via Discord and the comment section below.

GlobeNewswire’s Countries and Languages for Global Press Releases

Full list of outlets can be found at http://www.blockchainrelations.io/presentations/global-distribution/

Primary Media Networks for Article Distribution



Core Team Assigned to SmartCash Media Relations Campaign


News Media Tracker Website

SmartCash community will be able to see all placements and featured content from crypto enthusiasts as well as official press releases and recent tweets from the official SmartCash Twitter account. It will be mobile friendly and built on Wordpress so new content can be efficiently added via blog/rss functionality.


Other Tools to Accomplish Objectives

  • MeltWater – Ability to identify journalists that recently wrote on blockchain/cryptocurrency for targeted outreach ($6,000/year fee already paid by us and not part of this proposal)
  • Communication Task Force (CTF) – This is a specialized group I’ve helped build with Antonio Clark to encourage collaboration among marketing professionals in the SmartCash community


Overview of Strategy

Please note that the impact of our efforts will be felt towards the end of this term; not the beginning. Fifteen days before the end of this 90-day proposal, we plan to submit a new proposal to carry on and make enhancements to the initiatives presented in this proposal. As with all forms of branding and engagement initiatives, consistency is key. Our approach has always been to steadily build audiences and increase engagement methodically over time through continual branding. We view this 90-day proposal as only the first step in a long-term journey to build momentum by maintaining top visibility.

The first half of our proposal lays a solid foundation via content creation, adding impact to grass roots efforts, building awareness and establishing credibility. The second half of our proposal continues these efforts while starting journalist outreach and reaching many more people by placing SmartCash in heavily trafficked news sections of large-cap companies via NetworkNewsWire’s Brand Awareness Distribution program (see details: http://brbn.io/K4IUo).

Interactive flipbook showing overview of each phase: http://www.blockchainrelations.io/presentations/smartcash/strategy-overview

Full details are available upon request.


What We Bring to the Table

This comprehensive plan was put together utilizing the specialized knowledge gained through assisting more than 200 small, publicly traded companies via our parent company The Global Precision Group (established 8 years ago). Blockchain Relations, a registered tradename, was formed as a special division to leverage the first-hand cryptocurrency knowledge and mass news distribution experience of Jonathan Keim (http://www.linkedin.com/in/jonathankeim/) and his team to bring mainstream media and the cryptocurrency markets together.

The infrastructure and relationships outlined above are already in place and capable of touching millions of people around the globe; a sizable percentage of which now hold bitcoin and are eager to be further involved in next-generation blockchain technology. We are also leveraging 8 different in-house brands to provide ongoing third-party coverage of every news event to reach more individuals, eliminate the stigma of self-promotion, attract further interest and provide new perspective. Our long-term plan calls for further expansion and SmartCash will gain the increasing benefit of this growth throughout the next 12+ weeks.


Goals of this Proposal

  • Continually place SmartCash in front of millions of people visiting news sites every day
  • Encourage more grass roots efforts through increased recognition and added impact via news dissemination
  • Build up credible content for people to discover while campaign is underway
  • Grow the SmartCash community by bridging the gap between mainstream audiences and the cryptocurrency market
  • Position SmartCash as a next-generation cryptocurrency that solves real-world problems in a practical way
  • Educate the market of how easy it is to accept cryptocurrency via SmartCard and highlight its many benefits that are unrivaled by other payment technologies
  • Increase the prominence of the SmartCash website through valuable backlinks and increased traffic


How Others can be Involved

  • Submit content on the new SmartCash News Media Tracker website
  • Join the Communication Task Force to discuss outreach strategy on weekly basis
  • Become part of core team (requires 6+ months of engagement, deep knowledge of SmartCash and commitment to long-term success)

Note: Founders will be a key part of this campaign as well and we’ve been in regular communication with Decentralizd. Approvals will be gained before official press releases are disseminated.


How Payments are to be Made

  • Milestone payments must be paid in the order specified for the community’s peace of mind (i.e. a new phase can’t be paid for until the prior one is finished).
  • Each global press release will be paid upfront due to high expense, but will be fully written prior to disbursements of funds.
  • Management/administration, articles and their distribution costs, journalist outreach and all other costs are paid at the end of each month once completed.
  • The brand awareness distribution campaigns are paid upfront individually, but we will pay the full amount for both campaigns ourselves after receiving payment from accountant of the first half for the first campaign. This is to reduce community risk while still securing the large discount for committing to do two campaigns instead of one.
  • All other items are paid once deployed/completed.


Breakdown of Costs in Pie-Chart Format

result.title: Smartcash Mascot, Animated Puppet & Video Promotion Series
result.summary: This is a proposal for creating a professional illustrated Smartcash mascot and make that into an animated quality puppet using Adobe Character Animator with face-tracking and lip-syncing technology. With that puppet I will create five videos about SmartCash in general, SmartHive, SmartRewards, SmartNodes and SmartVoting. The videos will be in English language. The final videos will be promoted on Steemit/Dtube to push them to the trending page.
result.description:
Dear Smarties,

my name is **Florian Dellé** aka @flauwy on Smartcash and [Steemit](https://steemit.com/@flauwy). I am very actively promoting Smartcash on Steemit since I discovered it at the Anarchapulco event in Mexico a month ago and was even reward the MVP of the week a few days ago. Among many other things I create semi-animated tutorial videos about Steem and Steem-based-apps with my animated Steem-puppet Steemy. It helped my to become a Steem dolphin with nearly 7000 followers. You can find most of my videos on Youtube on the channel Cryptoons: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNqTpF3gwJmb1P56Y0digMA
Please keep in mind that the puppet as well as the video production will be of higher quality than the videos I have usually done for Steemit. But you will get an idea about what I have in mind.

This is a proposal for creating a professional illustrated Smartcash mascot and make that animated quality puppet using Adobe Character Animator with face-tracking and lip-syncing technology. With that puppet I will create five videos about SmartCash in general, SmartHive, SmartRewards, SmartNodes and SmartVoting. The videos will be in English language.

 

**Introduction**

With the latest software from Adobe it is possible to create amazing animated cartoon mascots that can be moved via face-tracking and lip-syncing. It was never easier to create great videos with animated puppets before.

This technology is just one year old and very few people are able to use it yet. using a quality puppet for that creates stunning effect and will stand out of the masses very easily.

Example puppet from me (made by @kayrex):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ucCq0gKXks

**Proposal Goals**
_The proposal includes the following goals:_

**Smartcash Mascot**

The mascot and un-rigged puppet will be created by the illustrator Joseph Sanchez aka [@kayrex](https://steemit.com/@kayrex) from Steemit who has created several puppets for me. He is very skilled and creates amazing cartoon designs as you can see on his Steemit profile. The character will be devloped in a scalable vector format.

Here is another example design @kayrex has created for me recently which I made into a puppet:
![Asset%202|484x500](upload://faJAPHr5LhADfW5cjCgGdNsFzeh.png)


I will ask for five sketches which will be shared on the Smartforum for discussion and to pick our favorite for further development. The final mascot design will be publicly available as soon as it is done.

For the mascot I propose **a cool bee** as that works well with the hive identity of SmartCash and we already have a design with a bee circling on Steemit. I am open to alternatives before bringing this to the official proposal.

**Animated Puppet**
After receiving the vector file with all relavant layers for different mouth and eye shapes, as well as different expressions and various animations like buzzing wings for example I will begin the rigging process and create a working puppet file within Adobe Character Animator (ACA).

As soon as this puppet is done it can be loaded by anybody into ACA and used immediately for video recordings and even life-streams without any further setup. The puppet will be available to all Hive members for quick import.

**Promotion Videos**
The five videos will be each about two minutes long. Each videos will be semi-animated with the puppet as narrator and photos/screenshots/screencasts in the background. The videos content of the videos will be:

1. SmartCash - General video about Smartcash
2. SmartHive - Introduction to the SmartHive
3. SmartRewards - Introduction to SmartRewards
4. SmartNodes - Introduction to SmartNodes
5. SmartVoting - Introduction to Smartcash proposals and SmartVoting

The videos will be made available to download for all SmartHive members to use, reupload and share. All Hive members can and should share the final videos on their channels.

**Steemit Promotion**
All videos will be uploaded to DTube, the Steem-based video platform, and with upvote-bots catapulted to the trending page. Unlike on other social media websites it is easy to make the entire network see our posts by boosting it enough. They will remain on the top of the trending page for about 2-3 days - visible to the ENTIRE NETWORK - before they are replaced by other posts. As Steemit is a very crypto-based community we will easily find many new Smartcash users as my previous Smartcash posts have already proven when looked at the comment section.

**Amount**

Breakdown

* $750 for the design of the mascot with ten different expressions and layers for five extra animations in vectorized .AI format. This is a very complex and time intensive task.
* $250 for the rigging process of the puppet.
* $500 for each video production ($2,500 for all five)
* $400 per video promotion on Steemit/DTube ($2000)

Total: $5,500

_After completion of this task I would like to continue working with the puppet and create more content and maybe even life-streams but that is for a future proposal._

Lots of love from Costa Rica,
**Florian Dellé**
_Steemit Smartcash MVP_

result.title: Continue the growth of the "Intro to cryptocurrencies sponsored by SmartCash" course
result.summary: This is a follow-on from an earlier approved proposal. We would like to continue the momentum with user growth we have gained in our "Introduction to cryptocurrencies sponsored by SmartCash" course on Thutor.
result.description:
We have just completed the first month in our “Intro to cryptocurrency” course that SmartCash sponsored. The course was really well received and we would like to build on the momentum in this second proposal.

This second proposal is building off what we offered in the first proposal, link below:

https://vote.smartcash.cc/Proposal/Details/Introduction-to-cryptocurrencies-with-SmartCash-rewards

This is what we proposed in the first proposal:

Deliver a cryptocurrency course introducing students from a finance background to the world of cryptocurrencies.

The course is free for anyone interested to join but is targeted at newbies to cryptos.

We wanted to have weekly quizzes that covered basic cryptocurrency topics. The quizes would integrated SmartCash questions into each week.

We wanted 100 students to register for the course over a period of a month.

The 7 top students each week would win SmartCash of ~$50 each.

This is what we delivered:

We delivered a course that covered the following topics:

  • Topic 1 - The history of cryptocurrencies
  • Topic 2 - How cryptocurrencies work
  • Topic 3 - Why cryptocurrencies are important
  • Topic 4 - How to value cryptocurrencies

We integrated SmartCash into the topics each week.

These are the SmartCash resources we integrated:

  • Topic 1: Introductory SmartCash video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=3&v=mxc1gZVEoLU1)
  • Topic 2: SmartCash: A Unique Self-Funding Governance Model (https://medium.com/@joshuarousseau/smartcash-a-unique-self-funding-and-governance-system-built-on-a-privacy-focused-community-c24e0032a9621)
  • Topic 3: SmartCash: Decentralized Cryptocurrency Governance (https://bitcoincryptocurrency.com/smartcash-smart/)
  • Topic 4: SmartCash Research Report (https://coincheckup.com/coins/smartcash/analysis)

We wanted to have 100 students registered over the course of the month. We have 106 registrations so we surpassed this goal.

We had 24 unique students won the SmartCash prizes. We intentionally made the prizes randomized for students who got over 75% for the weekly quiz. We did this since we wanted to give as many new students an opportunity to win as possible but they still had to get over 75% for the quiz.

The list of all the winners can be seen on our Facebook page here:

https://www.facebook.com/mythutor
 
For detailed statistics on the course, please see this shared Google docs folder:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/125mQBabTeGHMNolPj3NJOCo4hpduIs7B?usp=sharing
 
In here you will find:
1. Proof of prizes paid to winners
2. Proof of test results showing the winners who got over 75%
3. Content that we delivered in the course (including questions and pre-reading)
4. Course results showing number of questions answered per specific topic
5. Proof of registrations (showing we had 106 registrations)
6. Customer feedback. Feedback on the course was very positive and many users were interested in obtaining more SmartCash
 
What we propose going forward:

This aim of this second proposal is to maintain the growth momentum of users and to offer new services to users.

Our specific outcomes are to:

  • We would like to grow our registrations to over 500 registrations over a 3 month period.
  • We would like to test a referral system in our marketing (that for a student who refers another student, they received a SmartCash referral bonus of $4 - out of our marketing budget)
  • Due to the interest in acquiring SmartCash, we want to integrate an ability for users to buy SmartCash directly from our platform. For this, we will need a float which we have included in our budget below. 

Budget:
We propose the following monthly budget:
Weekly prizes (7 students x $50 x 4 weeks) = $1400
Monthly marketing = $50 x 4 weeks = $200
Course management and float = $800
Total monthly cost = $2400

Number of months = 3 months

Total cost = $7200

This is the same budget as the original proposal, just extended for 3 months.

It is important to note that the majority of this budget actually goes to users and new SmartCash adopters.

Reporting:

We will deliver the same reporting as in what we have detailed in this proposal and also feedback the amount of SmartCash purchased from our float.

Benefits to SmartCash:

  • The top students each week become invested in the coins they win. These winners have shown that they are interested in growing their holdings.
  • Because winners are educated about SmartCash and cryptocurrencies generally, they become advocates for the coin.
  • SmartCash continued sponsorship of the course means that people will learn about SmartCash as their first coin when starting out.
  • We will offer a new gateway for users to acquire SmartCash directly

Thank you for the community support we have received to date. We have really enjoyed delivering the course and continue to be passionate in educating people about cryptocurrencies.

result.title: Developing a SmartCash Ambassadors Team in Nigeria
result.summary: To quickly spread round Nigeria and beyond, we’d begin by raising Smart Ambassadors. These ambassadors would be identified, trained, and equipped to promote Smart in different states in Nigeria.
result.description:
Solidifying Smartcash in Nigeria Phase 1

Developing a SmartCash Ambassadors Team

Background

I Co-hosted the only SmartCash event in Nigeria thus far where Mr Kofi was the guest Speaker. After that, we were enjoined to join the SmartCash forum and slack, offering ideas to move Smart forward in Nigeria. Been away due to my degree which demanded most of my time but I’m now available to execute the plans made since September 2017.

The Plan

To quickly spread round Nigeria and beyond, we’d begin by raising Smart Ambassadors. These ambassadors would be identified, trained, and equipped to promote Smart in different states in Nigeria. These ambassadors would go through a series of talks, videos, and other educational materials that would enlighten them and equip them to promote smart.

Target is 20 participants.

Participants would be grouped into A, B, C and D to organize a meetup each as their first activity for SmartCash. At least 100 new wallets would be opened and given a tip of $10 each in this campaign.

  1. Smart Ambassadors Training program
  2. Smart Ambassadors Team Meetups

 

  • Budget

Printing of SmartCash shirts, stickers, fliers rollup, banner, wristband             $1000

Venue + event setup {3 day training}                                                                $940

Logistics, publicity and communication                                                            $720

Meetups                            venue                                     250 * 4                = $1000

Refreshment                                                                    205 * 4                   = $820

Tips for new wallets                                                       $10 * 100               = $1,000

SmartCash for volunteers                                                                               $400

Exigencies                                                                                                         $400

Total                                                                                                                  $6,280

 

Timeline for execution is 20 days………………… April 9 – 29

On successful completion of this and validation from the community, we would roll out phase 2 of our plans for a full adoption outreach in Nigeria.

result.title: Smart Campus Tour For Tertiary Institutions In  Nigeria
result.summary: Cryptocurrency adoption is soaring throughout Africa, with many of the continent’s unbanked using Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as a store of value, medium of P2P exchange and form of remittance. Cryptocurrency is particularly valuable in countries where the local fiat currency is susceptible to inflation, or where a vast number of the populace are unbanked. Nigeria is one such country.Like its sibling African states, Nigeria has a huge interest in cryptocurrency, with Google search data showing the country, along with other African nations, regularly topping the list for bitcoin enquiries. People in Nigeria aren’t just interested in hoarding cryptocurrency for its speculative value: it’s empowering them to gain their financial freedom, start their own businesses and free themselves from the yoke of government control which is where smartcash comes to play due to its interest and concentration on community support.
result.description:
Proposal owner Blessing Nathaniel is a well-known and active member of Discord and the Smartcash forums, cryptocurrency enthusiast and promoter. She is the co-founder of gidicoin exchange, based in Nigeria she have been able to setup a team of competent Smartcash investors who have worked with her in several meetups event in Nigeria…

We are very glad to be part of smartcash. We contribute to Smartcash interest and do it with great pleasure. Being Smartcash investor we want Smartcash to develop dynamically and reach it objectives to tune into a full widespread payment service with multiple useful options. We’re sure that our marketing skills will provide great benefits to the community.

Cryptocurrency adoption is soaring throughout Africa, with many of the continent’s unbanked using Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies as a store of value, medium of P2P exchange and form of remittance. Cryptocurrency is particularly valuable in countries where the local fiat currency is susceptible to inflation, or where a vast number of the populace are unbanked. Nigeria is one such country.

Like its sibling African states, Nigeria has a huge interest in cryptocurrency, with Google search data showing the country, along with other African nations, regularly topping the list for bitcoin enquiries. People in Nigeria aren’t just interested in hoarding cryptocurrency for its speculative value: it’s empowering them to gain their financial freedom, start their own businesses and free themselves from the yoke of government control.

OBJECTIVES

INTRODUCING SMARTCASH TO 5 TERTIARY INSTITUTIONS

The smart tour aims at reaching out to about 1,000 students in tertiary institutions from the Northern and western part of Nigeria (Lagos, Kano, Kaduna, Zaria, Ogun)

The tour will also enable us to select 5 SmartCash ambassadors and set up 5 Smart cash clubs/meetups. We will be giving each ambassador complete Smart cash kits that will enable him or her to be able to properly educate new members and get started.

Providing SmartCash Kits for selected students

The smart starter kits will contain gift items to help introduce the students to Smart Cash and properly educate them on the basics and importance of smart cash along with a small amount of smart cash to enable the new users get started.

The Smart kit will contain:
Paper wallet
Brocheur
Jotters
Ambassador gold Tag
Card holders

Setting up smart club and appointing smart Ambassadors

The smart Ambassadors initiatives seeks to create a well structured program for interested individuals who wish to represent Smart Cash in their institutions and help promote crypto-currency thereby sustaining and multiplying the club community. We will be training them via Zoom and also setup a telegram, discord ambassadors group the duration for interested participants will be 2 weeks which will commence after the smart tours.

Each of the Smart Ambassadors will be organising a mega summit/conference or meetup that will include students and store owners within the surrounding so as to make sure the students in the club can spend their smart cash and by doing that they will receive an incentive. Each ambassador will organise one major event ones in a month with at least 50 to 60 attendees and for this he or she will be paid  for both is wage and payment for space, refreshments and other logistics.

Creating Smartcash Nigeria Website: this will serve as a medium for smart cash community to view our progress and adoption growth. As we will be adding more ambassadors and setting up more clubs. The ambassadors will be dropping their weekly reports on how far they have gone in expanding their clubs and community with pictures and videos attached with the total smart cash wallet they have created and TX ID to prove they sent tips to each wallets.

The Smart Cash Nigeria website will be a portal for spreading the word of Smart Cash and cryptocurrencies in general throughout the country. It will include a selection of resources ranging from general information on SmartCash to specifics on how to obtain, store and spend it within the country.

The site will also be used to publish information on the projects we’re undertaking and the outcome of these which will be added by our different Ambassadors in different universities. The multi-functional site will include Smart Cash Nigeria team information, a calendar listing forthcoming events, an FAQ, live chat and support and news stories pertaining to SmartCash and growing cryptocurrency usage in the country.

How will our activity benefit SMART CASH?

  1. Smart Cash will obtain thousand audiences via our institutional tour in Nigeria.
  2. New Smart cash members will become active followers with the help of our clubs and
    ambassadors
  3. Smartcash will gain new investors. We are going to attract young folks who will be able to
    promote Smartcash efficiently.
  4. Smart cash will get our team as a long term solid partners with rich experience in crypto-
    currency adoptions strategies, business and marketing on the Nigeria markets.
    Our next step is to promote Smartcash deeper and deeper into our community and institutions
    by selecting competent SmartCash ambassadors. We are intending to accumulate people around our place by giving them free consultations and express training for frequently asked questions. Our aim is to show ordinary men that that Smart Cash is a real financial instrument supporting by real people for the future. We think this is necessary to make society start getting Smart cash ecosystem.

Budget
Smartcash tips = $10 X 250 persons (50 from each institutions)= $2500
SmartKits= $500 (customize jotters, bags, brochures)
Graphic design= $100
Social media adverts= $400
Conference room for 5 schools= $500
Smartcash banners and pull ups= $150
Photography services= $250
Website/Ambassador wages = $3000
Feeding= $200
Refreshments for participants for the 5 schools= $1500
Smart shirts= $1000
Accommodation for 6 persons= $1000
Transportation for 6 persons= $600
Team reward= $1000
Sub total=$12,700
Contingency 5%= $635
Total=$13,335
Validation
Reports will be shown through pictures of each activity and links shared with the community.

result.title: SMARTCASH FOR LADIES
result.summary:
Hello community, my name is Mohammed Mashud Kofi, known in the Smartcash community as Momako. Women and ladies are an integral component of our communities. They are indispensable in nation building and economic growth. No nation can thrive devoid of women. Women have a lot of influence and as such I am proposing SMART CASH FOR LADIES. This project focuses on unearthing innovative and doable ideas from female Ghanaians in our contemporary society.
The aim is to organize conferences in three (3) prime regions of Ghana. That is the Greater Accra Region, the Western Region and the Central Region. These training programs is solely for ladies and it’s anticipated at training 200 ladies and young women in each of the three (3) regions. The conference and training programs shall be opened to all Ladies from various facets of the Ghanaian economy; Female Directors, Female Politicians, Female CEO’s, Female Bankers, Female Teachers, and Female Tertiary Students. Etc.
The project will see one meetup and a booth camp, a 15 minutes TV discussion and a 20 minutes radio discussion. The media discussions will be heard by not less than 50,000 people. This is because the selected media houses in each region are the most prime, popular and most listened to media houses in the various regions.  These media houses have also been ranked best on several platforms. The media houses are; TV 3’s (New Day Show) (www.tv3network.com), Joy FM (www.myjoyonline.com) in the Greater Accra Region, Eastern FM (www.easternfm.com) in the Eastern Region of Ghana and Twin City Radio(https://twincityradio.com) in the Western Region of Ghana. Even though the target group of the training programs is ladies, the media discussions will be heard by both males and females. Listeners would be allowed to ask questions through phone in after presentations, Smartcash tokens will be given to listeners who phone in to answer questions during the radio and TV discussions. The reason behind this project is to use this powerful tool of women to promote Smartcash for massive adoption and usage in Ghana.
result.description:
Sub Saharan Africa where Ghana forms part is the poorest in the world. Poverty in this part of the world keeps increasing at a scaring rate. This has formed part of many international developmental debates. The question that usually arises during these debates is why is sub Saharan Africa the poorest? Many of these debates have raised issues trying to address the situation, the key reason identified by many researchers on poverty in this part of the world is inequality. In Ghana, inequality still remains a major challenge and a troubling issue. Where women are marginalized and denied certain rights and opportunities, despite the international community’s efforts to end this, the phenomenon still prevails. This trend has taken toe in every sphere of our economic and social lives, it can be manifested even in our leadership. There are 275 parliamentarians in the country, out of this 35 are women representing 13% of the legislature (https://www.parliament.gh/). There are 110 ministers of state in the country with only 29 of them being women (presidency.gov.gh/index.php/governance). This phenomenon has reflected in virtually every other aspect of our economy. This has greatly affected everything we do as a country. Women have been relegated to the backdrop.

This project would demystify and break the chain of inequality in Ghana and empower women. Women will be selected from diverse fields, trained and empowered to take up leadership positions and roles. They will be taught investment and wealth creation, and they would be showed avenues in which they can leverage Smartcash as a source of income generation through speculative decisions and the use of smartRewards.

Most of these women are traders, they buy their goods online and physically in many parts of world using fiat money. The risk involved in using this fiat money is enormous and therefore the need to adopt and use cryptocurrency and Smartcash in particular to transact. The training will be held in 3 regions of Ghana.

Having successfully organize meetups in Ghana and having helped @Cryptowall in the current Smartcash Roadshow in Ghana, I have a strong conviction that this project is possible and necessary. Please click https://mmashud61.wixsite.com/website or on facebook by searching MOHAMMED MASHUD KOFI to check.

Action Plan

All participants would be trained on how to set up Smartcash wallets and how they can promote it. Also ideas that can promote the currency will be brought up through our discussions. 20 participants from each region who demonstrate an excellent understanding of the block chain technology and Smartcash technology would be selected to serve as ambassadors for smartcash.

 

Event plan

  • 15 minutes TV discussion on TV3’s new day in Accra.
  • 20 minutes Radio presentation on Smartcash in all 3 regions.
  • 3 hours vigorous boothcamp on Smartcash for two days in a chosen venue in each region.

The breakdown of the Media interaction is as follows;

  • 5 minutes training on the blockchain technology.
  • 5 minutes training on cryptocurrencies.
  • 5 minutes presentation on smartcash.

The breakdown of Boothcamp training is as follows;

  • Presentation on Blockchain technology.
  • Presentation on Cryptocurrency with focus on Smartcash.
  • Presentation on how to invest and trade using Smartcash.
  • The need for women financial freedom and women leadership.

The above breakdown will entail;

  • How to download and activate smartcash wallets.
  • Key features of Smartcash i.e. smart forums, smart rewards, smart voting, smart nodes etc.
  • How to purchase/buy Smartcash from local and international exchanges via CoinExchange, HitBTC etc.
  • Advantages of using Smartcash for daily transactions like buying goods online, paying for services, receiving remittances and many more.

$5 worth of SMART will be given to the first 50 participants in each region and the participants will be allowed to demonstrate a practical understanding of the training by making them send the tokens to each other. This will make them feel the speed and convenience with Smartcash and also give them experience in using Smartcash immediately. Participants will therefore will encouraged to purchase Smartcash to accumulate capital and wealth using Smartcash and Smart Rewards as store of value in the long term to realize their businesses and future entrepreneurial goals, etc.

TIMELINE

  • Greater Accra Region (Accra) 2 Days’ workshop (1st Month)
  • Western Region (Takoradi) 2 Days’ workshop (2nd Month)
  • Eastern Region (Koforidua) 2 Day’s workshop (3rd Month)

BUDGET

  • Transportation cost to and within the 3 regions for 3 months - $3,000.
  • Total accommodation and feeding for 3 regions - $2,000.
  • Hiring of venue for all 3 conferences - $1,500.
  • Feeding cost of participants - $600.
  • Tokens for participants - $ 700.

Total =$12,550

JUSTIFICATION

  • Videos, pictures and reports of this project will be sent to the Smartcash community and circulated on social media platforms.
  • Each region will establish a club and submit and execute an action plans for their respective duties.
  • Team members are self-motivated and selected on merit bases.
  • The regions are selected with regards to their female populations, location and influence on the Ghanaian economy (http://worldpopulationreview.com/countries/ghana-population/)

Thank you.
