result.title: MetaNode - SmartNodes Made Simple
result.summary:
MetaNode is a platform that provides secure, reliable and fractional masternode hosting.  By allowing users to put their tokens to work right away, MetaNode will become the on-ramp for crypto users to quickly and easily create masternodes.  If our proposal is accepted, we plan to offer SmartNodes as the initial product for our pre-alpha and alpha launch.  By building our product around Smart from the very beginning, we will position Smart to quickly grow its user base as our company’s user base increases.  A win-win outcome for all.  

In addition to increasing the number of Smart users, we believe our platform will provide value to the Smart community in the following ways: 
•	Easy and Hassle Free SmartNode Deployment
•	Increased Institutional Interest in Smart
•	Increased Long Term Value of Smart
•	Helpful Analytical Information for Current SmartNode Owners
•	Increased Security for the Smart Network
•	Outsourced SmartNode Support
All of these benefits are explained in greater detail below.  Most importantly, Smart users will have the ability to shape a growing and innovative cryptocurrency platform from the ground up.  Our team will work hand in hand with Smart users to gather feedback and implement changes quickly.

A full PDF of the proposal (including graphics) is located on our website: https://metanode.io/Smartcash_Proposal.pdf
result.description:
Introducing MetaNode

We plan to use the initial funding ($36,685.38) to build our product and roll it out in two stages: (1) a soft launch of our pre-alpha product and (2) an alpha launch. We will offer both the soft launch and alpha launch exclusively to the Smart community. The pre-alpha product will allow a user to launch and host SmartNodes on our platform. Subject to legal and regulatory review, the alpha product will add additional features including the ability to pool Smart tokens with other users to launch and host a SmartNode, the option to automatically transfer payouts into additional SmartNodes and access to our portfolio of tools to analyze the performance of their masternodes.

The funding from the Smartcash community will be used to invest in four key areas: (1) security (2) reliability (3) regulatory and (4) customer experience. Our investment in security means that we will adhere to the best practices of web application security (“OWASP”), user authentication, data encryption, backup, and disaster recovery. Our investment in reliability means that there will be no downtime for your masternodes because our state of the art distributed cluster architecture will allow for virtually zero service disruption. Our investment in regulatory means that we will differentiate ourselves from competitors by maintaining compliance with all pertinent regulations and laws. MetaNode intends to comply with applicable state money transmission laws, federal Money Services Business registration, KYC and AML statutes, and any relevant foreign licensure requirements. Our investment in customer experience means that we will design the site to be intuitive so that it becomes the number one consumer facing masternode hosting site.

Ultimately, we believe that our team’s focus and deep expertise in security, engineering, legal and product issues will help us drive user growth both in the Smart community and the masternode community as whole. Right now MetaNode has the team, timeline and vision in place in order to build this platform. Funding is the missing piece of the puzzle to build this exciting platform and it is the reason why we are before the Smart community now.

Benefits for Smartcash Community

We believe that an early partnership between MetaNode and Smart would provide a number of benefits for the Smart community, including:

Easy SmartNode Deployment: Running a masternode involves technical knowledge that the average token holder, let alone crypto newbie, does not possess. By completely automating the process, MetaNode will make masternode deployment as easy a single click. Think Amazon’s “1-Click Ordering”, but for masternodes instead of USB cables.

Increase Smart User Base: MetaNode will become the on-ramp for crypto users looking to quickly and easily create masternodes. By building our company around Smart from the very beginning, we will position Smart to quickly grow its user base as our company’s user base increases. Economists call this a WIN-WIN (technically they call it an integrative negotiated agreement, but let’s not get bogged down in the details).

Increase Long Term Value of Smart: We intend for MetaNode to become the gold standard for masternode creation and management service providers. As we attract more users to our platform, we believe this increased interest will most likely result in a long term increase in the value of Smart.

Increase Information for Current SmartNode Owners: MetaNode will allow users access to a portfolio of analytical tools that will allow them to better analyze their masternodes, as well as make informed financial decisions. Less HODL and more STAEK.

Help Secure the Smart Network: SmartNodes play a vital role in protecting the integrity and efficiency of the network. By automating the setup process, MetaNode will help to further increase decentralization. This in turn will help secure the Smart network from malicious attacks and stagnation. Similar to how the Black Panther’s Dora Milaje protect Wakanda from avaricious outsiders looking for its vibranium…and now back to the proposal.

Outsource SmartNode Support: MetaNode understands that Smart developers spend a significant amount of their time on Discord helping new users launch and maintain SmartNodes. By providing 24/7 support to SmartNode owners, we will relieve the burden on Smart developers and let them do what they do best: SHIP EPIC CODE!

Timeline, Deliverables and Funding

Timeline: 9 weeks

Deliverable One: Soft Launch of MetaNode Platform

  1. Timeline: 4 weeks
  2. Goal: Pre-alpha product rolled out to a small group of Smart community users.
  3. Features: Users will be able to:
    1. Launch and host individual SmartNodes.

Deliverable Two: Alpha Launch of MetaNode Platform

  1. Timeline: 5 weeks
  2. Goal: Alpha product rolled out exclusively to the entire Smart community.
  3. Features: Users will be able to:
    1. Launch and host individual SmartNodes.
    2. Pool Smart with other users to launch and host a SmartNode.
    3. Automatically transfer payouts into additional SmartNodes.
    4. Utilize our portfolio of tools to analyze the performance of their masternodes.

Funding

  • Engineering Costs: $22,275
  • Legal Costs: $13,500
  • Operational Costs: $910.38
  • Total Cost: $36,685.38

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the MetaNode platform?

MetaNode is a secure and reliable masternode hosting site that allow users to launch individual masternodes or pool tokens with other users to access masternode dividends.

What coins will MetaNode host?

MetaNode is committed to working with the Smart community to increase Smart’s user base, adoption and long term value. In order to reach that goal, we think it is vital to create a dynamic platform that offers different options to match our user’s interests and demands. A decision to host other coins will only happen after a number of steps have been taken.

How will pooling work?

Pooling will work automatically. Instead of having to scroll through dozens of masternodes, users will deposit their tokens into a contribution pool. Once the staking requirement has been met, the user is notified that he/she is a fractional owner of a masternode. Their masternode network fee share will be proportional to their contribution.  

Is there a minimum amount needed for pooling?

No. Unlike other services, pooling will not be limited to a minimum amount. If you have only 1 Smart token our system will still accept it.

Can I host an individual masternode?

Yes. Our platform allows you to host an individual SmartNode too.

Is it a difference process for running an individual masternode vs. a pooled masternode?

No. Our intuitive interface makes it so that you can deposit any SMART amount and our system will automatically generate as many SmartNodes as possible. Any remainder Smart tokens will be directed to a contribution wallet that will launch a SmartNode as soon as the wallet contains enough Smartcash.

How much does the service cost?

MetaNode will keep a small transaction fee from the distribution of Smartnode rewards in order to maintain our service. We are still working on finalizing the fee amount, but it will be competitive with other services.

Where are the masternodes hosted?

Masternodes will be hosted in data centers located in multiple regions across the globe by a leading cloud service provider. Hosting masternodes in multiple regions ensures redundancy if a single region goes offline. This strategy has the added benefit of preventing centralization of masternodes in a single region.

How will MetaNode track masternodes?

Our state of the art telemetry and diagnostic solution will be monitoring each deployed masternode as well as the whole platform. This solution will track performance, availability, security events and usage. In the event of an anomaly or a potential system failure, the MetaNode self-healing system will trigger an alert and deploy the fix. Our team of highly skilled Site Reliability Engineers will be involved in any issues that directly affect the users or masternode rewards. As advocates for transparency, the MetaNode team will be sharing masternode telemetry data with our users.

How will MetaNode mitigate service disruptions?

MetaNode’s state of the art distributed cluster architecture will allow for virtually zero service disruption. Due to the containerization of our masternodes, we can rapidly redeploy nodes as needed. If an extended downtime is detected or expected, we will have the ability to quickly re-establish masternodes on other servers/regions, assuming the outage is centralized to clusters or regions and not 100% of the cloud provider’s services. Users will be able to track the health status of their masternode through an intuitive telemetry dashboard. Additionally, users will be able to set up notifications to alert them of rewards or other events.

Team

Experience

Our team has diverse experience as crypto miners, traders, investors and masternode owners. Nick is a co-founder of a limited partnership for cryptocurrency mining and trading, a long time masternode investor and an active member of the Smart community. Joe is a practicing attorney in the United States at an AML Top 100 Law Firm who brings his legal and business experience to the project. Joe primarily provides counsel to enterprise software companies and has been involved in crypto since 2014. Both Nick and Joe are loyal SmartNode owners. Our engineering team consists of two engineers. Dmitrii is a Blockchain Engineer at Microsoft Finance. David is a former Senior Surveillance Technician for the U.S. Air Force and a Senior Full Stack Engineer with diverse experience in multiple industries and a deep passion for blockchain technologies.

result.title: Smartcash to sponsor a StartUp Grind event namely "Beyond Bitcoin" in johannesburg.
result.summary: StartUp Grind is the largest global community for entrepreneurs. Each month they discuss a different topic and bring out different guests.  June 19th will focus on Cryptocurrency. My name is Grey Jabesi, The host of The Grey Ave Podcast which is the top podcast in South Africa as far as crypto. I'm also involved with a number of entrepreneurial communities including Startup Grind hence this event.
result.description:
June 19th is going to be an exciting day for Crypto in South Africa. I had a chance to propose to StartUp Grind's director in Johannesburg to make June's event about Cryptocurrency. She welcomed the idea since Crypto is currently a big topic in South Africa and they haven't done an event of this type before. They also gave me the responsibility to choose the main speaker as well as a four man panel for the day. Within my network, I managed to pull out a great panel of notable people in the space. Some of them, which I've had on my podcast before.

Who are the speakers at the event?

Here is a list of people I have managed to get to speak at the event:

1) Roger Ver (Introduction) - He wont be able to make it in person but he will do a skype talk live. 

2) Dan van de ghinste (Main speaker) - Co-founder of Blockstarters(The first and only Blockchain incubator in South Africa) http://www.blockstarters.com/

3) Shakes Motshilili (Panel)- Founder of Aziza Coin (The first SARS(Tax man) endorsed crypto in South Africa), Co-Founder of Africa New Energies)

4) Tawanda Kembo (Panel) - Founder of Golix (The only Crypto exchange in Zimbabwe)

5) Mpho Dagada (Panel) - Crypto investor and educator. Also Author of Mr Bitcoin.

5) Grey Jabesi, myself as host of the panel. 

The agenda "Beyond Bitcoin" is meant to introduce the audience to the whole world of cryptocurrency. When most people read or hear the word "Cryptocurrency", they usually think of the concept of Bitcoin. So we want to discuss other applications of Blockchain technology and how Africa can take advantage of this new technology.

The event will be recorded on both video and audio.

Why Smartcash should get Involved?
I love and support smartcash and this event is covering other use cases of cryoticurrency and smartcash is a good example. I think this event will be a great place for good exposure as well. I will have sometime to speak and I will host the panel so I will talk about Smartcash. Imagine me in a Smartcash tshirt on stage.

Community Bulding
Myself and my team are based in Cape Town but since we'll be in Johannesburg for 5 days. We'll do the following community bulding activities:

- After event dinner with the speakers etc (Invite only)
- I will work with one of the Alexandra radio host to do alive smartcash competetion on radio
- SmartCash beers on Friday the 22 of June
- Cape Town Bitcoin Banter group meetup on Sunday the 24th of June

Blockstarters Smartnode
Blockstarters is the first and only blockchain inclubator in South africa. They have open space for blockchain startups to work in as well as educational facilities including a mining farm. I wanna get a Smartnode running there so that whenever people visit to learn about mining, they also get exposed to smartcash and it's nodes.

Budget: $10,150

Links:

Startup grind johannesburg: https://www.startupgrind.com/johannesburg/ (FYI, this event will be listed next month on their website)

My podcast: http://www.greyjabesi.com/thepodcast/

Blockstarters: http://www.blockstarters.com/

result.title: Node.js Library for SMART
result.summary: Build a SmartCash RPC Library with NodeJS
result.description:
Who am I?

Full-stack Web Developer turned Blockchain Engineer

What will I do?

I hope to build out a useful, versatile ES6 Node.js library to easily interface with the SMART RPC (remote procedure call) protocol. This will allow other developers to seamlessly integrate SmartCash into their projects. By doing this, I hope to rapidly expand the number of SmartCash intergrations in applications for the communities benefit.

The library will be opensource and licenced under LGPL-3.0

I will continue to maintain the library for as long as I can assuming that there are no major updates needed.

Timeframe & Budget:

The milestones have been structured so as to allow me to build focussed on this task without having to prioritize my other work. The dates are of little significance and I could well be finished before them. In fact, as soon as I see the initial interest of the voting, I can begin work without waiting for the deadline.

I hope you support this project as we try grow our community! Thanks

@sean_brodie

result.title: SmartCash Toshi Exchange Bot
result.summary: A Toshi powered bot that allows users to easily convert Ethereum to SmartCash and vice versa. This will make it easier for people to access SmartCash thus helping increasing the adoption rate.
result.description:
Hi Everyone!

When I started out with SmasrtCash I had some difficulty getting my hands on some and thus I would like to make the process of buying SMART just a little easier for some people.

My Proposal
I would like to create a Toshi powered bot that allows users to easily convert Ethereum to SmartCash and vice versa. This will make it easier for people to access SmartCash thus helping increasing the adoption rate.

What I Plan to Deliver:

  • A Toshi Bot that makes exchanges between SmartCash and Ethereum easy.
  • The bot will be published and working on the Toshi application(Android and IOS) within 2 weeks of my proposal has been accepted.

My Credentials:

  • I have a B.Sc in Computer Science and have been a full stack developer for about 6 years. 
  • I love the ideology behind SmartCash.

What I am looking for

Monetarily
About 70 hours of initial development, troubleshooting and setup. ($2500)
Minimum of 2 hours/week for 1 year ($200/month): 

  • engage with community. 
  • add additional features. 
  • keep the bot operational.
  • 20000 SMART to be split between Ethereum and SMART to enable exchanges to take place.

From you:

  • Help with testing. 
  • Your suggestions and feedback.

Example Usage

  • Open Toshi
  • Search or open the SmartCash Exchange Bot.
  • Exchange Ethereum to SmartCash message option.
    • Bot: Enter the SmartCash address you would like the SMART sent to.
    • User: Enters their SmartCash address.
    • Bot: How much SMART would you like to buy?
    • User: *xxx*
    • Bot: xxx SmartCash to equivalent to yyy Ethereum.
    • Bot: SmartCash Exchange Bot is requesting yyy Ethereum from you.
    • User: User Accepts*
    • Bot: I have sent xxx SmartCash to the address _____.
  • Exchange SmartCash to Ethereum message option
    • Bot: How much SmartCash would you like to sell?
    • User: Enters amount of SmartCash they would like to sell
    • Bot: xxx SMART is equivalent to yyy Ethereum. Do you accept exchange?
    • User: Yes
    • Bot: Send xxx SMART to the address _____
    • Bot: Once the SmartCash has been received I will send the equivalent Ethereum to you.
    • Bot: We have sent you yyy Ethereum.

FAQ:
Q: What if the Bot does not have enough SmartCash or Ethereum to make the exchange?
A: The bot will start off by having a Split of 10000 SMART and 10000 SMART worth of Ethereum. If all of the Ethereum is exchanged for SmartCash then the bot will only accept SmartCash to Ethereum exchanges and vice versa.

Q: Why can't you just go buy at an exchange?
A: You can but this makes the process a lot faster and easier for people who already have Toshi. 

Q: Is this a direct exchange?
A:Yes, it is like a direct exchange. This makes it so more people can access SmartCash. Possibly in the future I could turn it into something that resembles an actual exchange more closely.

result.title: Lets Evolve the CryptoKart into the SmartKart
result.summary: Sponsor 4 professional level karting events in Cape Town, South Africa.
result.description:
First off take a look at my kart here: https://imgur.com/9OMeIgs

I designed the wrapping back in January before I knew about Smartcash.

I have done 4 races this year and unfortunately, I've been in few crashes.

I need to re-wrap my kart and looking to see if the community wants to help me design the new look.

So far I've come up with this first draft design: https://imgur.com/1fHLtbP

Essentially I want to make SmartCash the main focus of the design.

 

Around the pits my kart is known as the CryptoKart and its encouraged some of the other drivers to invest in coins like Ethereum and Litecoin. Sponsoring my kart is mainly just a fun thing to do, I will post a video about my racing career on my YouTube channel that has over 10000 subscribers. So it will bring some attention to SmartCash but mainly this is for fun. SmartCash already has a great reputation of sponsoring boxers, bikers and e-sport players. It would be great to continue this trend and add a karter to that list.

Karting is a bit expensive and here is the budget.

Entry fee is $100 per race.

Fuel is around $20 per race.

Wrapping the kart is around $300 (once-off)

Tyres are around $200 per race.

Repairs and parts are around $150 per race.

Promotional banners/merch with SmartCash logos are around $200 (once-off)

All in all its $500 once-off and $470 per race.

For 4 races it is a total of $2380

Lets turn the CryptoKart into the SmartKart

result.title: SmartStudent Ecosystem Stage , month 2 by Coach Digi
result.summary:
I want to thank all the community for your feedback and support, because I did a better proposal with a more effective budget (less merchandise material and personel)and different activities. 

This will serve as a lab for getting a payment process with SmartCash for the merchants.

This is 2nd month of the stage 1 of the creation of SmartStudent ecosystem is the same project than proposal #403 but wiht a new budget.


We'll be focused in starting a SmartStudent community in two different universities in 2 different cities of Mexico: Universidad Anahuac Cancun at Cancun and Universidad de las Americas Puebla at Cholula, we will also start spreading the SmartCash word to highschool students.
We will creat the SmartStudent ecosystem with food schoolarships to some students and athletes from the universities. The students will receive weekly SmartCash so they can pay their food in different restaurants/establishments that are part of our SmartRestaurants club. This restaurants will receive SmartCash as payment.

For creating the SmartStudent ecosystem we first have to create a SmartStudent community involving Students, restaurants and universities adminsitrations.

The objective of Stage 1 is:
a) to convince at least 5 restaurants/establishmenst to accept SmartCash as payment in every city
b)Know what can the universities contribute to SmartCash (SmartCash ATM, SmartCash branding in campus, SmartCash meetups, SmartCash campus radio, SmartCash sport tickets payment, etc) and what SmartCash can contribute to the universities (Sponsorship of: Sports teams, conferences, students activites, Blockchain courses, etc)
c)Know what students need (how they receive their monthly budget, what restaurants/establishments the students go, etc)

Stage 1 2nd month: from may 23 to June 6
3 meetups and 2 events sponsored by SmartCash in 2 different cities (Cancun, Cholula )
result.description:
This is the First Month Activity report of proposal #182 (https://vote.smartcash.cc/Proposal/Details/Creation-of-SmartStudent-ecosystems-Stage-1-by-CoachDigi)

Link to first month Video Report   

2nd Month Activities.

I did some small changes in the activities and number of attendees.

  • 4 SmartStudent Meetup in Cancun, Mexico (May 23,30 & june 6, 13). Our first 3 SmartStudents (All football players -captains)will invite other students to the SmartStudents Meetups and also will be learning more about SmartCash so they organize their own SmartStudent Meetup.  We will do the meetups in 3 different establishments.
  • SmartCash Highschool Cryptofair: A SmartCash day with 150 highschool senior Students (in 3 months they will be in college).
    • The students will learn about SmartCash in a PRACTICAL way, they al ready now about SmartCash and have their wallets but now they will use SmartCash for payment 
    • The students will receive $3 USD in SmartCash so they participate in the fair games.
    • Students will do games and activities and the winners will receive a SmartCash merchandise 
    • They will have to pay a small amount of SmartCash so they can play the game
  • National Girl Flag Football Tournament sponsor in Cholula, Puebla (june 1,2,3): 35 teams (400 athletes) from different states of Mexico.
    • 2 categories (junior and open)
    • All the players, coaches and tournament staff will have a  Shirt/cap or hat/glasses/ with the SmartCash logo, so SmartCash can be in all the event.
    • The tournamen Champion  and the MVP´s will receive 5000 Smarts as price (we will do a big Check with a paper wallet QR and they will scan the price)
    • We will also have SmartCash games and activities where the people can win SmartCash merchandise, they will be invited to join our Social Media Communities so they can participate int he activities.
    • 3 SmartStudents football players from Universidad de las Américas will help us whith the event, and they also will be the Smartstudents that will receive the first SmartCash schoolarship in Cholula and they will invite other students to future meetups and SmartCash events.

Community Creation

  • Students: We will start coaching 3 Smartstudents in each town (Cancun, Cholula) so they can know SmartCash, they will start participating in the different social networks and they will invite more students.  They will receive SmartCash as food schoolarship so they can eat at restaurants that accept SmartCash.  
  • Restaurants: They will start receiving the SmartCash scholarships as payment.  This will be our lab. experiment, so we can se the SmartCash payment process whit out s POS. We will use Coinomi wallet as receiving because with the Web Wallet you can´t see all the transactions made (only like 12), also you can´t see the amount in Pesos (MXN), so you don´t know how much SmartCash you have to pay. Also we hae to see an easy way that they can change SmartCash to Fiat, because much of them need the money for daily operations. In the future we will start speaking with providers so they can start accepting SmartCash but know this is a problem that has to be resolved.
  • University authorities: I had already spoken whith the coaches and in this month I will talk to the univerity authorities (Academic and administrators) so we can find a way to promote SmartCash in the universities and students.

This project would focus on Training of Trainers (TOT) to give teachers the basic knowledge in cryptocurrencies, skills and practical experience to provide assistance to their colleagues, merchants, students, parents and their community members to promote Smartcash in Ghana. After going through the training all participants will be able to:

  • Explain the Blockchain Technology
  • Explain the Smartcash Technology
  • Explain the features in Smartcash
  • Download and Setup Smartcash wallet
  • Trade Smartcash on the exchanges and
  • Promote Smartcash in Ghana.

Below are the outputs and outcomes of this training / workshop:

S/N                                       OUTPUT                                                OUTCOME
1 Train one thousand (1,000) teachers at ten (10) centers on how to download and setup Smartcash wallet. 
  • All the one thousand (1,000) teachers downloading and setting up SmartCash wallet (window wallet, web wallet, android wallet etc)
  • Help others to setup Smartcash wallet
  • Trade SmartCash from the Exchanges like ebitcoinics, coinexchange, Hitbtc, Trade Satoshi etc
  • Mass adoption of Smartcash by teachers.
  • Stabilization of Smartcash prices.
2 Select twenty (20) teachers from each region who were very active and displayed exceptional skills in the training as Local Coordinators for Smartcash in their region.
  • Popularized (promote) Smartcash among their colleague teachers and other citizens in region
  • Submit proposals to the Smartcash Community for further blockchain and cryptocurrency education in their region
  • Organization of School-Based and Cluster-Based workshops on Smartcash Technology in their respective region
  • Increase in Merchant Adoption
3 Trained teachers to impart their knowledge on cryptocurrencies on students and parents and the community they live.
  • Reaching out to over 100,000 teachers; 200,000 students; and 650,000 community members. More people learning about cryptocurrencies and smartcash
  • Promotion of Smartcash among teachers, students and parents. Parents sending money to their wards at school using Smartcash to avoid higher fees from banks and delays in transfer
  • Students, graduates and the unemployed youth trading Smartcash and using profit gained as startup capital for their businesses without depending on the state for jobs.
  • Promotion of Smartcash by Teachers Associations in Ghana and students groups in Ghana
  • High demand for Smartcash in Ghana and Africa
4 Two radio discussion to reach out to more people
  • Reaching out to over 500,000 Ghanaians in Kumasi and Koforidua at their homes
  • Defusing the negative perception the general public have about cryptocurrencies
  • Mass adoption of Smartcash in Ghana

Topics to be covered are:

  • History of Blockchain Technology
  • Smartcash Technology
  • How to download and setup Smartcash
  • Understanding features of Smartcash
  • How to purchase Smartcash from the Exchanges
  • Becoming a Merchant of SmartCash
  • How teachers can promote SmartCash among their teachers, students, parents and community members.

ACTION PLAN

This Action Plan seeks to target teachers as primary promoters of the mass adoption and use of Smartcash in Ghana. All participants would be trained on how to setup Smartcash wallet and promote it among the teachers, students, parents, and the community they live. In addition, twenty (20) participants from each region who was active and exhibited an excellent understanding of the blockchain technology and SmartCash Technology would be selected to serve as Local Coordinators and trained to submit proposals to the SmartCash Community for further blockchain and cryptocurrency education and use SmartCash to teach students on cryptocurrencies in their region. Each region would be given 101SMART to submit a proposal. Below is the Planned Activity for workshops:-

TEAM                                                                          PLANNED ACTIVITY
1 Twenty (20) teachers from each region would be trained to submit proposals to the SmartCash in Ghana Community for further blockchain and cryptocurrency education and use SmartCash to teach students cryptocurrencies in their region. Each region would be given 101SMART to submit a proposal.  The team will always collaborate with the other eighty (80) teachers in their region who attended the workshop to promote SmartCash.
2 Five (5) teachers from each region would be selected and trained to setup Young Entrepreneurs Club in schools so that students can learn more about the Blockchain Technology and SmartCash Technology. A fund of $500.00 worth of SmartCash would be used to support each region making SmartCash the headline sponsor. The team will collaborate with the other ninety-five (95) teachers from their region to setup these clubs in their schools
3 Fourty (40) teachers from each region would promote mass adoption of SmartCash among parents and the community they live. They will organize meetups and symposium. They will speak at School Management Meetings, Parents Teachers Association (PTA) meetings, community gathering and among others. They will convince parents to send money to their wards using Smartcash and convince school authorities to accept SmartCash (longterm). Parents would also be encouraged to purchase and hold Smartcash for their wards. They will collaborate with the other sixty (60) teachers from their region who participated in the workshop.
4 Fourteen (14) teachers from each region would be meeting with Mobile Money Merchants and Vendors in their region and pushed for merchant adoption of Smartcash in Ghana. They will train merchants and vendors on how to trade Smartcash.

TIMELINE

Below is the timeline for this workshop:-

result.title: SmartCash.tv (Video & News Portal) + German content + Germany marketing campaign (+200,000 german subscribers)
result.summary: Create Video/News platform “www.SmartCash.tv” (domain reserved already), publish german content and spread it through topic-relevant channels to build up a bigger german community.
result.description:
Please read this knowing that we will keep up contributing to SmartCash as good as we can regardless of if this proposal gets approved or not.

Who are we?
Some of you may probably know us from telegram or this forum:

@Dili (My Partner): Educated Sales Manager with more than 9 years of experience in marketing and sales

@operk (Me): IT professional with more than 13 years experience in Software-Development (especially in developing Web Applications)

We are both from germany and came across SmartCash a few months ago. The concept of a decentralized governance is what made us fall in love with it. Thats why we began contributing to this community. We have already worked together for a german ICO, where we have realized similar tasks to those, that are object of this proposal.

Description
After realizing that there is no SmartCash community in german we came across the idea of building up a german community. Thats why we first created a german telegram group (see: t.me/SmartCash_de), which has already 60 german members (not too much, but we’re just at the beginning). We noticed big potential, thats why we already started providing related content in german language. You can find some here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2YYA02WEs2dUq3w9VkH58g/1

We have not only released the official SmartCash news translated in german, but also created tutorial videos for absolute beginners (e.g. “How to setup Wallet with bootstrap file”).

And thats what we want to do - periodically and in a more professional way.

So what will we do?

  • We will create a german Video & News Portal (www.SmartCash.TV).
    (Note: More languages could be added, but this proposal will focus on german only, since thats our native language)

  • We will translate all official SmartCash news/announcements to german and publish them on facebook (to 199,000 + 26,000 subscribers) and in the german SmartCash telegram group

  • We will create own content in german (Explanation videos etc). At least 1 video per week (maybe more).

  • We will publish content on SmartCash.tv and YouTube

  • We will promote content through topic-relevant marketing channels (which brings us to the next point)

  • We will support people, who join our german telegram group and need help (Note: We will do that anyways, regardless of this proposal)

Which are our marketing channels?

  • Facebook Page “ICONews Deutschland” (facebook.com/ICONewsDE)
    26,000 Subscribers, German fanpage about ICO related news

  • Telegram Channel “ICO News Deutschland” (t.me/ICONewsD)
    325 members, German telegram channel about ICO related news

  • Facebook-Page “ICO Coins” (facebook.com/ICOCoins.de)
    199,000 Subscribers, German fanpage about ICO related topics

  • Website "www.icocoins.de"
    German website about ICO related topics

All videos will be shared on these channels, as well as all announcements (with german translation) that are being posted by official SmartCash sources.

By voting yes on this proposal you are giving the opportunity to build up a german community and make SmartCash grow that way.

Any kind of feedback is highly appreciated!

result.title: SMARTCASH ROADSHOW, MERCHANT INTEGRATION AND BUSINESS ADDOPTION EXTENSION
result.summary: This proposal is an extension of my current smartcash roadshow project currently in its Sixth month in the Brong Ahafo region of Ghana with an addition of merchant and business integration. The roadshow has been successful in the two regions with participants mainly worried about how to get smartcash and where to spend it and this has necessitated incorporating businesses and merchant adoption into the roadshow activities. The roadshow will continue from the southern part of Ghana which is also the business hub starting from Eastern region, Western region, Volta region and Central region. Each region will see a conference, two radio discussion and a TV discussion with a minimum of 100 participants comprising of business owners, agencies and the general public
result.description:
Hello smarties! My name Mohammed Awal Sani known as Cryptowall on the smartcash discord page, from Ghana West Africa. I am submitting this proposal as my smartcash roadshow extension and to embark on extra activities on businesses and merchant adoption. The second phase of the smartcash roadshow in Ghana has been successfully covered another three regions, greater Accra, Ashanti and Brong Ahafo region of Ghana making it a total of six regions effectively covered so far in six regions and more than 1000s wallets have been created. Updates on the previous works can be found on YouTube @cryptowall55, twitter @cryptowall55 and Facebook @smartcashgh. Through the second phase of the project, 0ver 1000s of individuals and some businesses got to know about smartacsh and its amazing features such as the smart rewards and the speed of transactions. The most important part is the outreach to as many people and businesses through our meetups and the mass communication media to create awareness and education for future adoption and acceptance. It’s worth noting that every new revolution takes time before massive adoption and mainstreaming due to some level of risk. I am however confident that smartcash have a positive growth potentials considering its age and its popularity. Smartcash will be the dominant cryptocurrency for the exchange of goods and services in the near future considering the various efforts by various teams sponsored by smartcash all over the globe.

Gradually cryptocurrency adoption in Africa is taking roots at an admirable pace. However, one critical area that needs a big push is merchants and business acceptance as a form of payment for goods and services. It is very indispensable since that will boost adoption and offer Africans the freedom and convenience virtual currencies brings and to bridge the currency limitation of international trade. None the less, getting smartcash to the masses is still very paramount that need more of outreach. Also it is crucial to get more fiat/smartcash exchanges that can provide liquidity to smartcash holders. Businesses will be motivated to accept smartcash if there is a large user base and the only way to expand user base is through aggressive outreach.

Ghana is one of the four countries where cryptocurrency adoption is picking up remarkably in Africa. The West African Nation is home to over 25.9 million people and counted among entities where monetary mismanagement has ruined lives and wealth creation. There is no doubt the country is ripe for use of cryptocurrencies

The third phase of the roadshow will be geared towards covering the remaining four regions of Ghana. The roadshow will take different dimension in this round, holding regional conference in each of the four regions with at least 100participants comprising of business owners and potential investors, two radio discussions to reach over 50000 listerners and a Television discussion to reach over 1million people. This will see business and merchants approach, to get merchants and businesses to accept smartcash and make it an alternative medium of exchange to the Ghanaian cedi and also expand the user base in Ghana. The conference will also see government agencies to discuss how to enhance the public sector with the blockchain technology and the relevance of cryptocurrency in our lives and the Ghanaian economy using smartcash as a case study. The radio and TV discussions will feature call inn sessions for questions and answers and Smartcash tokens given to listeners who call to ask questions and or contribute. The radio discussions will be heard by over 200,000 people every week and over 1000,000 viewers to the TV discussions. At least 10s of business owners will take part in the conference in each region to learn how to internationalise their businesses using smartcash as medium of exchange. The success of the roadshow and other projects carried out by various teams in Ghana has made smartcash popular in Ghana than any cryptocurrency. The extension of this project will further make smartcash popular in the remaining four regions. The project will continue to pursue the mobile money/mpesa agenda in the rest of the regions to be covered by outreach even though the acceptance is not much. I anticipate a positive results soon.

This phase of the project will start from June and end in september. This will start from Eastern Region, Western, Central Region and Volter Region with massive outreach to potential investors and businesses in each region. The likes of smartrewards and smartnode will be used to make smartcash appealing to investors

This project will contribute significantly in pushing smartcash to be the best digital currency in terms of adoption and usage and a perfect alternative to the fiat currency. 

ACTION PLAN:

  1. A conference will be organised in each region comprising of business owners, mobile money operators, potential investors and government agencies.
  2. Businesses that have willingly accepted to incorporate smartcash in to their businesses will be giving additional extensive training on smartcash and how to use the wallet for sending and receiving payment
  3. Recruiting ambassadors and training them to attend to businesses in each region
  4. Getting smartcash listed on other fiat-crypto exchanges in Ghana.eg payplux.com and others

OUR ACHIEVEMENTS

The team have done successfully organised 12 meetups, 12 radio interview, and six TV discussion creating more than 2000 wallets for the past six months. See pictures and videos in the links below.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CWzmNIOkd44&t=28s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XQblrdRpcS8&t=384s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ULbd3JzIOw&t=221s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMxjIspUIQw&t=10s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Swrjr9BoFfw&t=10s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s9OyckUS9sQ

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zxnuDJOLvBA&t=6s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uqRjs-zuP0s

https://imgur.com/81f7tr0

https://imgur.com/1KQP525

https://imgur.com/E60OQlY

https://imgur.com/rihTv8p

https://imgur.com/R0eh2cq

I am asking for US$15120 every month for the next four months to cover the remaining four regions of Ghana, Eastern, Central, Western and Volter region. This will bring the roadshow activities to and end and this will be replicated in two French countries that share bothers with Ghana. Togo and Burkina Faso

BUDGET

Transportation to and within each region for one month                      $1500
Accommodation for a month for 5 people                                            $2000

the entire six months covered have been recorded in video and also pictures available, this will also be have videos, pictures and reports and the community will be updated at each mile stone.

result.title: Masternodebot.io
result.summary: Automated Setup & Trusted Masternode Hosting
result.description:
Automated Setup & Trusted Masternode Hosting

Contents

  • Introduction
  • Masternodes
  • Observation
  • Our Solution
  • Budget
  • Bonus
  • Additional Information
  • Closing Statement



Introduction

As an experienced and enthusiastic team of developers, we produce and focus on  products for the blockchain space, thriving on contributing towards a wide range of decentralised projects.

 

Having researched the Smart Cash system the team strongly believe we can enhance and evolve the Smartcash project further by bringing onboard our ideas and expertise.

Masternodes

  • Observation

There is currently a huge risk for masternode owners in trusting a 3rd party to assist them with the masternode setup, especially if the user has little or no technical experience.

 

    • Users have to follow detailed setup guides.
    • There are also limited notification services available for Smartcash masternode payouts. Masternode operators are having to constantly check wallet vales to ensure payouts are being made, a time consuming exercise.



  • Our Solution

Masternodebot.io  will assist users in setting up their own masternode, focusing on enhanced security ensuring the user  never has to share private information, all while the user remains in full control of their asset. Coins never leave the users  wallet.



It is important to note, all funds raised through this proposal will be spent directly on integrating and marketing Smartcash on the masternodebot.io platform.

 

masternodebot.io will offer the following features:

 

  • Trusted hosting
    • Coins do NOT leave the users wallet.
  • Fully maintained masternodes
    • 99.9% uptime guarantee utilising our worldwide, secure, dedicated platform.
  • Live masternode stats and monitoring
    • View unique masternode statistics and monitor hosted masternodes.

 

The following features are soon to launch:

 

  • Payout notifications
    • Receive alerts each and every time the masternode generates income, with daily, weekly or monthly updates.

 

Budget

 

 

  • Masternode Enabling Monitoring

 

We run full nodes enabling us to provide detailed analysis and compile the data as we harvest the Blockchain information. The information we gain enables us to present the user information such as payout rewards and frequency to name but a few.

Required: 10,000 Smart cash

 

 

  • Developer Resource

 

The requirement for expert resource is essential. The team of internal developers will be responsible for creating scripts that integrate the Blockchain with our platform.

Required $1,385 / 13,000 Smartcash

 

 

  • Incorporating Smartcash onto masternodebot.io

 

In order to incorporate Smartcash on the masternodebot.io platform user guides, statistics and listing the Smartcash masternode requires research and development time.

Required: $2985, / 28,000 Smartcash

 

 

  • Marketing (Social/ Banner/ Community)

 

To drive new users to the Smartcash platform, our marketing specialists will develop a target driven campaign. Community and social channels will be provided driving increased traffic to the official channels. The marketing campaigns key focus is to inject additional volume into the Smartcash ecosystem.

Required: $3520 / 33000 Smartcash

 

The total required for this project is only: aprx $8950 / 84,000 Smartcash.

 

We strongly believe this budget, whilst low, is extremely realistic and achievable.

 

Once funding is secured, the team will be ready to  integrate Smartcash on the masternodebot.io platform and begin marketing activities within a week of the proposal being secured.

 

Bonus

We believe in paying back the community and supporting our user base. On the 1st of each month, 5 randomly selected customers with active Smartcash masternode accounts will receive free masternode hosting for the following month. This will be an ongoing campaign.

 

Additional Information

 

masternodebot.io is not a site for hobbyists with the ability to already set-up basic masternodes, but will become the markets first global specialised service that focuses on higher net-worth individuals who have an interest in the Blockchain and Crypto solutions, specifically masternodes, but have neither the time or the skill to setup, manage and monitor their investment.

 

Our platform is available in multiple languages enabling international customers to feel confident. Our user focused interface works seamlessly with specialised assistance at every stage of the process if required.

 

We have created a user journey that takes the customer from order completion to the automation process for there chosen masternode. Focusing on the customer at each step, masternodebot.io has removed the multi-step requirements allowing them to activate a masternode. Dedicated specialists are on hand to assist the customer at any time of the process.

 

We will be focusing our marketing activities to those who may not have previously been aware of masternodes

 

(Beta Site Launch - 11th June 2018 - 9pm UTC)

 

Closing statement

This overview is designed to highlight our product and gauge interest from the community. Please feel free to contact us for more information or a site tour.

 

We strongly believe a secure, dedicated masternode hosting solution will enhance the Smartcash offering. With focused marketing activities and an easy to use platform masternodebot.io introducing Smartcash to a wider audience.

 

Our team look forward to answering any questions you may have around the proposal and are excited to work with the Smartcash community and showcase our talents on this and possible future products.

result.title: Advertise Smart Cash and Smart Band in Brazil on Second Largest News Outlet
result.summary: Strategically, repetition is the key. My goal is to show the Smart Band in action, not only through paid advertising, which we will but also on the daily basis on my YouTube channel. With the community's help, we will get millions intrigued by the usability of Smart Cash through Smart Band, and the technology Smart Cash brings.
result.description:
Amount: US$ 5.500 every 2 months
Goal: initially get the Brazilian population interested in Smart Cash trough Smart Band, meanwhile advertise the usability and technology os Smart Cash in the biggest news outlet in Brazil.

Hello community I'm Wilker, I previously worked with digital marketing and now, for the past 2 years I have been working on a YouTube channel here in Brazil with over 18.000 subscribers, where I do daily updates on the market news and much more.

I share the same vision as the Smart Cash community here in Brazil which is to make it the main source of payment, show how Smart Cash is already a smart payment system utilizing debit card and Smart band. Also, I have a Smart Cash free guide where I show what is Smart cash, how to use it, send smart trough email, much more and always adding new videos.

I'm very intrigued with the Smart Band solution, and every time I use the Smart Band to make day to day payments, when I tell the merchants and people that I am making payments in Smart Cash they really want to get involved.

The problem I want to solve.

We are at the infancy of this technology and less than 1% of the population knows about it, therefore we need to introduce cryptocurrency by explaining what is Smart Cash and how it uses blockchain, smart nodes and much more to revolutionize the world.

For Smart Cash to really get adopted her in Brazil, it is important to let the population know that Smart Cash exists, and it's already changing people's lives.

Solution

With the community´s help and consensus, my goal is to let the whole Brazilian population know that Smart Cash exists and is already changing the payment system. And here's is how I plan on instigating the Brazilian community to join the Smart Cash ecosystem.

Smart Band is the key since is a visual mean of payment utilizing cryptocurrency, there for people need to see it in action, I plan on buying, food, clothing, pay bills and display it on my youtube channel.

Advertising is the key, people need to see and hear about Smart Cash on the daily basis (that's my goal). That's why I am going to do paid advertising, since facebook, twitter, google, and bing has banned cryptocurrency ads, we will advertise Smart Cash on the second biggest news outlet in Brazil with over 110 million views.

I am frequently doing speeches on public schools, radios, community serviçes institutions and more. With the funding, I will be able to make shirts, bracelets, posters and much more and distribute in those events.

I have already made a couple of videos showing how easy it is to pay using a Smart Band, here's an example of how people's reaction.

(Watch the video here)

Comments

“That's awesome, form now on, Smart Cash is my coin.”


“Cool, paying bills with Smart Cash, now we can use cryptocurrencies without banks and in a private way. This is the future.”

Media Outlet

O Popular in partnership with Rede Globo (biggest television channel In the country), partners with 8 radios station, 11 media sites and more. In all it generates over 110 million views on the monthly bases, also it is important to point out that O Popular is second biggest media site in Brazil, as shown below.

The more people see Smart Cash being utilized and talked about, the better and faster it is for its adoption, that's why it's important to let people know, and show how Smart Band with Smart Cash, offers a real payment solution.

Budget

US$5,500 per month for every 2 months

  • US$750 will be invested in the Smart Band, where I will record places that accept Smart Cash with Atar Band and publish on my channel and paid to advertise. In order to instigate and generate curiosity on the users.
  • US$500 will be invested on a professional graphic designer to design campaign ads, shirt, and posters.

result.title: SmartFridays Extension and SmartMerchants meet up pilot.
result.summary:
This is the continuation of the proposal SmartFridays grass rooting meet ups and merchant pilgrimage: 
https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/pre-proposal-smart-fridays-viernes-inteligente-grass-root-cancun-entrepreneurs-pilgrimage-smartcash-as-payment-adoption-5-business-accepting-smartcash-as-payment-method-month/2183
result.description:
Amount 8 050 USD per month / SmartCash equivalent ammount
Timeline 3 Months ( 24 150 USD for 3 months)
Total Hours Expected 850+ hours

Proposal Goal Increase, consolidate and keep updated the Mexican SmartCash community in the Yucatán peninsula by meet ups and ensure that more businesses accept SmartCash as a payment method with 1 merchant oriented meet up per month.
Mexico and its Southeast

Mexico is a country with a population of at least 119 million habitants. The Yucatan peninsula has 3.5 million people and Quintana Roo (Cancun, Playa del Carmen) has 1.5 million.
The region of the Yucatan Peninsula is rich in Sun and Beach tourism, adventure tourism, ecotourism and archaeological tourism, it is estimated that at least 8 million tourists a year pass through this region.

Who Am I? What do I bring to the table & whats my goal here? What are your credentials? Why are you qualified for SmartHive funding?

We are @Eiky_Can (Agrocultural Engineer), @Mich.sunza (Developement and Business Innovation Engineer, SME administration Degree) and @Oucan (Financial and Fiscal Engineer, International Commerce degree), since November 2017 we have being promoting SmartCash in the Yucatan Peninsula Region, mainly Cancun, Playa del Carmen and Merida.

We have been in the world of cryptocurrencies since 2016, since October 2017 we were monitoring the community without being participants, however we realized the excellent way how the community works so it is a pleasure to be part and work to increase it and consolidate it.
We are confident our credentials to be funded by SMART HIVE because of our enthusiasm, willpower and the work already done.
In fact this is an Extension of our previous proposal:
https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/pre-proposal-smart-fridays-viernes-inteligente-grass-root-cancun-entrepreneurs-pilgrimage-smartcash-as-payment-adoption-5-business-accepting-smartcash-as-payment-method-month/2183

This previous work can be consulted at:


https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/1er-viernes-inteligente-cancun-mexico-smartcash
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/2nd-smartfriday-playa-del-carmen-mexico-smartcash
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/3rd-smartfriday-viernes-inteligente-cancun-mexico
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/4th-smartfriday-viernes-inteligente-merida-yucatan-mexico-smartcash
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/5th-and-6th-smartfriday-playa-del-carmen-and-cancun-mexico
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/7th-smartfriday-viernes-inteligente-cozumel-mexico
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/8th-smartfriday-cancun-mexico
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/9th-and-10th-smartfriday-surprise-viernes-inteligente-cancun-mexico
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/smartfridays-11th-and-12th-cancun-mexico-and-playa-del-carmen
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/15-business-accepting-smartcash-as-payment-method
https://steemit.com/smartcash/@doc-momo/hourray-for-our-mexican-community-leaders

In this extension we will keep the weekly SmartFriday meet up adding a 1 extra meet up for merchants.

In this meet up we will make a specialized program for merchants, explaining and exposing the positive points when smartcash is accepted as payment method, distribute SmartCash t-shirts, merchant stickers and keychains.

And also adding marketing on Facebook, yes cryptocurrency adds are banned on Facebook, but it exists some local groups with more than 200k members in total. Where you can pay for pin up your product/service or whatever you want to put as first sight content. we are estimating 500 USD per month for this kind of advertising. (1st Month have been already paid to ensure the exposure)

Deliverables / Job description of the proposal. Ideally it will be itemized. What are you doing? be specific. How much does it cost? Why?

This proposal has 2 main Parts.
1st Carry out weekly meet ups in different cities of the yucatan peninsula (Cancun, Playa del Carmen, Cozumel, Mérida).

Bring together cryptocurrency enthusiasts and educate them about Blockchain and SmartCash, introduce new crypto-enthusiasts. Keep them updated with SmartCash news, introducing them into the SmartCash community by Telegram and Discord platforms.

We will make a refund of USD 10 per person to their consumption check. To attract attendees and facilitate access to information and use of SMARTCASH. Encourage the participation of attendees in the SMARTCASH community so that in the future they can contribute with more proposals.
Number of expected participants 30 per session
Distribution of Stickers, T-Shirts, Keyrings.

2nd Promotion of SmartCash in Business to be accepted as a payment method by Merchant oriented meet ups.
We have already showed how many merchants are accepting smartcash as payment method in Cancún see : https://steemit.com/smartcash/@oucan/15-business-accepting-smartcash-as-payment-method, we want to push the adoption by merchant oriented meet ups.
Encourage the use of SmartCash as a payment method in small chains of businesses in Cancun.
Train the owners and managers of businesses in the use of SmartCash as a method of payment, monitoring, training.
Distribute SmartCash Stickers, T-Shirts, Keychains.

SmartCash past
We 3 (@eiky, @mich.sunza @oucan) we are part of Team SmartCash Mexico with The_walker and @Pest, in my case @oucan I help with the customer service of SmartCash social networks.
Together we have carried out at least 17 meet ups in total thanks to your support with a great attendance of at least 450 people in total, we dedicate our own time and resources to the promotion of SmartCash in our region. We have also funded 2 meet ups in Guadalajara.

We have participated in talent land as speakers and staff reaching 30k collateral people and direct speaking 2 000 people by direct speech during the event.

@Eiky_can have been interviewed and quoted by Brasilian mainstream cryptocurrency media
https://guiadobitcoin.com.br/o-smartrewards-pode-ser-uma-oportunidade-de-ouro-aberta-para-quem-quiser/ he is an active member from the brasilian community.

@mich.sunza and I we have been invited to the “Salon de la Crypto” in Montreal Canada by @MoMo knowed as * Doc * SmartSquad Member on Discord (bluenamed) more info coming soon.

@Mich.sunza have been the designer of Community integration and proposal design in talent land event workshop.

Possible questions.
What marketing channel will be used?
Our main communication channel will be facebook local groups in addition of mainstream local media such as magazines, social media and socialité events. We will continue collaborating with the official SmartCash MX networks to promote weekly events, generating interaction in social networks.
What happens if they don’t have 30 people per meeting?

We will use all the funds until they we ran out uf them, that is, if there are less than 30 participants, that resource will be allocated for the next meet up, therefore, is a project that in its naturalness can tend to last more than 3 months. Also we will fund other user meet ups if possible.

Conclusions. With this proposal we seek to increase and encourage the SmartCash community in Mexico, in one of the most touristic areas of Mexico and the world, as well keep pushing goods or service businesses to accept SmartCash as a payment method in Cancun. We are looking for a 3 months funding. ( 24 150 USD for 3 months)

result.title: The Absolute Beginner's Guide to Smartcash, Video Series
result.summary:
Summary

The Absolute Beginner’s Guide Videos Series, it's a set of videos to educate newbies to cryptocurrencies and it promotes Smartcash adoption. The videos are recorded in Spanish, but they include subtitles in English.

It’s hard to introduce Smartcash Concepts to the average person without any knowledge about cryptocurrencies. I’m creating the Absolute Beginner’s Guide to Smartcash, so people can understand from A to Z, all about Smartcash.
result.description:
I’m completely passionate about Smartcash and blockchain technology, perhaps just like you, and I’ve been trying in the past months to introduce Smartcash to my friends and family.

A few of them have adopted Smartcash, I used to give them 10 Smarts when they install the wallet in their smartphone. But many of them don’t really understand the power of Smartcash, they just don’t understand how to buy and sell Smartcash and I’ve noticed they think it’s too complicated.

They are completely newbies and they feel overflooded with too much information.

I’ve noticed that for people like you and me, it’s very easy to understand the terminology and we perfectly understand the new concepts.

But it’s very hard to explain from the very beginning to people that has zero knowledge.

They just don’t believe in the concepts, they don’t believe in Rewards, Airdrops, the Hive, they think I’m in dirty business.

It’s not the technology complexity, it’s that they are used to fiat money and the rules of the old world.

So I’m writing this pre-proposal because I know it will have a deep impact to introduce people to Smartcash.

I’m doing this through a proposal to show the power of the Hive and the Smartcash community.

So this is my proposal:

Description

The Absolute Beginner’s Guide to Smartcash will cover the following topics, every topic will become into a video.

I’ll make one video per week. This include script writing, video recording, video edition, translation to add subtitles, and uploading the video.

  1. Cryptocurrencies and Smartcash Basics.
  2. Smartcash Essentials.
  3. How to Buy Smartcash.
  4. How to Spend Smartcash.
  5. Smartcash Mining.
  6. Smartcash Rewards.
  7. Smartcash Smart Nodes.
  8. Smartcash Hive.
  9. How to Make a Proposal.
  10. How to Earn Smarts in Steemit.
  11. How to Send Smarts by Email.
  12. Smartcash Roadmap and other features, Smartcard, Smartband.
  13. Smartcash in the Future and Bitcoin Confidential.

Additionally I’ll write a post in Steemit to market the videos and in order to have the complete guide documented in Steemit.

Timeframe

I’ll make one video per week, so this proposal will last 13 weeks.

Deliverables

The Absolute Beginner’s Guide to Smartcash:

-13 Videos, one video per week, spoken in Spanish with subtitles in English.
-13 Post in Steem in both languages, English and Spanish.
-1 Facebook Page Managment to promote the Guide.

Budget

Breakdown:

For every Video I’ll spend at least 14 hours to create it, doing the following tasks:

Research and develop the creative approach 3 hours
Writing the Script 2 hours
Record the Video 1 hour
Editing the Video and adding graphics and effects 3 hours
Translating to English the script to add subtitles 1 hour
Adding Subtitles to the Video 2 hours
Mix Music and Soundtrack 1 hour
Final touches and distribution to Youtube/DTube 1 hour

14 hours x $20/hour = $280 per video
$280/Video x 13 Videos = USD$3, 640

I'll be delivering one video per week.

Aditionally to this, I'll write a post in English and another one in Spanish in Steemit to promote every videochapter of the guide and I'll be managing the 'Absolute Beginner's Guide to Smartcash' Facebook page, so we can promote and the guide and have interaction with our viewers. The time invested in these activities are not in the budget because I want to volunteer some of the activities related to the promotion of the Guide.

Who am I?

So, I love technology and its impact in the society. I’m currently 22 years old and I deeply fell in love with the blockchain technology. I see many futuristic scenarios about how the blockchain will transform our world and our society. And you know what? Last year when I knew Smartcash I knew true love. I know that Smartcash has the potential to change the world entirely. The Smarthive concept is a piece of smart art. And I’m really engaged with the roadmap.

I’ve been trying to introduce to family and friends Smartcash, but I’ve been struggling because a lack of a Guide that covers all the topics.

I’d love to work in order to spread the voice about cryptocurrencies and Smartcash. And I’m planning to deliver training and conferences that deals with the topic.

I invested in Smartcash because I see a huge potential because it’s completely oriented in the community, and I think that in the long run Smartcash will be a great investment.

Currently I live in Cancun, in an oceanfront apartment and I administer 3 Airbnb properties, and you guessed, I have everything automated with technology, well, almost everything, I haven’t found my Rosie, the robot maid.

I love to make videos, and I own several microphones, 3 gopro cameras, 1 360 camera, and several other kind of cameras, lights, a green screen, one drone and other gadgets. Sometimes I make inspirational videos or documentary videos like this one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=soG5f-YBfmg&t=110s42 or this one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IJJIeWvCYEw&t=29s3

I enjoy travelling, I’m passionate about sailing(I have a Hobie Getaway Sailboat), I’m a gourmand and I want to help the blockchain technology change our world.

result.title: SMARTCASH CAMP FOR LOCAL COINEXCHANGES AND ESTABLISHING THE FIRST SMARTCASH PHYSICAL EXCHANGE CENTER IN GHANA
result.summary:
SmartCash possess the greater potential of becoming the world’s number one cryptocurrency. It is applauding to see more outreach programs in Ghana nonetheless there is the need for more local coin exchanges to come on board to operate and trade massively on Smartcash cryptocurrency in their various coinexchange markets.
Our aim is to organize workshops to educate and train local cryptocurrency exchange markets in Ghana for them to massively adopt and trade SmartCash cryptocurrency on their coin exchange. The one-week workshop will camp Ghanaian local coinexchange markets in one geographical location, give them massive training on blockchain technology and the need for them to trade and operate smartcash cryptocurrency on their websites. It will also invite CEO’s of businesses and investors to come learn BlockChain Technology, Cryptocurrency and SmartCash in particular.
The workshop will invite ten most popular local coin exchange CEO’S in Ghana. Live Radio streaming prior to each workshop to create public awareness on the various local exchanges trading in smartcash crypto currency in Ghana. SmartCash tokens will be given to each local coin exchange to start trading smartcash on their coin exchanges.

The motivation behind this project is to make SmartCash a common currency for everyone irrespective of your financial status, makes it easier to trade in SmartCash on our local cryptocurrency exchange markets as well as create a sustainable SmartCash ecosystem in Ghana.
result.description:
Hi smartcash community, my name is Gawsu Hassan known on the smartcash community as @HassanC. A crypto advocate who believe in the future of SmartCash. For the past six months, I have supported cryptotravelers in advocating cryptocurrency through meet ups and conferences. I am presenting my first proposal which seeks to train and bring on board crypto traders to massively adopt and trade smartcash cryptocurrency on their various local coinexchange websites in Ghana, to allow business the freedom to adopt and trade in SmartCash as well as incorporate it in their businesses. Ghana is a middle income country with a relatively large population of over 27 million people. The three Northern regions where we intend to Carry out the program are characterized mostly by agricultural activities. A number of SmartCash programs have taken place in Ghana targeting the youth and businesses and it has really built a great SmartCash community in Ghana but nonetheless, more work still need to be done because few local coinexchanges trade smartcash in Ghana and With the kind of SmartCash community we are building in Ghana, there is the need for coinexchanges to come on board to trade and operate Smartcash cryptocurrency. Meanwhile, there numerous exchange markets trade in bitcoin, etheurum and litecoin. Some of the local exchange markets include:
• www.ebitcoinics.com1
• www.zenithcoins.com
• www.spectrocoin.com
• www.localbitcoin.com
• www.ecurrency4u.net
• www.payplux.com
• www.Cbtekghana.com etc.
The workshop will be held in the three Northern regions to educate the exchange markets as well as businesses to adopt and trade in SmartCash. About 10 coin exchanges will be invited of which two participants are expected to represent each exchange market targeting at camping 20 participants for a week intensive training and adoption of smartcash on their exchange markets across the three regions.

PLAN
All invited local coin exchange markets will be given an intensive training on Blockchain Technology, Cryptocurrency and Smartcash cryptocurrency and the need for them to massively adopt and start trading Smartcash crypto currency on their coinexchange markets. They will also be trained on how they can advertise Smartcash cryptocurrency on their local coinexchange markets website. The workshop will also train participants all the unique features of smartcash (smarthive, smartrewards, smartnodes, instant send, smartcard, etc.) and also spell out the smartcash roadmap to participants. Five local exchange markets that seem active and interested in trading smartcash on their markets will be given a token of smartcash to start trading and operation of smartcash on their local coinexchanges.

PLANNED ACTIVITIES

  1. The workshop will train all invited coin exchange markets on
    • Blockchain Technology and SmartCash in specific
    • How to download and setup SmartCash wallets
    • Key features of SmartCash,
    • How they can expand their local markets internationally,
    • The advantages of trading SmartCash on their local markets,
    • And the need for participants to use SmartRewards and SmartNodes as a store of value in the long term to realize their entrepreneurial goals.

  2. Participants will also be trained on how they can partner with businesses to trade with SmartCash especially those into import and export of goods and services.

  3. Local exchange markets that seem interested will be given some token of SmartCash to advertise and trade SmartCash on their markets.

  4. Finally, we will also set up the first SmartCash exchange center in Ghana. This office will serve as a point of physical contact for people to walk in and learn more about SmartCash. Also, this center will serve as a place for SmartCash exchange throughout the country and we intend to establish SmartCash Centers in every region of Ghana in the future. This will help coordinate all activities of SmartCash in the country, promote SmartCash through trained Ambassadors and as well as help reduce doubts about Cryptocurrencies and SmartCash in particular. This body will also hedge against the price of SmartCash by allowing businesses that accepts SmartCash to record all transactions in Ghanaian cedi equivalent. This will reduce the risks associated with businesses accepting SmartCash as payment for goods and services in case there is a fall in price. We shall also undertake the following activities:
    • Monthly SmartCash Business meets ups
    • One on one intensive interaction with business owners for massive adoption.
    • Training of SmartCash Business Ambassadors to reach out to as many businesses as possible
    • Running of SmartCash promotion and Business Advertisements over television and Radio stations in Ghana.
    All these will help create new opportunities for effective marketing, networking and development of fruitful partnerships within the business sector.

Timeline
Week 1

  1. Three (3) days intensive lecture on blockchain technology and SmartCash cryptocurrency

  2. Three (3) days intensive practical’s on how to download and migrate smartcash wallets to their local exchange markets websites.

  3. Dinner and departure of all invited participants

  4. Week 2 & 3
    A. Establishing a physical exchange center in Tamale
    B. Advertisement and publicity (Radio/TV, fliers, brochures etc.)
    C. Logistics
    Week 4
    A. Recruitment of working personnel
    B. Opening and commencement of operations

Budget
Transportation for four invited guest speakers =$800
Accommodation of 20 invited guest for one week =$1,000
Hiring of conference for the workshop for 7 days =$500
Feeding cost of 50 participants for one week =$1,750
Live radio streaming for 6 days = $800
Photography for videos and pictures for 7 days = $700
Publicity = $500
Tokens for participants = $150
Training materials
Smartcash Guide books =$250
Smartcash T- Shirts = $350
SmartCash Rubber wrist bands = $150
Smartcash branded caps =$100
Smartcash accreditation cards = $40
Smartcash banners, stickers and fliers = $150
Total = $7,140

Establishing first SmartCash exchange center in Tamale
Budget
Renting an office space for a year =$2000
Refurbishment =$200
SmartCash banners, fliers and Stickers, Brochures =$1000
Logistics = $1000
Startup funds for exchange =$4000
Total budget = $ 8,200

Total = $15,340

Contingency 5% = $ 767
Grand total = $16,107

CONCLUSION
This project seeks to bring more local online exchange sites to incorporate Smartcash to their trade and also establish a physical SmartCash Exchange & Support Center which will also serve as a center for monitoring and evaluation of Smartcash projects in the country. Therefore, it becomes a win-win situation. We hereby seek your kind opinions and recommendations for this proposal. Cheers! Everyone

result.title: FIRST CLOTHES COMPANY IN THE WORLD FUNDED BY SMARTCASH - CRYPTO
result.summary: First fashion brand from Brazil that was born ready for the world with the cryptocoin. The brand will be financed by Smartcash, will disclose the cryptocoin and receive payments in SmartCash. The main focus is on reaching young people who shop online and who may be impacted by the importance and strength that virtual currencies are achieving. The strategy is to dialogue with young people about Smartcash in an indirect way. They will buy the product and will be surprised with information about the currency in an intelligent and innovative way.
result.description:
This brand of clothing is born with the intention of being a clothing production democracy and strengthening the world of crypto-coins, focusing almost exclusively on Smartcash. Our site will allow people to suggest pieces of clothing to increase the amount of product options on our site, with room for voting in which the most voted will be transformed into high quality T-shirts and finishing.

 

In addition, in the social sense, inputs will be purchased from low-income seamstresses and self-employed, stimulating a better income distribution and strengthening emerging markets.

 

The focus of the products will be the male and young public, considering that it is the main niche that buy virtual currencies in Brazil and is a category that has a habit of buying online.

 

Current market:

It is important to analyze the current circumstances to understand the promising market that we are dealing with. By 2015, e-commerce revenue totaled approximately US$ 14 billion. In 2016 there was an increase of 11%, reaching 15.7 billion dollars and in 2017 reached 17.6 billion dollars and the fashion area represents 30% of this total, being the most researched and purchased category in the country.

In terms of schooling, the lowest percentage of purchases is for people with elementary education with 3%, while those with complete higher education represent 32%. Consumers with postgraduate courses total 20%, secondary education 22% and incomplete higher education 23%.

With regard to age, it is noticed that the majority of consumers are between 35 and 49 years old are the largest buyers with 36%, followed by those between 25 and 34 years with 32% and between 18 and 24 years with 11%. Being this the same public that most buys virtual currencies in the Brazilian market, but mainly male, causing that in this way, the sale of clothes is linked directly to the public that also acquires virtual currencies. In this way, we can strengthen Smartcash if it is targeted and qualified.

 

 

Project Expectation:

  • Develop a new clothing brand for the youth market;
  • Develop a high quality product that stands out in the market;
  • Enable thousands of young people to get to know Smartcash, the cryptomoeda behind the project;
  • Get media space on the new brand being launched focusing on the beginning of the disclosure in the fact of funding from Smartcash;
  • Start of operations in the second half of 2018 and make at least 1000 sales this semester;
  • Sale mainly to young people who have a habit of buying online;
  • Several spaces on the platform to promote Smartcash.

 

 

As a way to promote SmartCash:

  • The following text will be displayed on the website: "Company funded by the best currency in the world, SmartCash."
  • In all sales, text will be placed on the packaging talking about the company and about SmartCash in a creative and innovative way.
  • Possibility to buy products using Smartcash;

result.description:
My name is Mike Sygula and I'm the founder of Truth Theory, I'm also a crypto enthusiast, to learn a little bit about me, please watch this recent interview on DTube (CLICK HERE) 

ABOUT TRUTH THEORY
Truththeory.com is a digital media brand which was established in 2010. Since its inception, we have had over 100 million page views, with 40 million of those views in the last 12 months due to rebranding and refining our message. Our shift was to focus mainly on solutions, instead of just highlighting problems, and to provide uplifting content. This is why we created a new concept which is that of “New Media”, which has the goal of leaving viewers feeling empowered. Most of our visitors come from English speaking countries with the US being the most popular source of traffic, however, we get views from all over the world. Our main demographic age group is 25 to 34 year olds. Our readers are activists, freethinkers, libertarians and generally those interested in solutions and sustainability, therefore we believe that our visitors will be a great match for SmartCash.

21.4k followers on Twitter
