Video views on Facebook

OUR TEAM

BENEFITS TO SMARTCASH

  • Banner ads on our website. 3 different banners linking to dedicated SmartCash pages educating people about SmartCash and redirecting people to Smartcash.cc (most of the advertising on our website will be replaced with these banners)

  • Exclusive SmartCash branding of all video content produced by Truth Theory (at least 15 videos per month).
    All video content produced over the next 1 month will have a “Powered by SmartCash” watermark and outro with the link to our dedicated SmartCash page on our website explaining more on what SmartCash is.

  • Exclusive branding of all memes created by Truth Theory (shared on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc.) with SmartCash logo.

  • Monthly dedicated SmartCash livestream on our Facebook page with 1.7 million followers, where we will be educating our readers on what Smart Cash is, how to buy it, what are the benefits of it and all other important info.

  • Dedicated SmartCash educational page on our website.

Total video views from all platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc.), some of SmartCash branded content will continue to be shared on social media and the web, so the stats will continue to grow after the initial period. 

We are looking for long-term partnership but lets first test it out for a month, we guarantee at least 1mln impressions on our website with banner ads on each page plus all additional views and clicks on videos, memes, articles etc. If both sides decide to continue with the future partnership, we hope to do our own events and speak at different conferences and we would be extremely happy to promote Smartcash as our main sponsor and partner.

result.summary:
## Who am I?

I’m a full stack developer, crypto and blockchain enthusiast, Linkedin: [https://www.linkedin.com/in/hector-b-7677828a/](http://bit.ly/2J6Teni) Twitter: @BravoVlog. I was developing software solutions for one of the most important banks in Mexico, My plan is to leave my traditional job and dedicate 100% to the world of cryptocurrencies because I think it's the future, unlike the traditional banks. I met SmarthCash thanks to the people of Cancun who did a meetup in Mexico City, I am very excited for the future that Smartcash envisions.

I want to contribute my bit to this great smartcash project.

# Goals

* Develop the first SmartCash cryptocurrency marketplace in Mexico

* We plan to transact 4000+ dollars in smartcash on the first 2 months. We’re going to track the results and show them to us.

* Open at least 1300 real wallets on the first two months, with real transactions over the marketplace. We’re going to track the results and show them to us.

* Massive Smartcash adoption and usability.

* Reach thousands of people who will hear about SmartCash with marketing campaigns, especially video marketing and email Marketing.

* Scale to all country and international

* Implement referral program
result.description:
# ¿Why online Marketplace?

Global internet commerce has grown exponentially in recent years, In México Generation X, Millennials and Baby Boomers now have more access to the Internet. Free Public Networks and Smartphones stimulate growth of users and maintain connectivity 24 hours a day.

In 2016, 65.5 million of Mexicans used internet, today more than 71 million users are calculated. Three out of every four Mexican Internet users buy online with consumption averages close to 370 dollars per month. The Generation X and The Millenias are the most active in terms of Internet purchases, possibly due to their greater economic capacity.

With a powerful and creative marketing campaign aimed to Generation X (1966-1982) and the Millenias (1988-2002) we will generate new Smartcash investors who will have the incentive to make immediate commercial transactions in our platform and they will put new products to sell. The Community of SMARTCASH users in Mexico will grow significantly and we will be able to do more and more real commercial transactions with the SmartCash Wallets.

This is a Project in which worth Invest.

Now it's time to give a chance to cripto marketplace, the first one in México.

# Strategy

### Growth SmartCash Community

I will Develop an e-commerce marketplace where the Smart community can exchange their smartcash for trending products previously reviewed by recognized youtubers*, that will make the buyers sure about the product they are going to acquire*.

* This is thought to be done in phase two. In the phase one we are going to make the video reviews

* We are going reach our target creating youtube reviews like: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6tkwn2MwCRo](http://bit.ly/2srdgBX) and online marketing campaigns

We want to promote the** growth of the Smart community**, so we devised a way for people to use their smartcash to carry out transactions through an e-commerce platform.

This marketplace, unlike others (Amazon, Ebay, etc...), will be based on video reviews of the items for sale to reach our audience. The video reviews is one of the most effective sales techniques in e-commerce, even we can achieve thousands of smartcash possible users. The products reviews will be done in a professional way, either by our team or, with help of the most experienced youtubers in the field, thus achieving a greater uptake of new users and an **accelerated growth of the Smart community**. The community can also sell their own products in the plattform. With this medium-term strategy we can grow the community greatly.

![image alt text](image_0.png)

Also, in order to quickly **grow the community** and have a quick capture of new users, we will carry out a spectacular draw (raffle) of two flagship smartphones, being one of the requirements to enter the draw to open a Wallet with a minimum amount of Smartcash. With that we have contemplated the opening of at least 300 wallets in the first month.

In the second month under the same strategy we hope to open 1000 more wallets and have transacted with real wallets about up to 3000 dollars.

### Engage community

In addition, another strong stimulant for people to use their cryptocurrency is that all announced products will have a **significant discount when purchased with Smartcash**. The strategy to follow for offering products with big discounts will be the following.

Smartcash will offer an impressive 50% discount for new users who use their smartwallet.

The contribution of smartcash for the 50% discount will bring a great growth of new users who really transact with their smartwallets.

Additionally, there will be **six ****meetups**** to provide information about the cryptoeconomy and smartcash**, as well as seek for smartcash investors and investors to advertise products within our platform.

### Topics:

1. What Blockchain and Smartcash is and how it works,

2. Advantages of Smartcash over other cryptocurrencies,

3. How to open my Smartwallet,

4. How to invest Smartcash

5. How to make transactions with Smartcash.

6. The future of smarthcash,

7. How to sell your products in our smartcash plattform.

Also, we are going to create **Youtube content** explaining all of this issues for the spanish speaker community in the world, so they can see it and get interested in becoming part of the Smartcash community.

By creating a **reliable marketplace platform**, in which the buyers will have the security that they are going to acquire the product they are seeing (on the reviews) and which also accepts Smartcash as payment, we will motivate people to adopt this cryptocurrency and with that the smart community will grow even more.

### Referral program

To generate an exponential growth of new users we will reward the members for each referral that is registered with a new smart wallet, a personalized link will be generated to send to all their contacts and they will obtain 1 additional ticket for the draw for each successful referral.

# Six week plan

Start back-end development $750 (Hosting, domain, development).

result.title: masternodebot.io version 2 - Bringing new users to Smartcash through marketing - dedicated smartcash page - automated node setup & hosting
result.summary: A dedicated page for Smartcash which will be marketed heavily and give users the ability to setup and host a masternode on the same platform - we will be marketing t new users who are new to masternodes through targeted marketing :-)
result.description:
Smartcash proposal 2nd edition


Contents

 

  • Introduction
  • Masternodes
  • Observation
  • Our Solution
  • Budget
  • Bonus
  • Additional Information
  • Closing Statement

 



Introduction

As an experienced and enthusiastic team of developers, we produce products for the blockchain space, thriving on contributing towards a wide range of decentralised projects.

 

We are launching a new website called masternodebot.io to enhance the user experience for masternode users and to bring a new audience to the site so they can discover smartcash. We will be offering a dedicated page for smartcash listing information about your coin along with various useful links. If someone decides they want to purchase smartcash and run a masternode they can do it easily using our automated system and trustless environment as all coins stay on the users wallet.

 

Masternodes

  • Observation

There is currently a huge risk for masternode owners in trusting a 3rd party to assist them with the masternode setup, especially if the user has little or no technical experience.

 

    • Users have to follow detailed setup guides.
    • There are also limited notification services available for Smartcash masternode payouts. Masternode operators are having to constantly check wallet vales to ensure payouts are being made, a time consuming exercise.


Our Solution

Masternodebot.io  will assist users in setting up their own masternode, focusing on enhanced security ensuring the user  never has to share private information, all while the user remains in full control of their asset. Coins never leave the users  wallet.



Smartcash dedicated page

 

Below is a screenshot of the smartcash page - we intend to add to this but we hope it gives you a rough idea of what the site will look like.

It is important to note, all funds raised through this proposal will be spent directly on integrating and marketing Smartcash on the masternodebot.io platform.

masternodebot.io will offer the following features:

 

  • Trusted hosting
    • Coins do NOT leave the users wallet.
  • Fully maintained masternodes
    • 99.9% uptime guarantee utilising our worldwide, secure, dedicated platform.
  • Live masternode stats and monitoring
    • View unique masternode statistics and monitor hosted masternodes.

 

The following features are soon to launch:

 

  • Payout notifications
    • Receive alerts each and every time the masternode generates income, with daily, weekly or monthly updates.

 

Budget



 

  • Developer Resource

 

The requirement for expert resource is essential. The team of internal developers will be responsible for creating scripts that integrate the Blockchain with our platform.

Required $1,385 / 13,000 Smartcash

 

 

  • Incorporating Smartcash onto masternodebot.io

 

In order to incorporate Smartcash on the masternodebot.io platform user guides, statistics and listing the Smartcash masternode requires research and development time.

Required: $1743, / 20,000 Smartcash

 

 

  • Marketing (Social/ Banner/ Community)

 

To drive new users to the Smartcash platform, our marketing specialists will develop a target driven campaign. Community and social channels will be provided driving increased traffic to the official channels. The marketing campaigns key focus is to inject additional volume into the Smartcash ecosystem.

 

We shall be conducting the following marketing exercises to bring new users to the platform so they can learn about Smartcash. The marketing contribution would go towards the following resource.

 

Banner ads - on masternode various masternode and crypto related sited

 

Community resource - we will be allocating hours to our team to reach out to various POW and investing channels to make them aware of masternodes and smartcash

 

Blogs - we will be writing blogs to promote smartcash and our platform which will assist with SEO.

 

Social media -  we will be allocating resource to build out and post on our various social media channels, we will be including smartcash posts within these campaigns.

 

Required: $2877 / 33000 Smartcash

 

The total required for this project is only: aprx $6005 / 69,000 Smartcash.

 

We strongly believe this budget, whilst low, is extremely realistic and achievable.

 

Once funding is secured, the team will be ready to  integrate Smartcash on the masternodebot.io platform and begin marketing activities within a week of the proposal being secured.

 

Community Bonus

 

To share our excitement in going live with masternodebot we will be offering the following

 

  • 10 x 6 months hosting contract
  • 15 x 3 month hosting contract
  • 20 x 2 month hosting contract
  • 30 x 1 month hosting contract

 

We shall be proving voucher codes on the Smartcash forum.



Additional Information

 

masternodebot.io is not a site for hobbyists with the ability to already set-up basic masternodes, but will become the markets first global specialised service that focuses on higher net-worth individuals who have an interest in the Blockchain and Crypto solutions, specifically masternodes, but have neither the time or the skill to setup, manage and monitor their investment.

 

Our platform is available in multiple languages enabling international customers to feel confident. Our user focused interface works seamlessly with specialised assistance at every stage of the process if required.









Masternode selection page

 

We have created a user journey that takes the customer from order completion to the automation process for there chosen masternode. Focusing on the customer at each step, masternodebot.io has removed the multi-step requirements allowing them to activate a masternode. Dedicated specialists are on hand to assist the customer at any time of the process.

 

We will be focusing our marketing activities to those who may not have previously been aware of masternodes

 

(Beta Site Launch - 11th June 2018 - 9pm UTC)

 

Closing statement

This overview is designed to highlight our product and gauge interest from the community. Please feel free to contact us for more information or a site tour.

 

We strongly believe a secure, dedicated masternode hosting solution will enhance the Smartcash offering. With focused marketing activities and an easy to use platform masternodebot.io introducing Smartcash to a wider audience.

 

Our team look forward to answering any questions you may have around the proposal and are excited to work with the Smartcash community and showcase our talents on this and possible future products.

result.title: SMARTCASH AND BLOCKCHAIN ADOPTION CAMPAIGN AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP SUMMIT IN GHANA
result.summary: The entrepreneurial process involves all the functions, activities and actions associated with perceiving opportunities and creating means to pursue them. Entrepreneurs pursue their own ideas, take risk and realize financial rewards. This project seeks to introduce SmartCash and Blockchain Technology to young entrepreneurs in Ghana starting with the three Northern Regions (Upper East, Upper West and Northern Region). This will be done through organizing conferences/Seminars in each region with attendance of not less than 100 young entrepreneurs and a radio discussion which will reach about 45,000 people with phone in sessions for questions and answers. The rationale for this project is to make SmartCash a mainstream digital currency for all, making SmartCash a common means of exchange for entrepreneurs in their daily dealings and to also make SmartCash an investment avenue and alternative source of funding for future business plans.
result.description:
Hello Smarties, my name is Yunus Thuahir Nazeef (known as @digaama on discord and forum). I am a crypto lover, investor and an advocate for SmartCash. I have been working closely with @shitu on his project “Introducing SmartCash to 5 Ghanaian Universities and I have also been working around the clock with @cryptosoja on his project “SmartCash for Senior High Schools”. I am submitting my first proposal “SMARTCASH AND BLOCKCHAIN ADOPTION CAMPAIGN AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP SUMMIT IN GHANA” which seeks to empower young Ghanaian entrepreneurs to adopt and use SmartCash in order to realize and achieve their entrepreneurial goals and to also attain financial freedom.

Ghana has a youthful population. Results of the 2010 Population and Housing Census indicate that, 8,662,400 out of the estimated 24,658,823 (representing 35 per cent) people in Ghana were between the 15-34 years’ age. The youth therefore constitute the vital force for national development. Entrepreneurship helps to alleviate the problem of unemployment, to overcome the issue of stagnation and to increase the competiveness and growth of businesses and industries. For this reason, most of the youth are in to entrepreneurship.

However, entreprenuers faces numerous challenges such as high cost of transaction fee with banking system, difficulty with online shopping due to currency appreciation and depreciation as well as luck of funding for future plans. This present the best opportunity to introduce SmartCash to young entrepreneurs to massively adopt and use it for their daily transactions, for purchase/sales of goods and services online as also serve as an investment avenue for funding future entrepreneurial business plans. The conferences/seminars will be held in three different regions with each region recording not less than 100 participants.

 

WORK PLAN

Young entrepreneurs who are able to attend the seminar would be trained on Blockchain Technology and SmartCash in general. They would also be trained on SmartCash wallet installation and how to advertise SmartCash on social media, within peers and the various markets. Participants would as well be trained on Network/Digital marketing, planning and executing businesses and the ways by which their entrepreneurial targets can be achieved by accumulating capital to fund future business plans through investing in SmartCash and SmartReward. Fifteen (15) participants from each region who exhibit perfect understanding of Blockchain Technology and SmartCash digital currency would selected to serve as regional Ambassadors.

ACTIVITIES

  1. There shall be a 30 minutes’ Radio presentation on SmartCash and Blockchain Technolohy in all the regions prior to the day of the conference.

 

  1. The seminar would train participants on:
  • Cryptocurrencies and its evolution.
  • SmartCash and Blockchain Technology.
  • Installation of SmartCash Wallets (Mobile and Web Wallets).
  • Unique features of SmartCash which include SmartRewards, SmartNodes, SmartVoting, SmartForums etc.
  • How to purchase SmartCash from local and international exchanges.
  • The benefits of using SmartCash for their day-day transactions, buying goods and services oline, payment of bills ect. over any other cryptocurrencies.

 

  1. Fifteen (15) participants from each region who exhibits perfect understanding of seminar would be selected and trained as regional Ambassadors for SmartCash. They would also establish regional clubs to promote SmartCash among their peers. This clubs would be supported with $700 worth of SmartCash to help organize more entrepreneurial training events to educate each other as to how SmartCash and SmartRewards can be used as a store of value to achieve their entrepreneurial goals.

 

  1. Participants would be trained on how to achieve financial independence through Network/Digital marketing, planning and executing businesses and the ways by which their entrepreneurial targets can be achieved by accumulating capital to fund future business plans through SmartCash and SmartReward.

 

There would also be a token of $5 worth of SmartCash for the first 50 participants in each region. This will encourage attendance, allow participants to experience the speed and convenience with using SmartCash and to share that experience with others.

TIMELINE

1st Week (2days workshop) Northern Region ( Tamale)

 

2nd Week (2days workshop) Upper East Region (Bolga)

 

3rd Week (2days workshop) Upper West Region(Wa)

 

PROPOSAL BUDGET

Transportation cost within the 3 regions for three weeks = $1000

Hiring of venues for the conferences/ seminars = $900

Hotel accommodation and feeding for team for 3 weeks = $1700

Cost of Feeding for participants for all 6 conferences/workshops = $600

Printing of SmartCash T-shirts, stickers, fliers etc for participants across the 3 regions = $1400

SmartCash regional club funds for all the 3 regions = $2100

Cost of Radio programs for all the 3 regions = $700

Website and publications for all the 3 regions = $250

Communication and data calls for organizing the all the 6 conferences/ workshops = $100

Hiring cameraman for videos and pictures for the 6 workshops = $500

Token for participants for all the 6 workshops/conferences = $500

Sub-total -$9,750

Contingency 5% = $487.50

GRAND TOTAL = $10, 237.50

We are therefore asking for $10,237.50/equivalent of amount of SMART to be able to execute this project successfully.

 

JUSTIFICATION

Pictures, videos and reports of this project would be submitted to the SmartCash community and would also be circulated on the various social media platforms as ads.

result.title: SmartNode Simply Explained: How to set one up.

result.description:
Hi Everyone

So I'm busy setting up some SmartNodes and I've realized it isn't that straightforward for the average person. I have experience with programming and clouds and was still a little confused on the whole process. I'm using Hannah's video and the SmartCash guide docs. They are great and they do have all the steps, however, they don't explain why each step is important.

I'm proposing to make a YouTube video that simply explains the steps on how to set up a SmartNode. I'm quite good at explaining difficult things:

Here is some proof of me simply explaining Mean-Variance Portfolio Theory  https://youtu.be/6do_11UZNu4

The video will help non-tech people understand SmartNodes and how to set one up. It will cover the following:

1) What are SmartNodes

2) Why are SmartNodes important

3) An overview of the setup process

4) The steps to set one up and why each one is necessary

5) The benefits of having a SmartNode

I'll also include some tips, for example how to get free $25 credits for your Vultr VPS. (Check this link out https://www.vultr.com/promo25b?service=promo25b)

My channel has 12000 subscribers, most of them are interested in finance, crypto and investing. My previous SmartCash videos have brought in collectively 45 000 views. So my audience is already aware of SmartCash, this next step is to get them to invest and set up SmartNodes.

The more SmartNodes, the stronger the network. So this will help all of us.

Budget: Total $750

Creating Content: $500

Advertising Video: $250

As always, I'm open to questions, so please don't hesitate to ask me in the comment section below.

result.description:
Hi everyone, I'm Abdul Razak Chelpang, SmartAmbassador on discord, and razakchelpang@gmail.com as my email address.

INTRODUCTION

Food is a basic commodity purchased regularly on a daily basis. It will be great getting food vendors to accept smartcash as a mode of exchange. Being able to purchase food with smart will be a great accomplishment.

Also, food vendors reach out a very large number of people on a daily basis, so getting these vendors to talk about smartcash will promote smartcash in every way to their customers. Food vendors on a daily basis reach out to not less than 500 people.

We therefore want to introduce smartcash to these food vendors and convince them to accept this digital currency as a mode of exchange for food.

MODE OF EXECUTING THIS PROJECT

  • We wish to reach out to 20 popular food joints in Tamale in the Northern Region – owners to be specific.
  • We will talk to them about crypto-currencies and smartcash specifically, and the benefits of the digital currency.
  • We will convince them to accept this currency as a mode of payment for food.
  • We will give them two smartcash t-shirts each to be given to their employees to help promote smartcash in their own way.
  • Fliers will be given out to each vendor to give out to customers who are unaware of smartcash.
  • Smart-cash customized rubber-bags will be given to each food vendor for food packaging.
  • Each vendor will be given a banner to hang at a vantage point for customers who are unaware of this digital currency to also get to know about smartcash.
  • About 5dollar worth of smart will be given out as a token to each vendor.
  • The project will be carried out within four (4) working days, five (5) vendors reached out to each working day.
  • After the final day of execution a radio program will be held for 30minutes to inform people about smartcash and inform them food vendors that now accept smartcash.
  • After execution of this project, details will be published by a nationwide newspaper and a blog that reaches out to over 10 000 people to help get the message out, locally and globally.

 

AIM OF THIS PROJECT

The aim of this project is to popularize smartcash and make it an accepted mode of exchange among food vendors.

 

 

BENEFITS OF THIS PROJECT TO SMARTCASH

  • Food vendors will get to know about smartcash and accept it as a mode of payment for food.
  • We will reach out to their customers by making them aware of smartcash.
  • 20 active members (food vendors) to sign up onto smartcash.
  • More people, not less than 500 will see the smartcash banner on a daily basis, therefore awareness will be created for 2000 plus people on a weekly basis.
  • Radio program will reach out to over 50,000 people within Tamale and the Region at large.
  • Newspaper and blog publication will reach out to over 20 000 people.

 

MODE OF EVALUATION

  • Picture evidences will be provided.
  • Reports will be provided after every daily activity.
  • Updates on social media handles for the public.

 

BUDGET

Travel cost for 4 days- $ 430

Feeding for team for 4 days- $ 400

Cost of customizing 40 T-shirts- $ 800

Cost of customizing rubber bags- $460

Cost of pictures- $ 500

Cost of banners- $ 850

Token for vendors- $ 100

Radio program- $300

Cost of newspaper and blog coverage- $120

Contingency funds 5% of total $3,960 - $ 198

Total- 4, 158.00 $ USD

Therefore, we are requesting an amount of not more than $4,158.00 or amount equivalent of smartcash to execute this project. Thanks.

result.title: CONTNUETION OF SMARTCASH FOR SENIOR HIGH SCHOOLS IN GHANA
result.summary: Gradually cryptocurrency adoption in Africa is taking a root at an admirable pace. However, one of the relevant areas that need a big push is the educational sector to accept and use smartcash as payment of school fees. This is very essential since, that will boost the adoption and offer Africans the freedom and comfort stations to these currencies and Ghana is one of the African countries where cryptocurrency adoption is picking up massively. Therefore the proposal intends to continue smartcash to secondary schools in Ghana and make a target of 30 secondary schools within a period of 2 months with the development of interest and the acceptance of smartcash by secondary schools, since we need schools to understand the relevance of cryptocurrency, blockchain technology and smartcash as a means of payment which is easy, fast and can be processed immediately. For the first time this initiative will be introduce into the country, to introduce smart to secondary schools in Ghana will help expand the smartcash frontier and the increment of smartcash usability in Ghana. This project is aimed at introducing Smartcash to students in the secondary level in Ghana. The reason is to educate them on the importance of youth savings as a means of creating access to and a key link between economic opportunities and outcomes for young people and enabling them to manage emergencies, invest in their education as well as improve their future orientation
result.description:
INTRODUCTION

Alhassan Abdul Wadudhttps://twitter.com/cryptosojais my name known on the smartcash community as cryptosoja. A crypto advocate who believe smartcash is the future of payments. I have supported cryptotravelers in advocating cryptocurrency through meet ups and conferences under the umbrella of our free markets and liberty think tank. Due to the increasing adoption of cryptocurrency in Africa and with the passion and enthusiasm I have for smartcash and as part of my efforts to inflate the adoption and usage of smartcash

Having successfully completed the phase one of this project in Ghana, covering the northern region of Ghana (Tamale) from late April to late May 2018, I am submitting the second phase of my proposal to cover the next two regions of the country namely: the upper east region and Upper West region.

Works in phase one

DESCRIPTION

First of all I want to say a big thank you to the good members of this community for having funded and assisted our team in many diverse ways in making the first phase of smart for secondary schools successful we say a big thank you to all in my native language; “mpagya”. Cryptocurrency adoption in Africa is taking root at an admirable pace. However, one of the relevant areas that need a big push is the educational sector to accept and understand the relevance of blockchain technology, cryptocurrency and smartcash. This is very essential since that will boost the adoption and offer Africans the freedom and comfort stations to these currencies and Ghana is one of the African countries where adoption is picking up massively. Though the first phase of this project has been successfully completed, some interesting observation were made during and after the events of the first phase of the project. These observations have better informed me on how best to get Smartto the masses in Ghana through this project.

We observe most teachers were very interested in knowing more about smartcashand the whole project and the opportunities that comes with holding smartcashafter listening to most of our presentations made to the students and ask the team to come back and have a presentation with the teachers as well. Teachers play a major in the development of every country. But unfortunately in Ghana, teachers are among the least paid. But with this opportunities teachers are willing to take advantage of this because of it speculative nature. The second phase of this project intern to organize workshop to educate and trained teachers to find other source of livelihood and impact this new ideas on their students to use smartto start business after high school whilst promoting it.

We also observe that students forms the major part of the public and because of the continuous increase of graduate unemployment in the country, giving students the urge to leverage available opportunities against the web of unemployment hence student will take keen interest in the speculative returns in smarttowards accumulating capital to start business after school. This project aimed at introducing smartcashto student in the secondary in Ghana. The reason is to educate them on the importance of youth savings as means of creating access to and a key link between economic opportunities and outcomes for young people and enabling them to manage emergencies, invest in their education as well as improve their future orientation. Therefore the proposal intends to introduce smartcash to 6 senior high schools in the upper east and upper west regions and a make a target of 6 schools within a period of two(2) with the development of interest and acceptance of smartcash by high schools ,since we need schools to understand the relevance of cryptocurrency, blockchain technology and smartcash.

 

 

WHY SECONDARY SCHOOL STUDENT

The second cycle institutions are the future of the next generation and therefore needs to be educated on the new evolution and if they understand it very well then the cashless system we are aiming for can be achieve. Also students from senior high schools constitute of people with different culture background and form different palace. So if the student are educated, they can serve as ambassadors in their communities to disseminate the information very fast to their people. Again, students are able to make further research about smart on their own that will help them make decisions on their own in the best interest regarding either speculating for future profits, savings on transactions with smart or understanding smart base projects. Student can easily convince their parents and peers from other schools and communities. When student are on vacations, all friends would be backed home and he share what they have learned and think it would benefit their colleagues.

 

WHAT WE INTERNT TO DO

My team and I intend to organize a meet up with secondary schools across the two regions, within a period oftwo months to discuss the relevance and uses of the blockchain technology, cryptocurrency and smartcash. The reason being that, until a number of schools start to understand the relevant and importance of smartas the future of money, which will soon replace the fiat currency in the near future as payment for goods and services, that smartcash can now be fully recognize for the purpose of it creation. Also all participants will be trained on the blockchain technology, smartcash, how to download and setup smart wallet, key features of smartcash that makes it unique from any other cryptocurrency in the world, how to purchase smartcashfrom local and international exchanges, and the advantages of using smart for their daily transactions worldwide for the payment goods and services, payment of fees/bills, receiving remittances and many more. Students will therefore be encouraged to use their savings to purchase smart to accumulate capital and wealth using smartcash as store of capital in the long term to realize their entrepreneurial goals. Again we intern to print smart manual guide for beginners in this ecosystem. Workshop for teachers of the selected schools and educate them on smartcash.One on one meeting with principals, headmasters/headmistress and school staffs as well. Last but not the least, radio talk show will be held in each region to create public awareness within the region. Also as part of the project, we aim to Increase the adoption of smart as a means of exchange (transacting businesses) and investment.

STRUCTURE OF THE PROGRAM

My team and I have visited a number of schools and gave lectures on blockchain, cryptocurrency and smartcash prior to this project. The team will like to achieve the follow;

The aim of this proposal is to set S.M.A.R.T (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Realistic and Timely), strategy to attract new adopters (newbie’s), introduce smart to schools and to reach out to a maximum number of people and increase the adoption of smart. The program would last for two months and 6 secondary schools would be tackled at the end of the program. This project will see a meet ups with school staffs and students, one on one interaction with school proprietors/principals on the need to understand the relevance of blockchain and cryptocurrency as the future of money.

TIMELINE:

The first month will be dedicated to the upper west schools. The schools with higher population

  1. Wa senior high school (wa) 2days workshop
  2. Wa technical institute (Wa) 2days workshop
  3. Saint Xavier senior high school (Wa) 2days workshop

The second month we shall proceed to the upper East region of Ghana

  1. Bolga senior high school (Bolga) 2days workshop
  2. Navrongo senior high school (Navrongo) 2days workshop
  3. Bolga girls high school (Bolga ) 2days workshop

This project is tergetting over 5000 students .

Contingency (10%)                                                                                  $2055

Total                                                                                                        $22605

Proof of works will be shown through pictures and videos coverage of activity throughout the proposal cycle and links shared with the community to evaluate the progress of the project.

result.title: SMART PLAY - SMART STARTUPS INCUBATOR FOR SPORT
result.summary:
This project is being relaunched with some adjustments to meet the requirements made by the voting site of Smartcash.

Smart Play will be a startup incubation program for sports and fitness, working with entrepreneurs, startups and multi-stage companies, from idea to business to billing and will act within the minimal resource concept to accelerate an idea.
result.description:
This project is being relaunched with some adjustments to meet the requirements made by the voting site of Smartcash.

Smart Play will be a startup incubation program for sports and fitness, working with entrepreneurs, startups and multi-stage companies, from idea to business to billing and will act within the minimal resource concept to accelerate an idea.

The headquarters of the incubation program will be in the city of Recife, Pernambuco, Brazil, which has a strong culture for entrepreneurship and technology. In our city there is the Porto Digital which is a technological park with activities in the areas of information technology and communication (ICT) and creative economy (EC). In 2010 the Business Week magazine chose the Porto Digital as one of the ten places in the world where the future is being considered, while the consulting company A.T. Kearney ranked the park as the largest and most profitable in Brazil. Porto Digital also holds three awards for the best technology park in Brazil awarded by the National Association of Entities Promoting Innovative Enterprises (ANPROTEC). In 2017, a book edited by Professor Jerome S. Engel of the University of California at Berkeley presents Porto Digital as one of the world's major technology clusters, highlighting it as a benchmark in public-private governance.

We want to take advantage of this culture to join two possibilities. Criptomoeda and sports. Ideals / startups will be chosen in the process of initiation, considering that, in this case, financial support and structure will be more important in comparison to already established startups. Another advantage of startups in the early stages will be the development already thinking about the Cryptheads, especially in Smartcash.

 

 

What to expect from the program

  • Startups will be incubated for one year.
  • The program will learn specialized mentoring;
  • Customer development, strategic planning, financial guidance, sales plan, sales follow-up and relationship network;
  • Space for work;
  • Networking;
  • speeches;
  • Presentation of key people for national and international sport and fitness;

 

Investment by startup

During the incubation process does not clean up financial resources as startup. Separate or physical support materials, with marketing support and support professionals in specific actions in the projects, but need not be present and the focus of incubation is on the development of the business model, the tool and sales and sales.

 


How many startups do we want to accelerate?

In this first year of this Project, 4 startups will be incubated.

 

 

The responsibilities of the selected Startups

  • Disseminate and stimulate an entrepreneurial culture;
  • Spread as crypto-coins with a focus on Smartcash;
  • Develop as startups to accept crypto-coins;
  • Strengthen the Brazilian sports and fitness market for crypto-coins;
  • Develop and monetize a startup.
  • All products and services were informed that they were funded by Smartcash.

Differential for Smartcash

All Startups are incubated and receive payments in packages, mainly Smartcash. As startups also need to make use of "Blockchain". As startups, I use their own projects to promote a brand. All startups need to have a social idea and define a type of frequent disclosure of Smartcash.

result.title: Union of Anglophone Students in Morocco in partnership with SmartCash – Sharing is Caring
result.summary:
Amount: $9,072.25
Timeline: July 06 - July 13 2018
Total Hours: 8 days
Proposal Goals: 
To start a partnership between SmartCash and the Union of Anglophone Students and Trainees in Morocco (UASTIM or Anglophone) with the goal of introducing awareness and introducing SmartCash to Morocco and by extension Sub-Saharan Africa through a two phase initiative over an 8-day period.
result.description:
To start a partnership between SmartCash and the Union of Anglophone Students and Trainees in Morocco (UASTIM or Anglophone) with the goal of introducing awareness and introducing SmartCash to Morocco and by extension Sub-Saharan Africa through a two phase initiative over an 8-day period.

  1. The first phase of this initiative will be a food and toiletry drive to take place on July 06 - July 08 during the BIG 4 Sports Tournament, which is the first two days of the annually scheduled Anglophone Week during which period the association will be holding at the International Students Dormitory Facility, Cité Universitaire Internationale to assist students with meeting their basic dietary and hygienic needs while also introducing them to SmartCash. The dormitory facility houses over 700 students, each of these people are potential Brand Ambassadors for SmartCash and can help to further propel SmartCash in the world of Cryptocurrency by exposing the young minds here to SmartCash as their first cryptocurrency. This venue is the perfect environment for introducing SmartCash as it provides a large sample of students coming from different countries and educational backgrounds. Which can help spread the use of SmartCash in a variety of domains and open a channel for SmartCash to establish itself not only in Morocco, but also in numerous other African countries where SmartCash is still unheard of.

 

  1. The second phase will take place from July 9-13th, under the theme: "Youth Work: Engaging Young People in Nation Building". Here, we will have the opportunity to encourage adoption of SmartCash by providing students with a real life example of how to use their SmartCash at various stands that we will put in place. [Traditionally, on the Opening Day, each community prepares a sample of their traditional food to share with the dignitaries and students present. This provides us the opportunity of demonstrating how SmartCash works in a real-life setting. Students will be provided with 50 Smart which they will be able to use to purchase food from any of the Anglophone Union member traditional food stands. Students will also be able to exchange their Smart for dirhams, providing an example of an exchange transaction. Allowing students to witness SmartCash in use in a real-life, face to face and casual environment.

Phase two aims to reach a larger number of students as all members of the association will be in attendance as the Cultural Week marks the start of summer holidays and we expect students coming from different towns around Morocco. This ensures a wider dissemination of information pertaining to SmartCash and the possibility of financial independence and opportunities that a cryptocurrency such as this may create for them.

Who are we?

The Union of Anglophone Students and Trainees in Morocco (U.A.S.T.I.M, Anglophone) is a not for profit student union currently comprised of over 20 Anglophone student associations and over 1000 individual students. With our members coming from all over the African continent, and the rest of the world; we hope to provide Smart Cash with a large platform to raise awareness and introduce Smart Cash to the Moroccan market and also the larger Sub-Saharan market, in particular.

The Union was established on April 13 2003 by 6 founding student communities: Gambia, Ghana, Kenya, Liberia, Nigeria and Sierra Leone in view of the need to take a closer look at the challenges Anglophone students and trainees may face in Morocco. Reinforcing solidarity and assisting all Anglophone students and trainees residing in Morocco, we aim to facilitate and ensure a better knowledge of our countries, customs and traditions through social, cultural, intellectual and sporting activities.

 

Phase 1 event - BIG 4 Sports Tournament

 

Itemized Budget:

NB*(Please see the itemized budget Xcel spreadsheet)

 

Branded Goodies (T-shirts, caps, drawstring backpacks for packing donations) = $1,840

Canned Foods and Toiletries for food and toiletry drive = $2,102.50

Aggressive Marketing Campaign (radio, social media, print) = $980.00

SmartCash Stand = $300.00 + 5000 SMART

  • Tent
  • 5 SmartCash voucher for first 500 attendees = 2500 Smart
  • Treasure hunt prizes, hidden wallet prizes, participation rewards to attendees = 2500
  • Printer
  • Informational Leaflets

Entertainment = $360

 

Prizes for Big Four Tournament winners = $475

  • Branded Jerseys
  • Equipment based on discipline = Footballs (), Volleyballs (), Basketballs
  • Medals and Trophies (all teams)

10% contingency = $605.75

 

Phase 2 Events - Anglophone Week

 

Each year, we hold a Sports and Cultural Week to not only unite students through team sports, but also to share our respective traditions and cultures. This week is usually comprised of: sporting activities (football, volleyball and mini-foot), art (sketches, sculptures, paintings, musical, dance and theatrical expositions) and cultural expositions (food, dance, music and theatre). Our theme this year is inspired theme by The Commonwealth Youth Conference of 2016, held in Pretoria, South Africa.

 

Theme:

 'Youth Work: Engaging Young People in Nation Building'

Youth workers play a mediatory role between young people and national development by supporting the channelling of youth empowerment to sustained national and global development efforts. Youth Work plays a valuable role in that it creates conditions for enabling and empowering young citizens, and in turn impacts on a country’s social, economic, political and environmental success.

There is a youth bulge across many African Anglophone countries, this demographic dividend can be unleashed and utilised to make significant strides in development, in which youth workers play a crucial role.

Within this context, the theme also advances the Union's values of gender equity, inclusion, peace, development, human rights and democracy as key tenets that determine meaningful nation-building. The conference will see discussions on the youth worker’s role in moving towards these ideals in our respective countries.

 

Venue :

Cite Universitaire Internationale

 

Speakers :

President of UASTIM, Ms. Nolwazi S Mkhonta

Albern Newton - @Cryptonfused

Terry Lovell - @MoonMan

 

Program:

 

Day One: Opening Ceremony

12:00

Opening Remarks:

Opening Remarks by H.E. Director General Ambassador

Opening Remarks by Mr. Director of Cite Universitaire Internationale Mr Kamal

Opening Remarks by President of UASTIM, Ms. Nolwazi S Mkhonta

30-minute presentation on SmartCash and Blockchain Technology during the opening ceremony

 

Food Exposition: Traditional food from each community

Each community will be invited to display their culture with the use of artefacts, art, clothing, and also provide a sample of a traditional delicacy. For this, we will be providing each community with 500 MAD ($50 equivalent). 

**500 MAD/community

 

This will be the first opportunity for students to take up these following roles:

As Vendors –

They will present their traditional foods and sell them for SMART using the various payment acceptance methods such as, using printed QR public addresses linked to their co-operations’ SmartCash wallets which will be embedded into the display tables surfaces, or by interacting directly with buyers and scanning their wallets during transactions. Vendors will also be brand ambassadors for SmartCash and encourage clients to first buy some SMART in order to purchase using that medium as opposed to the fiat which they hold; this will be an educational experience introduced into an otherwise casual buying experience. Students already run small shops out of their rooms, and these can also start accepting payments using SMART.

 

As Consumers/End Users –

Students, after having received their 5 SMART can then go on to buy from the vendors, some food or whatever else may be on sale during the exposition. They will also have the opportunity to purchase additional SMART which will then be an accepted means of payment at any of the booths on campus. Smart Cards, Paper wallets, online wallets and hopefully functional electrum wallets will be introduced to the students who will be sufficiently educated by the many volunteers and vendors circulating the campus.

 

Exchange rate:

  • 1x1 |    1 SMART = 1 MAD

Services:

  • Smart Card printing service provided at the dedicated SmartCash booth.
  • Demos will also be provided by volunteers who’ll be roaming the campus throughout the duration of the 8 days of activities.

An exchange service will be provided at the SmartCash booth as well at each booth where at least one dedicated SmartCash / Anglophone Union representative will be placed in order to render this service in a speedy and professional manner.

NB* - The proceeds from the sale of any SMART will go toward the future funding of the Union of Anglophone Students in Morocco’s events. Any remaining SMART will be distributed to students as (hopefully the value of this currency is realised by the students) prizes during the proceeding summer activities. It is our expectation that some of our existing and new entrepreneurs continue accepting SMART as a payment method, thus creating continued demand for SMART amongst the campus population during the summer months, a period where students regularly find difficulty sustaining themselves and cash flow is generally halted since scholarship bursaries are not offered during this period.

 

It is primarily in light of the absence of cash flow during the summer months why the 1) distribution of food stuff during the Sharing is Caring campaign and the 2) distribution of SMART among students coupled with the 3) subvention of a few vendors / entrepreneurs is so important and, through the impact that SmartCash has on the students affected will be a lasting one and can only bode well for the SmartCash community as a whole in the long run, as well as feed and empower a lot of young people who are in need.

 

15:00

Sporting Activities: Opening Matches Football and Volleyball

 

18:00

Cultural Fashion Show and performances

Each community will be invited to showcase their traditional dance. In the case of countries where each region/state has its own tribal dance, these too will be showcased to better educate us of the particularities of each tribe.

Miss and Mister Cultural Anglophone

At the end of the night, Mr. and Miss Cultural will be chosen based on the following criteria:

  • Traditional attire
  • Natural Beauty
  • Knowledge of their culture and of Anglophone Union history

Material:

Prizes: 1st, 2nd, 3rd place:  Anglophone/SmartCash mug, key chain, cushion etc.

Decorations:

  • Banner
  • Balloons
  • Student artwork
  • Streamers
  • Blade flags
  • Custom curtains
  • Carpeting

Logistical:

  • badges (contestants, players...)
  • wrist bands (volunteers)
  • t-shirts (Executive committee and volunteers)
  • photographer

 

Day Two: Forum

10:00

Forum and Round Table discussion: 'Youth Work: Engaging Young People in Nation Building.'

Speakers:

Albern Newton - @Cryptonfused

Terry Lovell - @MoonMan

 

Key questions that will be discussed are:

  • Is the impact of youth work being strategically thought of in terms of contributions to national and global development?
  • Why should countries invest in youth work? What evidence exists that shows linkages between youth work successes and national development? Can there be national development without targeted youth development? What have been the contributions of professional youth workers to national and global development?
  • What youth work theory and practice exists to support this linkage?
  • What mechanisms exist in policy that create the space for youth workers to contribute directly to nation-building?

 

Sub-themes:

  1. The concept and practice of youth work.
  2. Youth work models in practice, with a focus on empowerment, social and political education and care 
  3. Role of youth work in youth citizenship, nation-building and peace-building
  4. Youth work in building youth-led organisations and businesses.
  5. Sports and the arts as tools in youth work practice
  6. Sustaining professional youth work through certification/licensing

 

Objectives:

  • Encourage the creation and sharing of knowledge around youth work theory and practice
  • Accelerate the recognition of, and investment in, youth work as a profession
  • Profile the youth worker’s role in mobilizing young people as change agents and contributors to nation building
  • Educating the participants on the benefits of Blockchain technology, it's potential applications.
  • Promoting SmartCash as the cryptocurrency of choice.

 

Materials:

  • water (40 x 0,5l bottles)
  • pens (20 black)
  • notepads (A6 featuring sponsors logo)

 

12:00

SmartCash forum discussion:

  • Encouraging Critical and Innovative thinking (to solve real world problems and create more opportunities for economic empowerment of African youth).
  • Blockchain technology, an introduction to and exploration of potential real world use cases / applications.
  • What is SmartCash (functionality & advantages vs fiat and other electronic transactions).
  • Being part of the SmartCash community.
  • Contributing to SmartCash economic expansion, growth and utility.

 

15:00

Day Three: Talent Show

15:00

  • notebook (x3)

 

Day Four: Logic and General Knowledge Quiz

Day Five: Finals and Miss, Mr. Anglophone

14:00

Miss and Mister Anglophone

Each year, we crown our Miss and Mister Anglophone. They are chosen using the following criteria:

  • Traditional Outfit
  • Casual Wear

Day Six: Closing Ceremony

16:00

Art Exhibition

Closing Ceremony

Word from Sponsors

Performances: Cultural, Dance, Spoken Word, Monologues

Closing remarks by UASTIM President, Ms Nolwazi S Mkhonta

 

The closing ceremony is an important part of the program where students are yet again invited to showcase their cultures and express themselves through art in the form of dance, music, poetry, paintings and monologues, all preformed and/or written by students.

Material

 

  • Water for dignitaries
  • Photographers
  • Sonorisation
  • Decorations
  • Materials for displaying art work during exhibition

 

Pre-event activities:

SmartCash and crypto training sessions will be held one week prior to the events, we intend to gather a core group of enthusiastic volunteers ** target 10 -20 ** who will be educated on blockchain, SmartCash, how to setup wallets, best security practices and performing basic transactions (both POS as well international transfers).

 

During the entirety of the duration of the events:

Throughout the Sharing is Caring / Big 4 Tournament weekend and the Anglophone week subsequent to that, daily SmartCash workshops and information campaigns where pamphlets and T-shirts and other SMART branded material are to be given to participants after every session.

 

The main objective of these training sessions is to:

  • Educate participants on the concept of crypto-currencies in contrast to that of the existing digital monetary system (almost nobody seems to know that the currency they currently use is already digitised).
  • Instruct on how to setup their various wallets and options, raise awareness on the advantages of features such as the Smart Card.
  • Encourage the creation of small businesses with the aim to provide goods and services to students, by students.
  • Push innovation and adoption of new methods of earning an income through diversification.

 

Post Event:

After the events are over, we intend on providing an exchange service to Smart holders and Smart businesses so that they can convert their Smart into Dirhams when they need to spend outside of the crypto space that we would have created. Vendors and holders who venture out into the wider market will act as ambassadors who will encourage their clients to buy Smart which can then be used when interacting with their businesses and also generate interest from others who may seek to also accept Smart as a payment method.

A publication will be put together by the journalism and media students as well as a short documentary showing what went on during the events, we have looked at the flipbook made by Blockchain Relations and have decided to emulate this.

 

FAQs

About Us:

The Union of Anglophone Students and Trainees in Morocco (U.A.S.T.I.M, Anglophone) is a non for profit student union comprised of over 20 Anglophone student associations. The Union was established on April 12 2003 by 6 founding student communities: Gambia, Ghana, Kenya, Liberia, Nigeria and Sierra Leone in view of the need to take a closer look at the challenges Anglophone students and trainees may face in Morocco.

 

Member Communities:

Antigua and Barbuda

Bangladesh

Dominica

Eritrea

Ethiopia

The Gambia

Ghana

Grenada

Kenya

Kiribati

Malawi

Nigeria

Papua New Guinea

Saint Lucia

Sierra Leone

South Soudan

Sudan

Swaziland

Tanzania

Tuvalu

Vanuatu

Zambia

 

 

Links

https://www.facebook.com/uas.tim.1?viewas=100000686899395&privacy_source=timeline_gear_menu#_

http://uastim.wixsite.com/anglophonesinmorocco

 

Conclusion:

 

Our main goal is to help students to meet their basic needs before the summer financial drought hits, that is why the bulk of the money is going towards the food drive. Many of us are here without financial support from home and depend solely on the 1500 MAD bi-monthly stipend that is provided by the Moroccan government, this does not extend into the summer months and we need the students to open their eyes and start to think; think of better ways to sustain themselves as well as create wealth for themselves and their families.

 

Starting their own little businesses is one solution, they need to see that circulating the currency among themselves is an effective way to meet some of their needs, this behaviour will be encouraged by us the core team and volunteers until some of these small businesses spill out into the larger market  that exists outside of the campus (we intend on hitting other campuses one by one after), they will be encouraged to let buyers know that they accept crypto as a payment option thus helping to remedy yet another major problem that exists here in the form of ignorance. The vast majority of the people here have never heard of or are not adequately educated about cryptocurrencies and the possibilities that such a fluid and near barrier free system exists, since currently the average Joe here cannot send money out of this country and has to face steep fees when receiving.

 

We need to get these young people to think and innovate so that they can then go out and make a difference. So far a few business ideas have been proposed by the students with whom I've spoken to, like small loans, catering, apparel, pooled mining and cloud mining services, speculative intermediation and investment services, even a local exchange.

This is just the first of our initiatives and our long term vision is to instigate a culture of solution seekers whose eyes are not set on running to foreign lands to find greener pastures, but instead to seek to create their own, as well as find better solutions for real world issues like money transfer and income through non-traditional means such as online services and content/wealth creation.

result.title: SmartCash Series Educational videos in  Spanish

result.description:
Amount: 1850 USD/Month in SMART EQUIVALENT
Timeline: 2 months Total 3700 USD in SMART EQUIVALENT

I have noticed that most of the SmartCash information is in English and there is only a few information in SPANISH. Some times the Spanish telegram chat gets overwhelmed by a lot of questions about technical details about SmartCash, REWARDS and more. So I decided to support my community by making videos and trying to answer all the questions that they have in our native language: SPANISH.

SmartCash is getting more popular in Latin-America due to the efforts of @thewalker @coachdigi @eiky@michsounza @oucan @ddiaz @cryptoskater @dimitarv @marilunabella4 and more people involved in this ecosystem, but the Spanish content about Smartcash is more scarce than English content. As an innovating cryptocurrency SmartCash is often adding new features and functionalities to its system and these characteristics must be translated and informed to SPANISH community “in a nutshell” audio-visual content.

Who Am I? What do I bring to the table & whats my goal here? What are your credentials? Why are you qualified for SmartHive funding?

My name is Daniel Brito (@cryptoflashing) I am from México but currently I live in Phoenix, AZ. I am a crypto enthusiast and a SmartCash Holder. I have been following the activities in SmartCash since January but I have been actively participating in the ecosystem since May on Telegram, Discord, Steemit, YouTube and SmartCash Forums.

I bring EDUCATION in short, informative and simple videos, my goal is to educate people about Blockchain and SmartCash in Spanish. I have been studying Blockchain for more than one year giving it more than 6 hours a day to understand the technology behind the cryptocurrencies, and I have been following SMARTCASH for many months and I really like it.

The goal of EDUCATIONAL SMART CONTEST IN SPANISH is to incentive people to get involved with SmartCash community, this will include: writing articles, making videos of Blockchain and SmartCash, art designing(images, photos, banners about blockchain and SmartCash) and share it to their social media: Facebook, Twitter, YouTube or Steemit, this way the participants will be learning at the same time sharing their experience on social media platform and involving their family and friends.

The reward of the contest will be 50 USD in Smart and there will be one contest each week of the month during the duration of this proposal. This way, the participant have the chance to earn money at the time he/she is learning and sharing that trough social media.

 

Next Topics:

TUTORIALS:
-How to vote with SmartCash Desktop Wallet.

-How to send SmartCash by SMS
-How to use SmartBot for tipping other members on Steemit.

SMART INFORMATIVE SPOT:

-SmartCash Roadmap 2018 and visit to SmartCash web site.
-SmartCash Band what is it? How can I get it? How to use it?
-SmartCash Card what is it? How can I get it? How to use it?
-Instant Pay what is it? How to use it?

SMART NEWS:

3 June 2018 Most important NEWS from SmartCash community: Telegram, Discord, Reddit, Forums, Twitter, YouTube and so on.

10 June 2018 Most important NEWS from SmartCash community: Telegram, Discord, Reddit, Forums, Twitter, YouTube and so on.

17 June 2018 Most important NEWS from SmartCash community: Telegram, Discord, Reddit, Forums, Twitter, YouTube and so on.

24 June 2018 Most important NEWS from SmartCash community: Telegram, Discord, Reddit, Forums, Twitter, YouTube and so on.

SMART CLASS:

-What´s the difference between cryptocurrency and Token?
-Bitcoin Confidential basics.
-Block Reward Split in Crypto: SmartCash, Dash, PIVX, deCRED.
-Descentralized Autonomous Organizations.
-Introducción to SmartCash mining: Pools available, GPU needed, approximate ROI.
-Differences between Proof-of-work and Proof-of-Stake

EDUCATIONAL CONTEST Topics:
1.- Create an illustrative image where you explain “in a nutshell” how the SmartCash blockchain work. The illustration can be drawn by hand or in Adobe ilustrador, quality is required to participate.

2.-Write a post where you can explain how Miners, SmartNodes and SmartRewards work for SmartCash ecosystem. Orthography and diction matters! please take your time to write an amazing post.

3.- Explain the difference between cryptocurrency and token.Orthography and diction matters! please take your time to write an amazing post.

4.-Create an illustrative image where you explain how SmartCash ecosystem work. The illustration can be drawn by hand or in Adobe ilustrador, quality is required to participate.

5.-Can you explain the SmartCash RoadMap for 2018 in a post, image or video?

6.-Can you explain in a post, image or video the difference between PoW and PoS? Which one SmartCash uses?

7.-Can you explain in a post, image or video what is a cryptocurrency?

8.-Can you explain in a post, image or video what is a Autonomous Self-funded organization?

Deliverables / Job description of the proposal. Ideally it will be itemized. What are you doing? be specific. How much does it cost? Why?

I Daniel Brito (@cryptoflashing) commit to deliver 2 videos and design 1 educational contest each week.

1st video will be published during the week and can be about one of the main topics:
-Tutorials
-Smart Class

2nd video will be released on weekend (Sunday) in that video I will talk about SmartCash NEWS or SmartCash Informative spot…

Educational Contest: There will be an educational contest every week it will incentivize people to participate, learn and earn money.

¿Why support this proposal?

With SmartCash getting more attention from Spanish-Speakers people I want that English isn’t a barrier for these people to understand the main goal of SmartCash: to be a useful criptocurrency for users and merchants.

I want to create fresh content to my community and engage more people to join. As a SmartCash holder and member of the Spanish community it has been a pleasure for me to help these people to understand SmartCash its potential and its strong community spirit, I want to continue my work and give it more of my time.

result.title: Growth SmartCash community with massive media promotion and helping stray dogs and cats in México.
result.summary: I will organize a Free Dog and Cat Sterilization Campaign Sponsored by SmartCash in order to generate a benefit to the society and at the same time creating a SmartCash Community in a population sector that is getting bigger: Pet owners, which I like to call SmartPets community.
result.description:
Description

 

Hi Smarts, mi name is Oscar Alanis, I am a Veterinarian graduated from the Universidad Nacional Autonoma de Mexico. Currently I’m working on my own veterinary clinic named Pet’s Kingdom https://www.facebook.com/Petskingdomvet/ located in one of the most prestigious places in the city, offering a variety of services such as general medicine, alternative medicine, spa/grooming, recreational activities, lodging, etc. I’m really interested in generate positive changes in the society both for SmartCash and population in general.

Let’s put ourselves in context

 

It is estimated that in Mexico there are about 28 millions of pets (dogs and cats) of which 70% live on the street. Only in Mexico City there are nearly 1.2 millions of stray dogs, and that number increases 20% year over year, partly because they continue reproducing without any control.

 

What I want to do is a Free Sterilization Campaign Sponsored by SmartCash so that people with low economic resources can sterilize their pets or take the stray dogs or cats that live in their neighborhood, contemplating performing 50 surgeries. In this way I will have a positive impact on the society and at the same time  I will make a great diffusion about SmartCash.

 

The average cost for one sterilization is $150 dlls, SmartCash will fund only 38% of the surgery cost and Pet’s Kingdom will fund the rest. We will use the funds for surgery material, drugs, doctors fee, promotional material and staff.

 

In order to achieve a greater diffusion for SmartCash, I will collaborate with some really important nonprofit organizations interested in animal welfare and pet adoptions. Some of this organizations are ‘Cambia un destino’ and ‘Koncientizando’, they are used to do massive adoption and sterilization campaigns on social networks. I am also going to publish an article on a mexican magazine for pet owners, about what is SmartCash and how it is going to help the society with this campaign.

 

In addition, I’m going to put SmartCash advertising stickers in my clinic and also in our social networks so that clients and people in general find out that we accept SmartCash as payment method. In this way I will start generating the SmartPet community in this important sector of the mexican population.

On the campaign day, a specialized staff will give a capacitation to the assistants supported by a video and flyers and will teach them what is SmartCash, how it works, what are the differences with other criptocurrencies. The video is going to be a tutorial on how to open their SmartWallets and the way to do transactions with a 5 dlls (in SmartCash) giveaway, so they can buy something for their pets in that moment. With this, they will have the experience of doing a real transaction with this cryptocurrency.

 

Goals

 

  • Achieve a massive diffusion of the SmartCash altruistic labor with a publication in a mexican magazine.
  • Massive diffusion campaign on facebook with collaboration of nonprofit organizations.
  • Generate new wallets of the participants and Pet’s Kingdom clients with the SmartCash giveaway and video tutorial.
  • Sterilize at least 50 dogs and cats in two days.



Plan.

 

  1. Promote the Sterilization Campaign on facebook (3 weeks period for scheduling an appointment for surgery) with collaboration of nonprofit organizations.
  2. Publication of the article in the mexican vet magazine.
  3. Design and elaboration of SmartCash flyers, stickers, canvas and video.
  4. Purchase of medical materials and drugs.
  5. Make a call for medical assistants who will participate in the campaign.
  6. Placement of the SmartCash advertising stickers and canvas in the veterinary clinic.
  7. Performance of the sterilization campaign.

 

With everything ready, the campaign will be carried out in two days. The itinerary of each day will be the following:

 

  1. 08:00 preparing the operating rooms and accommodating the materials.
  2. 09:00 begins the reception of the pets owners.
  3. They will be asked for their personal data and will be given authorization sheets to sign.
  4. The patient will be admitted to the surgical preparation room and then will be taken to corresponding operation room.
  5. While the owners are in the waiting room, the staff will give them the information about SmartCash supported by the video for opening their SmartWallet and making their first purchase. 5 dlls will be given to each owner once their SmartWallet is opened.
  6. When the surgery is finished, the patient will be sent to the recovery area.
  7. Once the patient is ready to go, it will be delivered to its owner along with the medical prescription.
  8. This process will be repeated several times along the day.

The main goal of this campaign is to grow the SmartCash community and to contribute to the mexican society.

 

Q&A

 

q: Why am I doing this?

I want to contribute to solve the problem of stray pets in México City and at the same time to positively impact SmartCash creating the SmartPets community

 

q: Will I became rich with this?

No, I won’t at all, my fee it’s only $85 dlls per day, two days total. The surgeries will have no cost for the pet owners, so there will be no profit for Pet’s Kingdom.

the campaing will last two days of full work, from about twelve hours each day of active participation of the whole team

INTRODUCTION

We will show them the futuristic plans, this is financial freedom to communities and Africa at large, in 2009 if you had the opportunity to invest in bitcoin you would frown at it, here comes smart cash another opportunity to secure your future today.

Logistics and necessary tools and equipment needed to achieve this project is highlighted below

A total sum of $5650 is what we need for a successful completion of these projects in each state, monthly.
We bring you a budget proposal for 5 major cities and an estimated cost of $28,250 total cost for the completion of these projects.

result.title: Crypto-influencers marketing campaign on YouTube episode 1 and episode 2

result.description:
Total Amount: 1200 USD in SMART EQUIVALENT
Timeline: 3 weeks

COLLABORATING WITH JOSE RAFAEL RIVAS YOUTUBE CHANNEL | EPISODE 1

Proposal goal is to engage people interested in cryptocurrencies to learn about SmartCash and join to our friendly community by making an introduction video in the Jose Manuel Rivas YouTube Channel (14K + subscribers).

Looking for incentivizing more people to learn about SmartCash I am targeting people that consume crypto content on YouTube, I have been following Jose Rafael Rivas YouTube Channel(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDcyHmzyFnG4S9RypMX7_1g/videos1). He has more than 14 K people interested in cryptocurrencies, he has an average of 3K-4K views on his videos.

I have contacted him in order to have an interview and he has accepted. He is asking for 200 USD.

For 200 USD he is willing to:

  1. Make an interview with me (video conference), in which I will be explaining (in a nutshell):

a)What is SmartCash?
b)What is the main goal of SmartCash
c)What are SmartNodes
d)What are SmartRewards

e)How to get involved with community (local meetups, creating content in English-Spanish, making proposals to the community, inviting people to join to Telegram, Discord and so on).

f) What is SmartCard?
g)Bitcoin confidential Airdrop

  1. Mention the SmartCash interview in his next two videos getting 6K + views (aprox.)

   3.He will write a post in Spanish in http://millonariosbtc.blogspot.com an on-line crypto-magazine in Spanish about the SmartCash interview, reaching even more people.

 

Who Am I? What do I bring to the table & whats my goal here? What are your credentials? Why are you qualified for SmartHive funding?

I am Daniel Brito(@cryptoflashing ), I am a Smart HOLDER and an active member in the community. I have designed the SmartCash Series an educational video series (In Spanish) and with this proposal I want to get more attention to these educational videos and also to engage more people to join to the Hive (Telegram, Discord and Forums).

¿Why support this proposal?

Nowadays Jose Rafael Rivas YouTube Channel have a lot of attention by Spanish-speaker audience from Venezuela, United States, Mexico and Spain, with this interview we can introduce SmartCash to these people and grow our Latin-American community.

I truly believe that SmartCash can be a world-wide accepted cryptocurrency and with more people collaborating together all over the world we can make this happen.

 

COLLABORATING WITH “PAPA BITCOIN Y CRIPTOS” YOUTUBE CHANNEL | EPISODE 2

Looking for incentivizing more people to learn about SmartCash I am targeting people that consume crypto content in YouTube, I have been following PAPA BITCOIN y CRIPTOS YouTube Channel (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3IiGGIgyHtaF_naQ0cOhxA/videos1) he has more than 26 K people interested in cryptocurrencies. He has an average of 7K-9K views on his videos.

I have contacted him in order to have an interview and he has accepted. He is asking for 600 USD, he likes the SmartCash project and he is willing to accept the payment in SmartCash!!!

For 600 USD he is willing to:

   1. Make an interview with me( video conference), in which I will be explaining (in a nutshell):

a)What is SmartCash?
b)What is the main goal of SmartCash
c)What are SmartNodes
d)What are SmartRewards
e)How to get involved with community (local meetups, creating content in English-Spanish, making proposals to the community, inviting people to join to telegram and discord and so on).

   2. Make a second video about Smartpay App/SmartCard.

 

Who Am I? What do I bring to the table & whats my goal here? What are your credentials? Why are you qualified for SmartHive funding?

I am Daniel Brito, I am a SmartCash HOLDER and an active member in the community. I have designed the SmartCash Series an educational video series (In Spanish), and with this proposal I want to get more attention to these educational videos and also to engage more people to join to the Hive (Telegram, Discord and Forums).

¿Why support this proposal?

Nowadays PAPA BITCOIN Y CRIPTOS YouTube Channel has a lot of attention by Spanish-speaker audience from Latin-america and Spain, with this interview we can introduce SmartCash to these people and grow our Latin-American community. With CRYPTO-INFLUENCERS MARKETING CAMPAIGN ON YOUTUBE | EPISODE 1 -EPISODE 2, I want to incentive people to join to our community and to watch the educational content that already exist in Spanish:
