result.title: Reality Check w/Ben Swann Powered by SmartCash
result.summary:
We propose that just as SmartCash is helping to create disruption in the financial world, it also helps to create major disruption in the media world by becoming a non-exclusive sponsor of “Reality Check w/ Ben Swann.”  In order to fit into the SmartCash budget, we are proposing ½ sponsorship of Reality Check.  This means, SmartCash will be a sponsor for ½ of the episodes and ½ of the sponsor spotlight episodes and will be branded and tied to what is one of the most successful news segments in the world. Our hope is to  establish and sustain a long-term partnership, and we would be honored to be an ambassador of SmartCash.

Reality Check with Ben Swann is a news and information segment that paved the way in covering stories mainstream media misrepresented or simply deceived the public about in the United States and around the world. In 2016, Reality Check with Ben Swann had 110 Million video views on Facebook and outperformed media giants such as VICE News.   

From February to May of 2018 Reality Check with Ben Swann was sponsored by DASH Digital Cash and during that time Reality Check segments garnered over 20 Million views.  In addition, our brand partnership with DASH has introduced DASH as a brand to millions of new and potential crypto users.
result.description:
Deliverables and Funding Breakdown

½ Reality Check Sponsorship.

   ? SmartCash will be the a sponsor of Reality Check for the duration of this sponsorship.?

   ? Estimated 2.5M video views, 20M social impressions. The estimated video views and impressions do not include views and impressions gained through advertising. Videos will be uploaded to Facebook, YouTube, DTube, LBRY, Amazon Prime,  Roku, embedded on Steemit and News Websites. Episode teasers will be posted to Instagram and Twitter. These will be in video or image format.?

Sponsorship includes:?

   ? SmartCash name and logo as part of the animated open for each episode including a verbal announcer who says “Reality Check w/ Ben Swann Powered by SmartCash.

      Lower third bug. “Ben Swann’s Reality Check Powered By SmartCash” and will be seen on all platforms listed above and more as we expand our network.

      Dedicated Smartcash Bug on the opposite side of the screen which states “powered by SmartCash throughout the episode.?

   ? Link in the description of the Youtube, DTube, and LBRY if available?

   ? This will be a non-exclusive sponsorship and will cover one Reality Check per week; Every Tuesday unless the date lands on a US holiday. Then Reality Check’s marketing department will decide what day to release that Reality Check on.?

   ? Videos will cover topical US and World issues and will be 2 to 5 minutes long.?

   ? A total of 47 episodes will be sponsored.?  At our current average of 600,000 views per video, we project over 14 million SmartCash branded views of Reality Check


Ben Swann at 3 Crypto/Blockchain events. Ben Swann and team go to one, US based, blockchain conference a month (3 total) to promote SmartCash. Live stream on Facebook and Instagram with SmartCash logo on the screen. Social promotion before and after the event. The events have not been picked yet, and we would love the SmartCash community’s feedback on where in the US you would like us to go.  


Ben is already scheduled to speak this July at FreedomFest in Las Vegas.  Freedomfest is the “world’s largest gathering of free minds and is independent, non-partisan and not associated with any think tank”.   This event includes speakers such as Judge Andrew Napolitano, John Stossel, Peter Schiff and many others.

 

Mention SmartCash. Ben and team, while being interviewed by other press, will mention SmartCash as an example of the decentralized financial system needed to create and promote independent media.

Sponsor Spotlight.  

Each Sunday Ben and his team will release a “Sponsor Spotlight on SmartCash.”  These segments are a powerful way to create adoption of SmartCash. While the branding associated with the Reality Check segments will allow for brand recognition for SmartCash with our audience, these Sponsor Spotlight segments will give an in-depth view of SmartCash to our audience and explain why SmartCash is a vibrant and useful crypto ecosystem.  The Sponsor Spotlights have received hundreds of thousands of views. This proposal includes 12 Sponsor Spotlight episodes. We project over 1,500,000 SmartCash sponsor spotlight views.

In total, we project over 30,000,000 video views of SmartCash branded content over a 6 month period.  


To see samples of the branding look from our sponsorship with DASH Digital Cash you can follow this link https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WjcEWMwPegt2NZkvsPYxW4dZ1i8OK1BtuQeZlgS6BeQ/edit

result.title: Continue SmartCash course
result.summary: This is a follow-on from an earlier approved proposal. We would like to continue the momentum with user growth we have gained in our "Introduction to cryptocurrencies sponsored by SmartCash" course on Thutor.
result.description:
This is a resubmission of an earlier proposal that was not started but was passed. Here is a link below:

https://vote.smartcash.cc/Proposal/Details/Continue-the-growth-of-the-Intro-to-cryptocurrencies-sponsored-by-SmartCash-course

We did not initiate the course at this stage due to the ban on crypto currency ads by Facebook. Since Facebook has, as of last week, amended their ban to allow cryptocurrency ads, we wish to continue with our proposal

This second proposal is building off what we offered in the first proposal, link below:

https://vote.smartcash.cc/Proposal/Details/Introduction-to-cryptocurrencies-with-SmartCash-rewards

This is what we proposed in the first proposal:

Deliver a cryptocurrency course introducing students from a finance background to the world of cryptocurrencies.

The course is free for anyone interested to join but is targeted at newbies to cryptos.

We wanted to have weekly quizzes that covered basic cryptocurrency topics. The quizes would integrated SmartCash questions into each week.

We wanted 100 students to register for the course over a period of a month.

The 7 top students each week would win SmartCash of ~$50 each.

This is what we delivered:

We delivered a course that covered the following topics:

  • Topic 1 - The history of cryptocurrencies
  • Topic 2 - How cryptocurrencies work
  • Topic 3 - Why cryptocurrencies are important
  • Topic 4 - How to value cryptocurrencies

We integrated SmartCash into the topics each week.

These are the SmartCash resources we integrated:

  • Topic 1: Introductory SmartCash video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=3&v=mxc1gZVEoLU1)
  • Topic 2: SmartCash: A Unique Self-Funding Governance Model (https://medium.com/@joshuarousseau/smartcash-a-unique-self-funding-and-governance-system-built-on-a-privacy-focused-community-c24e0032a9621)
  • Topic 3: SmartCash: Decentralized Cryptocurrency Governance (https://bitcoincryptocurrency.com/smartcash-smart/)
  • Topic 4: SmartCash Research Report (https://coincheckup.com/coins/smartcash/analysis)

We wanted to have 100 students registered over the course of the month. We have 106 registrations so we surpassed this goal.

We had 24 unique students won the SmartCash prizes. We intentionally made the prizes randomized for students who got over 75% for the weekly quiz. We did this since we wanted to give as many new students an opportunity to win as possible but they still had to get over 75% for the quiz.

The list of all the winners can be seen on our Facebook page here:

https://www.facebook.com/mythutor
 
For detailed statistics on the course, please see this shared Google docs folder:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/125mQBabTeGHMNolPj3NJOCo4hpduIs7B?usp=sharing
 
In here you will find:
1. Proof of prizes paid to winners
2. Proof of test results showing the winners who got over 75%
3. Content that we delivered in the course (including questions and pre-reading)
4. Course results showing number of questions answered per specific topic
5. Proof of registrations (showing we had 106 registrations)
6. Customer feedback. Feedback on the course was very positive and many users were interested in obtaining more SmartCash
 
What we propose going forward:

This aim of this second proposal is to maintain the growth momentum of users and to offer new services to users.

Our specific outcomes are to:

  • We would like to grow our registrations to over 500 registrations over a 3 month period.
  • We would like to test a referral system in our marketing (that for a student who refers another student, they received a SmartCash referral bonus of $4 - out of our marketing budget)
  • Due to the interest in acquiring SmartCash, we want to integrate an ability for users to buy SmartCash directly from our platform. For this, we will need a float which we have included in our budget below. 

Budget:
We propose the following monthly budget:
Weekly prizes (7 students x $50 x 4 weeks) = $1400
Monthly marketing = $125 x 4 weeks = $500
Course management and content creation = $500
Total monthly cost = $2400

Number of months = 3 months

Total cost = $7200

This is the same budget as the original proposal, just extended for 3 months.

It is important to note that the majority of this budget actually goes to users and new SmartCash adopters.

Reporting:

We will deliver the same reporting as in what we have detailed in this proposal and also feedback the amount of SmartCash purchased from our float.

Benefits to SmartCash:

  • The top students each week become invested in the coins they win. These winners have shown that they are interested in growing their holdings.
  • Because winners are educated about SmartCash and cryptocurrencies generally, they become advocates for the coin.
  • SmartCash continued sponsorship of the course means that people will learn about SmartCash as their first coin when starting out.
  • We will offer a new gateway for users to acquire SmartCash directly

Thank you for the community support we have received to date. We have really enjoyed delivering the course and continue to be passionate in educating people about cryptocurrencies.

result.title: Urban Adoption: Cape Town
result.summary: Cape Town is a strategic city for SmartCash. It has 1.5 million tourists every year and has vibrant crypto communities. It is not a question of whether or not Cape Town will embrace crypto, but a question of which one.
result.description:
Quick Intro

My name is MJ, I studied Actuarial Science where one of the cornerstone subjects is Financial Economics. I'm focused on the application side of blockchain and how to integrate it into society.

Smart Plan

The idea is to launch a series of interconnected SmartCash projects around Cape Town so that the city adopts the coin. This means getting merchant adoption, hosting events, setting up exchanges and prospecting for investors. Together these projects support one another and increase their effectiveness.

Merchant Adoption

Cape Town merchants have embraced mobile payment solutions and some having even started to accept bitcoin. Cryptocurrencies aren't a new concept to them and with the correct approach, we will be able to win them over to SmartCash.  This means handing out booklets, having one on one discussions and giving them continuous support.

Hosting Events

Cape Townians understand the blockchain and many already have bitcoin. This means events can focus on explaining the unique benefits of SmartCash instead of trying to cover the basics of the technology. Cryptocurrency events have a large attendance and people here enjoy the networking benefits they offer.

Exchanges

It is tricky for South Africans to buy SmartCash. Not many of us have heard of the online exchanges that trade SmartCash and few will be prepared to trust them with serious amounts of money. For Urban Adoption to occur, there needs to be a local Bitcoin to SmartCash exchange as well as a local Fiat to SmartCash exchange. People need to buy the coin with ease and merchants must be able to sell the coin with ease.

Getting Investors 

I'm soon to become a Fellow Actuary of the Actuarial Society. This has taken me 8 years to accomplish and I've passed all the exams. In South Africa, actuaries are required by regulation to oversee the investments of large institutions. Our opinions matter. Once merchants have adopted SmartCash and an Exchange is up, I will do a write up of SmartCash for one of the financial magazines. In the article, I will outline the reasons for investing in SmartCash. I will also write about the risks. After this article, I will use my position to approach investment firms and make them aware of SmartCash. I will also speak at various investment seminars.

Budget

This is a big proposal and I understand that the amount required is higher than others. This isn't my first proposal and I know that SmartCash only reimburses me after I've supplied valid invoices. This reduces the risk that I take all the money and run. So you can rest assure that I'll only get paid after the work is done. Also, I'm budgeting for amounts Up To. This doesn't mean I'll receive all of it. The Fiscal officer of SmartCash does a great job in ensuring that proposals are not overpaid. The reason for an Up To budget is that I know from experience that there are often hidden costs that creep up on these types of projects.

  • Merchant Adoption
    • Up to $5000 payment to team members after signing up 100 Merchants in Cape Town
    • Up to $1000 for t-shirts, booklets and other adoption promoting material.
  • Hosting Events
    • Up to $1000 for banners, snacks, rent, helpers
    • Up to $1000 for advertising the event
  • Exchange
    • Up to $3000 to set up an online exchange
    • Up to $2000 to set up an offline exchange
  • Investors
    • Up to $500 to write articles for financial magazines
    • Up to $500 to approach investment firms
  • Admin Costs
    • Up to $1900

This brings the total to $15000. 

Already Started

I'm already in the process of getting my family's Airbnb business on board, this will allow tourists to pay for accommodation with SmartCash. I'm attending an Actuarial Investment Seminar at the end of August where the topic is Cryptocurrencies. I've volunteered to be a speaker and will use the networking time to tell other investment professionals about SmartCash. I have a lot invested in SmartCash and I'm excited to be part of its success story.

Third Parties

I will be working with others to make this proposal a success. People will only be paid after a merchant is adopted. The online exchanges will be either an established one like Luno, or a new one like ZuluX. The exchanges need liquidity in order to make the markets and that has been priced in. The offline exchange will be a physical space in Cape Town where people can trade fiat for SmartCash.

Conclusion

This is a big proposal and I do welcome your comments. I'm hoping that this proposal is a success and that it can be used as an example for other cities. Urban Adoption of cryptocurrency is happening, we need to act now and beat the other coins by setting up simultaneous projects that support each other. Vote Yes.

result.title: Social English course with the release of Smart Cash
result.summary:
Dear Smarties , we know that english is a universal language and we have a dream to do many
people in social vulnerability speak this languages.
result.description:
Description
Level Up (CNPJ: 21.049.955/0001-03) is a course made for everyone like children, youngs and
adults with low income that really want to learn . The course offers certificate.When the
students finish the course and we offer all the support that a student needs to have a succesful
carreer (taking into account the importance of English for better job opportunities, studies and
social inclusion).
This Project was created by teacher Renan Cordeiro Matias Silva, the course works at Renan’s
house and we would like an aid from the smarts for getting some things to the course like
desks, books, white boards, uniforms and other stuffs.
For a better detail, this project is being developed with the interest in the development of
people with low income in the following aspects:

(i) education and;

(II) social development:

• Educational: Level Up will offer immersion classes once a month; (focusing on children
and adolescents) presenting them to the culture of other countries, films to develop
listening classes; dynamic dialogues to develop student sociability and themes
throughout the year.

• Social development: theater presentation of Level Up students in cultural centers and
schools each semester.
What the project intends to do:

• To attend approximately 140 people, including children, adolescents and adults.

• Provide a monthly study (in each unit) on encryption and inclusion in the financial
system for low-income adults without access to the banking system.

• Qualify students for better opportunities in the market, improve communication and
empower them for foreign socialization.
What the project has as main differentials:

• Responsible for the project has a University graduatein English by Estácio de Sá;
• The course is held in Belford Roxo, in Rio de Janeiro. The city where people have
difficulty accessing education and a low per capita income and a social initiative for
bilingual development is needed.

• Level up has three locations: home of Professor Renan, First Baptist Church of Areia
Branca (https://www.facebook.com/Igreja-Batista-de-Areia-Branca-188940697841065/)
and Centro Cultural de Belford Roxo Donana (http://www.donana.org.br/).
Benefits to Smartcash
• Use of the mark in the course

• Considered an official sponsor of Level Up
• Conducting studies on crypto-coins (specifically Smartcash);

• Publicizing the brand in the official presentations and social networks of the course,
including a YouTube channel;

• Use of the mark in several graphic materials produced in the project.
The course needs:
140 teaching materials = US $ 375.20
140 uniforms = U$ 154,00
20 student seats= US $ 700,00
3 white boards= US $ 135,00
Materials for site renovation = Us $ 1.300,00
Bricklayer: U$ 300,00
2 computers =US $ 1.100
1 printer: US $ 268,00
Cost help for volunteer teachers: US $ 210,00 ( 3 teacher, U$ 70,00 each one)
Graphic designer (course completed by the MicroRio) responsible for promoting the course and

result.title: SmartCash 360 Video Editor & Creation Tool
result.summary:
We are currently developing a web browser based (WebVR) 360 Video Editor with Smartcash InstantPay to solve the problem of easily creating VR enabled 360 videos with no technical skills required. 360 Videos are the new video media type used on platforms like Youtube 360, Facebook 360, etc. 

As you all know, VR 360 videos and blockchain technologies are all classified as emerging high growth industries and so what better than to combine them together.
result.description:
Screen shot of our 360 Video Editor in development

 

Amount: 282,240 SmartCash

 

Timeline: 3 months – Targeting late September / Early October 2018

 

Total Hours expected for project to complete: 480 hours+

 

**The Problem:**

  • Creating 360 video content is very difficult and expensive.

Think creating websites back in 1997 or trying to create a blockchain back in 2010 when it was all still quite new.

 

There are currently no practical and technically easy ways to create 360 videos for the average user. Other than by using expensive and complicated video editing programs and or 3d engines like Unity and Unreal game engines. These all require a huge learning curve and high skill level to use.

 

**The Solution:**

We will provide users a FREE browser based (WebVR) editor to enable users create 360 video content easily with no technical skills required. Users will be able to showcase and monetize their 360 video templates using SmartCash InstantPay.

 

Who We Are: We are a group of five talented Engineers that have successfully built 3d applications and game engines, marketplace websites and WebVR 360 videos. We have two fullstack developers on our team, a front end developer proficient in Javascript and React as well as an MBA and a 3d /game engine developer.

As you can see from the Editor screen shot above, we have already developed a significant portion of the WebVR editor. We initially tried to raise funds the traditional way but we were laugh at because we chose to switch to crypto (Smartcash) as our payment mechanism rather than using fiat.

We explained that we wanted to be able to do micropayments using Smartcash for the trading of 360 video templates and assets within the WebVR editor just like how it works within most game engines. Thus, it wouldn’t be viable for our users to pay using fiat payment options from platforms like PayPal that charge significant fees.  

Smartcash Instant Pay is a better, faster and cheaper option and we love the direction and community here at Smartcash.

 

Deliverables/Job description:

**The Ask:**

We will appreciate your help in voting for us to raise the requisite funds to complete just a few remaining milestones:

  1. Complete development of WebVR editor and integrate SmartCash’s InstantPay to be used as the payment mechanism so that users using our WebVR Editor can easily sell their 360 video templates and assets using Smartcash. This will also help with micro transaction payments. As well as allow users in several countries were traditional credit card payment options are a major impediment.

 

  1. Add functionality to enable the WebVR Editor to be used as a browser extension. Users will be able to use the WebVR Editor within major existing video platforms like YouTube (by simply clicking a button that has been added by the extension on the YouTube UI). This will allow a broader mass market use of the WebVR Editor with SmartCash InstantPay as the universal crypto currency payment feature.

 

i) Backend Developer – NODE JS/API Developer/WebVR: (120+ Hours):

70,560 SMART

ii) Design/Front End Developer – Javascript/ ReactJS/CSS/Images/360 Videos: (160+ Hours):

94,080 SMART

iii) Integration: API integrations, 3D Assets Integration, Video/Animation Timeline Development, Scripts Integration, etc. (120+ Hours):

70,560 SMART

iv) Testing & Deployment: Test WebVR Editor, Launch/Bug Fix & Support (70+ hours):

41,090 SMART

 

Possible FAQs:

Why WebVR and 360 Videos?

We believe that in the future most websites will be developed in WebVR as 360 videos and virtual reality becomes more main stream. We also believe that Crypto currencies will be the main online payment mechanism.

 

What are your Future Plans after you successfully complete development and integrate SmartCash payment?

We will then like to be able to publish all the 360 videos created with the WebVR editor onto the blockchain. This is because blockchain ensures higher security of the assets as well as the transparency of transactions for copyrighted content though the watermarking and protection of intellectual property of the creators.

How can I help?
You can help by voting Yes for us and once it is live be among the first to use it to create your own amazing WebVR games and 360 video content.

 

Conclusions:

We believe that with your help we can take the next step forward in promoting true decentralized payments in web applications with Smartcash.

result.title: Reimburse Decentralized 50% of the coins he was ROBBED AT GUNPOINT in my home. Full story inside.
result.summary: On May 1st, 2018 I woke up to two men entering my home with masks and balloons, they must have stalked me because my address is NOT public knowledge. These men had a tazer and a gun, and upon entering my home immediatly came into my room and jumped ontop of me while tazering me and trying to get me on my stomach and to stop fighting back, this eventually happens and they proceed to point a gun at me while threatening my life, family and so on. They used duct tape to tie me down to a chair for a little over 2 hours while they basically interrogated my crypto out of me. Police report is filed, money is in limbo and not even the SmartCash Devs cannot touch it even thought it is on a web wallet account due to my quick thinking. Sadly the money is locked behind a password that only the criminals would know, but they cannot use it because the username has changed, they also did not backup the key for the web wallet therefore have 0 access to the funds. Nor does anyone else... thats 14m coins just locked up.
result.description:
I have always been one of the guys who will happily get my hands dirty actually doing work for the community and would love to continue doing so on my own dime, but sadly I was robbed of 14,000,000 SmartCash on May 1st and have sort of kept quit about it due to a few reasons, one of which keeping it on the low while we tried to deal with it others ways...

 

Well it has been 2 full months now and there isn't much happening, the cops have very little to go on, minus MAYBE a tiny amount of DNA from 1 perp. I have slowly gone broke and can likely only afford rent for a few more months until I am forced to find other sources of income and start from square 1 again.

At one point the SmartCash team was open to funding my 50% proposal by themselves but something seems to have changed and rather than speculate on why or whom caused this, I was hoping I could just bring the proposal to the community, without drama, or arguments and just see what the tune of the community says about this..

 

If not I completely understand and will do my best to maintain, but its not looking good. I even got up the nerve to call whom I thought it was who robbed me yesterday but that turned out to be a dead end. Not really sure what to do from here, cant exactly try to crack the password anymore than the devs already have due to web wallet security im essentially screwed.

 

What do you guys think? Too much to ask? Should I just move on with my life? When you get robbed of 1.5 million dollars in one 3 hours period its a bit hard to come back from mentally and in general, working on the PTSD at 3am but it would really help ease my nerves if I knew the community had my back.

 

Police reports are already in place ( I can post proof if people reallly need it, but I have long since discussed this with the  devs, the password has been attempted to be cracked and the devs swear there is NOTHING they can do to help me, so here we are.... Oh and obviously the coins were a perma hold. I had been working on my smartcash balance since LITERALLY before day one. :/

 

Looking forward to the input, thanks guys and gals. And if this 'breaks' any rules just delete it and expect me to be LONG gone for that BS, so don't even try it please.

 

Oh and if you are curious as to why I didnt add to many details, I wanted you to actually read it, if you are curious just DM me.

result.title: Workshop for creating a SmartNode for the southern German Crypto Community
result.summary:
There is a huge crypto community in southern Germany (Stuttgart) with a non-profit organization and monthly public meetings with a lot of participants.

Goal of this proposal is to hold a workshop to show what SmartCash is and to create a SmartNode.
result.description:
A non-profit organization called Bitcoin User Group Stuttgart e.V. (BUGS e.V.) holds a monthly public meeting for everyone who is interested in crypto currencies. BUGS e.V. is a non-profit organization with the goal to educate everyone with crypto currencies. What are crypto currencies? What can I do with them? How can I accept crypto currencies on my shop? And so on...

This would be a great opportunity to show to these user

  • What SmartCash is
  • How SmartCash works
  • Benefits of SmartCash
  • How SmartNodes and SmartRewards are working
  • A Workshop to set up an own SmartNode

Why funding is needed?

At least 10,000 smart for creating a SmartNode of course.

Additionally some advertisement is needed with flyer, online ads and so on to get a big audience. Again about 10,000 smart.

Where it will be held?

Southern Germany, Stuttgart.

When it will be?

Due the public meetings are monthly based and it's always the first thursday 08/02/2018 would be too short-termed. The perfect date would be 09/06/2018

What will it cost?

It will be free, of course.

More Information

If the funding is successful it will be announced on the official website of the public meeting (www.bitcoin-stuttgart.de) and on the website of BUGS e.V. (www.bugs-ev.de).

result.title: Building software for the Africa ecosystem of SmartCash(hackathon)
result.summary: The adoption of cryptocurrency in  Africa seem different from other parts of the world and other continent. The kind of software and marketing ideas that work well in Other parts of the world may seem not to function well down here. This project seek to promote SmartCash ecosystem and  technology in the Africa perspective  and also to bring new computer engineers, software developers, programmers and other stakeholders in order to build new software to help  achieve the massive adoption in Africa at a faster rate
result.description:
Building software for the African ecosystem of SMARTCASH.
 
 
 
Preamble 
 
 
My name is Kingsford Yankson cryptocurrency enthusiasts and an ambassador  for SmartCash. On discord as @yankdiary.
 
 
 
Description 
 
 
The adoption of Africa seem different from other parts of the world and other continent. The kind of software and marketing ideas that work well in Other parts of the world may seem not to function well down here. This project seeks to promote smartcash ecosystem and  technology and also to bring new computer engineers, software developers, programmers and other stakeholders to build new softwares to help move the massive adoption in Africa at a faster pace.  
 
 
 
How we will do it.
 
 
We (my team and I) aim to organize competition for the developers. We are expecting not more than  50 developers and they will be competing for a price in SmartCash
 
 
 
The judges for the competition will be pioneers for SmartCash Africa and other Outstanding  developers in Africa.
 
 
 
Email and letters have been sent to  the various software developers in Ghana and Head of department of the various IT universities to let outstanding developers students to also partake in the competition.
 
schedule
The competition will be organize in the capital city of Ghana that is Accra for two days
 
Agenda
 
Friday 6 PM to Saturday 8:00 PM
 
Friday
 
6:00 PM Registration
7:00 PM Opening
8:00 PM Conference 1
9:00 PM Workshop 1
10:00 PM Dinner
11:00 PM Workshop 2
12:00 PM Workshop 3
 
Saturday
 
8:00 AM Breakfast
10:00 AM Mentors Panel
11:00 AM Workshop 4
1:00 PM Mentors Panel
4:00 PM Hacks Registration
5:00 PM Hacks Presentation
6:00 PM Hacks Judging
7:00 PM Winners Announcement Awards
8:00 PM Closing Ceremony
 
 
Activities
 
Workshops - This would be a series of preparation talks given to the teams that will be participating on the Hackathon, with technical specs.
Hackathon - Programming session will go from x to y pm. Teams will be assembled and coding sessions will go on for the remainder of the day.
Award session - Closing of the event as well as evaluation of the code from Judges and final award to the teams.
Judging session - This will be a space to have the developers to Judge and participate in the judging session they will be key part of the winners decision
 
  
 
Benefit To smartcash
 
 
The ROI is very great and enormous to smartcash and its community in Africa at large. Developers will be motivated to code in their own language. The benefits to Smartcash are:
 
 
 
Developer Engagement
 
 
The competition will build a bridge to the developer community.
 
 
For cryptocurrency like Smartcash whose competencies lie in providing technology solutions, this competition help establish two-way conversations between those that develop the technology (APIs, APKs, data sets etc) and the people that use them. This feedback loop increases developer adoption, which is crucial if solutions are to proliferate across new channels.
 
 
Corporate Branding
 
 
Associating your brand with a competition like this can change the public’s perception of your brand and help acquire developer mindshare. Hosting a competition or getting involved as a sponsor is an efficient way to deliver more awareness about your coin to a prime, target audience – the maker community – and increase brand exposure in the tech world.
 
 
IP Development
 
 
This competition  is great, not necessarily because the silver bullet will be found, but because participants may find something you never knew you were looking for. This may be using your software solutions to break into new markets or developing extensions that open up entire new customer bases.
 
 
In addition, participants often not only develop a prototype of an app but frequently its infrastructure as well. This competition can build a genuine business case for the submission that justifies and facilitates further development and investment in the team that provided the solution.
 
 
Recruitment
 
 
As project-based challenges, this competition come closest to testing a candidate's capabilities of handling challenges in the workplace.
 
 
With software developers and data scientists in high demand, it’s challenging for companies to gain exposure, garner interest and determine the best talent. This competition can address both challenges. It will enable  the The smart-ass community  to gain awareness in the developer community and are perceived as “hacker-friendly”. This helps attract top talent and once the candidates apply, they have at least one project under their belt and have proven to be passionate enough about their work to spend a weekend with little to no sleep. With  this looking for software developers to create software for the ecosystem  of smartcash in the future  will be simple.
 
 
 
Justification
 
 
Videos and pictures will be sent to the various community  of smartcash during when the competition is ongoing. There will be live streaming  of the competition  on facebook  and twitter.  
Developers who will show outstanding performance will be introduced to the Smartcash community for further collaborations with other developers of SmartCash around the world
 
 
 
Budget 
 
 
Venue $500
 
 
Award for the winners $1000
 
 
2 Software Developers and 2 data scientists + 5 Judges.   $416
 
 
Refreshments $513
 
 
Banners $180
 
 
Photographer $115
 
 
Transportation within the region $360
 
 
Smartcash shirt $300
 
 
advertising the competition (Radio and Television)  $319
 
  
 
Contingency  $370
 
 
Total 4,077
 
 
 
 
 
 
My team and I aim at extending this project to other Africa countries. But since this is my first project I want to see my  performance in this mini project before I roll in another one. We aim at completing the smartcash road map which state that developing local base multi currency wallet which trading abilities.

result.title: Slothicorn Art Curation Sponsorship with SmartCash
result.summary: Slothicorn is an art curation group on Steemit that curates 17 artists daily to our followers. The SmartCash sponsored art curation would add one additional piece of artwork in each of our daily posts for that month (31 posts in total), highlighted by a custom SmartCash graphic to give it special attention in the post against the other 17 selections. The chosen artist will be rewarded with $10 USD in SmartCash, and the curator that day would be rewarded with $10 in SmartCash. We would source the custom graphic by running a week long contest with our artists to kick off the project with $100 USD in SmartCash for the winner.
result.description:
How it Works

  • We have on average 5 English posts, 1 Indonesian post, and 1 Spanish post a week. Sometimes this changes based on curator availability.
  • Each day a curator selections eligible art from the Slothicorn tag on Steemit (17 in total) and we write a post to the slothicorn account highlighting the entries. Here’s an example: https://steemit.com/slothicorn/@slothicorn/slothicorn-daily-art-curation-44
  • This project would add one special curation (bringing our daily total to 18 artists) for the span of one month (August, 31 days). We reward the first 17 ourselves. The special 18th artist, sponsored by SmartCash, would receive $10 USD in the equivalent SmartCash. The curator for the day would also receive $10 USD in equivalent SmartCash.

 

Budget Break Down

    • $310 for Artist Rewards - $10 x 31 days
    • $310 for Curators - $10 x 31 days
    • $100 for Custom Header Graphic

 

  • $720 USD total

 

 

Timeline Break Down

If the proposal is funded the proposed timeline is:

  • July 7th-July 22nd (approx) - Proposal Open for voting for 2 weeks
  • July 22nd-31st - If the proposal passes the vote, we will announce it on the Slothicorn steemit, as well as post our need for a header graphic. We generally get graphics (including out current logo) through a contest with upvotes and a crypto reward as the prize so we would stick with this format. Artists will have until the 28th to deliver work. The promotional post on Steemit and the custom header graphic will be our first milestone deliveries.
  • August 1st - August 31st - Starting August 1st, we will add a special section to our daily curations with the custom SmartCash logo to highlight the SmartCash sponsored post. This will continue until the 31st. Artists will be paid out using the SmartCash TipBot (https://steemit.com/@smartbot)  on steemit so that it’s all verifiable and good.
  • September 1st - We’re done! Yay us!

 

What is Slothicorn?

Slothicorn (http://www.slothicorn.com // https://steemit.com/@slothicorn) is a decentralized, autonomous, loosely affiliated collective of artists who create art for cryptocurrency (often with a blockchain theme) or rewards other artists with cryptocurrency. We are rooted in the culture of open source and creative commons movements. Slothicorn seeks to liberate artists from daily grind and support them in higher quality of life by giving them the tools to create more abundance of resources, creativity, income, and support. Hopefully, these artists will become “slothicorns” themselves and help spread the wealth and community. Slothicorn often uses art projects, contests, bright colours, or crypto games to teach and share. Known for surreal and futuristic visuals, rainbow colours, and an outpouring of playful energy, Slothicorn strives to be the “wonderland of the Blockchain”. The ultimate goal of slothicorn is to take an artist from famine to enough fortune for them to uplift another artist in slothicorn.

While the combination of a sloth and unicorn has existed on the internet for some time, Slothicorn as we know it was born from a dream by Stellabelle(https://steemit.com/@stellabelle). Stellabelle first released Slothicorn onto the Steem Blockchain in late 2017 and it exploded into a large community of creatives who have, at the time of writing, rewarded artists with over 46,000 USD(https://steemit.com/slothicorn/@paulag/slothicorn-analysis-artists-project-on-steemit) for their artistic efforts.

Drawing inspiration from the original off-white paper, Slothicorn’s first project was the Slothicorn steemit account(https://steemit.com/@slothicorn) that funded many contests and now supports a steemit art curation, made possible by a generous steem power delegation from Stellabelle and the support of other slothicorns. Slothicorn has evolved from a creative commons and open source background to encouraging artists to choose their own licensing.

You can look back at the daily art curation on our Current Projects(https://slothicorn.com/current-projects/)  page on the website, with translations and curations also available in Indonesian and Spanish. We have a Discord community of about 700 members and a Twitter, but Steemit is by far our most active social media platform with around 1900 followers.

Who are the artists?

Currently the slothicorn tag on steemit receives around 80-100 submissions a day and at our last analysis about a month ago(https://steemit.com/slothicorn/@ghulammujtaba/slothicorn-weekly-art-curation-analysis-05-09-2018-to-05-15-2018), there were over 200 unique users using the tag. Most of the artists use english, though we have a large enough Spanish and Indonesian community that we have added curators specifically to create curation posts in those languages. We’re interested in helping artists at all stages of their careers and frequently have artists from across the globe, including Nigeria and Venezuela.

Who am I?

My name is Ciel. I’ve been a driving force behind Slothicorn since Stellabelle was hired by Ono, along with Ghulam (one of our other curators). I’ve been interested in crypto since 2013, but only been very active in the space since last year. I was introduced to SmartCash through Crypt0 on Youtube and I’ve participated a bit in Team SmartCash, mostly writing short fiction. (Theodore and the Queen Bee https://steemit.com/smartcash/@justatouchfey/theodore-and-the-queen-bee-or-a-little-suspense-story-about-smartcash). I actually have another little serial I’m in the process of (The Winter Hive https://steemit.com/smartcash/@justatouchfey/the-winter-hive-part-one-or-a-little-suspense-serial-involving-cryptos-and-smartcash) though my Slothicorn work has put that on hold a bit.

I wrote those stories because I like SmartCash and found the community to be very approachable and encouraging. It was a great re-entry into cryptocurrency for me as a creative person and I think it would be very fun to introduce SmartCash to the Slothicorn community.

Outside crypto, I’m an artist and writer who has performed and exhibited work in Winnipeg, Vancouver, and Toronto. I’ve been involved in everything from television production to immersive art installations. Besides my curating work with Slothicorn, I also co-created and helps maintain the CryptoKitties Wiki.(http://cryptokittieswiki.com). You can check out the most recent version of my CV here: https://cielsaintemarie.files.wordpress.com/2018/06/cielsaintemarie_webcv.pdf

 

Who are the curators?

We currently have two english language curators (myself/@justatouchfey and Ghulam/@ghulammujtaba, one spanish language curator (@karmachela), and one indonesian curator(@kennyvaldez). The curators were chosen simply as the individuals who showed up every day to do the work.

result.title: Exclusive Sponsorship Reality Check w/ Ben Swann Powered by Smartcash
result.summary:
This is an updated proposal.  After speaking with several members of the SmartHive, I believe that an EXCLUSIVE Reality Check sponsorship makes sense.  

We propose that just as SmartCash is helping to create disruption in the financial world, it also helps to create major disruption in the media world by becoming the exclusive sponsor of “Reality Check w/ Ben Swann.”  In order to fit into the SmartCash budget, we are proposing an exclusive sponsorship of Reality Check.  SmartCash will be branded and tied to what is one of the most successful news segments in the world. Our hope is to  establish and sustain a long-term partnership, and we would be honored to be an ambassador of SmartCash.

Reality Check with Ben Swann is a news and information segment that paved the way in covering stories mainstream media misrepresented or simply deceived the public about in the United States and around the world. In 2016, Reality Check with Ben Swann had 110 Million video views on Facebook and outperformed media giants such as VICE News.   

From February to May of 2018 Reality Check with Ben Swann was sponsored by DASH Digital Cash and during that time Reality Check segments garnered over 20 Million views.  In addition, our brand partnership with DASH has introduced DASH as a brand to millions of new and potential crypto users.
result.description:
Deliverables and Funding Breakdown

 

Reality Check Sponsorship.

   ? SmartCash will be the exclusive sponsor of Reality Check for the duration of this sponsorship.?

   ? Estimated 30M video views, 70M social impressions. The estimated video views and impressions do not include views and impressions gained through advertising. Videos will be uploaded to Facebook, YouTube, DTube, LBRY, Amazon Prime,  Roku, embedded on Steemit and News Websites. Episode teasers will be posted to Instagram and Twitter. These will be in video or image format.?



Sponsorship includes:?

   ? SmartCash name and logo as part of the animated open for each episode including a verbal announcer who says “Reality Check w/ Ben Swann Powered by SmartCash.

      Lower third bug. “Ben Swann’s Reality Check Powered By SmartCash” and will be seen on all platforms listed above and more as we expand our network.

      Dedicated Smartcash Bug on the opposite side of the screen which states “powered by SmartCash throughout the episode.?

   ? Link in the description of the Youtube, DTube, and LBRY if available?

   ? This will be a non-exclusive sponsorship and will cover one Reality Check per week; Every Tuesday unless the date lands on a US holiday. Then Reality Check’s marketing department will decide what day to release that Reality Check on.?

   ? Videos will cover topical US and World issues and will be 2 to 5 minutes long.?

   ? A total of 44 episodes will be sponsored.?  At our current average of 600,000 views per video, we project over 26 million SmartCash branded views of Reality Check



Ben Swann at 3 Crypto/Blockchain events. Ben Swann and team go to one, US based, blockchain conference a month (3 total) to promote SmartCash. Live stream on Facebook and Instagram with SmartCash logo on the screen. Social promotion before and after the event. The events have not been picked yet, and we would love the SmartCash community’s feedback on where in the US you would like us to go.  

Ben is already scheduled to speak this July at FreedomFest in Las Vegas.  Freedomfest is the “world’s largest gathering of free minds and is independent, non-partisan and not associated with any think tank”.   This event includes speakers such as Judge Andrew Napolitano, John Stossel, Peter Schiff and many others.

Mention SmartCash. Ben and team, while being interviewed by other press, will mention SmartCash as an example of the decentralized financial system needed to create and promote independent media.

Sponsor Spotlight.  

Every other Sunday Ben and his team will release a “Sponsor Spotlight on SmartCash.”  These segments are a powerful way to create adoption of SmartCash. While the branding associated with the Reality Check segments will allow for brand recognition for SmartCash with our audience, these Sponsor Spotlight segments will give an in-depth view of SmartCash to our audience and explain why SmartCash is a vibrant and useful crypto ecosystem.  The Sponsor Spotlights have received hundreds of thousands of views. This proposal includes 12 Sponsor Spotlight episodes. We project over 1,500,000 SmartCash sponsor spotlight views.

In total, we project over 30,000,000 video views of SmartCash branded content over a 6 month period.  

 

Release Dates for Reality Check:

August: 7, 9, 14, 16, 21, 23, 28, 30, September: 4, 6, 11, 13, 18, 20, 25, 27, October: 2, 4, 9, 11, 16, 18, 23, 25, 30  November 1, 3, 6, 8, 13, 15, 29 December 4, 6, 11, 13, 18, January 10, 15, 17, 22, 24, 29, 31

 

Release Dates for Sponsor Spotlight:

August: 12, 26 September: 9, 23, October:  7, 21 November: 4, 18 December: 2, 16, January: 13, 27

 

Investment:  $356,000  paid out over 6 months

 

Payment Dates:  

           Aug. 1st, 2018-       $59,334.00

           Sept. 1st, 2018-       $59,334.00

           Oct. 1st, 2018-     $59,334.00

        Nov 1st, 2018-        $59,334.00

        Dec 1st, 2018        $59,334.00

        Jan 1st, 2019        $59,334.00



We will provide a monthly KPI report. The KPI report will include banner impressions, video plays and reach.




Budgeted Costs Monthly:

 

$15,000 Researchers, writers, producers, executive producer, social managers, online producer

$12,000 Production Crew (Audio operator, Director, Videographers, Engineers, Video Editors, Video Animator)

$3,000 Graphic Designers

$6,000 Legal/Insurance

$23,000 Marketing budget



About Ben Swann

I have 20 years of experience in journalism, behind and in front of the camera. I became drawn to covering under-reported issues and events early on in my career, particularly during my time covering the drug war in Mexico when I realized that the war on drugs was being misrepresented and most mainstream media had no interest in upholding their commitment to sharing the truth with the public. I’ve received three Emmy awards and two Edward R. Murrow awards, as well as several AP awards from my time in Texas and New Mexico and Georgia.

I am not new to the cryptocurrency community. I’ve been discussing Bitcoin since 2013, longer and more thoroughly than most journalists in the media, in my own reporting as well as during my appearance at the Texas Bitcoin Conference in 2014. My experience stands in contrast to the majority of mainstream media, which is scrambling to catch up on coverage largely because cryptocurrency has become so accessible and attractive that they can no longer ignore it. However, the majority of media corporations fail to objectively and accurately report on this industry.

 

Benefit to SmartCash

We have the ability to bring SmartCash to a vastly larger audience than ever before.  From February to March of 2018 we had a similar sponsorship agreement with Dash Digital Cash.  Without question we brought an enormous amount of attention to the Dash DAO with many media organizations and individuals now aware of the concept of a DAO treasury when they had not been in the past.  In addition, we introduced DASH as a brand to millions of freedom and liberty minded individuals. Further, the addition of the Dash Spotlight in the final month of our sponsorship gave our viewers an intimate look at DASH and its benefits not only in terms of a financial option, but also as a way to expanding disruption and freedom throughout the world.  

In addition, Reality Check episodes dive into subjects that are embraced and heavily recirculated by an enormous and diverse crowd. This crowd comes from widely varying political, social and geographic backgrounds and they range from individuals who have spent a great deal of their own time on research to individuals who are learning about these subjects for the first time, and the subject of cryptocurrency is no exception. The promotion of SmartCash will fit seamlessly with our reporting: while our audience is diverse, it shares a common passion for disruption in the media as well as a mindset that embraces disruptive technologies like cryptocurrency.

We have the advantage of both a huge audience and existing experience in speaking to the public about cryptocurrency. Using the same footprint that has helped Reality Check and Truth In Media episodes reach hundreds of millions of viewers, we will be able to integrate SmartCash and crypto within our videos as well as bring those topics to live events at a more intimate level with the public.  Our audience is comprised of millions of free thinkers and many people who either have or want to adopt cryptocurrency. Many of those individuals know very little about alternative currencies. Our Sponsor Spotlight provides important brand building information for those viewers.

I have been honored over the past 4 months to act as an ambassador for Dash and to introduce the power of Dash Digital Cash to so many people. I now look forward to moving forward as a brand ambassador for SmartCash and introducing millions of people worldwide to the SmartCash community and economy.

result.title: EXPANDING THE OUTREACH OF SMARTCASH TO THREE REGIONS OF GHANA
result.summary:
My name is Abass Iddriss known in the Smartcash community as @abasz, @abasz on twitter and miles_drizzy on instagram.
This project is the continuation of our successfully completed project. We therefore tend to increase the adoption of Smartcash in Ghana through grassroots community outreach efforts and to establish marketing methods. Training of 30 newly Smartcash ambassadors in three regions of Ghana to propagate Smartcash. One-on-one meet up with business owners and the ordinary people on the need to sign up and accept Smartcash for their daily transactions.
result.description:
The problem
For years Ghana and most African countries has been pummeled with high unemployment. Lack of steady positions and corrupt business officials make it hard for entrepreneurs to make their mark on the continent, and Cryptocurrency has given many business owners and workers opportunity they likely wouldn’t have had otherwise.
Cryptocurrency fever is now striking Africa hard. Ghana is one of the few countries in Africa where Cryptocurrency is picking up remarkably and yet, most people still hold a hostile attitude towards these digital currencies which still hinders the adoption rate in the country.
Based on our just completed proposal, it came to our notice that even though the knowledge of Cryptocurrency is rising, many people still don’t know of Smartcash.
This project shall cover the 3 major industrialized and business areas of Ghana (Takoradi, Tema and Koforidua) for the next three months. Our earliest project https://vote.smartcash.cc/Proposal/Details/INTRODUCING-SMARTCASH-TO-THE-ASHANTI-COMMUNITY1 is completed with all milestones and measure of success met with an increase awareness of Smartcash within the region. There is therefore the need to create more awareness on Smartcash and why Ghanaians should adopt and trade using Smartcash.
Several lessons and observations have been made for our first project and there is the need to factor in new development such as training Smartcash ambassadors, contracting bloggers to write on Smartcash and Smartcash radio advertisements.

Contracting bloggers to write on Smartcash
Blogging can be seen as a form of social networking service. Bloggers do not only produce content to post on their blogs but also build social relations with their readers and other bloggers. This however create a great opportunity to advertise ones goods. We shall contract major bloggers to write and share Smartcash contents periodically. This will reach about 15000 Ghanaians and it will increase the adoption of Smartcash in Ghana.
Media advertisement
Outreach is a major advantage with radio ads. Despite criticism for high costs. Advertisers have the best chance to reach large audience through television and radio. Radio advertisement can reach even the illiterates people in the country.
Smartcash radio and advertisement in the nations most watched and listened stations to help educate Ghanaians on Smartcash Cryptocurrency.
Ambassadors program
For massive adoption and usability, there should be massive Smartcash advocacy in developing countries like Ghana. The country is not new to Cryptocurrency but most people are not aware of the impact of Smartcash. To be able to achieve this, ambassadors will be provided with training, funding and materials to perform their own meet-ups, thus exponentially increasing our influence. The project intend to train 30 Smartcash enthusiast to spread and educate the mass on Smartcash digital cash and to clear any misconceptions Ghanaians have on Smartcash Cryptocurrency.

Work done so far
My team and I have been busy advocating Smartcash in Ghana and Ashanti region over the past three months where many Ghanaians have shown massive interest in the coin by signing up and buying Smart to be used for their daily transactions.

result.title: SmartCash Sponsorship of Anti-Media
result.summary: The goal of this proposal is to secure funding for our media outlet, Anti-Media, while delivering effective, large-scale, censorship-proof branding and marketing for SmartCash.
result.description:
“You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.”

? R. Buckminster Fuller

Hello SmartHive, we’re Anti-Media

Much like cryptocurrencies, Anti-Media was born from the internet to disrupt the mainstream paradigm of centralization and control. As young people began to ask questions online about the status quo, we found a home in anti-establishment millennial circles that were looking for explanations of why the world is the way it is. Since we started as a non-partisan Facebook meme page in 2013, Anti-Media has grown into a leader in digital independent media, reaching over 12 million people every month. Our founder, Nick Bernabe, started the company after witnessing widespread shortcomings in politics and media during the U.S. elections in 2012. He had the the hope of challenging official narratives and injecting alternative voices into the conversations that shape our world. Five years later, Anti-Media is one of the most trusted and well-known brands in the industry.

Our hard-hitting, non-sensationalized content is not only shared throughout our own network of two million+ followers but is also syndicated across hundreds of independent media websites and has been featured on and sourced by mainstream outlets such as Newsweek, Huffington Post, Drudge Report, and Yahoo. Our content is also regularly shared by Ron Paul’s outlets. Our incredible team of writers, researchers, and editors features some of the most influential personalities in the liberty community, including Carey Wedler, Derrick Broze, Josie Wales, and Nick Bernabe.

Much like our team, our sizable following is made up of largely anti-establishment millennials who value freedom and decentralization. This is a perfect match for SmartCash.

SmartCash Sponsorship Proposal

In the same way SmartCash seeks to disrupt the centralized financial system, Anti-Media seeks to disrupt the centralized media and information model. As SmartCash promotes freedom through decentralization and innovation, Anti-Media publishes content promoting the values of freedom and decentralization in everyday life by covering both threats to these values as well as developments that help to protect and nurture them. That is why we believe SmartCash sponsoring Anti-Media would be an ideal, mutually beneficial, and timely match for the visions of our organizations — especially as large ad networks continue to ban crypto advertising.

If SmartCash sponsors Anti-Media, our organizations will both thrive through this innovative new way to fund media and advertise cryptocurrencies.

  • Anti-Media will remove advertisements from Google, Facebook, and other invasive ad companies from our platforms that we’ve relied on for years to monetize our content. We’ve become increasingly concerned with Google and Facebook censorship and data mining and would like to cease our use of them altogether. Removing these invasive ads and replacing them with ads for SmartCash will allow our advertisements to align with our values. Sponsoring Anti-Media will enable SmartCash to circumvent Google, Facebook, and Twitter bans on cryptocurrency advertisements. It will also make our revenue model censorship-resistant.
  • Anti-Media will publish a bi-weekly podcast sponsored by SmartCash
  • SmartCash banner ads, videos, calls to action, SmartCash social media page @tags, and shoutouts will be strategically placed on our content across all platforms, from our website, TheAntiMedia.com, and viral memes and videos on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter to our newsletter with 50,000 subscribers, as well as Steemit. This provides us the ability to deliver well over 6 million impressions per month and monetize our influential social media reach. We’d be able to seamlessly plug SmartCash marketing graphics and videos (or have our graphic designer/video editor make the material) into our content, which is consumed by an audience that is already skeptical of the financial system and eager to find and support new solutions. SmartCash’s social media profiles will receive many new followers from @tagging them on the various platforms. We will provide accounting for all impressions and actions taken on SmartCash advertisements across all platforms.
  • Anti-Media will be able to increase the amount, quality, and distribution of our content, expand video programming, hire more prominent writers from the freedom community, increase our network reach, and acquire much more traffic and views for our content. We will be able reach for our goal of publishing 40 or more articles per week with at least one cryptocurrency-related article per day. We will publish at least three videos per week and dozens of potentially viral memes — all branded with a call to action to buy SmartCash when possible.
  • SmartCash’ marketing materials will be put in front of over 6 million people every month and will reach an audience whose values already align with SmartCash’ core principles. We will sponsor certain articles and content strategically for high conversion rates to advertise across Google, Facebook, Reddit, Twitter, and other advertising networks to drive clicks to the SmartCash ads in our content, sending traffic to smartcash.cc or smartcash.cc/get-smartcash. As we scale up video programming and viral content, the potential to reach much more than 6 million people per month is essentially guaranteed.
  • Anti-Media’s core demographic is the most likely to embrace cryptocurrencies.
  • SmartCash press releases, updates, and announcements will all be covered by Anti-Media writers and turned into news articles, which will likely be syndicated by many other media sites that aggregate our content.
  • Viral content, which will contain SmartCash advertising/branding/call to actions/social media @tags, will be shared with our larger network of distribution partners, which will likely result in hundreds of millions of impressions for the SmartCash brand. Our content is licensed creative commons, so viral content may be freely uploaded by many other publishers, influencers, and individuals, carrying SmartCash to an exponential number of impressions.
  • Bonus: A project we’re currently working on (but are unable to talk about publicly yet because of non-disclosure agreements) would provide massive, mainstream visibility to SmartCash if and when it comes to fruition. Our SmartCash sponsorship would be “grandfathered” into that project. This is not guaranteed but would be a gamechanger for both of our organizations’ name-recognition, branding, and reach.

What are we asking for?

To accomplish all we set out to do with this sponsorship, we are requesting:

 

  • 100,000 SMART per month

 

-SmartCash banner ads will be placed in our content.

-Social media content (viral in many cases) would be branded with SmartCash.

-Anti-Media podcast sponsored by SmartCash

-Approximately 6 million+ impressions per month for the SmartCash brand. (Many ads on websites generate $10 CPM, which is $10 per 1,000 impressions. We’re offering a conservative estimate of 6 million impressions, which would be valued at $60,000 per month by this metric, providing extraordinary value.)

How the funds would be spent (monthly estimates)

  • Anti-Media team wages (writers, editors, social media managers, video editor, new hires, etc.): 50,000 SMART
  • Marketing (with an emphasis on SmartCash ad conversions): 20,000 SMART
  • Operating expenses: 10,000 SMART
  • Resources to scale up operations: 10,000 SMART
  • Research and development: 5,000 SMART
  • Networking: 5,000 SMART
  • We’ll utilize SMART as our official currency and use it to spend our budget when possible, including paying Anti-Media team wages.

*Fluctuations in the price of SMART will be either absorbed by Anti-Media if the price goes down or put toward increasing traffic and impressions (marketing) if the price goes up. In the event of a dramatic change in SMART value, the amounts could be renegotiated in a new proposal.

Terms

  • 4-month trial period (one month for us to scale-up, 3 months to collect and report data to SmartCash). If the sponsorship proves to be satisfactory for both parties, we’d like to extend it another 8 months with a new proposal.
  • We will maintain transparent accounting. Spending and advertising/branding/impression data will be shared with SmartCash.

Thanks for taking the time to read our proposal, SmartHive! We look forward to working together to bring cryptocurrency and blockchain to the masses.

result.summary: sports are a powerful tool that brings people together and creates a sense of community. They develop connections that bond together people from all walks of life. For a long time, sports have been viewed as a way to stay healthy and in shape, but their importance goes much further. As a matter of fact, playing sports teaches life lessons like discipline, responsibility, self-confidence, accountability, and teamwork.
result.description:

I and my team will be hosting inter-tertiary sports competition including

We intend starting with Nuhu bamalli polytechnic Zaria, proceed to Kaduna state polytechnic and round up in Kaduna State University.
INTRODUCTION
I am Blessing Nathaniel a cryptocurrency evangelist and enthusiast. I got to know about cryptocurrrency since 2016 and have ever since been passionate about it and evangelising about it at every slight opportunity. I am a member of the community on discord and steemit and have been contributing my quota,i raised a proposal some months back which didn’t pass but still I wasn’t deterred because I am looking at the bigger picture . I got drawn to smart cash because of it community support system and am here to stay.
How will our activity benefit SMART CASH?
Smart Cash will obtain thousand audiences through the sports fiesta and also from the activity being aired and further publications by bloggers and journalists online.
Smartcash will gain new investors. We are going to attract young folks who will be able to
promote Smartcash efficiently.
Smart cash will get our team as a long term solid partners with rich experience in crypto-
currency adoptions strategies, business and marketing on the Nigeria markets.
Our next step is to promote Smartcash deeper and deeper into our community and institutions

result.title: SMARTCASH MEDIA SPLASH (SMS)
result.summary:
INTRODUCTION
Hi fellow Smarties, I am Adeleke Saheed, popularly known in the SmartCash community as @kingcrypto from Nigeria, West Africa. I am a Crypto-advocate, a Monetary Economist by profession, an Event planner by practice, a Data scientist and financial analyst, and a father. Since I discovered Smartcash, a decentralized economy with it huge potential, I have decided to stay around and succeed with the Smartcash family, and this is my pledge to you all.
After realizing there is little awareness and adoption of SmartCash cryptocurrency in Nigeria, I have decided to create the required mass awareness for SmartCash cryptocurrency and promote its adoption among fellow Nigerians with the power of public media. By this, I have started raising new local Smartcash vanguards and ambassadors who will support me in execution of this project and join the Smartcash mass awareness campaign training.

DESCRIPTION
Public media (use of television and radio) has been a good innovation and an efficient means of advertising and marketing of businesses, products and services across the world today. Thus, the effects of public media promotion in business growth is inevitable in today’s world and has been the key factor that drive the positive trend of information growth.

THE PROBLEM
I am a member of the Smartcash community who lives in Lagos State, Nigeria. I have attended some projects and seminars generally on the future of cryptocurrency in Nigeria. In addition, I have been to the streets of Lagos to meet with individuals, firms and business owners to make rapt survey on cryptocurrency adoption and use in Nigeria, with major reference to Smartcash cryptocurrency. However, my study has shown to a great length that Smartcash cryptocurrency adoption and usage is quite low in Nigeria and requires urgent attention.

THE PROJECT (SMS - NIGERIA): WHAT WILL WE DO?
A standard survey of Lagos according to Geopoll Media survey shows that about 78% of the Lagosians own and watches television and about 85% of the population listens to radio which makes these two media, an effective and efficient means of information outreach for Smartcash cryptocurrency. I have intended to run this project for two (2) months with my team members which I am raising and training, and which the continuation of this project in the future will be based on the community’s decisions about the achievements and outcomes of this current proposed project. The project targets the Lagos state residents, business owners, Crypto-enthusiast, firms, merchants, local exchanges and students, all in Lagos State.
This project will feature:
•             An Eight-weeks “Smartcash Home drive” on the radio with Kingcrypto.
•             An Eight-weeks “Smartcash TV series” with Kingcrypto.
•             A Smartcash Public Seminar/workshop for business owners, firms, local exchanges, merchants and private individuals in Lagos State.
All video report of the programs will be shared on all official SmartCash sources. In addition, written reports will be made and submitted concerning each week media programs.

MY SMARTCASH ACTIVITIES
https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=1l-svmZbQzL6rSU1z0uqnAOTZRKzvBuMc
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=136252553917523&id=100025983366541
result.description:
THE MEDIA HOUSE PARTNERSHIP
For this project, the support and partnership of some media houses (a renowned radio and a television station) have been sorted. These media houses already have our ‘letters of partnership request’ with them and are ready to cooperate with us in the project execution. The power of internet radio services added to radio stations services and cable televisions in Nigeria will enable people within and outside the Lagos states and Smartcash community members to listen to the radio shows and watch the television series broadcast. In addition, website links will be sent to the community discord channel prior to the radio talk shows to enable community members listen to the program.




MY SMARTCASH ACTIVITIES
https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=1l-svmZbQzL6rSU1z0uqnAOTZRKzvBuMc
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=136252553917523&id=100025983366541
BENEFITS OF THIS PROJECT TO SMARTCASH
  • The Eight weeks public media program (radio and TV) will trigger mass awareness and the name Smartcash will roam the streets of Lagos in short time, thereby making Smartcash known and adopted by many.
  • The media program will discuss and enlighten the masses of the advantages of Smartcash over other cryptocurrencies, features and services rendered by Smartcash. By this, we will also advertise and highlight various Smartcash projects, products, services and innovations that are not available to other cryptocurrencies, which includes the Desktop wallet, the Mobile wallet, the Electrum wallet, the proposed Paper wallet and Hardware wallet, the Smartband, SmartReward, SmartNodes.
  • By issuing of gift of free smart token as bonus for contributions on the radio, more smartcash wallet will be created and subsequently, they will be encouraged to adopt and use Smartcash cryptocurrency.
  • Inviting merchants and exchange business owners to the TV series will help trigger business adoption and merchant integration as well as exchange and conversion services for Smartcash in Nigeria.
  • The Smartcash Public Seminar/workshop for business owners, firms, local exchanges, merchants and private individuals is intended to raise more vanguards that will be ambassadors of Smartcash and as well attract and educate more business owners, firms, local exchanges and merchants on how to key into the evolving cryptoworld by adopting Smartcash cryptocurrency.

SMARTCASH HOME DRIVE
Smartcash home drive is a media awareness program that will run for Eight (8) weeks on one of the most listened-to radio station in Lagos State with a listening population (traffic) of about two (2) million people according to Geo poll survey. The program will hold on the radio in the evening at around 5:00-5:30pm, which revolves around the period Lagosians closes from work and drive home. The program will hold twice a week on the radio, on Mondays and Wednesdays at the stated period (5:00-5:30pm).
   Smartcash home drive will feature discussions and enlightment about Smartcash; it uses and adoption; introduction to Blockchain technology and becoming a member of Smartcash community. In addition, for the radio programme, the Smartcash theme song by @Marshallife will play on the radio to lighten up the listeners and promote Smartcash. Series of questions that borders around Smartcash cryptocurrency, it use and adoption, blockchain technology and the future of Smartcash cryptocurrency will be entertained and answered on the radio. In addition, gift of free Smart token will be given to some listeners based on their contributions to the program, as this will enhance more participations of people. Website link of the radio show will be sent to the Smartcash community to enable community members join the program live and contribute if necessary.

SMARTCASH TELEVISION SERIES
Smartcash television series is another media awareness program planned to hold on the TV once a week for Eight (8) weeks. The program will show on Saturdays at around 5:00-5:30pm in the evening, at a time that Lagosians will be at home and would be on the TV. Smartcash television series will feature discussion and enlightenment; marketing and advertisement of Smartcash, use and adoption of Smartcash and becoming a member of the Smartcash community. In addition, we will invite a merchant/exchange business owner to each weekly TV series to enhance merchant integration and business conversion services, and gift of free Smart token will be given to some viewers based on their contributions to the program, as this will enhance more participation of people.

JUSTIFICATION
All recorded videos of the radio and TV programs, pictures and official reports of this project will be sent to the SmartCash community and other official Smartcash source. Furthermore, Instagram and YouTube will be used to broadcast live videos and do all necessary updates on the great projects happening to enable it be viewed worldwide.
In addition, we will adopt http://smartcashafrica.org for sharing of the information and website links will be sent to the community discord channel prior to the radio talk shows and the TV broadcast to enable community members listen and watch to the programs.
