result.title: Meetups and Videos for Latin America Season 3
result.summary: This is a continuation of the Proposal “Videos and Social Media in Spanish for Latin America 2.0”, now I am planning to visit Argentina, Colombia, Peru and Guatemala, to continue evangelizing SmartCash with Meetups, videos of interviews, videos of events, and keep managing existing social media channels in Spanish.
result.description:
This is a continuation of the Previously Approved Proposal “Videos and Social Media in Spanish for Latin America 2.0”

Hello Smarties,

I am Ignacio Figueroa a.k.a @thewalk_er I live in Mexico, and I have been working in the SmartCash community for 10 months now, helping to spread the word about SmartCash in Latin America.

 

Milestones and Goals Achieved

In the last 8 months I have been producing 50 informative videos, meetups, tutorials and interviews on several events in the Youtube Channel “SmartVlog”

 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6any6NuctZ3R7roopbARwA/videos

 

Other activities include managing social media channels and community service to the new people.

 

Thanks to the community I have been traveling to several cities in Latin America, for Meetups, SmartCash event and for making interviews in the following cities.

 

  • Acapulco, Mexico (Anarkapulco and Anarkaforko events)
  • Guadalajara, Mexico (Talent Land)
  • Cancun, Mexico
  • Mexico City
  • Monterrey, Mexico
  • Queretaro, Mexico
  • San Salvador, El Salvador
  • Sao Paulo, Brazil
  • Caracas, Venezuela
  • Valencia, Venezuela
  • San Jose, Costa Rica
  • Jaco, Costa Rica

 

I have helped to build the social media in Spanish starting from Mexico and extending it to Latin America.

  • Facebook 1827 members
  • Twitter: 391 followers
  • Telegram:418 members

All these efforts had let us to create communities in every country visited, and increased substantially the presence of SmartCash in the Spanish speaking countries.

 

 

Introduction

Having a population of 650 Million people living in all Latin America, most of them are still new to this technology, the blockchain.

Spanish is the Second most used language in the world only after Mandarin by native speakers.

 

So I am ready to continue this effort, now with the expansion to four more countries.

  • Argentina   (September)
  • Colombia    (October)
  • Peru              (November)
  • Guatemala (December)

.

PROPOSAL GOALS

The proposal includes the following but not limited to:

 

Video Production

 

 

• Continue with the production of SmartVlog YouTube Channel and delivering 7 videos per month

• 50% of all the income from the previous proposal went directly on buying new equipment such as Professional Video Cameras, Audio Systems, wireless microphones, recorders, Lighting, Livestreaming Equipment, and Hardware for Post Production.

• Record the events, make the interviews and make livestreaming on social media.

 

Meetups

• 2 meetups in every country visited to talk about SmartCash.

• To assist every event in Mexico related with SmartCash to record and create the content for promotion.

 

Social Media

• To keep managing the Mexico Group for Facebook with a total of 1,826 community members.

• To keep Managing the Twitter account for Mexico and the WhatsApp group.

• Managing the community is a challenge since this has to be done in a very respectful way and giving a follow up on all the questions that might rise.

-A constant follow up on this social media is key for bringing more users to the platform.

• Graphics Design needed for Facebook and Twitter

 

 

Timeline

4 Months, starting in September through December 2018

One country per month

.

BUDGET

Amount Breakdown

 

Video Production

  • 134 hours per month on pre-production, traveling, production and post-production.
    Price per hour $18.00 USD (it includes wages and equipment previously mentioned)
    Video Production= 134*18 =$2,412 USD

                      (I have reduced the price on video production -18% from the previous proposal)

 

Air travel expenses per month =$1200 USD (One trip per month to a different country)

 

Hotel, food and local transportation $700 USD

 

Social Media Management

• 40 hours per month on social media management at $0 USD per hour

Subtotal $0 USD (This was a paid activity in the previous Proposal)

 

Meetups Giveaways

Faucets $500 USD (100 people, $5 USD each)

No expenses on rental spaces, meetings can be done in open places, schools, universities or restaurants.

SubTotal $4,812 USD per month

 

Total $19,248 USD

Please note, that with the same amount approved previously I am adding 1 more video per month, charging $0 on Social Media Management and reduced the Video Production costs by -18%.

 

So offering more results at reduced price, and a very competitive budget, this is the way to maintain the trust in the community by giving more.

 

Payments are due at the end of every month after delivering the report.

Videos are uploaded as soon as are edited.

Social Media Management its run 7 days a week.

 

By voting YES on this proposal you are giving the opportunity to many to know about our project in Latin America.

As you can see in the first image, We are turning all Latin America into Yellow color.

 

Best

Ignacio Figueroa

SmartCash Ambassador

result.title: 1º SmartCash Brazil Event
result.summary:
SmartCash – Smart Money will be the first major event in Latin America dedicated exclusively to SmartCash.

In October we will hold an exclusive event of SmartCash, the intention of this, is to invite people and companies to know the tools offered by the currency and its network. We understand that today is the right time to introduce SmartCash into commercial and other businesses, promote the use by individuals and encourage more and more the technology of this currency, because we want SmartCash popularly known when the crypto market reaches maturity. 

We will bring from other states, members of the official SmartCash Brazil team, active members of the Brazilian community who have helped several people assemble their SmartNodes, promote the use of currency and have extensive knowledge about the use, payment methods and their technologies.
result.description:
NOTE: To follow up project updates, including the complete proposal with the images, access the link: http://criptospace.com.br/smartcash

 

1º SmartCash Brazil Event

By CRIPTO SPACE (contributing to a better world!)

Oct, 2018

 

 

The CRIPTO SPACE is held in Brasília - DF

BRAZIL

 

 

INTRODUCTION

The initiative of CRIPTO SPACE arose from the need to create a space where enthusiasts from the crypto world can meet, share knowledge, make friends with people who have the same interests and have free activities such as events, meetups, workshops and talks about it of Bitcoin, Blockchain, Altcoins and all that is related. Four events have already been held by CRIPTO SPACE and adherence has been increasing, as more people are interested in obtaining knowledge in crypto-coins, as well as networking.

In October we will hold an exclusive event of SmartCash, the intention of this, is to invite people and companies to know the tools offered by the currency and its network. We understand that today is the right time to introduce SmartCash into commercial and other businesses, promote the use by individuals and encourage more and more the technology of this currency, because we want SmartCash popularly known when the crypto market reaches maturity.

In this way, we set out below our objectives for the 1st big event exclusive of SmartCash in Brazil:

OBJECTIVES

  1. Increase the awareness of SmartCash

In this event, we will receive from entrepreneurs interested in implanting the crypts in their establishments as payment method, to people who already have SmartNodes and interested in getting to know the currency and its technology better.

  1. To encourage the use of currency in Brazil

Brazil has great influence in Latin America and is well known for its vast territory and technology. This will be the first SmartCash event in Brazil and so SmartCash will benefit from a year-round presence on CRIPTO SPACE: the SmartCash logo will be associated with our events always as a project sponsor. In addition, we will regularly publish articles on currency on our website criptospace.net.

  1. Increasing SmartCash network

We will demonstrate the strong presence of SmartCash in Brazil, which already has several MasterNodes, attracting more people interested in supporting the currency, through its use in SmartBands, SmartCards and we will encourage the creation of new currency nodes during the event.

 

WHO WE ARE

We created the CRIPTO SPACE project in 2018, in Brasília - DF, capital of Brazil, to promote events related to the crypto world, share knowledge with people who wish to enter this world, join the enthusiasts of the subject and promote networking. We seek to reach the public that has heard about Bitcoin and its Altcoins, but still fear to enter this world for not really knowing the technology.

Since the creation of CRIPTO SPACE we have already held four events, the first edition addressed the theme "Decentralizing everything" that attracted the attention of all types of audience that were present at the event, from the most lazy to the most involved in the universe of cryptomoedas, focusing on the possibilities that the decentralization can provide in the most diverse spheres, showing even that it can be part of the daily life of people.

Already the second edition came with the theme "Understanding Bitcoin" that involved all the participants talking about the most introductory subjects related to Bitcoin to topics that are of interest to those with more advanced knowledge - for example: what is and how to do MasterNodes of some crypto-coins.

The third edition was about SmartCash and the most prominent topics during the event were the SmartNodes service, Rewards, and Smart usability forms through AtarBand and SmartCard. In addition, we highlight how SmartCash promotes engagement with the community where it is possible to participate in polls and give opinions on new projects for the currency, since one of the premises of SmartCash is decentralized governance.

In our last edition, we promoted a workshop for laypeople with the theme Introduction to Cryptheads, ranging from the emergence of Bitcoin to some ICO's.

 

SMARTCASH

We met SmartCash at the beginning of 2018 and were fascinated by the technology of its project, since the currency is simple to use and is accepted in several commercial establishments in Brazil through SmartBand in a bureaucratized way, giving true meaning to the term decentralization, thus bringing greater empowerment of people over their money.

In addition, SmartCash allows community participation with the voting of projects allowing everyone to help in the improvement and dissemination of the coin, an idea that is allied to our main objective of CRIPTO SPACE that is to generate the interaction of people in the crypto community.

Our goal is to continue to hold events, bringing renowned speakers to share information on the use of crypto-coins and their technologies, thereby enabling more people to have an opportunity to consciously adhere to the crypto world by mitigating risk and fraud.

 

THE EVENT

SmartCash – Smart Money will be the first major event in Latin America dedicated exclusively to SmartCash.

We will bring from other states, members of the official SmartCash Brazil team, active members of the Brazilian community who have helped several people assemble their SmartNodes, promote the use of currency and have extensive knowledge about the use, payment methods and their technologies.

The event will last 6 hours, it is estimated that there are 100 to 150 people, among them businessmen, merchants and people from the crypto world. The realization will be on October 20, 2018, the place will be in a club on the edge of Lake Paranoá, noble area of Brasília - DF.

 

We offer at the event:

  • Reception with SmartCash kit (T-shirt + Folders + Gifts + Stickers)
  • Comfortable space with tables and chairs for participants
  • SmartCash product area for speakers and presentations
  • Exclusive people to help entrepreneurs with doubts
  • SmartCash tools training area
  • Representatives of the official SmartCash Brazil team
  • SmartCash banners with informational
  • Backdrop for photos and videos
  • Cocktail
  • Photos and videos
  • Diverse possibility of networking, since the event will focus on the public of merchants from Brasília - DF and region

 

The main topics that will be addressed during the event:

  • What is SmartCash
  • How to acquire the currency
  • The market
  • SmartNodes
  • SmartRewards
  • SmartPay
  • SmartCard
  • SmartBand
  • InstantPay
  • Prospects for the future

 

TRAINING AREA 

We will introduce SmartCash tools, utilities and advantages to entrepreneurs and investors, tell your story, how you can buy and sell, and show you how easy and quick it is to make payments with SmartCash, either by SmartBand or SmartCard. In addition, we will talk about Nodes and Rewards, drawing the attention of the enthusiasts so that they can also adhere to these services, further strengthening the network.

To affirm the brand, we will distribute to the participants the SmartCash kit (T-Shirt + Folders + Gifts + Stickers).

SmartCash / CriptoSpace t-shirt template example: http://criptospace.com.br/SmartCash/ 

To achieve the best results with the event, we want to ensure that participants continue to receive information about SmartCash, and to achieve this goal, we will publish articles, videos and other informational materials on our website criptospace.net, and replicate to the main news portals about crypto-coins, we will also continue to participating in groups of the SmartCash community in Brazil, promoting debates and new meetings.

In addition, the SmartCash brand will always be present as a supporter of CRIPTO SPACE and we will use the logo of the project in our portal and other events that we will carry out all year round.

 

COSTS

Total: $7.890

 

SPEAKERS (Official representatives SmartCash Brazil)

  • Airfare
  • Accommodation
  • Food
  • Transport

 

GIFTS AND DISCLOSURE MATERIAL

  • AirDrop
  • T-Shirts
  • Gifts
  • Stickers
  • Banners
  • Backdrop
  • Posters

 

CRIPTO SPACE (Event organizer)

  • Organization
  • Local
  • Ceremonial
  • Publicity
  • Sound system
  • Lighting
  • Support staff, training and Hosters
  • Cocktail
  • Photographer & Videos

 

ACCOMPANY / COVERAGE

To follow the project, official updates and coverage of the event, access the site, crytospace.net or crytospace.com.

 

IMPORTANCE OF THE PROJECT

By saying yes to this proposal, you support the dissemination of the SmartCash project and, more precisely, you:

-           Ensures awareness of the SmartCash brand in Brazi;

-           Encourages the use of currency by individuals and entrepreneurs;

-           Encourages the strengthening of the SmartCash network by supporting the creation of new nodes.

 

LINKS

http://criptospace.net

http://criptospace.com.br

http://facebook.com/CriptoSpaceBrasil

http://criptospace.com.br/SmartCash/

 

Thanks for taking the time to read our project.

CRIPTO SPACE

result.title: SmartOnSale: Smartcash POS system with automated liquidation for merchants
result.summary: Simply, In addition to how a POS system works, SMART sent to x address gets converted and sent to x bank account. We will also build a conversion API to anticipate the amount needed to send to receive an exact fiat amount.
result.description:
TABLE OF CONTENT

1. OBJECTIVE

2. ABOUT ME

3. THE PROBLEM

4. SOLUTION - HOW

5. SOLUTION - WHAT WE ARE BUILDING (SMART ON SALE)

6. THE PICTURE AND BENEFITS

7. IMPACT TO SMARTCASH

8. IMPACT TO MERCHANTS AND BUSINESSES

9. PREPARATION AND THINGS WE HAVE DONE BEFORE NOW!

10. EXTRA THINGS INCLUDED IN SMART ON SALE

11. OUR PLANS FOR ITS ADOPTION

12. COST BREAKDOWN

13. YOUR SUPPORT

 

To create a universal Smartcash POS system with an automated liquidation to merchant’s local currency providing fast and smooth Smartcash payment for goods and services while safeguarding merchants from volatility. To empower 200 merchants in both Nigeria and Ghana with Smart on sale solution.

Simply, In addition to how a POS system works, SMART sent to x address gets converted and sent to x bank account. We will also build a conversion API to anticipate the amount needed to send to receive an exact fiat amount.

ABOUT ME
I’m Oluwatobi Akinpelu. An entrepreneur and reputable programmer with about 7 years of experience in web and mobile development. I lead the Phalanx team which won the first angelhack(http://angelhack.com/angelhack-lagos2) hackathon in conjunction with Consensys in Nigeria. I have worked for Google Developers Groups and Andela programs here in Nigeria for over 3 years. I currently work as a software engineer with Farmcrowdy – Africa’s best digital startup in Africa 2018, while also having vast experience in smart contract development, Machine learning with Firebase, Media players and live streams SDKs.

I also currently lead the forloop’s developers community in Ogun state, Nigeria, while also being part of the Blockchain community in Nigeria lead organized by reputable companies like Paxful, Seso global and uPort.

I have a solid experience in managing teams and being part of product development from start to finish. You can know more about me here: Linkedin profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/androidmaven4

THE PROBLEM
The primary reason why merchants are reluctant to accepting cryptocurrency generally is because of the volatility of cryptocurrency. A buyer could buy a good/service in a minute, pays for it using Smartcash and the next day the value of Smartcash to fiat has either high depreciation or appreciation. Merchants may lose valuable funds especially when liquidation is needed at a point when the value of Smartcash has depreciated.
We made a recent phone call survey of 50 merchants across Africa having clothing lines, restaurants, pizza shops, shopping malls and hair styling businesses to validate our hypothesis. 90% i.e 45 merchants out of 50 are willing to accept Smartcash, 42 merchants out of the 45 however raised the issue of volatility and how having to manually liquidate often could be strenuous and less efficient.
This shows that until we are able to solve the problem of crypto liquidity on behalf of the merchants, mass and genuine adoption might still be far away.
As of now

  1.    NO PLATFORM OFFERS POS SYSTEM AND SAFE GUARDS VOLATILITY.

  2.   OTHER BLOCKCHAIN ECOSYSTEM OFFERS JUST POS, no liquidation assistance.

SOLUTION

1. HOW

In other to solve the problems highlighted above, we’ve started working on a POS software which allows buyers in any country to pay for goods and services using Smartcash and merchants can choose either of the following
a. Merchants can receive Smartcash directly to their own wallet, and on that same be able to liquidate to fiat currency with just a click. A barcode will be generated which will be used to transfer the Smartcash to our address, on confirmation fiat currency will be released to the bank account provided by the merchant.
We will partner with exchange sites in both Nigeria and Ghana who will provide APIs for fast liquidation.
b. Merchants can choose to receive Smartcash directly to their own wallet at the point of sale and decides how it is being spent, liquidated or exchange at their own will. This works basically LIKE A NORMAL POS SYSTEM.

Merchants can choose to liquidate all funds or store up Smartcash at the point of sale.

It also gives database integration of all transaction taking place, so that merchants can have a log of all transactions in their own customized database starting from the fiat value and Smartcash of the good/service to be paid for, Smartcash paid, and the fiat value that was disbursed after an automated liquidation. These are useful and important to keep track of all records and for analytics purposes.

 

2. WHAT WE ARE BUILDING

We are building Smart on sale. Smart on sale is a Smartcash universal point of sale system able to safeguard merchants from volatility by providing automated liquidation. Smart on sale will be available on the web and Android.

Smart on sale, is for all types of merchants. Starting from the big shopping malls to the mobile business owners. The POS system is usable by merchants in the world, while the liquidity enablement is supported for only Nigeria and Ghana at the moment.

Merchants can simply visit or download smart on sale app, register or login the business, enter business’s payment receiving details and start receiving payments using Smartcash. Custom integration will also be available for big companies who prefer a privatized integration of transactions database.

 

THE PICTURE AND BENEFITS

Merchants do not accept smartcash because they can not easily transfer to fiat -Naira/ Cedis. Our solution will make this problem go away. We expect to sign up 200 number of merchants as a result. We are currently in talks with organizers and attendees of Cheetah Africa https://www.eventbrite.com/e/cheetah-africa-launch-fintech-and-blockchain-conference-2018-tickets-47987749651#  and many other businesses

IMPACT TO SMARTCASH
Nigeria and Ghana alone have over 200 million population and over 96% users of smartphones are on Android. Safeguarding volatility and liquidation for merchants in these areas can provide a massive adoption of Smartcash. The increased merchant acceptance of Smartcash will lead people worldwide or in accepted countries to buy and keep buying more of Smartcash on an exchange so that they can now purchase goods and services using Smartcash, therefore, leading to a massive appreciation in Smartcash’s value.

IMPACT TO MERCHANTS AND BUSINESS
Over 10 million merchants and businesses globally will be empowered by Smart on sale. Smart on sale respects your privacy. No personal information is required to set up an account. No government tax IDs or hocus pocus paperwork need be submitted. No photographs of you standing with signed documents. Just email, password, and a payment receiving details. It’s really that simple.
Merchants can now easily receive payments using Smartcash cryptocurrency without the worry of volatility. Whether in the office, shop or public transit – Payment can be made using Smartcash while safeguarding volatility!

 

PREPARATION AND THINGS WE HAVE DONE BEFORE NOW!

1. We are currently in talks with organizers and attendees of Cheetah Africa https://www.eventbrite.com/e/cheetah-africa-launch-fintech-and-blockchain-conference-2018-tickets-47987749651#  and many other businesses.

2. We've created 2 social media accounts for the purpose of media communication and documentation of the progress of SmartOnSale's project. 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/smartonsale_app

Instagram: https://instagram.com/smartonsale_app

3. I've talked with one frontend and one backend developer and they have both agreed to start work with the hiring price stated in the cost breakdown as soon as the project gets funded.

 

MERCHANTS AND BUSINESS THAT CAN USE SMART ON SALE
All business and merchants can use Smart on sale including
· Gas Stations
· Grocery Stores
· Farmers’ Markets
· Hotels
· Restaurants
· Rental Properties
· And More!
EXTRA THINGS INCLUDED IN SMART ON SALE – Analytics and more perks
A painless on-ramp for merchants, including video and text-based user-guides, online FAQ, and ongoing customer support for Smart on sale merchants. Relevant guides will be cross-posted to Blogs and press. Real-world economic data showing and tracking Smartcash’s use as a currency. Including b
How many transactions did smart on sale process this month?
How much Smartcash?
How much USD?
How many businesses?
OUR PLANS FOR ADOPTION STARTING FROM AFRICA

  1.  Marketing.

  2.  Trainings and events on Smartcash adoption across Africa.

  3.  Partnerships with SMEs.

  4.  Partnerships with Smartcash ambassadors to expand and execute adoption.

COSTS BREAKDOWN
A. Product development stage:

  1.   Hiring of front-end developer (2 months) - $2800.

  2.   Hiring of Backend developer (2months) - $3150.

  3.   UI/UX wireframing for both web and mobile and will also handle graphics designs – $750

  4.   Android developer – $3200.

  5.   Quality assessment tests (1 month) - $800.

  6.   Domain registration and hosting plan for 1year on namecheap (www.namecheap.com), including Positive SSL - $39.43

  7.   Mailchimp email Pro (3 months) - $597.

  8.   3 Hardwares for testing(Android phones and tablets of different OS versions and screen sizes): $520

B. Product testing and release preparations stage

  1.   Team setup and contractual compensations for 3 months:

1 Platform developer and technical support - $400 per month for 3 months = $1200
2 adoption advocates - $350/month/advocate for 3 months = $2100
2 customer support - $350/month/person for 3 months = $2100

  1.   Transportation costs of adoption advocates: $250.

  2.   2 laptops, work desks and landlines for customer support – $415

  3.   Internet data subscription for customer support and calls credits for 3 months - $212

  4.    Merchants training/event for adoption - $500.

    6. LEGAL - $400

result.title: Mexico City digital business summit Expo PYME
result.summary:
### Mexico City digital business summit Expo PYME 2018

The **most important** business event in Mexico City, where micro, small and medium enterprises will find support programs, public institutions, financial services to strengthen their capacities and promote its development, innovation, productivity and competitiveness.

Since the Fintech law was recently passed, this year event is target in companies, as well as public and private institutions whose economic activity is digital. As a priority, but not excluding: software and technologies, internet of things, mobile applications, cloud technology, digital marketing, web design, incubators, financial services, video games, virtual reality, traditional messaging, e-commerce, security with use of systems, electronic payment and the like.

This event will take place in Mexico City. It highlights among other cities in the country because it contributes with 35% of the national GDP in less than 1% of the territory. It is classified as a global service center, ranking 15th out of 54 cities. Similar position as Sao Paulo, Madrid and Brussels.

Two thirds of the most important companies in the country are located in Mexico City.
The event, "Expo Pymes 2018" will take place from September 7th to 9th, on the "Plaza de la Constitución" the main square in Mexico City. It will gather over 400 enterprises, 50,000 attendees are expected per day [the most crowed event in this place gathered 4 million people in a two weeks event] 
This makes the Expo an excellent opportunity to present SmartCash to Mexico,s capital business owners.

This event will allow us to have a space for direct dialogue with business people who are interested in applying technology to their own enterprises.

result.title: SmartCash on the National Week of Science and Tech in Mexico - 3000 students adoption
result.summary:
The National Science and Technology Week (SNCyT) is a forum through which millions of children and young Mexicans know the possibilities offered by the areas of science in the fields of productive activity, scientific research, and teaching.

This event is presented every year all around Mexico but this proposal will be placed in the state of Tabasco which includes 8 cities for the National Week, (Villahermosa capital, Comalcalco, Huimanguillo, Jalpa, Centla, Macuspana, Teapa y Balancán).
result.description:
https://www.conacyt.gob.mx/index.php/comunicacion/semana-nacional-de-ciencia-y-tecnologia1

Summary of the 2016 year event2 (Video)

SmartCash needs to be part of this event because we will impact students and teachers, in what blockchain technology is, what benefits it has for training students for the potential offered by technology, being at the vanguard of universities around the world and convincing them of that the adoption of technology through projects like SmartCash is a giant step towards a not too distant future.

¿Who am I?

Hi, my name is Gustavo Vargas, I live in Mexico, my background is on Industrial Engineer with a Master Degree on Business Administration and a passionate for blockchain and cryptos.

I am a member of the network of graduates of the Technological Institutes (important fact), which has more than 260 universities throughout the country, this gives me the opportunity to access the events that take place throughout the year at the Universities.

I have been working this year on several meetings, events and conferences promoting Blockchain and Smartcash to encourage the use of technology and currency for the community to grow it in Mexico.

Goal

Develop a communication strategy and adoption activities about SmartCash and Blockchain technology taking advantage of the National Week of Science and Technology impacting 3000 students and teachers in 10 university and tech centers across the southeastern part of Mexico and generate a good impress of the project to reach all the Universities in the future.

We will visit each university during the 5 days of the National Week of Science and Technology. Give out conferences two days (2 conferences to 150 each one, 300 students reached per University) and the rest of the days SmartCash will be promoted by handing out important information (Flyers and talk Face two Face). Our objective will be to invite a minimum of 30 students and kickstart a SmartCash community in each University and bring all the ideas that they have to the network as well start using SmartCash inside the University paying in the cafeteria, rent of equipment or in any idea that they have about it.

As well as invite 100 devs to be part of workshops to 25 people each one, where they will be taught to set up Smartnodes and use blockchain technology, in a later event. result.title: Adoption of Smartcash by Businesses and Conference in Nigeria
result.summary:
Nigeria will stand to have the largest Smartcash community base in Africa by holding a mega conference for Smartcash education and viral adoption of Smartcash into businesses by introducing Smartcash to hundreds of crypto enthusiast and tech/internet users in various institutions in Africa starting from Nigeria. This will help in adoption of Smartcash into businesses for buying and selling of goods and services, (Retail shops, Restaurants, Healthcare, Real estate, etc.) bringing merchants in through event set up with business owners.

 We believe in the value addition that Smartcash usecases can bring to businesses especially in a Cryptocurrency friendly economy like Africa, hence the motivation behind promoting SmartCash through education and events for massive adoption and usage in Nigeria and Africa at large.
result.description:
The discussion on Cryptocurrency in Africa today cannot be over emphasized, it was informed by google that Africa recorded the highest search request on Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency in late 2017 and early 2018, about 43% search on Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency was from Africa with Nigeria holding the highest proportion of it. Nigeria being the largest populated country in Africa, presents to be a fertile base for adoption of innovative technologies, pregnated with millions of youth that are interested in internet businesses and open to technology that present to them a way of making money online.


Educating student and community on Smartcash platform through conference and effective workshop activities in Nigeria in various institutions will serve as a great way of creating new user base and community base for SmartCash in Nigeria and Africa at large. This will allow crypto driven individuals that got enlightened through our conference and meetups to start using SmartCash as a medium of exchange and a way of making money online through Smartcash Reward system and Smartcash Nodes. Business owner meetups will also serve as a massive way for SmartCash adoption to be used as payment for goods and services.

GOALS

  1. To create a large SmartCash community base in Africa
  2. To introduce SmartCash to a minimum of 200 business owners and merchants in Nigeria. They would begin using Smartcash as a medium of exchanges in their businesses and would be listed on find.smartcash.cc.
  3. Training individuals with vast knowledge of Blockchain to become smartcash ambassadors for continuous merchant adoption;
    Participants would be trained on how to benefit from smartcash reward system, set up SmartCash wallets and also how they can be part of Smartcash social activities to contribute to the development of Smartcash community. Individuals with vast knowledge on Blockchain and Smartcash services will be trained on how to continuously onboard merchants and businesses for the adoption of Smartcash as their payment means. Below is the planned activity for them.

The event would entail talks on:

o Blockchain & cryptocurrency,
o How to download and setup SmartCash wallets
o Buying and selling of Smartcash
o Understanding the Smartcash Reward system
o Smartcash Mining.
o Smartcash Rewards.
o Smartcash Smart Nodes

o Smartcash for Merchants and Businesses

a. Presentation on how Local and major business to adopt SmartCash as their payment means.
b. Advantages of using SmartCash for their daily transactions like payments of goods and services, payment of fees/bills, receiving remittances and many more
c. Training individuals with vast knowledge on Blockchain to become Smartcash ambassador for continuous merchant adoption.

BUDGET

Budget for Printing:
Shirts - $12 per shirt for 100 T- shirts = $1,200
Banner $40 * 3 = $120
Stickers $2 * 200 = $400
Pamphlet $1 * 200 = $200

result.title: SMARTCASH present and COCMUN2018 "Innovation and technology for the new gblobal governance"
result.summary:
Smart Cash Community! With this proposal we will increase the presence of Smart Cash in Venezuela in a work @SMARTCASHLARA, through a representation of smartCash as a premium sponsor in the event "COCMUN 2018:" Innovation and Technology for the new global governance "to be carried out in the city of Barquisimeto-Venezuela.

The objective of this proposal is to introduce SmartCash to approximately 550 people, increase the number of new portfolios downloaded, the number of people familiar with SmartCash and the number of merchants who accept SmartCash as a means of payment.

This event is a meeting place for entrepreneurs, students, academics and social leaders where @smartcashlara will be able to promote our community in all the programmed activities in COCMUN 2018.
result.description:
WHAT IS THE EVENT ABOUT?

COCMUN2018 will be this year from September 19 to 22 in the city of Barquisimeto-Venezuela, this event are organized by the non-profit organization COCMUN Venezuela, it is one of the most prestigious meetings in Venezuela that brings together the Chambers Federations trade and industries of the region, representatives of 12 universities in the country, more than 25 StarUp and dozen social organizations.

Mong the activities program of the event is a cycle of 9 conferences on disruptive technologies and cryptocurrencies, a fair of social and business ventures, a round of business where the @SmartCashLara team will expanded its presence in each of these activities to position the SmartCash brand.

During its execution, the event has a broad coverage of traditional and alternative media of comunication, allowing the attendance of 550 people directly, more observers and the public that follow the event through the media. You can learn more about the event through theirs accounts:

https://www.instagram.com/cocmunvzla/?hl=es

www.cocmun2018.wixsite.com/cocmunvzla 

https://www.criptotendencias.com/criptoeventos/realizaran-el-primer-modelo-onu-disruptivo-de-venezuela-en-barquisimeto/

HOW TO GROW THE SMARTCASH COMMUNITY?

We hope that with this proposal @SmartCashLara will be present with a stand inside the event of COCMUN 2018, during the 4 days of it, sharing with the assistants in general, talking about the benefits of SmartCash, helping people to download the wallet of SmartCash, delivering advertising material, networking with business sectors for the use of SmartCash as a means of paymant and secure investment.

In addition, we will have a presentation of @SmartCashLara that will have 25 minutes during the congress for the firts day of the event of COCMUN 2018, our cryptocurrency will be promote and forum attendees will be able to follow step by step the downloading of their wallet.

In this same order of ideas, this presentation will be of great help to launch and promote the SmartUniversity project to the public, a virtual plataform of the SmartCash family for the financial education with accreditation from Venezuela universities, the implementation it is estimated for january 2019.

HOW DOES BEING PRESENT AT COCMUN2018 CONTRIBUTE TO OUR SMARTCASH COMMUNITY?

As participants in COCMUN 2018 SmartCash has the right to:

  • Conducet a 25-minutes SmartCash conference in fornt of the 550 people attending the event.
  • Placement of a stand Type A, of 2.40X2.40X2.20 meters that includes: awning, table witch tablecloths and 5 chairs, stood in the background, bookshelf, power outlet, porjector with screen and drinking water. Placed in the premium zone of the fair of business ventures.
  • Mentions in the deneral publicity of the event in the different 2.0 networks.
  • Advertising spots in the development of the event.
  • Mentions on the two local television channels that cover the event.
  • Distribution of material P.O.P.
  • Full access to entrepreneurship  and the business round, which includes the lobby, lunch with entrepreneurs and represnetatives of StartUp, with what is intended to socialize to promote the use of SmartCash in their stores.

In counterpart for the spaces given to SmartCash, a SmartCash collaboration will carried out for the realization of the event that consists in granting the attendees:

  • 100 SmartCash folders for the assitants of the university sector to the debate rooms, considering that there are 200 participants in the discussion rooms, SmartCash would be promotiong 50% of the required folders.
  • 5 shirts and 5 SmartCash cap for COCMUN 2018 executives, it was agreed with COCMUN Venezuela's board of directors that offers SmartCash sponsorship to the event, the media tours and public presentations beforehand and during the event the organizers will wear the SmartCash shirts.
  • The rental of the stand must be made to the organizers of the event.

NOW SURELY YOU WILL ASK: WHO IS MAKING THIS PROPOSAL?

my name is Wilmer Canelon https://www.instagram.com/wilmer.ac/  i am an economics student and i am deeply passionate about Blockchain technology for its great benefits.

For about 3 years, i organized academic events, and since February 2018 i started to give some workshops on this technology and cryptocurrencies in the universities of the central-western region of Venezuela.

I meet SmarCash in May of 2018 and then with a group of colleagues from the university, we were delighted with the project and vision of the SmartCash community, for the potencial to consolidate itself not only as a cryptocurrency, but as a toll for transformation socioeconomics regional and global in the coming years.

For this reason, we created https://www.instagram.com/smartcashlara/  and did our first MeetUp at the Faculty of Economics of the Centroccidental University Lisandro Alvarado of Venezuela. Among the 4 founding members we bought t-shirts and printed some posters, we were very excited because the owner of the cafeteria of the university went to the activity (who had no idea of the benefits of our crypto) began to accept SmartCash as a means of payment.

one month later we will hold our 2nd MeetUp with the summer students in the Administration and Accounting Faculty of UCLA Venezuela, having an excellent receptivity of the students, all created their wallet and were given SmartCash so that they could try the transactions with the cryptocurrencies it was a genius experience!

An important web portal reviewed the activity: https://www.criptotendencias.com/criptoeventos/realizan-2do-meetup-de-smartcash-en-lara/

We have achieved an alliance with the financial consultancy Bitcorp with presence in Venezuela, Spain, the Dominican Republic and the United States to promote SmartCash amoung its customers http://bitcorpve.com/blog/2018/smartcard who will also attend COCMUN 2018.

We belive faithfully in the need to promote this cryptocurrency in Venezuela and the world, we are convinced that by participating in COCMUN2018 we will have an important impact in the region in which we would like to continue working in the expansion of the SmartCash community.

this 4-days the event is divided as follows:

  • SEPTEMBER 19th, 2018. wednesday: Conference Cycle "Disruptive Ideas". With an estimated participation of approximately 550 people. it will be held at the Juares theater of Barquisimeto, wich has a maximun capacity of 705 people. there will be 9 presentations on the following topics:
         - Emerging Digital Markets.

             - The Blockchain revolution.

             - General aspects of Cryptocurrencies.

             - SmartCash, a financial instrument and the new Global Governance.

             - Innovation and entrepreneurship.

             - Disruptive technologies in international organizations.

             - Socio-cultural and educational approach of fintech.

  • SEPTEMBER 20, 2018. Thursday: discussions rooms for students.Through 7 discussion rooms, about 200 younng people of 20 educational institutions from different parts of Venezuela will simulate the world leaders in the political and business sector, raising prospects about the challanges and opportunities that technological innovation and SmarCash provide us in a globalized world, with the ultimate goal of visualize SmartCash as an effective, reliable and sustainable alternative in the different proposed contexts.
  • SEPTEMBER 21, 2018. Friday: Entrepreneurship Fair and SmartCash Business Round. With more than 25 StartUPs, a dozen of Non-Governmental Organizations, and the two main commence and industry Chambers Federations ofthe region, all of them will be able to experience the SmartCash benefits while exposing their initiatives, generating a feedback that will nourish the business exchanges in a win-win relationship.
  • SEPTEMBER 22, 2018. Saturday:  Interectaive public polices forum. For the closing of the event a forum will be held in order to provide general feedback on everything contributed during the previous days. In addition, through a strong activity in social networks, participants will be able to interact on their experiences, and special guests in a round panel will talk about the use of SmartCash and Blockchain technology within public policies.

The required budget is $990 destinet to the following:

  • STAND: 1 stand of 2.40x240.220 meters, wich stopped in the background, a table with tablecloth, 5 chairs, power socket, and shelf. Daily rental $50 for 4 days. = $200
  • COINS OF SMARTCASH: SmartCash to give the first users who approach and download the wallet with our advice, and can make small demostration transactions during the event.= $80
  • PUBLICITY 2.0: promotion on socual networks such as instagram, twitter, facebook, and other websites related to the themes so that the impact of SmartCash in the event reaches a greater number of people. = $100
  • BANNER: printing of two banners of 1.50x0.90 meters each. = $60
  • 500 ADVERTISING: SmartCash advertising flyers for general attendees. = $50
  • 10 SHIRTS: SmartCash shirts for the 5 SmartCash volunteers and 5 for the organizers of the event. = $150
  • 10 CAP: SmartCash cap for the 5 SmarCash volunteers and 5 for the organizers of the event.= $100
  • 100 FOLDERS: SmarCash folders for students participating in the discussion rooms, as part of SmartCash sponsorship of the event. = $150
  • ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES: administrative expenses. = $100

TOTAL: $990

detail of budget in: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1YUn20tu0m0KB8t2neWE7IXywfslkRkSi

With this proposal, the doors of the community are open to a region with an important rate of commercialization of goods and services, due to the fact that it is a node of terrestrial communications at the national level; besides an important and active academic sector, which is the engine of any innovacion.

By supporting this proposal, it will guarantee an incursion into a new market for SmartCash; and us the satisfation of being part of this experience, where innovation, technology is the spirit of the event for the construction of a new global governance.

result.title: SmartCash for Newly Admitted Students of The University of Cape Coast (UPDATED)
result.summary:
Having consulted some members of the SmartHive, I have revised my previous proposal #507 and I hope it meets the kind consideration of all. The previous proposal didn’t pass the test of voting with a little difference of 2.65% (50.71% voted No while 48.06% voted Yes).  In an attempt to act on the suggestions of some sampled Smarties, I have restructured the failed proposal hoping that You give me the chance to contribute my quota to this incentivized decentralized community. 
This is the link to my old proposal ( https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/smartcash-for-newly-admitted-students-of-the-university-of-cape-coast-updated/5009/4)  

I aim at contributing to the ultimate goal of massive adoption and usability by introducing SmartCash to newly admitted students of the 2018/2019 academic year. These fresh students represent a ‘Virgin Publics’ and do not probably have any idea about cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. It serves as an opportunity to introduce SmartCash to them as they start their journeys to getting their first degree. 
This is obviously not a new idea to this community but I believe that even existing ideas can prove viable and significant when introduced well to new markets. This is known as Market Development which proves beneficial as a growth strategy. This proposal shall be executed with a budget of $1302
result.description:
Who am I?

I am Alhassan Abdul Basit on Facebook ((https://web.facebook.com/alhassan.abdulbasit.77) and @Mr. SmartCash on the Discord community. I am a Bachelor of Commerce graduand and a SmartCash advocate in the University of Cape Coast. Just like everyone here, I believe that SmartCash is the future and a real example of a 21st century currency because of its incentivized and decentralized nature. I also believe that students should be our target if we really want to precipitate the massive adoption and invasion of SmartCash as a generally accepted medium of exchange.

My vision is to see SmartCash being adopted as a store of value and medium of exchange inside the University of Cape Coast and beyond. I seek an opportunity from community members to achieve this vision.

What are the primary revisions to the old proposal #507?

In the previous proposal we aimed at organizing five (5) different workshops at hall levels within the University to educate fresh students. In this current one we aim at organizing just one big workshop to educate our target audience. There is a significant cost reduction from $2940 to $1302 representing 55.71% reduction in the previous budget. We are going for a bigger venue this time and more work will be done on publicity so as to involve as many fresh students as possible.

What’s our aim?

Basically, our goal is to introduce SmartCash to a new set of publics (Fresh University Students) through a workshop/seminar. If approved, this shall further increase the size of the SmartCash community and aid the massive adoption and usability of SmartCash. Just like me, many students are ready to learn and embrace any idea that will lead to financial freedom. 

Execution of this project will trigger the invasion of SmartCash as a generally accepted medium of exchange and also educate students on all the benefits and merits of using SmartCash against other cryptocurrencies.

About the University of Cape Coast

The University of Cape Coast (https://www.ucc.edu.gh/aboutus/about-ucc) is one of the largest tertiary institutions in Ghana with an incremental annual enrollment status of about 15,650 students. The university, which is five kilometers west of Cape Coast, is on a hill overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. It operates on two campuses: the Southern Campus (Old Site) and the Northern Campus (New Site). The University is very large with geographically dispersed students.

The good news is that most University students have laptops and smart phones and are actively involved in conversations on social media platforms such as WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. Also, First year students reside in Halls with wireless internet connection which creates room for all-day internet connectivity. These serve as opportunities to introduce cryptocurrencies especially SmartCash to these fresh students since they have the needed devices to join the ‘Smart Train’.

Action Plan

 A workshop/seminar shall be organized inside the University community to educate Students about SmartCash. The education and training outline for participants is detailed below:

  • At the workshop, all participants will be given a general education on the Blockchain technology and crypto currencies. They will be lectured on SmartCash and given practical training on how to set up Smart Wallets and its features, how to send/receive SMARTS, buying/selling SMARTS on local exchanges and the merits of choosing SmartCash over other cryptocurrencies. Participants will also be educated on why they should invest in SmartCash with respect to SmartRewards and SmartHive projects.

Timeline for the project

This project shall be executed on 22nd September, 2018. 

Proposal Budget:

Transportation   $115

Hiring Venue for Workshop  $255

Refreshments for all Participants  $150

SmartCash T-shirts   $300

Communication, Publicity, data calls  $90

Photographer/Cameraman $150

Tokens for Participants in SMARTS   $50

Banner for Workshop   $130

Sub-total  $1240

Contingency (5%*1240) $62

TOTAL   $1302

We are therefore asking for $1302 or equivalent number of SMARTS to execute this project.

Justification

We shall make every necessary reports, photos and videos available to members of this community.

result.title: Conference “Crypto revolution and SmartCash” in Europe - Let's make the largest SmartCash event in Eastern Europe and boost adoption.
result.summary: The main goal of the project is the organization of conference called "SmartCash and crypto future (freedom)". The event will bring together the blockchain and crypto communities in the region and it will be held in the Bulgarian capital Sofia - where the most people interested in blockchain in the country are located. The host and lead organizer is Startup Factory - a non-profit organization in public benefit committed to developing the entrepreneurial ecosystem and IT sector. The format of the conference is a mixture of presentations, workshops and inspirational talks.  There will be panels for techies and non-techies. The main focus will be SmartCash, presented as an alternative to the fiat currencies and developing the local SmartCash community.
result.description:
The proposal aims at promoting SmartCash in Bulgaria - a country with established and thriving IT community in Eastern Europe. This nation is the homeland of some of the most talented software engineers in the world who are naturally fascinated by the emerging blockchain technology and decentralized applications. Currently, there is an exponential interest in cryptocurrencies, investment opportunities in tokens and trading platforms. The people in Bulgaria are eager to explore new ways of executing transactions based on distributed ledger technology and to re-engineer and remodel existing processes in more secure and more secure environment.

The lack of transparency in public sector is a recognized problem and the financial institutions in Bulgaria charge some of the highest fees and interest rates in Europe. The citizens are looking for alternative platforms to make payments and get loans. Peer-to-peer lending services are gradually growing in terms of popularity and market adoption, laying the foundation of more disruptive fintech companies. Regularly organized crypto meetups attract more and more participants and the members of online thematic groups exploded in the last year.

These trends and the general enthusiasm create the demand of events presenting new blockchain products, crypto currencies and services built on top of decentralized platforms. There are prerequisites for a warm welcoming of conferences focused on these topics and this proposal sets the scene for initiatives that will increase the awareness about SmartCash and will accelerate its adoption in Europe.

The main goal of the project is the organization of conference called "SmartCash and crypto future (freedom)". The event will bring together the blockchain and crypto communities in the region and it will be held in the Bulgarian capital Sofia - where the most people interested in blockchain in the country are located. The host and lead organizer will be Startup Factory - a non-profit organization in public benefit committed to developing the entrepreneurial ecosystem and IT sector. The format of the conference is a mixture of presentations, workshops and inspirational talks. There will be panels for techies and non-techies. The main focus will be SmartCash, presented as an alternative to the fiat currencies and developing the local SmartCash community.

 

Organizer and relevant experience

Startup Factory is a Nonprofit organisation that supports blockchain startups and it is one of the first organizations in Europe focused on the practical applications of distributed ledger technologies. The mission of Startup Factory is to develop communities of entrepreneurs and developers who are building the next products on top of blockchain and decentralized networks and business models. The NGO is a regular host of events that present new blockchains, cryptocurrencies and emerging technologies.
Read more about the team behind Startup Factory, as well as our organization's TV appearances and interviews here: [https://startupfactory.bg/en/about/](https://startupfactory.bg/en/about/)

At Startup Factory we have a support team of dedicated people for event organizations with experience. Our network of mentors and ambassadors spreads throughout some of the most recognized tech companies in Eastern Europe.
Thousands of people attend our events hackathons and summits and we believe we can bring that power towards a strong SmartCash local community.



Main Goals

* Raising awareness about SmartCash.
* Showcase SmartCash to local businesses as new way to receive payments and make B2C and B2B transactions.
* Promote SmartCash as an investment opportunity.
* Attract local developers and people to the SmartCash community.

 

Agenda

Proposed event date - 27 October 2018.
Proposed event location: Conference center in Sofia, Bulgaria.

  • The Blockchain
  • Cryptocurrencies explainedTypes: decentralized, centralized, community driven
    • Properties of the different crypto currencies (smart contract, instapay, …)
    • Risks of cryptocurrencies
  • The financial aspect
    • How does it work
    • Investing in crypto
    • Exchanges
  • What is SmartCash and its properties
    • SmartCash for businesses.
    • SmartCash for investors (Stacking, Mining, SmartNodes).
    • SmartCash Community (Opportunities for SmartCash developers, Community channels, SmartHive)
  • Demonstrating transactions between consumers and businesses using SmartCash.

 

Stages of the project and justification of the budget:

  • Announcement
  • Promotion of the event to the target groups (regional businesses, crypto and IT communities, software developers, entrepreneurs and investors).
  • Preparation of the event (logistics, printed materials, venue, online marketing and advertising, catering).
  • Recording and distributing materials from the event.
  • Distributing tokens among the participants.

Additional Thoughts

We believe that Europe could be the place where SmartCash can get mainstream traction. There are many SmartCash proposals in Latin America and Africa, but not that many SmartCash events in Europe. This is why we believe that SmartCash has a big future in Europe if we can have more local exposure.

Recently a major Bulgarian bank went bankrupt and a many people and corporations lost a lot of money both in Bulgaria and in Europe.
Read more about it here:
https://www.forbes.com/sites/francescoppola/2015/10/05/bulgarias-failed-corpbank-the-former-owners-story/#1690c4f50d7c
Events like these are a good opportunity for people to realize the full potential of cryptocurrencies.

result.title: **Smartcash will participate in the Great American Capital Event of Culture-2018 to expand its proposal**
result.summary:
Summary

The state of Anzoategui has been chosen as the American Capital of Culture 2018, a recognition that will be thanks to the coverage of the Oriente Emprende organization, and sponsored by the group called Professionals of Here, a project developed thanks to the United States Embassy.

Therefore, on September 16 we will be present at the Great East Emprende event, with the intention of promoting and spreading to people and companies, the tools offered by the SmartCash currency, since we believe that the time is right to introduce this cryptocurrency in Venezuela due to the instability that occurs in the country with fiat money, for which it will be beneficial in commercial businesses.

This activity is an opportunity for 70 entrepreneurs who will have 60 stands, so it is estimated that it will be visited by more than 1000 people.
Why be part of this event?

Puerto La Cruz will be the city that will host the Great Event of the American Capital of Culture 2018, planned by Oriente Emprende, which will take place on September 16 at the Paradise Hotel.

We are sure that it is a golden opportunity to continue promoting the SmartCash currency and we calculate a broad willingness to the public to provide the following:

*Introduce yourself about SmartCash.

*Receive entrepreneurs, merchants and entrepreneurs, where we will provide information, advice and how to implement SmartCash in their establishments as a method of payment.

Anzoategui has been chosen as the American Capital of Culture 2018, according to the International Bureau of Cultural Capitals.

This organization, created in 1998, aims to promote inter-American integration from the cultural sphere, contribute to a better knowledge among the peoples of the American continent, respecting their national and regional diversity, while highlighting the common cultural heritage.

It has the recognition of the Latin American and European parliaments. Antena 3 Internacional and Discovery Networks Latin America / U.S. Hispanic are the two official television channels of the American Capital of Culture.

Anzoátegui will take over from the city of Mérida (Yucatán, Mexico).
Starting from this premise and reaffirming constant commitments with the American people, the event is an important initiative in recent years for the state, so that entrepreneurs, entrepreneurs and communities can consider the use and development of business solutions in a new economy based in the technology.

In the cultural event it promises a great scope since it will consist of conferences in the field of entrepreneurship, parade of regional designers, recreation area for children, shows of ventures in all its modalities, stage productions, live music, among others.

The event will last 11 hours, it is estimated the presence of more than 1000 people, among them, businessmen, merchants and entrepreneurs from the north of the state, from 10:00 am to 9:00 pm .

With the aforementioned, we can contact people interested in our service, especially that we will make the first approach with people from different specialties.

In our case, the SmartCash team will have five members, able to take advantage of the participation of attendees with the same interest in one place to illustrate the benefits promised by digital money today.

Making sure i Dish out a quality taste with three or more proposals

The aim of this project is to create a

 - and **"lets"** all promote it to the world

 

Those songs you listened to earlier, [my first second and third smartcash songs] are good but lacks professional production and video production. -

 ROAD MAPS 

Since the project is a tough one and hasn't be done in the crypto space before or it is rare. 

I will break each Road maps into three proposals.

Meaning anyone can create a proposal to promote the Smartcash theme song on any medium of their choice they think they are capable of handling, if this promotional proposal for this theme song is carried out successfully for each countries and regions by everyone that created that proposal - Creating a smart awareness becomes alot more easier than our imaginations - Imagine if smartcash Theme song becomes everyone's favorite song to sing all over the world?

-Imagine if crypto users fancy that songs and took to use it on a daily, we call that a stress free promotion as it has been accepted by everyone involved not only in the smart community but lovers of crypto projects all around, maybe because of its musical contents and presentations, What if an award is given to the song as the best ever cryptocurrency song trending world wide, what do you imagine the impacts will be, since anyone can create a proposal to promote this theme song in their own way. 

- we never may know - this might make smartcash more unique than other projects and gives it a much more better value.

**Time to make smartcash greater like always** ??

 

PREVIOUSLY DONE SONGS FOR CRYPTO PROJECTS 

I have done few tunes for crypto projects, like Eos blockchain steemit,steemgigs, whaleshares.io etc and have been used severally by bloggers and vloggers. 

whaleshares.io is sharing platform fork out of steemit.

FUNDS BREAK DOWN

I will be working with multiple producers in order to perfect this song.from voice couch to beat producers,voice recorders,Mixing and so on

 SOME FAQs

1,ain't you a producer? why cant you produce the song and keep the funds all for your self. 

 

Ans- yes I am a producer, and have my own field of production and I take it you've listened to all songs i did on my own , they are good songs but my mini studio lacks some major items and musical instruments that makes songs looks to the taste of professionalism we need as a world wide song. 

 

 

2, So smartcash community will be funding you for your contents too, how are you helping the dream and the community? 

Ans: i did songs for smartcash that most of you might not have heard. i did it willingly for the love of the community like most of you who know me do know how passionate i am to the project. 

the contents of this song "All over the world" will be mine 90 percent lyrics but technically a good song isn't done by one person, they will be a lot of reviews by many producers, most would want me to pay for their time,and i have to cause i know what i want. at the end of it all, i might not have any USD left for my self as the content creator. by the productivity of the song and the lyrics with efforts of gurus outside the scene, you definitely see the unique works done by me and any producers that work with me. 

 

3} Too much cooks spoils the broth.

ans- In music that's not true, the more creative and talented people involved in that musical project,the more creativeness,awesome the record looks.
