result.title: Safemart - Smartcash’s instant automated liquidation platform for merchants which can be integrated with SmartPay and used standalone.
result.summary: A simple and fast way for merchants to liquidate their Smartcash to local bank account. Implementable with SmartPay or can be used standalone. Smartcash sent to X address gets converted and sent to Y local bank account immediately. Kindly watch the video provided in the number (8) section of this proposal.
result.description:
TABLE OF CONTENT:

  1.  SUMMARY

  2.  OBJECTIVES

  3.  ABOUT ME

  4.  THE PROBLEM

  5.  EFFECT OF THE PROBLEM ON MERCHANTS

  6.  SOLUTION – HOW

  7.  SOLUTION – WHAT ( INTRODUCING SAFEMART)

  8.  PICTORIAL VIEWS OF THE SOLUTION.

  9.  HOW IT CAN BE INTEGRATED INTO SMARTPAY
  10. WHY A STANDALONE VERSION IS NECESSARY
  11. HOW IT’S DIFFERENT AND BETTER THAN ANY OTHER EXISTING LIQUIDATING PLATFORMS LIKE PAYTOMAT.
  12. IMPACT TO SMARTCASH COMMUNITY
  13. IMPACT TO MERCHANTS AND BUSINESSES IN AFRICA
  14. A STEP ABOVE SMARTCASH COMPETITORS LIKE DASH AND PIVX
  15. WHAT WE HAVE DONE IN PREPARATION.
  16. ADOPTION PLANS
  17. COST BREAKDOWNS.
  18. F.A.Q (FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

SUMMARY
A simple and fast way for merchants to liquidate their Smartcash to local bank account. Implementable with SmartPay or can be used standalone. Smartcash sent to X address gets converted and sent to Y local bank account immediately.

Kindly watch the video provided in the number (8) section of this proposal.

2. OBJECTIVES
To create an automated liquidation for merchant’s local currency providing volatility-proof application for merchants.
Simply, Merchants receives payment using SmartPay or Smartcard, opens SafeMart app or website, sends SMART to X address using barcode or manual input, the equivalent value of Smartcash sent to X address will IMMEDIATELY be sent to Y bank account.
KYC validation will be required for merchants to gain access for liquidation, and also for them to provide the bank accounts they wish to receive their payment to.

ABOUT ME
I’m Oluwatobi Akinpelu. An entrepreneur and reputable programmer with about 7 years of experience in web and mobile development. I lead the Phalanx team which won the first angelhack hackathon in conjunction with Consensys in Nigeria. I have worked for Google Developers Groups and Andela programs here in Nigeria for over 3 years. I currently work as a software engineer with Farmcrowdy – Africa’s best digital startup in Africa 2018, while also having vast experience in smart contract development, Machine learning with Firebase, Media players and live streams SDKs.
I also currently lead the forloop’s developers community in Ogun state, Nigeria, while also being part of the Blockchain community in Nigeria lead organized by reputable companies like Paxful, Seso global and uPort.
I have a solid experience in managing teams and being part of product development from start to finish. You can know more about me here: Linkedin profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/androidmaven

4. THE PROBLEM
The primary reason why merchants are reluctant to accepting cryptocurrency generally is because of the volatility of cryptocurrency. A buyer could buy a good/service in a minute, pays for it using Smartcash and the next day the value of Smartcash to fiat changes. Merchants may lose valuable funds especially when liquidation is needed at a point when the value of Smartcash has depreciated. Majority of these merchants are not knowledgeable on how exchange sites works and having to go through that process is definitely A BIG TURN OFF as compared to them continuing accepting fiat.
We made a recent phone call survey of 50 merchants across Africa having clothing lines, restaurants, pizza shops, shopping malls and hair styling businesses to validate our hypothesis. 90% i.e 45 merchants out of 50 are willing to accept Smartcash, 42 merchants out of the 45 however raised the issue of volatility and how having to manually liquidate often could be strenuous and less efficient.
This shows that until we are able to solve the problem of crypto liquidity on behalf of the merchants, mass and genuine adoption might still be far away.

5. EFFECT OF THE PROBLEM
Smartcash adoption for merchants in Africa will require a gradual process. An entry strategy is first as a means of payment, and then as a private bank.
A larger population of businesses in Africa are the SMEs i.e. small scale and medium enterprises who are not yet accustomed to cryptocurrency. For these businesses to consider a new and better alternatives of what they are used to – there is need to provide a simple, easy and fast way to accept this new currency, ensure they don’t lose value of it due to volatility and can easily get this same equivalent of cryptocurrency to their bank account.


Existing most widely used way of liquidation in Africa
(1) SMARTCASH IN WALLET –> (2) SMARTCASH IN EXCHANGE SITE -> (3) TRADE FOR BTC/ETH -> (4) GOES TO ESCROW -> LOCAL CURRENCY SENT TO BANK ACCOUNT.


What Safemart do.
(1) SMARTCASH IN ANY WALLET -> (2) SEND SMART TO X ADDRESS -> (3) LOCAL CURRENCY SENT TO BANK ACCOUNT.

 

6. SOLUTION - HOW
To create a simple, easy platform whereby,

  KYC of these businesses will be made – to ensure only merchants have 24/7 access to automated and instant liquidation.

  A smooth interface where validated merchants can input the amount of SMARTCASH they want to liquidate and the bank details.

  A check out page having barcode and manual payment address is being instantly generated.

  As soon as the payment is confirmed in the block, the equivalent value of SMART sent to the local currency is instantly sent to the merchant’s given bank details.

  A receipt of this transaction logged for users history, and a copy sent to the provided email address.

  Support for merchants to handle enquiries and complaints should any arises.

7. SOLUTION – WHAT
We are building Safemart, a simple, easy and instant automated liquidation of Smartcash to safeguard merchants in Africa from volatility. Safemart will be available on both web and android platform as standalone – and is also being built in a way which can be implemented and plugged into the SmartPay app. Safemart will be developed firstly for Nigeria and Ghana, with time be extended to other countries.

With a few-clicks merchants can easily convert their Smartcash to local currency directly to their designated bank account.

8. PICTORIAL VIEWS OF THE SOLUTION
Here is a short video explaining the integration of Safemart with SmartPay - This is a working UI design: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_TqDRL7bMx4

Disclaimer:

(1) The app represented in this video is only meant to explain how the integration with SmartPay is. It does not cover the entirety of the Safemart project for the mobile app (standalone) or web version which will be developed as soon as the voting passes.

(2) As we work closely with the SmartPay developers, certain design patterns for integration with SmartPay may still be reviewed and changed. 

 

 

9. HOW IT CAN BE INTEGRATED INTO SMARTPAY (Android).
After the app have been developed and tested working, we plan to work closely with the SmartPay developers in which SafeMart can be available as a library. After payment has been received using SmartPay or Smartcard -> A button added to the SmartPay (called e.g liquidate) -> Safemart library is been fired up and handles the rest of liquidation. Kindly see the video above for a visual aid

10. WHY A STANDALONE VERSION IS NECESSARY
Merchants can receive payment in diverse ways different from using SmartPay and Smartcard, it could be from a private transfer to merchants Smartcash wallet or existing Smartcash available in exchange sites. An easy way to get these funds in other wallets other received using SmartPay, is to provide a standalone website/app where they could send the SMART to, and receive local currency instantly.

11 HOW IT’S DIFFERENT AND BETTER THAN ANY OTHER EXISTING LIQUIDATING PLATFORMS LIKE PAYTOMAT.

  1.   Paytomat is not built to be plugged into Smartcash’s SmartPay application.

  2.   Target market is not optimized for S.M.Es in Africa especially in Nigeria and Ghana.

  3.   Paytomat will require you banking Smartcash using their platform to liquidate, Safemart does not store Smartcash.

  4.   Safemart provides instant liquidation for the countries supported per time, while it will take longer time for Paytomat to complete liquidation.

  5.   Safemart will include Smartcash’s brand to its design, Paytomat does not.

  6.   Use flow of liquidation is quite different, for Safemart is so much easier and straight forward.

Merchants do not accept smartcash because they can not easily transfer to fiat -Naira/ Cedis. Our solution will make this problem go away. We expect to sign up 100 number of merchants as a result. We are currently in talks with organizers and attendees of Cheetah Africa https://www.eventbrite.com/e/cheetah-africa-launch-fintech-and-blockchain-conference-2018-tickets-47987749651#1 and many other businesses

12. IMPACT TO SMARTCASH COMMUNITY
Nigeria and Ghana alone have over 200 million population and over 95% users of smartphones are on Android. Safeguarding volatility and liquidation for merchants in these areas can provide a massive adoption of Smartcash. The increased merchant acceptance of Smartcash will lead people worldwide or in accepted countries to buy and keep buying more of Smartcash on an exchange so that they can now purchase goods and services using Smartcash, therefore, leading to a massive appreciation in Smartcash’s value.

13. IMPACT TO MERCHANTS AND BUSINESS IN AFRICA
Thousands of merchants and businesses in Africa will be empowered by Safemart. Safemart respects your privacy. No government tax IDs or hocus pocus paperwork need be submitted. Merchants can now easily receive payments using Smartcash cryptocurrency without the worry of volatility.

14 A STEP ABOVE SMARTCASH COMPETITORS LIKE DASH AND PIVX

It is not a news to say there are existing major competitors like Dash and PIVX who may be closely monitoring the affairs of Smartcash. Both competitors all have their own POS systems, but None of them has grabbed hold of this technology that provides simple, easy and instant liquidation yet, due to no one raising proposals like this, lack of expertise etc. Enabling this technology will be one more step above Dash and PIVX.

15. WE HAVE DONE IN PREPARATION.
1. My team and I have the technical expertise to build this, and since the inception of positive reviews on the PRE-proposal we have started working on the general components like the intro, login and signups, including mock-up for integration with SmartPay as seen in the video link above. 


2. We had a meeting with the financial inclusion companies that will enable disburse the payments to local currencies for merchants like Flutterwave(https://flutterwave.com/) and Paystack (https://paystack.com/), which resulted positive.


3. Meeting with a lawyer who will handle all legal issues.


Building this project will require us starting from own locality where we have immediate access to merchants which is Nigeria, however, with time we will extend to other African countries and then to other continents. But we need to start first.

WHAT WE NEED.
Community support: we need the backing of the community we want to promote.
Funding: Funding to proceed to make the project work.
Strategic bits of advice for execution.

16. ADOPTION PLANS

  1. Marketing.

  2. Trainings and events on Smartcash adoption across Africa.

  3. Partnerships with SMEs.

  4. Partnerships with Smartcash ambassadors to expand and execute adoption.

17. COST BREAKDOWN

  1.  Hiring of 1 (one) backend developer for 2 months. - $2900

This is the major need for a working Safemart: to handle KYC registration and login authentication to database, implementation of Smartcash value to the country’s currency conversion rate, auto dynamic address generation, receiving of SMARTCASH, auto validating of transactions, highly secured disbursement of funds, transactional log of all transactions, email receipts to merchants, systems security measurements e.t.c.

  1.  Hiring of 1(one) Frontend developer for 2 months – $2600

It’s a complex task to make complex functionalities looks simple: To create all front-end web pages (material design and responsive).

  1.  UI/UX Wireframing for both Android and Web and graphic designs- $750

To have a consistent look, a material and well-crafted design for both desktop, mobile and android view is highly required. Logo creation and other graphic needs.

  1.  Android developer (2 months) - $3200

(a) From a recent study, Android phones comprise of 95% of smart phones in Nigeria and Ghana, and internet usage has over 60% through the applications over web. A well-functioning, high standard android app version of Safemart is obviously important.
(b) Integration of Safemart with SmartPay android app requires android development aspect. Both for standalone and SmartPay integration.

  1.  Quality Assessment tests - $700

Many times before apps are released for testing, it needs to be tested for different user use patterns, standards, errors and bugs, design pattern consistency tests, speed tests e.t.c. This is an imperative aspect of production as any error after production can be costly.
6. Domain registration and hosting plans for 1 year on namecheap and Positive SSL – $39.43

  1.  Mailchimp email pro (3 months) - $597

  2.  3 hardwares for testing (Android phones and tablets of different OS versions and screen sizes - $520

Mobile phones has different sizes and resolutions which could affect the designs. Merchants will have different types of phones and tablets - It is therefore crucial to ensure devices to test these orientations and sizes for a consistent look across all devices.

PRODUCT RELEASE STAGE.
Team setup and contractual compensations for 3 months after development.
GOAL – 100 NIGERIAN AND GHANA MERCHANTS WITHIN 3 MONTHS AFTER DEVELOPMENT.

There is need for an active team members to advocate and maintain the system in both technical and non-technical ways

  1.   1 (one) Platform developer and support - $400 for 3 months  - $1200.

  2.   2(two) adoption advocates - $350/advocate for 3 months ($2100) –

Adoption advocates are highly required to market and continually reaching out for merchants to adopt both SmartPay and Safemart in Nigeria and Ghana. For it is not enough to build an application, but to drive usage also.

  1.   2(two) customer support - $350/customer support for 3 months ( $2100)

Customer support cannot be underestimated in any project. They are importantly needed to attend to enquiries, complaints. 1 out of many case scenarios is when funds transfer are delayed due to bank network issues or some unexpected issues.

ENABLING COST FOR TEAM MEMBERS

Transportation costs of adoption advocates: $250.

2 laptops, work desks and landlines for customer support – $415

Internet data subscription for customer support and calls credits for 3 months - $212

Merchants training/event for adoption - $500.

LEGAL SUPPORT - $400.

TOTAL COSTS: $18,484.43

 

18. F.A.Q (FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS)

  1. THERE IS AN EXISTING APP FOR SMARTCASH, HOW DOES THIS AFFECT THE EXISTING TECHNOLOGIES?

Safemart gives an additional important functionality for the technologies like SmartPay and Smartcards buy providing instant automated liquidation. Safemart can be integrated into the existing SmartPay app.
NOTE: Safemart is not solving bill payments as SmartPay and Smartcard already solved that. The issue is using Smartcash and merchants being able to exchange it for fiat with reduced volatility.

  1. SMARTCASH TECHNOLOGIES E.G SMARTCARD POINT OF FORCE IS ZERO FEES, HOW DO YOU MANAGE FEES ABOUT CONVERSION TO FIAT AND SEND TO BANK ACCOUNT?

Firstly, Safemart project does not in any way affect the models Smartcard or any existing Smartcash technologies. It is important to note that,
Majority of banks in Nigeria and Ghana charges very minute transactional fees. And online payment platforms also charges minute transactional % as low as 1% per transaction. We will deduct the transactional fee (which will be visible and transparent to the merchant during checkout) from the total amount to be sent to bank account.
E.G if transactional fee is 1% and user’s equivalent local currency in Naira (Nigerian currency) is #30,000. 1% of 30,000 – #300. Amount that will be sent to user’s bank account will be 30,000 – 300 - #29,700.

  1.  LICENCING: WILL THERE BE ANY LICENCE NEEDED ANYWHERE IN YOUR SOLUTION.

No, software technologies that will be used for Safemart are all open sourced. Those that requires premium payment are already included in the cost breakdowns.

  1.  DO YOU NEED ANYTHING FROM THE DEV TEAM, IF YES WILL THE SMARTCASH GITHUB REPO SUFFICE?

We have gone through the Smartcash dev documentations, we can work with what is available very well. However, for the implementation and integration of Safemart on SmartPay – I will need to communicate well with the Lead developer for guidance on how to integrate this feature. This requirement only comes after completion of Safemart standalone itself.

  1.  DOES VOTING YES FOR THIS PROJECT AFFECT THE STAKING REWARDS FOR THE EXISTING HODL STAKERS?

No, it in no way affects stakes. The effect it can break bring is to increase adoption of Smartcash. The more the adoption, the higher increase in the price of Smartcash.

  1.  WHY IS HIRING OF TWO CUSTOMER SUPPORT NEEDED?

Hiring of customer is highly important, because keeping in mind that over 70% of these merchants are not well knowledgeable on crypto, it is not advisable for business men or women in Africa to begin to start accepting any crypto without providing support for them. If merchants begins to accept Smartcash in Nigeria and Ghana, they will need people they can always call and talk to when they get lost using the system. This is necessary to support Safemart so as not to lose merchants interests.

 

  1. HOW IS THIS GOING TO BRING AN INCREASE TO THE PRICE OF SMARTCASH?
    The potential of this Safemart is massive to the price of smartcash. The level of adoption of any cryptocurrency is in two phases
    When cryptocurrency is used as a payment and exchange of value.
    When cryptocurrency are now being banked, which is the ultimate goal and purpose of cryptocurrency: To replace the existing banking system. For smartcash to be widely used for purpose (1) in Africa, business who will accept payment must first be supported and provided with technologies that safeguards them from volatility. As soon as that is achieved coupled with marketing, customers starts to pay for goods and services with Smartcash. The more consumers buy Smartcash as a payment method, the higher the increase of Smartcash price. Even merchants themselves will be encouraged to buy smartcash for their own banking/trading. As more consumers buy Smartcash, merchants will with time reduce the rate of liquidation as an effect of the increase of price and with time.

 

However, we ought to solve the most prominent problem for merchants first - safeguarding them volatility by providing simple, easy and instant liquidation of funds - that is what Safemart is for.

result.title: Bring SmartCash
result.summary: This proposal seek to make Togo the first French west African country to adopt cryptocurrency massively in order to extend its success to other French speaking west African countries countries. We aim at making SmartCash ubiquitous in Togo since Togo is new when it come to cryptocurrency
result.description:
This proposal seek to make Togo the first French west African country to adopt cryptocurrency massively in order to extend its success to other French speaking west African countries countries. We aim at making SmartCash ubiquitous in Togo since Togo is new when it come to cryptocurrency.

DESCRIPTION
Togo is one of the French speaking west African countries where cryptocurrency has not yet been introduced to . The West African Nation is home to over 7.606 million people and counted among entities where monetary mismanagement has ruined lives and wealth creation.Myself and my team have interviewed a number of small-scale businesses, businesses and market traders prior to this project and the responses revealed that most people shun banks due to a number of reasons which include lack of trust, difficulty in accessing funds, cumbersome procedures in opening accounts, and high interest charges on loans. Surprisingly, most Small and Medium Enterprises owners affirmed that they cannot trust banks with their savings due to hidden charges and unclear condition. There is no doubt the country is ready for use of cryptocurrencies to enjoy its good fruit. Amazingly SmartCash can use this as first mover advantage to capture Togo for it to become first SmartCash nation
Togo is divided into five regions namely centrale, Kara, Maritime, Plateau and savenes with Lome been the capital city which is located in Maritime. Togo shared borders with Ghana where cryptocurrency is gradually gaining root a lot of economics activities goes on between Ghana and Togo introducing smartcash in Togo can really help economic activities to boom since receiving remittances and money can be made easily focusing on instant aspect of SmartCash and it border free feature. Recently there was agreement between Togo,Ghana and Burkina Faso to foster free movement of goods and services ( link to confirm the agreement http://www.ghana.gov.gh/index.php/news/1257-ghana-togo-burkina-faso sign-pact ) here is the case individual have to change cedis to Cefa and vice versa before transaction can be made. With SmartCash, transaction will be easy and simple. Conferences will be held in the various capital cities in Togo. Two conference in each city. With a contineous meetup in each city to raise ambassadors, with  businesses and business owners visitation to let them accept SmartCash as a form of payment. However the introduction of SmartCash to businesses and exchanges establishment will start from Maritime region the industrial and most populous region of the country for as to see how the people and businesses embrace it before we will extend to other regions of the country.

Why Smartcash in Togo can contribute to massive adoption
1. Togo is virgin when it come to cryptocurrency so SmartCash can used first mover advantage to capture the people of Togo when its  come to cryptocurrency.

2. The adoption of cryptocurrency in French speaking countries is very minimal as compared to countries like Ghana, Nigeria, Kenya and  other Africa countries which are English speaking countries. However the interaction, trade and culture of the French west African countries are the  same this means adoption for one means it will diffuse to other countries since SmartCash offers great potential to our activities and daily lives.

3.Togo is a country in West Africa bordered by Ghana to the west, Benin to the east and Burkina Faso to the north. It extends south to the Gulf of Guinea, on which the capital Lomé is located. Togo covers an area of approximately 57,000 square kilometres. Ghana is growing very well when it come to cryptocurrency. There is a lot of economic activities that goes on between Ghana and Togo. Here is the case you have to change your Togolese currency to Ghana currency and vice versa this comes with hidden charges which are very high. With this I believed that if  SmartCash gain root in Togo like Ghana people will start using SmartCash due to the instant and border free nature of SmartCash with that economic activities between Ghana and Togo will be smooth and convenient which will eventually make SmartCash a cryptocurrency with utility and real usage since all transactions will be made in SmartCash.

How we will do it

1.Merchant oriented meet up
There will be one on one meet up with businesses and business owners on the need to accept SmartCash as a medium of exchange showing them the great benefit smartcash offer them so as to make SmartCash a medium of exchange to increase utility and volume in circulation in Togo. Businesses who agreed to accept smartCash as medium of exchange will be listed on SmartCash  merchant directory fine.smartcash.com These meeting/meet up will create a stronger bond for SmartCash merchant, traders, exchanges and improve customer experience when participating in the SmartCash ecosystem.

2. There will be two radio discussion and one TV discussion in each region about SmartCash to create awareness for easy mass adoption in Togo.

3. Two conferences will be held in the various cities of each region. The conference is to create wallets, educate teach, talk and present SmartCash to the people of Togo. Under this conference participants will be thought how to download and make transactions with smartcash wallet. Benefit of using it as a medium of exchange will be our focus that is more of our teaching will be centred there since SmartCash solve most of our  Fiat issues again an intensive education on SmartCash, how to set up SmartCash nodes , how to accept SmartCash as payment using designed printed SmartCash POS in a form of printed SmartCash QR codes or using SmartCard in future, the benefits and advantage of smart rewards and how SmartCash can be of great benefit to their businesses will be explain very well
All participants will be trained on the  how to download and setup SmartCash wallets, key features of SmartCash, how to purchase SmartCash from local and international exchanges, and the advantages of using SmartCash for their daily transactions worldwide for the payment of goods and services, payment of fees/bills, receiving remittances and many more. Some dollars worth of SmartCash will be given to the participants and have them send some of it back  to other participants. This will make them feel the speed and convenience with SmartCash and also give them experience in using SmartCash immediately. The unbanked or the under banked will therefore be encouraged to use their savings to purchase SmartCash to accumulate capital and wealth using SmartCash as store of capital in the long term to liberate themselve from their economic woes and make their entrepreneurial dream achievable.

4.PARTNERSHIP WITH OTHER ORGANIZATIONS
We will partner with organizations who share the same ideology with us and speak at their events. We will do presentations to the audience
and members and have an inquiry desk at the event were people could come for more information. We aim at partnering organizations which cut across boundaries so as to get opportunity to introduce SmartCash to other French west African countries.we are currently speaking to workaway to speak under their events. https://www.workaway.info/661342793354-en.html we currently also speaking http://www.icye.org/icye-in-the-world/togo/ to also give as the opportunity to partner with them.

5. Participants of the conference  who show great skills and great attitude towards our various presentation will be call out and further trained as ambassadors of smartcash who will expand  the smartcash outreach to other part of the country and beyond.

Goals

  1. Create awareness in Togo about  cryptocurrency (SmartCash exclusive)  and other French west African countries through our partnership program.

  2. Create 1000 wallet in every region we found ourselves in. Even though 1000 is our target striving to get over is also our ambition.

  3. To onboard businesses and list them on SmartCash merchant directory and established both online and physical exchanges.

  4. Recruit ambassadors for SmartCash who will carry on the activities. That is train, educate, teach, advice and led them work either part time or full time to spread SmartCash all over the country and across borders.


Justification
Website for smartcashafrica.org will be used so well that all our activities will be post there.

result.title: Cancellation of Ben Swann's proposal - Operation Stop Swann
result.summary: The Ben Swann sponsorship has been under a heavy debate since it was created and it's time for the community to vote about it's future.
result.description:
The Ben Swann sponsorship has been under a heavy debate since it was created and it's finally time to vote about it's future.

My first point to discuss is the state of the video and impact made so far.
It's currently 2018 and youtube views/likes are easily bought. (Example:https://devumi.com/youtube-views/)
Me and a lot others strongly question the legitimacy of the views/likes on the promotion video.
During Ben Swann's Dash sponsorship the spotlight videos got less than 2000 views, ranged between 140-200 likes and had between 45-85 comments.
This was during a sponsorship of a larger and widespread cryptocurrency.
The SmartCash spotlight video has 140.000 views, 460 likes and 74 comments. https://gyazo.com/964eab3e08229fe70bef136d19ef73b6
A different random video of his has 228.000 views, 1100 likes and 273 comments. https://gyazo.com/7bc101a8f603af80383bcf2d28dc97a0
There is an obvious conclusion to be drawn from this. Compare the likes/comments to views on the Dash spotlight and to the SmartCash spotlight.
Another point is that there infact was a handful of people that joined the discord influenced by the spotlight video, but that number is much lower than what 140.000 "real" views would have provided.


During previous SmartCash proposals some of them have passed voting but been cancelled by the devs due to reasons such as "being overpriced" or funding was stopped because of milestones not being reached or fully correct, this has been the case here aswell.
It's on these ground I make this proposal since I deem the sponsorship overpriced and not delivering what was promised.

In Ben's proposal he was claiming: "At our current average of 600,000 views per video, we project over 26 million SmartCash branded views of Reality Check." https://gyazo.com/c0dfbef3e994977f393dc4a5f18bd004

This is clearly an overstatement and not factual, nor delivered.

The SmartCash communities opinion about the valuation of the sponsorship will be shown by this vote and if it passes I propose immediate cancellation of the sponsorship.


Benefits to SmartCash - The state of SmartCash has in the market is honestly speaking in a dire state.
The benefit this proposal provides is avoiding 12.6 MILLION SmartCash (at current $ rates) of sell-pressure.

It's no a secret that SmartCash proposal payments are pegged to $ and during this dump, the payments involve even more SmartCash than what was shown during the proposal.
As of now, Ben Swann receives over 1.6 million SmartCash each month ($59,334.00).
Ben has no incentive to hold since the proposal is pegged to $.
He will receive more SmartCash next month even if the price goes down.
That's a vicious spriral making Ben sell without any repercussions. This creates even more pressure on the market which is already negatively affected by the "early adopter" hack of 9 million coins.

Ben's first payout: https://insight.smartcash.cc/address/SUx2yZRF9ucSGxUXT3P2QeKL797sydcUes
It shows it was sent shortly after being received.

The recipient is linked to the hot wallet of HitBTC, showing that the payment was quickly sold off.
https://insight.smartcash.cc/address/SVJTaaMWkSJ4jE57GaA1pQR7Zd8e97sShg

This cycle will not be exclusively affecting the market, since the cycle can be predicted and people will try to beat Ben by selling their SmartCash before him and buying them back much much cheaper.

 

In the SmartCash discord, JuicyG (Coordinator of Outreach 1) said he spoke to Ben before the vote and claimed that Ben wants to be a holder and won't sell all the coins.  https://gyazo.com/2609f9399f7dcb1cf92bed0a35bac829
As proven above that is not the case.

The cost of this proposal is 100 SmartCash to cover the proposal cost and time of writing this.

result.title: Bring SmartCash to Togo
result.summary: This proposal seek to make Togo the first French west African country to adopt cryptocurrency massively in order to extend its success to other French speaking west African countries. We aim at making SmartCash ubiquitous in Togo since Togo is new when it come to cryptocurrency
result.description:
Preamble

I am skin-crypto on discord. Cryptocurrency enthusiasts, a graduate, photographer and public speaker. For the past 4 months that I joined the boat of SmartCash. I realized the need for SmartCash to be broadcast and spread in the whole of Togo and other French west countries  to liberate as from our economic woes which fiat always impose on us. My full name is Enyadema Gilbert Klutse.

DESCRIPTION
Togo is one of the French speaking west African countries where cryptocurrency has not yet been introduced to . The West African Nation is home to over 7.606 million people and counted among entities where monetary mismanagement has ruined lives and wealth creation.Myself and my team have interviewed a number of small-scale businesses, businesses and market traders prior to this project and the responses revealed that most people shun banks due to a number of reasons which include lack of trust, difficulty in accessing funds, cumbersome procedures in opening accounts, and high interest charges on loans. Surprisingly, most Small and Medium Enterprises owners affirmed that they cannot trust banks with their savings due to hidden charges and unclear condition. There is no doubt the country is ready for use of cryptocurrencies to enjoy its good fruit. Amazingly SmartCash can use this as first mover advantage to capture Togo for it to become first SmartCash nation
Togo is divided into five regions namely centrale, Kara, Maritime, Plateau and savenes with Lome been the capital city which is located in Maritime. Togo shared borders with Ghana where cryptocurrency is gradually gaining root a lot of economics activities goes on between Ghana and Togo introducing smartcash in Togo can really help economic activities to boom since receiving remittances and money can be made easily focusing on instant aspect of SmartCash and it border free feature. Recently there was agreement between Togo,Ghana and Burkina Faso to foster free movement of goods and services ( link to confirm the agreement http://www.ghana.gov.gh/index.php/news/1257-ghana-togo-burkina-faso sign-pact ) here is the case individual have to change cedis to Cefa and vice versa before transaction can be made. With SmartCash, transaction will be easy and simple. Conferences will be held in the various capital cities in Togo. Two conference in each city. With a contineous meetup in each city to raise ambassadors, with  businesses and business owners visitation to let them accept SmartCash as a form of payment. However the introduction of SmartCash to businesses and exchanges establishment will start from Maritime region the industrial and most populous region of the country for as to see how the people and businesses embrace it before we will extend to other regions of the country.

Why Smartcash in Togo can contribute to massive adoption
1. Togo is virgin when it come to cryptocurrency so SmartCash can used first mover advantage to capture the people of Togo when its  come to cryptocurrency.

2. The adoption of cryptocurrency in French speaking countries is very minimal as compared to countries like Ghana, Nigeria, Kenya and  other Africa countries which are English speaking countries. However the interaction, trade and culture of the French west African countries are the  same this means adoption for one means it will diffuse to other countries since SmartCash offers great potential to our activities and daily lives.

3.Togo is a country in West Africa bordered by Ghana to the west, Benin to the east and Burkina Faso to the north. It extends south to the Gulf of Guinea, on which the capital Lomé is located. Togo covers an area of approximately 57,000 square kilometres. Ghana is growing very well when it come to cryptocurrency. There is a lot of economic activities that goes on between Ghana and Togo. Here is the case you have to change your Togolese currency to Ghana currency and vice versa this comes with hidden charges which are very high. With this I believed that if  SmartCash gain root in Togo like Ghana people will start using SmartCash due to the instant and border free nature of SmartCash with that economic activities between Ghana and Togo will be smooth and convenient which will eventually make SmartCash a cryptocurrency with utility and real usage since all transactions will be made in SmartCash.

How we will do it

1.Merchant oriented meet up
There will be one on one meet up with businesses and business owners on the need to accept SmartCash as a medium of exchange showing them the great benefit smartcash offer them so as to make SmartCash a medium of exchange to increase utility and volume in circulation in Togo. Businesses who agreed to accept smartCash as medium of exchange will be listed on SmartCash  merchant directory fine.smartcash.com These meeting/meet up will create a stronger bond for SmartCash merchant, traders, exchanges and improve customer experience when participating in the SmartCash ecosystem.

2. There will be two radio discussion and one TV discussion in each region about SmartCash to create awareness for easy mass adoption in Togo.

3. Two conferences will be held in the various cities of each region. The conference is to create wallets, educate teach, talk and present SmartCash to the people of Togo. Under this conference participants will be thought how to download and make transactions with smartcash wallet. Benefit of using it as a medium of exchange will be our focus that is more of our teaching will be centred there since SmartCash solve most of our  Fiat issues again an intensive education on SmartCash, how to set up SmartCash nodes , how to accept SmartCash as payment using designed printed SmartCash POS in a form of printed SmartCash QR codes or using SmartCard in future, the benefits and advantage of smart rewards and how SmartCash can be of great benefit to their businesses will be explain very well
All participants will be trained on the  how to download and setup SmartCash wallets, key features of SmartCash, how to purchase SmartCash from local and international exchanges, and the advantages of using SmartCash for their daily transactions worldwide for the payment of goods and services, payment of fees/bills, receiving remittances and many more. Some dollars worth of SmartCash will be given to the participants and have them send some of it back  to other participants. This will make them feel the speed and convenience with SmartCash and also give them experience in using SmartCash immediately. The unbanked or the under banked will therefore be encouraged to use their savings to purchase SmartCash to accumulate capital and wealth using SmartCash as store of capital in the long term to liberate themselve from their economic woes and make their entrepreneurial dream achievable.

4.PARTNERSHIP WITH OTHER ORGANIZATIONS
We will partner with organizations who share the same ideology with us and speak at their events. We will do presentations to the audience
and members and have an inquiry desk at the event were people could come for more information. We aim at partnering organizations which cut across boundaries so as to get opportunity to introduce SmartCash to other French west African countries.we are currently speaking to workaway to speak under their events. https://www.workaway.info/661342793354-en.html we currently also speaking http://www.icye.org/icye-in-the-world/togo/ to also give as the opportunity to partner with them.

5. Participants of the conference  who show great skills and great attitude towards our various presentation will be call out and further trained as ambassadors of smartcash who will expand  the smartcash outreach to other part of the country and beyond.

Goals

  1. Create awareness in Togo about  cryptocurrency (SmartCash exclusive)  and other French west African countries through our partnership program.

  2. Create 1000 wallet in every region we found ourselves in. Even though 1000 is our target striving to get over is also our ambition.

  3. To onboard businesses and list them on SmartCash merchant directory and established both online and physical exchanges.

  4. Recruit ambassadors for SmartCash who will carry on the activities. That is train, educate, teach, advice and led them work either part time or full time to spread SmartCash all over the country and across borders.

result.title: First Tour of Merchants Adoption in Lara Venezuela
result.summary:
The proposal was executed to increase the number of merchants in Lara and to inform smartcash as the cryptocurrency indicated for each merchant.

The members of the community will visit different merchants of the city and we will promote smartcash. Once the merchant accepts smartcash as a form of payment we will do a meetup that will be promoted through social networks of our community, the merchant and the different media of our city. In which the customers who attend the day decided together with the merchant will have the opportunity to know the benefits of smartcash and to buy for the first time come and services with smartcash. Once they have made their first transaction the clients will be interviewed and videotaped, to know how was their experience when using smartcash and to use the recording in question for more marketing.

This is really the best way to quickly increase the adoption of merchants in the cities! I hope I can count on your support! To make smartcash the true cryptocurrency for purchases of goods and services from day to day.
result.description:
Hello SmartCash community! My name is Rafael Loyo https://www.instagram.com/rafaelj.loyop/. I am an economics student at UCLA in Lara Venezuela. For a couple of months together with several colleagues from the university we decided to start a community here https://www.instagram.com/smartcashlara/.

Part of the work we have done for smartcash can be found in the instagram account and in the following links:

https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/first-meetup-of-smartcash-lara-july-25-2018/4795/4

https://forum.smartcash.cc/t/second-meetup-of-smartcash-lara/4993

A web portal covered one of our meetups:

https://www.criptotendencias.com/criptoeventos/realizan-2do-meetup-de-smartcash-en-lara/

 

This proposal contains a translation into Spanish and Portuguese at the end for those who need it
Proposal in portuguese and spanish:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1XVbA3CLV3XQTtzoNg8O2u172U_ZJLxFL?usp=drive_open

 

Accelerate the adoption of businesses in Lara State in Venezuela. Making visits to the shops of the city and add them to the SmartCash cause. For 4 months we will be visiting the most popular shops in Lara State and we will get at least 2 shops per week to accept SmartCash as payment.

Goals:

  1. Minimum of 32 shops accepting payment with smartcash at the end of the proposal.
  2. Create wallets to the people who attend and teach them how to use it.
  3. Show people how easy and fast transactions are in the shops via smartcard-smartpay. 4. Delivery of informative leaflets explaining the procedures step by step.
  4. Increase the presence of SmartCash in Lara State.
  5. Grow the social networks of SmartCash Lara to reach more people.
  6. Encourage nearby businesses to which we will visit to also accept SmartCash as a form of payment.
  7. Establish SmartCashLara as a consolidated group that will provide support to each trade and person that requires it.

How will we achieve it?

The SmartCashLara team will travel and contact via social networks and in person the various shops in the city, to offer them the opportunity to be part of this project in which they will have the opportunity to include this fantastic form of payment, evolving and expanding their merchant. And at the same time encouraging the adoption in more stores showing the facilities of SmartCash to customers, they will be offered the purchase of 70$ in products to all customers that day that attend the trade.

The day that SmartCashLara decides to take action in the stores will be discussed in advance to promote the event, via social networks of SmartCashLara and the merchant in question in order to ensure a high influx of customers.

The day we will make a presence will be responsible for teaching people to attend what is SmartCash and how they can use it to pay for goods and services, we will teach them to transfer via wallet to wallet, by mail, through SMS, how to create the smartcard and how to load it with funds, the different Exchange where you can acquire SmartCash and how to acquire SmartCash with bolivares (currency of Venezuela).
In addition, we will provide support to businesses to assist them in installing the SmartCard Business and employees to use SmartPay as receive tips by SmartPay.

At the end of our visit we will leave in the merchant a number of information brochures where step by step will be explained how to acquire SmartCash, how to create the wallet, how to use it, how to create the SmartCard and other points mentioned above, so that in this way the future customers who visit the stores can learn to buy and make payments with the currency and serve as a form of advertising.

 

Why will we do it this way?

Although entrepreneurial fairs, conferences, meetup and forums are necessary to promote SmartCash, we have been able to show that a more effective way, although with greater work, is personal and dedicated to the merchant itself.

The culture of cryptocurrency, although it is booming in Venezuela, is difficult for most people, so dedicating exclusive time to each location to advise and serve as support is the best way to increase adoption.

What do we need?

Shirts:

They will be used as uniforms, in order to create a sense of institutional support that will create confidence to the businesses and clients when we introduce ourselves and teach how to use SmartCash to pay for goods and services.

Merchant:

Amount that will be delivered to customers present the day we organize the presentation so that it is used exclusively to buy in the store. In this way, the trade will be easily incentivized to accept SmartCash because it will benefit in the short term.

Information brochures:

Brochures that will explain in detail how to buy SmartCash, the different Exchanges where it is listed, how to buy SmartCash with bolivars, how to create the wallet, how to create the SmartCard, how to send SmartCash with SMS and email and also It will serve as advertising for SmartCash.

Decals:

SmartCash stickers and the SmartCash logo are distributed to the stores so that people who attend know that they can pay with SmartCash and stickers to give to customers as a souvenir and that support SmartCash.

Transportation:

Payment for the transport of the equipment to go to the different shops being necessary due to the transport of delicate and high-value items.

SmartCard:

PVC printing of the SmartCard for SmartCashLara members to show customers how to use it and thus see how SmartCash can replace common debit cards.

Administrative Services:

Payment for the SmartCash team for the work done during four months. We will strive even more so that in the largest amount of commerce accept SmartCash as payment.

 

Joint proposal:

This idea of adoption comes from me, a member of the SmartCashLara community and Anthony Montecalvo @amontecal1 member of the SmartCash Carabobo community.

Which means that this initiative will be applied in both Lara and Carabobo at the same time. In order to recover the national SmartCash Venezuela community.

Both communities will be dedicated to adding more and more businesses to the SmartCash cause for the mutual benefit of our cryptocurrency and the citizens of Venezuela!

Here the link to the proposal of the other community. Adoption of SmartCash in 32 potential stores in Valencia - Venezuela

We leave the idea of this project free so that anyone who wants it can imitate what we hope to achieve and in this way increase the adoption of businesses in Venezuela.

Please ask them to share their doubts and help us with any kind of suggestion to carry out our project!

Required budget

The budget will be divided into the following amounts:

First month:

For purchase of items ordered and preparation 1520$

Second month:

To encourage merchants and team salaries 1160$

Third month:

To encourage merchants and team salaries 1160$

Fourth month:

To encourage merchants and team salaries 1160$

The estimated time of this proposal is four months. We want to be effective, productive and do an excellent job.
We plan to take the beginnings for the day 15/10/18 until 11/02/19
The date is not exactly estimated, but we plan to start those days.

result.description:

result.title: Build Machine to build SmartCash Node Wallet for ARM64 Architecture (e.g. Raspberry Pi)
result.summary: A machine consists of Raspberry Pi 3B+ to build SmartCash Node Wallets for ARM64 and provide it to the community.
result.description:
Currently SmartCash Node Wallets are only available for Windows, Linux and macOS based on Intel Architecture (x86 and x64).

A lot of people have problems to run Node Wallets on a secure system. A lot of people are using Windows or all day computer, which can be easily compromised.

A good solution is to set up a Raspberry Pi with Desktop and Node Wallet but unfortunately there are no binaries for ARM64 architecture.

Why Raspberry Pi?

  1. It's cheap
  2. It's easy to set up
  3. Has more security than an all day used computer

Why we need you, to do that?

Everyone could do that, of course but you need a Raspberry Pi and a lot of Linux knowledge. For example it's not possible to use ppa:bitcoin/bitcoin on Raspbian to install Berkeley DB libs 4.8, but this is necessary to keep your wallet portable and compatible with other installations. So you have to build these libraries by yourself. Also it will take a lot of time. And so on. There a lot of problems, which have to be solved before you can run a build.

Long story short: It's a lot of work and you need a lot of time and knowlegde. It's much easier just to download the binaries.

Goal

The goal of this proposal is to create a hardware environment to build every release of node wallets also for ARM64 Architecture so every user can download it from GitHub and install/use it on a Raspberry Pi. The hardware should look also good (that's the reason for Pi-Top) to demonstrate it on Meetups. For example on the southern germany Cryptocurrency Meetup in Stuttgart and Munich. Also a developtment Environment is need, of course. This means: Display, Keyboard, and so on. All these could be fullfilled by a Pi-Top.

The founder of this proposal will build every future release of Node Wallet also for ARM64 Architecture for the rest of all days. Promise :-)

result.title: SmartCash Sponsorship of Anti-Media (UPDATE 2)
result.summary: Anti-Media will deliver reach, impressions, news coverage, and media publishing for marketing, branding, and public relations for SmartCash.
result.description:
“You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.” ? R. Buckminster Fuller

Hello SmartHive, we’re Anti-Media. We are an anti-establishment news media company with a very Millennial, very libertarian/anarchist audience and message. What we started in 2012 as a small meme page on Facebook has grown into one of the most trusted independent media organizations in the world, reaching millions of people every week. Anti-Media is also currently in the process (to be completed in the next few months) of becoming one of the first news organizations in the world to publish all of our content using blockchain technology.

We’d like to work with SmartCash to deliver reach, impressions, news coverage, and media publishing for marketing, branding, and public relations for your project.

Deliverables:

    • Audience: Our audience demographics are very receptive to blockchain and cryptocurrencies. Our audience consists of mostly libertarian/anarchist-leaning Millennials. We have 2.1 million Facebook followers, 47,000 Twitter followers, 100,000 Instagram followers, 70,000 Minds.com followers, 36,000 newsletter subscribers, and 22,000 push notification subscribers.
    • Reach: We reach a very large audience with our content — and our content goes viral.
      • 540,000 million video views
      • theantimedia.com website: 1,289,609 page views in August. 1,067,786 unique users (screenshot), 5.2 million banner ad impressions.
      • Facebook: 7.9 million reached from The Anti-Media page over last 28 days (screenshot)
      • Twitter: 910,000 million reached over the last 28 days (screenshot)
      • Instagram: 31,423 reached over the last 7 days
    • Coverage: We will deliver news article(s) about SmartCash’s project/product/release etc.
      • Example from a recent ICO sponsor: New Blockchain Startup 4NEW Promises to Solve One of Bitcoin’s Biggest Problems
    • Public relations: We can carry SmartCash’s press releases and adapt them into news article/video form. Our content is Creative Commons and has the possibility of gaining organic viral reach and/or reposts from other outlets.
    • @tags: We can tag SmartCash on social media in strategic posts to help you build your own social media followings (example)

 

 

Sponsorship proposal: $3,500 SMART equivalent per month

  • 1.5 million banner ad impressions for SmartCash with click and impression tracking
  • 250,000 video impressions would carry SmartCash’s branding/call to action, including viral videos and podcasts
  • Select social media posts will include @tags to help build SmartCash’s social media following
  • Press coverage for one press release or update per month for duration of sponsorship
  • Media created once a month showcasing SmartCash’s products, platform, idea etc., including interviews and/or appearances on our podcast for duration of sponsorship
  • Media created that may lead to higher conversions for SmartCash’s advertisements/branding on Anti-Media content
  • If impression targets are not met, SmartCash would be refunded the prorated amount

Terms

Three month zero risk sponsorship. If Anti-Media doesn’t deliver on agreed upon impressions, we will refund the prorated amount to the SmartHive treasury. Any impressions delivered over the proposed amount will be provided at no extra cost.

Conclusion

Thanks for taking the time to read our proposal, SmartHive! We look forward to working together to bring cryptocurrency and blockchain to the masses.

result.title: Listing Smartcash on Africa's cryptocurrency exchange (Golix) | A software development proposal
result.summary:
I am the founder and CEO of Golix. At Golix, we are committed to being the leading cryptocurrency exchange in Africa and we have achieved a lot in our short history.
We have operations in 7 African countries, namely, Zimbabwe, Uganda, Tanzania, Rwanda, Kenya, Cameroon and South Africa. We allow cryptocurrency to fiat conversions in those 7 countries that operate in and in terms of geographic reach and presence, Golix is Africa’s leading cryptocurrency exchange.
Golix was born out of the frustration from an inability to make online and/or cross-border payments. The cryptocurrency exchange therefore exists to give every person in Africa Financial Autonomy which aligns well with Smartcash values of community, growth and inclusion.
result.description:
The compensation that Golix seeks will primarily be used to pay for the man hours required for full wallet integration. Most of our development team is based in Zimbabwe and South Africa but we employ the best people we can find on the continent who come from the leading companies in Africa. We therefore pay competitive salaries. Because we have top talent, we are confident we can make a significant enhancement on the UX for someone looking to buy and/or use Smartcash in any of the current markets we operate in as well as the future markets we are going to grow to.

The man hour cost of the integration is significantly higher than what we are asking for - we are going to cover the bulk of the cost ourselves because we really like Smartcash. But we think it will be really awesome if we can get some support from this community.
We have designed our hot and cold storage wallets to provide the highest level of security for all the 7 cryptocurrency projects we have listed today and this proposal outlines a patch of buildup and integration for Smartcash support within Golix’s expensive production offering.

Integrating with Golix will make it substantially easier for for anyone in any one of the seven countries that we operate in to buy and/or sell cryptocurrency with the local fiat. Our platform has processed over US $8 millon in cryptocurrency transactions to date and our throughout our existence (we have been live since September 2015) our volume has doubled every 3 months. We now also have more than 60 thousand customers (and we're growing). We have also been fortunate to get a number of press mentions in almost all of the major publications over the years. My favorite ones are these ones:

  • https://www.cnbc.com/2017/10/24/why-everyones-talking-about-bitcoin-and-zimbabwe.html
  • https://www.herald.co.zw/golix-introduces-bitcoin-atm/
  • https://www.pazimbabwe.com/business-42757-zimbabwean-exchanges-monthly-bitcoin-volume-hits-1-million.html
  • https://www.ccn.com/zimbabwe-cryptocurrency-exchange-golix-drags-central-bank-to-court-over-trading-ban/
  • https://edition.cnn.com/2017/10/31/africa/zimbabwe-bitcoin-surge/index.html
  • https://www.ccn.com/zimbabwes-only-crypto-exchange-aims-for-a-national-digital-revolution/
  • https://www.newsbtc.com/2017/11/15/golix-exchangebitcoin-price-double-in-zimbabwe/
  • https://www.coininsider.com/golix-zimbabwe-atm/
  • https://news.bitcoin.com/zimbabwes-golix-battles-to-grow-volume-after-breaking-into-seven-african-countries/ 
  • https://cointelegraph.com/news/hyperbitcoinization-how-currency-crises-are-driving-nations-to-crypto 
  •  

Besides the exchange, we also have a wallet service so another problem we solve is custodial services for customers who cannot store their cryptocurrency themselves.
Our API is used by tens of thousands of people (either directly or indirectly) not just in Africa, but all over the world. We also have a full time technical team ready to help onboard any new customers and that would like to programmatically integrate with Smartcash either via our API or directly to a Smartnode.


The compensation is divided into installments upon delivery of key milestones that we break down in the milestones section below.

I also want to thank the following Smartcash Ambasadors for their feedback on the preprosal I shared in the forum (you helped make this proposal better):

  • https://forum.smartcash.cc/u/Control
  • https://forum.smartcash.cc/u/Solarminer
  • https://forum.smartcash.cc/u/slpin
  • https://forum.smartcash.cc/u/mark-smartcash (thanks again Mark for sharing the exchange integration guide we're comparing our notes against. We'll also document our process and share a tutorial we think will be useful for future exchanges that want to go through the integration process).

result.title: Increase Italian Base Users
result.summary:
Promote SmartCash With Italian Articles on Steemit - Minds - Twitter - Gab - Discord 
Proposals Goal: Extend Italian base users with more updates news and articles
result.description:
Hello to all,

My name is Gabriele Dibertulu and I am an Italian barista with a passion for technology and cryptocurrencies.

I have been happily part of the SmartCash community for over six months, during this time I learned to appreciate the project and the people behind SmartCash enough to push me to write and translate articles in Italian on my Steemit channel [https://steemit.com/@lord-gabo].

Up to now I have written 132 posts about SmartCash (which at the moment could already be increased) and I was lucky to be able to take advantage of some rewards that the Team offered a few months ago on Steemit and also to be one of the winners of the Writing Contest for the anniversary of the coin.

In the meantime, I created the Telegram Italian channel [https://t.me/smartcashitalia 1] which at the moment has about 20 users.

Each of my articles is always shared on the following Social Network: Discord (on #team_smartcash_links and # main_italian ), Telegram ( https://t.me/smartcashitalia 1 ) and recently also Gab ( https://gab.ai/Lord_Gabo) and Minds (https://www.minds.com/Lord_GaboIT).

My proposal has as its ultimate goal to be able to bring more and more Italian users to SmartCash through a constant presence of updated news and continuous support on Telegram on the most important issues concerning the currency.

My work mostly concerns research, translations, writing and sharing the news.

What kind of news? Those officials from the SmartCash team, tutorials, short news, market trends, main discussions on Discord or Telegram, interviews and videos on Youtube, and what’s also very important, proposals open to the vote. Once I get the news I translate it and integrate it with in-depth analysis after creating a small graphic banner (not a professional level, I’m not a graphic).

My plan is to write in Italian at least 25 posts per month between news, official articles, market trends, translations of SmartHive proposals and analysis of YouTube videos to share on my Steemit, Minds, Gab, Twitter, Telegram and Discord channels

My main goal is to increase the base of SmartCash in Italy and I am convinced that this work of mine can concretely help the circulation of information for Italians who, besides having a second source of information (after the English one) will also have articles with in-depth information on news and further support on Telegram thanks to the ever-increasing number of users.

My overall demand is 260 USD/month, I know that might sound like a lot, but most of the translated articles will require nearly two hours for preparation, especially those relating to the proposals or extrapolations of interviews or statements from Youtube videos.

My work can be viewed on my Steemit channel and I am sure that the quality of future content will always be growing because of the longer available time I can have in the months to follow.

The total monthly request will, therefore, 260$ for the publication of at least 25 articles for a period of three months that I hope to extend at the deadline with another proposal.

I would like to inform you that these  will be reinvested in Smartnodes and that as soon as they are active their address will be made public.

result.description:
EarthX is an international environmental organization that connects a global community to create a sustainable world for all life and future generations. In this event companies and assistants will meet to have fun learning on conservation and sustainable solutions.

For the first time in 8 years, EarthX leaves Dallas, Texas. Earthx Mexico will take place in November 9th to 11th in Casa del Lago (Lake House) of the Chapultepec Forest. The Chapultepec Forest is one of the most important natural areas of Mexico City.

Its location is ideal, since it is in the heart of the Mexican capital where the most important companies in the country are located. And next to one emblematic avenue “El Paseo de la Reforma”.

Reforma, in order to activate economic development in the last ten years has become the preferred area to build sustainable and high technology towers, like Mayor Tower, BBVA Tower, Reforma Tower, Diana Tower, New York Life Tower, Mapfre Tower and Reforma Latino Tower. Apparently, to activate the economy a skyscraper must be named “Tower”.

The urban forest Chapultepec (which is nahuatl for grasshopper hill) houses a zoo, museums, lakes, cinemas, hotels, restaurants and even a castle!

EarthX Mexico will consist of an expo, an hackathon, conferences and a movie festival.

https://www.earthxmexico.org

It is expected the participation of over 100 Non-governmental organizations, 100 exhibitors, 33 movies, 120 speakers (including oceanographic explorer Jean Michel Cousteau, Greenpeace Sea Shepard Paul Watson and Nobel Peace Prize Dr. Rajendra K. Pachauri) and over 30,000 assistants.

Proposal Goal:
To present SmartCash Non-governmental organizations that could use SmartCash in their efforts, as a method of payment for fundraising. And also business owners and assistants to The EarthX Mexico Expo.

 

Who am I?
Hi, I am Erika Montes de oca. I am a chemist who owns an Environmental Health and Safety e-commerce platform. I have been an entrepreneur since 2010, I have been in many bussiness organizations so I am an excellent networker.

I am a crypto user, that’s whys I was was an attendant to Talent Land, where met SmartCash.

SmartCash Resume.
I participated with @AlanisHec in the event  #666 Mexico City digital business summit Expo PYME.

Job Description

  • Plan the advertising designs and pay for ads.

result.title: Connecting bussines owners and Non-governmental organizations about acepting SmartCash at Earth X México, Mexico city
result.summary:
Participate in the expo Earth X México with a SmartCash booth. This event t is a good oportunity for networking with: 
- technological business owners to adopt SmartCash as a payment method,  
- nongovernmental which could be interested in SmartCash as a way to fund raising, 
- people who is already familiar with the use of cryptocurrency
and people who do not about cryptocurrency.
result.description:
Timeline: October 31st until November 16th.

 

Proposal Goals:

  • Increase the user community of SmartCash in Mexico City. 
  • Add 5 new users (shops accepting SamrtCash as payment method) during the expo. 
  • Add 3 new users before the expo, to be as example of available stores in the SmartCash booth. 
  • Educate about how to use Smart Cash during the expo.
  • Follow up sessions with 10 bussiness owners after the event to solve questions.

About EarthX

EarthX is an international environmental organization that connects a global community to create a sustainable world for all life and future generations. In this event companies and assistants with environmental awareness will meet to have fun learning on conservation and sustainable solutions.

For the first time in 8 years, EarthX leaves Dallas, Texas. Earthx Mexico will take place in November 9th to 11th in Casa del Lago (Lake House) of the Chapultepec Forest. The Chapultepec Forest is one of the most important natural areas of Mexico City.

Its location is ideal, since it is in the heart of the Mexican capital where the most important companies in the country are located. And next to one of the most emblematic avenues in the world, “El Paseo de la Reforma”.

Reforma, in order to activate economic development in the last ten years has become the preferred area to build sustainable and high technology towers, like Mayor Tower, BBVA Tower, Reforma Tower, Diana Tower, New York Life Tower, Mapfre Tower and Reforma Latino Tower. Apparently, to activate the economy a skyscraper must be named “Tower”:thinking:.

The urban forest Chapultepec (which is nahuatl for grasshopper hill) houses a zoo, museums, lakes, cinemas, hotels, restaurants and even a castle!

EarthX Mexico will consist of an expo with business which will offer technological products (in which the SmartCash Booth may be) and nongovernmental organizations, an hackathon, conferences and a movie festival.

This is the official website of the event: https://www.earthxmexico.org 

It is expected the participation of over 100 Non-governmental organizations, 100 bussiness exhibitors, 33 movies, 120 speakers (including oceanographic explorer Jean Michel Cousteau, Greenpeace Sea Shepard Paul Watson and Nobel Peace Prize Dr. Rajendra K. Pachauri) and over 30,000 assistants. 

You can consult the organizer brochure here:  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mrl5M6EPy9F11iYJdn81cwGV0pg1TlJ3/view?usp=sharing

This makes the EarthX Mexico Expo a great opportunity to present SmartCash to business owners and their customers. We would connect with a new audience: Non-governmental organizations that could use SmartCash in their efforts, as a method for fundraising.

Who am I?

I am Erika Montes de oca. I am a chemist who owns an Environmental Health and Safety retail. I have been an entrepreneur for eight years now. I have been in many business associations so I consider myself as a professional networker.

I am a crypto user, that’s why I was was an attendant to Talent Land, where met SmartCash for the first time. A  couple of months later, I talked about how to implement it in my business with @AlanisHec.  That is why I joined his staff in the event #666 Mexico City digital business summit Expo PYME.

I know the problems among the available payment methods for business owners in Mexico, so I am sure they will be interested in adopting SmartCash.

Job description

Meet with supplier to work out event details and buy advertising products.

Plan with the team about how to get in touch with the three target profiles: business owners, Non-governmental organizations and cryptocurrency users.

Deliverables. 
We will deliver receipt, ticket OR invoice of the purchases. Will post on the forum the photographies of the event development.

result.title: Bring SmartCash closer to the Spanish-Speaking Community
result.summary: Promote SmartCash among the Spanish-speaking community by creating reliable and promotional content about it. With the expertise of our team, Academia Blockchain would communicate about SmartCash through different means: one in-depth technological analysis through video by our blockchain expert, one interview to a SmartCash representative, three price-oriented technical-analysis commentaries on SmartCash, and one informative article.
result.description:
Proposal: Promote SmartCash among the Spanish-speaking community by creating reliable and promotional content about it. With the expertise of our team, Academia Blockchain would communicate about SmartCash through four content formats: 

  • One in-depth technological analysis (video): Our blockchain expert, Alejandro Veintimilla, will research and prepare his analysis before recording the video. He will explain what is SmartCash, how it operates, and what it stands for. He will also provide his insights in a simple and attractive manner to reach a broad audience. 
  • One interview to a SmartCash representative (video): The interviewer will also prepare himself about the SmartCash basics. However, the interview will have a story-telling approach, since it is targeted to new and potential users. Basically, the idea is to talk about the story behind the project, how it began, and how people can buy SmartCash or get involved in its community.
  • Three price-oriented technical-analysis commentaries on SmartCash: Academia Blockchain offers weekly technical-analysis commentaries on three or four cryptocurrencies. Therefore, we will feature SmartCash in three of our videos, considering its price and potential profitable opportunities. 
  • One informative article: The reporter will provide general information about the project and the team, the coin, and the latest updates on SmartCash.

The Spanish-speaking community on cryptocurrency and blockchain consists of a significant number of people, and it keeps increasing. Fiat currencies from countries like Venezuela and Argentina currently have a very bad performance, so bitcoin and altcoins are in their citizens’ crosshairs. Further, other nations like Mexico and Colombia are creating friendly legislation for fintech industry and startups.

About Academia Blockchain: We are the only technically-oriented organization that addresses cryptocurrency and blockchain topics in Spanish. We have a YouTube channel with more than 1.5 thousand subscribers and a website for news, adoption reports, opinion editorials, and tutorials. We also have social media presence in six networks, with a growing size of followers in each of them.
