result.title: Smart Wifi Network
result.summary: Allow millions of unbanked South Africans to purchase mobile data using SmartCash.
result.description:
The Problem

  1. South Africa has a large urban population that lives in poverty
  2. Internet access allows people to learn, communicate and start businesses.
  3. But Mobile Data from the Telecoms is expensive as it costs R0.99 per MB (+/-$0.1)

The Solution

  1. Sell cheaper Mobile Data with SmartCash.
  2. Mobile Data can be bought in bulk at R0.05 MB by SmartVendors*
  3. SmartVendors* can then sell each MB at R0.20 to the people if they pay in SmartCash

SmartVendors

  1. Anyone can become a SmartVendor and it will most likely be someone in one of these poor communities.
  2. All they need is a SmartyFi* device that allows them to host their own Wifi Hotspot.
  3. They can buy Mobile Data in bulk using SmartCash and sell Mobile Data for SmartCash

SmartyFi Device

  1. The website to the device: https://www.smartyfi.co.za/SmartyFiSite/index
  2. I have a close relationship with the owner of this company
  3. He is prepared to accept SmartCash as payment for bulk purchases of Mobile Data

Benefits

  1. Since SmartCash can be used to buy Mobile Data it will immediately have value in the community
  2. This means SmartCash can be used as a substitute for cash
  3. Other businesses in these communities might start transacting with SmartCash

Logistics

  1. We need to get the SmartyFi devices into the poor communities
  2. We need to educate the people on how to use SmartCash
  3. We need to provide an offline exchange for SmartCash and South African rands.

Promotion

  1. At the start, if someone buys 100MB of Data, the SmartVendor gives the customer the same value in SmartCash
  2. Each SmartVendor has a yellow T-Shirt with SmartCash branding
  3. SmartVendors can hand out flyers explaining SmartCash and how it can be used to buy Mobile Data

Budget

  1. 100 SmartyFi Devices at R2500 each (+/-$250)
  2. 100 SmartCash T-Shirts at R150 each (+/-$15)
  3. 10000 Promotional Flyers at R2 each (+/-$0.2)

Who Gets the Money

  1. A SmartVendor will pay R1000 to SmartyFi and get the device worth R2500, the T-shirt, 100 flyers and R1000 worth of SmartCash
  2. So the SmartVendor is getting R2850. (R3850 of items - R1000 cash)
  3. SmartyFi is getting R2500 per device
  4. A T-Shirt company will get R150 per shirt
  5. A printing company will get R2 per flyer
  6. SmartyFi also makes a margin on all the data that it sells to the SmartVendors
  7. SmartyFi will make a local liquid market and exchange Rands for SmartCash and cover any other expenses

Conclusion

  1. People in poor areas have access to more affordable data
  2. One hundred new SmartVendor jobs are created
  3. SmartCash is actively used in a micro-economy

result.title: PRESENTIAL COURSE OF DIGITAL ECONOMY
result.summary: Educate the people and promote the use of Smartcash through courses and a kermes where you can buy with Smartcash.
result.description:
PRESENTIAL COURSE OF DIGITAL ECONOMY WITH THE EXTENSION TO A CRYPTO KERMES

History


We have observed that the meetups that are being happening in Cancun are not getting the result of a broad Criptocurrency adoption in Cancun, in part because that talks are a few hours about cryptocurrency, we are seeing that there is a lack of information about the evolution of digital economy, furthermore, the rising of false information because of the ponzi squemes are doing that more and more people distrust of cryptocurrencies.


This results in a challenge to the real digital economy because of the uncertainty In the criptocurrencies market, we propose to do this:
We require a close space to give a course in a serious manner and make it in the simplest way possible for a better comprehension of the digital market. The time for the course would be three hours in three days for a total of nine hours.


This is made with the objetive to give support to what was learned the day before, also with the chance to get products through criptocurrency.


The objective of the face-to-face course is promote the use of criptocurrencies with a practical base, that the community have the clarity of how Works the digital economy by knowing the blockchain, demostrate that there is transparency in the technology. Face the ignorance from knowledge of the criptocurrencies promoting interest.

Why do this? I’m a firm believer that the digital economy is here to stay and the future is the decentralized economy, I have seen some people sharing their proposals and execute them in a magnify way, however I would like to participate more actively in Smartcash supporting to the community to comprehend what really will be the future and that we can use it now for the Exchange of products, services in a more efficient and effective way.

We believe that because of the rising ammount of scams focused in criptocurrencies, it is important to make the conference face-to-face, to be able to inspire to the community to invest in the digital market like is Smartcash.

The idea

Make a meeting with people that have local business and common people with the interest to know about the beginnings of the digital economy, the difference between digital money and common money. In the meetings the subjects will be how start the Bitcoin, how Works the blockchain, and how have evolved the criptocurrencies, how economies from different countries have already adopt the digital economy as a massive payment method. A clear example would be Venezuela.

Like first proposal we’ll have the training of the community in a clear way to continue to the second proposal of a Kermes (a Little market), where the community will be invited to participate actively in the buy and sell of products through Smartcash, using in a real way the criptocurrency, encouraging the adoption of criptocurrencies.

Market Segment

People with interest in the digital market changing from fiat money to criptocurrency.
People between 18 and 50 years what wish to learn about blockchain technology and their ample range of applications.

Pre-proposal

Course of digital economy based on Smartcash (History and comprehension) face-to-face

Amount: $6, 600 us
Time: 1 month
Total hours to complete Project: 24 hours

Objective: Educate in a clear way through a face-to-face course to the community about digital economy, with course with 20 to 25 people, 3 days at week por month promoting the use, management and adoption of Smartcash, in a total of 4 courses face-to-face, where the assistants at being in a clearer context about smartcash, will make easier to viralize the information in a more effective way.

Who am I?

My name is Daniel Francisco Burgos Gongora, I am a technician in computer systems, I’m a entrepeneur, I have a pizza shop and a bakery called “Ki Nohoch Pizza”, it is in Colony “Valle verde” in the highway Cancun-Merida, I’m a fanatic of digital economy, I like to share my knowledge about criptocurrencies with family, Friends and people, I would like to participate more in the Smartcash community by making these courses where it can be learned in a easy and clear way how criptocurrency Works.
I have imparted courses face-to-face about finantial education in the área of diversified investments, and courses where I share the evolution about Digital Currency and how to use leverage from the digital currency like an investment option. I also participate in the Smartcash community from Cancun managed by oucan and eiky, I went to international events like Talent Land in April on the city of Guadalajara, Mexico where we provided information about Smartcash to almost 30 thousand assistants to the event during a week.

Deliverables – Description of the Project:

Manual of introduction to the Digital economy, evolution, management of buy and sell of products on the course that allows to be bought with Smartcash to know the way to receive and send criptocurrencies in a practical manner, and at the same time see the time for a transaction to be made.

The strategy to arrive to the diverse sectors of the industries:

  • Through digital marketing, there will be a campaign for the kermes and courses to be known.
  • As entrepreneur, I have contacts with a lot employees, that is a huge área of opportunity to teach about digital money.
  • I’m an active member of a lot of work groups in branches of criptocurrencies, finantial education, goverment dependencies, and entrepeneur.

Possibles questions:

Why a 20 hours course focused in 20-25 people by week?
My experience tell me que a group of 20 is excellent to have a customized attention and obtain the expected results on the gained knowledge, making easier that the quality of the information arrives to the community that will do it in the practice.

Why 3 hours for day?
When I have done my courses, I have seen that after 3 hours, the attention span is lowered and the information is not received clearly, with 3 hours we can have the information fresh in the minds of the assistants.

Why only 3 days?
There are 3 days dividen in this way: First day is theory, second day is practice and in the third day we will take the application of the 100% of what they learned.

Conclusions:

It is expected to reach a population of 80 to 100 people con la capacity to replicate the learned and viralize the information from a cemented knowledge.

Cost Structure

Gift of the criptocurrency Smartcash to promote the use $1000 
Advertising $277 us
Video, Photos $ 277us
Expositor 1 $833us
Expositor 2 $833us
Rent of salón $555us
Manuals $ 888 us
Deveploment of the Manual $1,111us
Gasoline $277 us
Unexpected expenses $549us

Total $6,600 us

result.title: FPPradio Sponsorship
result.summary:
I’ve produced a daily 5-Minute Newscast, FPPradioNews, since February 2014, and begin the newscast with prices of gold, silver & Bitcoin. The newscast consists of 2-3 news stories & 2 ads.
Peace, Love, Liberty Radio is a 30 minute podcast that I’ve been recording since 2012. The show explores topics of self-help, personal growth, and relationships while promoting the ideas of liberty and peaceful interaction.
result.description:
Amount:
$300

Timeline:
1 month; January 2019

Proposal Goal:
To help SmartCash gain exposure to a wider audience.

Who Am I?
I am the Owner/Managing Editor of Free Press Publications, and I’ve spent most of my adult life as an advocate & activist for peace and liberty.
I’m an award winning author and publisher, and a host on the nationally syndicated talk show Free Talk Live. I also hosts the daily newscast FPPradioNews, and the weekly podcast Peace, Love, Liberty Radio.
I’ve produced FPPradioNews since February 2014, and the newscast begins with prices of gold, silver & Bitcoin, and consists of 2-3 news stories & 2 ads.
Peace, Love, Liberty Radio is a 30 minute podcast that I’ve been recording since 2012. The weekly show explores topics of self-help, personal growth, and relationships while promoting the ideas of liberty and peaceful interaction.

Description of the proposal & Deliverables
I will provide the price of SmartCash every day in the daily 5-Minute Newscast, FPPradioNews; and a 30 second ad during every FPPradioNews; and a live-read ad once weekly in Peace Love Liberty Radio.
FPPRadioNews is a daily 5 minute radio news program heard on several online radio networks and low power radio stations across the country, and is also available on iHeartRadio!
~1000 podcast listens/downloads per week, thousands of listens on LRN, FPRN & ipmNation
Peace, Love, Liberty Radio is a 30 minute show recorded live several times a week that explores topics of self-help, personal growth, and relationships while promoting the ideas of liberty and peaceful interaction; and can be heard on several online radio networks and low power radio stations across the country, and is also available on iHeartRadio!
~1000 podcast listens/downloads per week, thousands of listens on LRN, FPRN & ipmNation

There are three major deliverables:

  1. Provide the price of SmartCash every day in FPPradioNews
  2. 20-30 second ad seven times per week during FPPradioNews
  3. a live-read ad weekly in Peace, Love, Liberty Radio

Budget:
Deliverable 1: $75 | The price of SmartCash every day in the daily 5-Minute Newscast, FPPradioNews
Deliverable 2: $160 | A 30 second ad daily during FPPradioNews
Deliverable 3: $65 | A live-read ad weekly in the podcast, Peace, Love, Liberty Radio
Total: $300

Payment schedule:
January 15: $300

My Current/Past SmartCash related experience:
I learned aboutSmartCash at the FreeCoast Festival in Portsmouth, NH this fall. I have researched the coin, and am impressed with the team and the vision. I would be honored to be part of this moving forward.

Conclusions:
I believe SmartCash has great potential and promoting the price os SmartCash at the beginning of a newscast alongside gold, silver & Bitcoin will help give credibility to the currency. Live-read advertisements also give credence to the product/service because of the endorsement-style nature of that type of ad. I recommend the SmartCash team fund this advertising/promotion package so that SmartCash can continue to gain exposure to a wider audience.

I'd like this to be a contract for 12 months, however the SmartCash voting system seems to limit proposals to not more than 2 months.

result.title: Donation Platform P2P
result.summary: Donation platform which uses only Smartcash
result.description:
Donor organizations as we know devour vast amounts of capital due to expensive bureaucracy and corrupt managers. This should not be the case anymore!
My name is Simon, I'm from Germany and I'm a mechanical engineer. I earn my money with project management in the aviation sector as well as with internet marketing.

With the help of Smartcash and its community, I want to develop a donor platform where a donor can be 100% sure that his money will arrive where it should arrive. Namely, the person seeking help.

The platform should resemble a social network where people in need of help from all over the world can sign up. After they have been verified and found to be real people, they can upload videos, photos and texts of themselves and their lives.

Donors can then choose who to send SMARTs via this platform. Peer to peer, always transparently traceable on the Blockchain.

I do not want to give away more, just one more thing: This could be big! For the people in need and for Smartcash.

Yours, Simon

result.title: 1st CriptoBlock Event São Paulo
result.summary:
CriptoBlock has developed a program focused on an environment that will gather in São Paulo the first meeting of entrepreneurs, merchants and investors focused on payment acceptance with SmartCash. 

The event will be developed exclusively to attract new merchants accepting SmartCash, new entrepreneurs interested in investing with SmartCash and the population / enthusiasts interested in knowing the technology and usability of SmartCash.
result.description:
1st CriptoBlock Event São Paulo Theme: Adoption SmartCash

GLOBAL VISION

CriptoBlock has developed a program focused on an environment that will gather in São Paulo the first meeting of entrepreneurs, merchants and investors focused on payment acceptance with SmartCash.

The event will be developed exclusively to attract new merchants accepting SmartCash, new entrepreneurs interested in investing with SmartCash and the population / enthusiasts interested in knowing the technology and usability of SmartCash.

THE GOAL

The CriptoBlock event - 1st meeting of entrepreneurs, merchants and investors in São Paulo Brazil with the theme: Adoption SmartCash with objective:

1. Increase awareness of using SmartCash

It will be a gathering of entrepreneurs interested in deploying payment methods in their establishments, investors with interest in SmartCash and enthusiasts with a focus on getting to know the currency and its technology better.

2. Encouraging the use of currency in Brazil

Brazil has a large area of people interested in cryptomoedas and is a great influencer with active voice throughout Latin America being known by professionals worldwide with a focus on technology. This will be a major event promoted in São Paulo in the country's largest financial capital.

3. Increasing the SmartCash Network

The CriptoBlock event wants to show strength by bringing together a team of influencers to demonstrate the presence of SmartCash in Brazil, attracting more people interested in supporting the currency through its use in SmartBands, SmartCards and encouraging the creation of new currency nodes during the event.

WHO WE ARE

We developed CriptoBlock in 2018 to represent official SmartCash events throughout Brazil.

The first capital chosen is the headquarters of Criptoblock and also the largest financial capital of Brazil; São Paulo is known for meeting with developers, merchants, technology and events.

We hosted the largest number of brokerage houses in Brazil, making Sao Paulo the seat of decentralization, enthusiasts and the stage of a community full of influencers interested in crypto-coins.

PROPOSAL

CriptoBlock has developed a set of lectures that will address in theory the adoption and usability of SmartCash and will use in practice the consumption of products with payments in SmartCash, as well as bringing together entrepreneurs, enthusiastic merchants and digital influencers.

For the participation, each congressman will purchase a ticket with a cost of R$25,00 that gives free access to all dependencies leased by Criptoblock at InvestSP.

Upon registration, each congress member is entitled to a R$25,00 credit that has been converted into a SmartCash, whose redemption takes place at the entrance of the event. Access sales will be limited to an exclusive audience of 250 people, tickets will be marketed directly on the official CriptoBlock website and can be paid by credit card or with SmartCash.

MAIN ISSUES ADDRESSED DURING THE EVENT

- Who is and what is SmartCash

- Where to buy SmartCash

- The SmartNodes Marketplace

- What is SmartRewards

- What is SmartPay

- What is SmartCartd?

- What is SmartBand?

- What is InstantPay

- Prospects for the future

- Business with Accept in SmartCash

ADOPTION OF SPACES

The Event will have differentiated structures, among them:

1) Entrepreneurial space with physical presentation of shopkeepers accepting SmartCash in the sale of products;

2) Food space with varied options (kiosks, FoodTruck);

3) Information space with orientation on event, public targeting, and visitor accreditation;

4) Make doubts with staff Staff present from the beginning to the end of the event solving major doubts with the usability of SmartCash;

5) Networking space for exchanging ideas, contacts, photos and third party participation.

NOTE: Every consumer space will accept SmartCash as payment method.

ADOPTION OF BENEFITS

The event will feature a benefit called CBC (CriptoBlockCash), an incentive for anyone visiting the event and should occur as follows:

- Paying event visitors receive credit in their SmartCash wallet equivalent to the entry fee on the day of the event to consume and test the technology in practice at all kiosks;

- VIP guests (Entrepreneurs and supporters) also receive SmartCash credit. In addition to reversing the entry fee for paying visitors with credit in their SmartCash wallet, each participant will receive a complete kit with pen, sticker, notepad and SmartCash logo event shirt.

SOCIAL ISSUE

During the intervals of the lectures we will make sweepstakes in SmartCash, the same amount drawn will be reverted to charities.

With this we will show that SmartCash is not only an intelligent payments solution, but a social enterprise that is concerned with the well-being of society.

DATE, TIME AND PLACE OF EVENT

Location: A Investe SP

Date: 2/17/2019

Hours: 9am to 6pm

EVENT'S PLACE Investe SP is a Paulista agency for the Promotion of Investments and Social Competitiveness linked to the State Secretariat of Economic Development, Science and Technology of the state of São Paulo.

In this way we will unite a space created especially for economic development, science and technology, to introduce SmartCash adoption in the largest financial capital of the country.

- We will have a wide and divisible space between presentations and spaces. - Free parking for participants / event visitors - Location of easy access to the fringe of the city of São Paulo.

INFRASTRUCTURE

We will have Projector, Screens (simultaneous), Laser Point, desk and sound booth, lights mirroring the SmartCash logo, free high speed Wi-Fi Internet

SPEAKERS

We will have many thinkers, enthusiasts, entrepreneurs, investors and influencers known in the world of cryptomoedas and Youtube to talk about adoption, usability, technology and SmartCash:

- Roberto Pantoja channel on Youtube: “Investidor Anarquista”

- Vô Epa channel on Youtube: “Epaminondas Bitcoin”

- Edilson channel on Youtube: “Investimentos Digitais”

BUDGET TOTAL

$8.140,92

CONCLUSION

CriptoBlock intends through a big event that will be based in space: Investe SP, created to host themes related to Economic Development, Science and Technology based in the financial heart of Brazil! The biggest event on usability, adoption and investment of SmartCash.

With the support of SmartCash, we will promote highly educational lectures, carefully linked topics on adoption and use of SmartCash, and we will have partner companies, entrepreneurs, investor society and enthusiasts from the world of cryptomoedas besides of course thinkers and supporters of the technology that most grows around the world: SmartCash.

USEFUL LINKS

https://www.criptoblock.com.br

https://www.facebook.com/criptoblockvip/

https://www.instagram.com/criptoblock/

https://twitter.com/criptoblockvip


Thanks for taking the time to read and support our project.

CriptoBlock Team

result.title: The Show that Launched Bitcoin!
result.summary: Radio Advertising, 190+ FM and AM Stations Coast-to-Coast in the United States and on Free-to-Air Satellite over Sub-Saharan Africa, Central America, and North America
result.description:
Hello! I’m Mark Edge, one of the hosts of Free Talk Live (Freetalklive.com). Free Talk Live (FTL) is a seven-day-a-week, live, nationally syndicated, pro-crypto radio program on more than 190 AM and FM radio stations (affiliates.freetalklive.com) across the US.

Free Talk Live was the first consumer media in the world to discuss Bitcoin, in 2010, and Charlie Shrem said “Bitcoin wouldn’t even exist if it wasn’t for you guys”. Hyperbolic as that might be, it strongly hints at the power of FTL and these radio stations. These are real FCC licensed radio stations! You can see where they are on our radio transmitter map (radio.freetalklive.com). (This Summer we added 50,000 Watt WRKO in Boston - stations don’t get any bigger than that.) Our show is heard on both conservative AND progressive talk stations - we’re the only national issues-based show that is heard on both formats.

 

However, our reach is not exclusive to radio stations. We also have more than 15 million downloads on our podcast and others listen to us via live streaming and our international satellite channels (more on that later). We’ve been around the cryptocurrency world since 2011 and FTL is credited by Gavin Andresen and Roger Ver as helping to give Bitcoin the initial boost it needed to get widespread adoption.

“Many of the earliest Bitcoin adopters first learned about it through Free Talk Live…I’m convinced that is one of the sparks that turned a crazy little open source software project into a multi-billion dollar industry” -Gavin Andresen, Original Bitcoin Head Developer

“By broadcasting this message since 2011…FTL has been instrumental in creating the widespread adoption that we have today.” -Roger Ver, CEO Bitcoin.com

We don’t need Smartcash to build us a fancy studio or to help us start doing anything. We already have a studio and we’ve been doing our show since 2002 and have been in national syndication since 2004. We’re established in the industry and are the longest-running show in our daypart (7-10pm Eastern) in national syndication. We’ve outlasted all of our competition. In case you doubt our claims of success, TALKERS Magazine (the premiere industry publication for talk radio) this year named us the #27 most important talk radio show as part of their “Heavy Hundred” It’s our tenth year on the chart, and we’ve been moving up every year. See it for yourself here: (Link to Heavy Hundred).

As early adopters of Bitcoin, we’ve done very well and are comfortable enough to be very choosy about which advertisers we accept. We are exicted about Smartcash after having Zaphoid on to talk about it. 

This proposal is to bring Smartcash on as a prime sponsor of Free Talk Live. Per show, this means Smartcash receives three (3) :30 second recorded radio ads, one :30 podcast ad and one (1) Live Read ad (:60 seconds) per show. For the recorded ads we will work with your team to create several ads. We’ll use different voices. This, we feel, helps function as a sort of “Word of Mouth” campaign. Listeners hear the same message repeated by many different people.

Any comments you have are welcome. We are putting this in for 1 month of funding, but I must advise you that branding advertising is a long term endeavor. You need to stay on the air, if you want to stay top-of-mind. Repetition builds reputation. My recomendation is for AT Least a year. Bitcoin, via Roger Ver, has been on continuously, Since 2012. Persumably he knows something about building a brand. 

Besides Bitcoin, we have had people advertise other currencies like HoriZen (ZenCash), Monero and DASH. We are an open-lines radio program, but we like crypto. We would love it if any of you want to call in and talk about whay makes SmartCash a great tech for you. More voices is better. We aren't going to be The SmartCash Show, but we do want to hear from you. :-)

I mentioned earlier that Free Talk Live is heard on international satellite channels. It’s called Free-to-Air satellite broadcasting and it’s popular globally, especially in poorer countries. Poor people can’t afford to pay for satellite channels. Free-to-Air is not encrypted, which means the channels cost nothing to receive. We’ve been on satellite since 2010 over North and Central America (Galaxy 19) and over Sub-Saharan Africa (SES-5) since 2012. We know we’re reaching people, as we’ve heard from listeners in African nations like Cameroon, Sierra Leone, Kenya, and Nigeria. Here’s a video from our satellite fundraiser on Patreon that explains what we’re doing in more detail and introduces you to our listener Ako in Cameroon:

link to video

The satellite channel we’re on is LRN.FM - The Liberty Radio Network. It’s a 24/7 internet-based streaming audio network that’s been in existence since 2009 and we run it too. We figure our goal is to bring the Ideas of Liberty, which totally includes the concept of crypto currency, to as many people as possible, some people may not like our show, but may like another show. So we made LRN to service as many people as possible. We have the software and expertise already, so we are the best suited to run the best liberty network, and we have.

This is important branding reaching people in their cars, homes, and on their headphones. Thank you for reading this far and for your vote.

Break down of costs:

FTL Major Sponsorship Package
7 live promotions per week @ $140 each = $980 per week
21 :30 second radio ads per week @ $30 each = $630 per week
7 :30 second podcast ads per week @ $20 each = $140 per week
125x100 banner on every page.
Large Banner on a major page of FreeTalkLive’s site.
Periodic social media posts and a recorded interview for the podcast.
4 week Total = $6,160 

*We will hold the SMART and not sell it in the near future.

result.title: Building community awareness for Smartcash using Facebook live with the most active facebook group for masternodes
result.summary:
We operate the most engaged Masternodes community on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/groups/masternodesmovement/)  and believe in sharing our vision with the world. We create exciting content every regularly on our channels such as Youtube.
Every Monday evening, we conduct out Masternodes Monday facebook live sessions where we discuss and share our latest research about masternodes.
For our past interviews with other Masternodes and developers, we charged beteen USD$3,000 to USD$3,500. The objective of these interviews is the create awareness amongst our community and to garner their interest to potentially invest in the Masternodes. I hope to do an interview with the development team of Smartcash to let our community gain a deeper understanding of smartcash. We will be interested to know the direction and the mission that smartcash is heading to.
There are already hundreds of us who’ve expressed keen interest to know you more!
result.description:
My team and I have created a community in November 2018. Together, we always give our best to educate our community about masternodes. We cover regularly about the various masternodes to discuss:

  1. What the the other team directions are.
  2. What they are trying to achieve.
  3. Is it worth looking at to buy or is it another scam coin out there.

Based on organic reach and just pure sharing, we already have 600+ active members on our facebook group. We are targeting to have 3000 active member to be in our group. By January 2019. Althought our core team is based in Singapore, most of our audience are scattered through out the rest of the World.

Masternode Monday and Masternode movement are initiative we created to get people into the masternode scene. Every Monday People from all over the globe will tune in at the stated time to receive the latest update through Facebook Live. And most people will throw out they views/questions for us to have a discussion through facebook live together with one topic we choose to educate our community every week.


I have proposed smartcash to my team because I believe that our team vision is similar to smartcash; which is to bring value to community and to the public through cryptocurrency.

I personally feel that it would be best for us to interview the Smartcash developers. Alternatively, we can also interview the management team as well. We have been looking at your whitepaper and tracking the team’s latest activities and upcoming events.

Finally, SmartCash resonates strongly with us because you focus a great on community building and on real use cases for your coin; compared to many other Masternodes which just focus on people to buy your masternodes.

result.title: 8 SmartStudent Radio programs: Radio Cripto by CoachDigi
result.summary:
I´m CoachDigi, I live in Cancun, Mexico. In my past proposal  Oremor and I started Radio Cripto that is a radio show in the Anahuac Cancun University.

Radio Cripto is a 1 hour per week program (Tuesdays from 5:30 to 6:30 PM), The radio programs are produced in the university’s facilities and transmitted in the cafeteria’s speakers as well as being transmitted via the internet.

In each program we have a guest who talks with us about  Blockchain / cryptocurrencies topic.

Each program is divided into three sections and between each section a song is played.

News of the week in the crypto world: We talk about the market share and the most important news of the week
Topic of the day: Our guest talks  about a topic related to Blockchain / criptocurrencies
How to get Smart: We talk about a SmartCash topic.

result.title: Popularization in Russia and Eastern Europe
result.summary:
Opening of the first permanent mission of the SmartCash community in Eastern Europe. 

Location: Krasnodar, Russian Federation.

Target audience: students, entrepreneurs, professional athletes, commercial organizations of trade, large commodity companies.
result.description:
Aims and objectives of representation: 

  1. Promotion and advertising of the community and cryptocurrency in general. 

  2. Analysis of legislation, elimination of contradictions and finding a compromise between the laws of the Russian Federation and community principles. 

  3. Daily communication with the target audience. 

  4. Organizational and legal assistance to investors. 

  

  

  

Why Russia? 

  In today's realities, the Russian economy is experiencing a recession caused by Western European sanctions, domestic political phenomena, and the actions of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation. The average annual inflation in the country exceeds 14%, for some groups of goods the cost increases to 35%. The average yield on bank deposits is 8.7% - 9.7%. Large companies, small entrepreneurs, and even individuals have serious problems with the transfer of money in connection with the rigid policies of the Central Bank, the actions of the Tax Service, constant and unreasonable blocking of accounts and transactions. It should be remembered that Russia is a huge country with huge natural resources and capital, most of which is not in official circulation. 

  The functional and community perspectives satisfy most of the wishes of the people of Russia, however, SmartCash is virtually unknown in its territory. The speed and cost of transactions, the anonymity of payments and the ease of use of SmartCash on any platform provide an undoubted superiority over the current financial system in the country. It is these factors that we will promote in our work.

result.title: smartcash.cc and brochure/whitepaper translation to Igbo, Hausa, Yoruba, and Nigerian pidgin English
result.summary:
Smartcash as a currency has gained some percentage of awareness amongst media personnel’s and some of them have written about it on their various media platforms to bring its awareness to the general public so as to increase its awareness and adoption all over Nigeria.

With the steady increase in the awareness, adoption and use of cryptocurrency in Nigeria, it is important that Smartcash is made known in major local governments, cities and states in Nigeria by communicating Smartcash related information to Nigerians in their major languages.

The central purpose of this proposal is to increase the already growing awareness and adoption of Smartcash in Nigeria, make smartcash and the technology behind it known and accessible even to the Indigenous Nigerians from diverse localities.

With this in place; Smartcash wouldn’t just be a currency that is known and used by techy Nigerian citizens but also by the none techy citizens.
result.description:
INTRODUCTION

Smartcash as a currency has gained some percentage of awareness amongst media personnel’s and some of them have written about it on their various media platforms to bring its awareness to the general public so as to increase its awareness and adoption all over Nigeria.

With the steady increase in the awareness, adoption and use of cryptocurrency in Nigeria, it is important that Smartcash is made known in major local governments, cities and states in Nigeria by communicating Smartcash related information to Nigerians in their major languages.

OBJECTIVE

The central purpose of this proposal is to increase the already growing awareness and adoption of Smartcash in Nigeria, make smartcash and the technology behind it known and accessible even to the Indigenous Nigerians from diverse localities.

With this in place; Smartcash wouldn’t just be a currency that is known and used by techy Nigerian citizens but also by the none techy citizens.

PROJECT APPROACH

Milestones

Smartcash.cc and Brochure Translation: We will be embarking on a week smartcash.cc and brochure/white paper translation campaign which will enable us arrive at the goal of translating the entire smartcash.cc website and brochure into indigenous Nigerian pidgin English, Yoruba, Hausa and Ibo which is majorly spoken by Nigerians all over the country/world.

PROJECT BENEFIT

With the translated main smartcash website and brochure, it would be easy for Nigerians all over the world to familiarizes themselves with Smartcash and its utilities, this wouldn’t just be a boost to the community but also; Smartcash will be the first cryptocurrency to have translated their website and brochure/white paper into these Nigerian languages.

PROJECT TIMELINE

The required time needed for the execution of the project depends on the time it takes for the completion of each translation.

  • Website/Brochure Translation: from our calculation it was estimated that the translation of the Smartcash.cc website and brochure into Nigerian Pidgin English, Hausa, Yoruba and Igbo will take the team of translators approximately 1 week for the translation and proofreading of the translated website and brochure/whitepaper.

PROJECT VALIDATION

For the community to stay abreast with the challenges and progress of this project; we will be uploading a concise report which will be in a portable document format (.pdf) document at the end of each completed translation.

PROJECT/PROPOSAL OWNER
Crypto-fairy is a smartcash advocate and a cryptocurrency enthusiast whom through her a lot of Nigerians have been exposed to the crypto-sphere. She has contributed to the Smartcash community through meetups, seminars and conferences in which she has spoken and introduced people to the Smartcash community and all it has to offer the Nigerian Nation and the World as a whole.

PAST WORK
Crypto-fairy and her team through the proposal “CREATING-SMART-JOURNALISTS-UNION-SJU” and the support of the community organized 3 seminars in three different states in Nigeria where they educated journalist, bloggers and TV/Radio presenters alike on the importance of cryptocurrency and how it can change the financial world using Smartcash to site examples. This steered up the creating of a “Smart Journalist Union” in which under the union a couple of articles have been published about Smartcash which in turn increased the awareness of Smartcash in the Nation.
https://vote.smartcash.cc/Proposal/Details/CREATING-SMART-JOURNALISTS-UNION-SJU

SUMMARY

Considering the amount of time and energy that has been put into researching and the careful analyzes of every detail, it is without doubt that this project is right for the Smartcash community and that it will yield high returns for the community.

This project is designed to ensure the steady increase in awareness, purchase and use of smartcash in Nigeria by creating an avenue for Nigerians Worldwide to familiarize themselves with Smartcash, thereby giving citizens an opportunity to understand Smartcash better.

BUDGET

** (Website and Brochure Translation)**

ITEM COST
Nigerian Pidgin English (translation & proofreading) $500
Ibo (translation and proofreading) $500
Hausa (translation and proofreading) $500
Yoruba (translation and proofreading) $500
TOTAL $2000

result.title: SmartCash CryptoHour Segment Sponsorship

A CryptoHour sponsorship means one mention at the top of each segment of the daily cryptohour segments(4 segments per hour), access to our national airwaves to send your crew to discuss your tech, as well as on site promotion at any events we speak at or braodcast from during our relationship. result.title: FPPradio Sponsorship (February)
result.summary:
I’ve produced a daily 5-Minute Newscast, FPPradioNews, since February 2014, and begin the newscast with prices of gold, silver & Bitcoin. The newscast consists of 2-3 news stories & 2 ads. Peace, Love, Liberty Radio is a 30 minute podcast that I’ve been recording since 2012. The show explores topics of self-help, personal growth, and relationships while promoting the ideas of liberty and peaceful interaction.

result.description:
Amount:
$300

Timeline:
1 month; February 2019

Proposal Goal:
To help SmartCash gain exposure to a wider audience.

Who Am I?
I am the Owner/Managing Editor of Free Press Publications, and I’ve spent most of my adult life as an advocate & activist for peace and liberty.
I’m an award winning author and publisher, and a host on the nationally syndicated talk show Free Talk Live. I also hosts the daily newscast FPPradioNews, and the weekly podcast Peace, Love, Liberty Radio.
I’ve produced FPPradioNews since February 2014, and the newscast begins with prices of gold, silver & Bitcoin, and consists of 2-3 news stories & 2 ads.
Peace, Love, Liberty Radio is a 30 minute podcast that I’ve been recording since 2012. The weekly show explores topics of self-help, personal growth, and relationships while promoting the ideas of liberty and peaceful interaction.

Description of the proposal & Deliverables
I will provide the price of SmartCash every day in the daily 5-Minute Newscast, FPPradioNews; and a 30 second ad during every FPPradioNews; and a live-read ad once weekly in Peace Love Liberty Radio.
FPPRadioNews is a daily 5 minute radio news program heard on several online radio networks and low power radio stations across the country, and is also available on iHeartRadio!
~1000 podcast listens/downloads per week, thousands of listens on LRN, FPRN & ipmNation
Peace, Love, Liberty Radio is a 30 minute show recorded live several times a week that explores topics of self-help, personal growth, and relationships while promoting the ideas of liberty and peaceful interaction; and can be heard on several online radio networks and low power radio stations across the country, and is also available on iHeartRadio!
~1000 podcast listens/downloads per week, thousands of listens on LRN, FPRN & ipmNation

There are three major deliverables:

  1. Provide the price of SmartCash every day in FPPradioNews
  2. 20-30 second ad seven times per week during FPPradioNews
  3. a live-read ad weekly in Peace, Love, Liberty Radio

Budget:
Deliverable 1: $75 | The price of SmartCash every day in the daily 5-Minute Newscast, FPPradioNews
Deliverable 2: $160 | A 30 second ad daily during FPPradioNews
Deliverable 3: $65 | A live-read ad weekly in the podcast, Peace, Love, Liberty Radio
Total: $300

Payment schedule:
January 15: $300

My Current/Past SmartCash related experience:
I learned aboutSmartCash at the FreeCoast Festival in Portsmouth, NH this fall. I have researched the coin, and am impressed with the team and the vision. I would be honored to be part of this moving forward.

Conclusions:
 Per the January proposal (https://vote.smartcash.cc/Proposal/Details/FPPradio-Sponsorship) "I'd like this to be a contract for 12 months, however the SmartCash voting system seems to limit proposals to not more than 2 months." Sinc the proposal for January was accepted, I believe the proposal for February should be accepted as well.
I believe SmartCash has great potential and promoting the price os SmartCash at the beginning of a newscast alongside gold, silver & Bitcoin will help give credibility to the currency. Live-read advertisements also give credence to the product/service because of the endorsement-style nature of that type of ad. I recommend the SmartCash team fund this advertising/promotion package so that SmartCash can continue to gain exposure to a wider audience.

result.title: SmartCash for Brazilians in Japan
result.summary: The program was developed exclusively to attract new investors, merchants interested in accepting payments with SmartCash as well as the population and enthusiasts interested in knowing the technology and usability of SmartCash, including a population of more than 200 thousand Brazilians living in Japan.
result.description:
GLOBAL VISION

CoinTrade has developed a benefits program that will expose SmartCash as a benchmark in an international payment and transfer solution.

 

The program was developed exclusively to attract new investors, merchants interested in accepting payments with SmartCash as well as the population and enthusiasts interested in knowing the technology and usability of SmartCash, including a population of more than 200 thousand Brazilians living in Japan.

 

According to a Bloomberg study in 2017 shows that, in February 2016, Brazilians living abroad transferred about US $ 375.4 million to the country, an amount higher than the last four years.

Japan is one of those countries with great business potential for SmartCash

 

THE GOAL

CoinTrade will bring conceptual journalists linked to major Brazilian communications channels with outstanding journalistic relevance such as Band, IstoÉ Dinheiro, Época Negócios e Estadão for Japan, expanding the offer spread of SmartCash highlighting it as one of the main currencies of the platform; among the objectives we highlight as a reach goal the following characteristics:

 

  1. To make Smartcash use by Brazilians living in Japan and for the purpose of using transfer of funds as the main negotiating currency;
  2. Show the importance of use in the currency bringing new opportunities of use, withdraw, transfer and local and international use.;
  3. Increase the SmartCash network by bringing in new Japanese investors as well as a select group with an interest in technology

 

WHO WE ARE

A partnership between Byteinvest and Stratum puts Cointrade in the market for crypto-coins. With all market knowledge, the new platform emerges to fill, in an uncomplicated way, gaps that exist today in the world of investment in digital currencies.

Cointrade's goal is to enter the brokerage market that operates with the bid book model. With this, it aims to meet the traders with as many tools as possible. These tools enable crypto-currency investors a platform with high performance and efficiency.

In this new simple and agile system is all the experience and knowledge in crypto trading of giants of the market. To constantly develop new tools in order to increase their investment possibilities.

 

PROPOSAL

Based on this scenario, CoinTrade has decided to launch a new functionality in its platform that allows a person anywhere in the world to transfer crypto coins, which can be converted into currency and balances in strategic locations, in Brazil one of these places is known as "Lottery houses" where the looting takes place in a matter of minutes.

 

For this to happen the company has partnered with a local financial services platform network, operating in local currency and connecting the fi nancial system with these "lottery agencies".

Our proposal is to take this concept / model, including the following highlights:

 

- Exhibition of the brand as reference in international solution of means of payment and transfer;

- Presence, recognition and consistency of brand (brand awareness);

- Citation in magazines and newspapers of the most respected in Brazil present in Japan exporting matters of great prominence in the media

 

IN THE LIST OF INNOVATIONS WE HAVE:

- A smart bracelet that makes payments by approach, the first of its kind launched in Brazil. To make the payment is very easy, just approach the hand of the card machine, enter your password, and you're done! Band payments are made with the Mastercard banner, and in the country today, about 85% of the card machines are already accepting payments with our wristband "explains the CEO of the company.

 

- Another novelty of the device is the transfer of resources via app, without needing to be close to who will receive the money.

 

DISCLOSURE PLAN

The presence in Tokyo will be widely disseminated through videos, photos, magazines, television and social media.

The following professionals of journalistic concept will be present in the place:

 

- Producer Carlos Henrique Pereira da Silva of Band TV;

- Camera man Marcelo Alexandre Munhoz Di Petta of Band TV;

- News reporter João Paulo Vergueiro de Moura Campos da Band TV

- Publishing company Mariana Iwakura of Época Negócios magazine;

- Publishing company  Rodrigo Loureiro de Azevedo of IstoÉ Dinheiro Magazine

- Advisor Samantha loyal Conceição Schmitz of Vocali

 

- Who is the Band TV

Rede Bandeirantes is a Brazilian commercial open television network owned by the Bandeirantes de Comunicação Group. It entered the air on May 13, 1967, in São Paulo, SP

 

- Who is the Época Negócios Magazine

Época Negócios is the magazine of trends and analyzes about economy, finance, career, sustainability, technology, entrepreneurship and business of Editora Globo.

 

- Who is IstoÉ Dinheiro Magazine

ISTOÉ Dinheiro is a Brazilian business and economy magazine published by Editora Três. It is the first weekly Brazilian magazine of economics and business.

 

- Who is Vocali?

know how in press office for large companies and events, as well as signing customized publications and responding to the communication of projects and projects of renown.

 

INFRASTRUCTURE

We will have professional recording equipment and leading journalistic professionals to perform all the coverage of the event.

 

BUDGET TOTAL:

$ 10,000.00

 

DETAIL BUDGET:

18% Airfare for journalists

12% Stay for journalists

11% Food for journalists

59% For inclusion in social media, dissemination in magazines, reporting, information to be held on 01/27/2019 with a focus on distribution in national and international networks

 

CONCLUSION

CoinTrade intends, through this representation, to formalize the Brazil / Japan connection bringing and taking the concept of usability in practice emphasizing the ease of sending and receiving resources through SmartCash.

 

With the support of SmartCash we will broadly disseminate social channels as well as channels of great relevance and journalistic respect in Brazil and worldwide.

 

USEFUL LINKS

https://cointrade.cx

https://conteudo.stratum.hk/tokyo

 

Thank you for taking the time to read and support our project and we are available for any questions.

CoinTrade Team.

result.title: Continued funding of National Radio ads - Free Talk Live
result.summary: Radio Advertising, 190+ FM and AM Stations Coast-to-Coast in the United States and on Free-to-Air Satellite over Sub-Saharan Africa, Central America, and North America
result.description:
The Show that launched Bitcoin, Free Talk Live (FTL) is a seven-day-a-week, live, nationally syndicated, pro-crypto radio program on more than 190 AM and FM radio stations (affiliates.freetalklive.com) across the US.

Free Talk Live was the first consumer media in the world to discuss Bitcoin, in 2010, and Charlie Shrem said “Bitcoin wouldn’t even exist if it wasn’t for you guys”. Hyperbolic as that might be, it strongly hints at the power of FTL and these radio stations. These are real FCC licensed radio stations! You can see where they are on our radio transmitter map (radio.freetalklive.com). (This Summer we added 50,000 Watt WRKO in Boston and this week WONK-FM in Washington DC!) Our show is heard on both conservative AND progressive talk stations - we’re the only national issues-based show that is heard on both formats.

 

 

However, our reach is not exclusive to radio stations. We also have more than 15 million downloads on our podcast and others listen to us via live streaming and our international satellite channels (more on that later). We’ve been around the cryptocurrency world since 2011 and FTL is credited by Gavin Andresen and Roger Ver as helping to give Bitcoin the initial boost it needed to get widespread adoption.

“Many of the earliest Bitcoin adopters first learned about it through Free Talk Live…I’m convinced that is one of the sparks that turned a crazy little open source software project into a multi-billion dollar industry” -Gavin Andresen, Original Bitcoin Head Developer

“By broadcasting this message since 2011…FTL has been instrumental in creating the widespread adoption that we have today.” -Roger Ver, CEO Bitcoin.com

We don’t need Smartcash to build us a fancy studio or to help us start doing anything. We already have a studio and we’ve been doing our show since 2002 and have been in national syndication since 2004. We’re established in the industry and are the longest-running show in our daypart (7-10pm Eastern) in national syndication. We’ve outlasted all of our competition. In case you doubt our claims of success, TALKERS Magazine (the premiere industry publication for talk radio) this year named us the #27 most important talk radio show as part of their “Heavy Hundred” It’s our tenth year on the chart, and we’ve been moving up every year. See it for yourself here: (Link to Heavy Hundred).

As early adopters of Bitcoin, we’ve done very well and are comfortable enough to be very choosy about which advertisers we accept. We are exicted about Smartcash after having Zaphoid on to talk about it. 

This proposal is to bring Smartcash on as a prime sponsor of Free Talk Live. Per show, this means Smartcash receives three (3) :30 second recorded radio ads, one :30 podcast ad and one (1) Live Read ad (:60 seconds) per show. For the recorded ads we will work with your team to create several ads. We’ll use different voices. This, we feel, helps function as a sort of “Word of Mouth” campaign. Listeners hear the same message repeated by many different people.

Any comments you have are welcome. We are putting this in for our 2nd of funding, but I must advise you that branding advertising is a long term endeavor. You need to stay on the air, if you want to stay top-of-mind. Repetition builds reputation. My recomendation is for AT Least a year. Bitcoin, via Roger Ver, has been on continuously, Since 2012. Persumably he knows something about building a brand. 

Besides Bitcoin, we have had people advertise other currencies like HoriZen (ZenCash), Monero and DASH. We are an open-lines radio program, but we like crypto. We would love it if any of you want to call in and talk about whay makes SmartCash a great tech for you. More voices is better. We aren't going to be The SmartCash Show, but we do want to hear from you. :-)

I mentioned earlier that Free Talk Live is heard on international satellite channels. It’s called Free-to-Air satellite broadcasting and it’s popular globally, especially in poorer countries. Poor people can’t afford to pay for satellite channels. Free-to-Air is not encrypted, which means the channels cost nothing to receive. We’ve been on satellite since 2010 over North and Central America (Galaxy 19) and over Sub-Saharan Africa (SES-5) since 2012. We know we’re reaching people, as we’ve heard from listeners in African nations like Cameroon, Sierra Leone, Kenya, and Nigeria. Here’s a video from our satellite fundraiser on Patreon that explains what we’re doing in more detail and introduces you to our listener Ako in Cameroon:

link to video

The satellite channel we’re on is LRN.FM - The Liberty Radio Network. It’s a 24/7 internet-based streaming audio network that’s been in existence since 2009 and we run it too. We figure our goal is to bring the Ideas of Liberty, which totally includes the concept of crypto currency, to as many people as possible, some people may not like our show, but may like another show. So we made LRN to service as many people as possible. We have the software and expertise already, so we are the best suited to run the best liberty network, and we have.

This is important branding reaching people in their cars, homes, and on their headphones. Thank you for reading this far and for your vote.

Break down of costs:

FTL Major Sponsorship Package
7 live promotions per week @ $140 each = $980 per week
21 :30 second radio ads per week @ $20 each = $630 per week
7 :30 second podcast ads per week @ $20 each = $140 per week
125x100 banner on every page.
Large Banner on a major page of FreeTalkLive’s site.
Periodic social media posts and a recorded interview for the podcast.
4 week Total (From 2019-02-04 to 2019-03-04) = $6,160 

*We will hold the SMART and not sell it in the near future.

result.title: SMART on Anypay, the beloved libertarian POS
result.summary: Anypay.Global is a free point-of-sale app (Android, iOS, web) designed for brick and mortar retail that allows anyone in the world to accept cryptocurrencies. It is popular in New Hampshire, Thailand, Colombia, and Nigeria. Since its inception in 2017, Anypay has steadily grown in the number of users and the amount of transactions facilitated. What makes it stand apart from the rest is its ease of use. Cashiers who know absolutely nothing about cryptocurrency can operate it safely and reliably. Adding SMART to Anypay would mean more places will accept SMART in exchange for real goods and services.
result.description:
Timeline:

2 weeks

Total hours expected for project to complete:

40-50 hours

Proposal Amount:

~ 750,000 SMART

Deliverables:

  • Users can set a SMART address where SMART payments will be sent

  • Users can generate invoices denominated in any currency that gets correctly calculated into a price in SMART

  • Anypay gracefully handles exceptions of overpayments and underpayments in SMART

  • Anypay presents Green “PAID” screen (in different native languages such as Portuguese) upon successful payment

  • Users see immediate delivery of customer’s payment into owner’s wallet

  • Anypay adds SMART logo and branding added to Anypay website and promotional material, like the World Famous Bitcoin Tour

My current/Past SmartCash related experience:

I met Chris Karabats of SmartCash at the FreeCoast Fest in New Hampshire in the fall of 2018. Anypay was already in heavy use in that area at the time. He saw how well Anypay worked for Dash payments, and we got to talking about integrating SMART on our free Point of Sale app. After some back and forth talks, I recommended holding off on integration until Anypay could deliver the outstanding experience SmartCash users deserve. After honing in the on-boarding, payment monitoring, and forwarding services, we are ready to deliver the same great experience for SMART as we do for DASH and the others.

Possible FAQ’s:

Q) What unique advantages does Anypay bring to the table?

A) Anypay created the World Famous Bitcoin Tour, which gained publicity when journalists from VICE visited from China to take the tour. Other than our intimate relationships with the merchants on our platform, Anypay has three major compelling advantages over other systems. First, openness. Anyone can use it. No complex forms or ID required. Second, ease of use. Your local minimum wage barista who is barely awake and barely sober can easily take payments in any cryptocurrency without any special instructions. We work closely with merchants to hone in on the most effortless and invisible way to collect payments securely and get on with the next customer. Third, we are die-hard libertarians. This is not something many companies boast, but we think it matters. We are dedicated to delivering the best possible product to the market not only because it is our business, but it is our business because we believe in building a freer society by facilitating free trade between individuals.

Q) SMART is already integrated into CoinPayments and has its own POS built in. Why would we want to pay for another one?

A) SMART benefits from use. The more people using it to buy real goods and services, the more value the currency has in the real world. CoinPayments is great for online use, but Anypay shines at retail. Yes, the SmartCash built-in POS might be better, but for whatever reason, merchants are a lot more likely to try Anypay than they are to try a POS specific to a coin they have never heard of. If anything, using Anypay will introduce them to SmartCash and make them a lot more willing to try the SMART POS in the future. Anypay gets SMART’s foot in the door.

Q) $7000 is a lot of money for a simple integration. Why so much?

A) You get a job done right by a team of 2 professional engineers plus 1 heavy-hitting marketer for that price. And after the integration is complete, long-term benefits accrue to you for years. SmartCash gets lifetime support for SMART on Anypay. That means merchants or customers with questions can contact Anypay via phone, email, or chat and get their questions answered and problems resolved quickly. It also means that SMART benefits from future integrations and developments. When future customers pay for something like the ability to do cross-currency payments (spend SMART, receive BTC for example), then SMART benefits from that without any additional cost. Plus we continually are making the experience better, easier, and more fun for merchants and users. We recently added detailed charts that reveal what is really going on in the real-world crypto economy. Finally, we are always expanding to new areas and growing the number of merchants using our platform. That means ongoing exposure for merchants to SMART and more likelihood that they will accept SMART for payment, since many of our users have a Coinomi wallet to store their coins, and adding SMART is just as easy as a few taps.

Who Am I? What do I bring to the table, and what’s my goal here?:

My name is Derrick J Freeman. I produce liberty entertainment and am known for my years on Free Talk Live, Cop Block Radio, Peace News Now, Freedom Feens, and my movie, “Derrick J’s Victimless Crime Spree.” Since 2011 I have been teaching people how to use cryptocurrency to increase their personal independence, and in 2017, my partner Steven and I created Anypay to help businesses in our area take bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies without the intrusive hassles of a BitPay account. Anypay now has 136 active accounts and facilitates retail crypto payments worth tens of thousands of dollars each month. Charts here: https://admin.anypay.global/#/charts More here: https://charts.anypay.global

We are people who love freedom and who are using our bodies, time, and talent to create a world where everyone can use cryptocurrency. Our mission this year is to grow the number of active accounts worldwide from 136 today to 1,000 by the end of 2019. SMART’s goals and Anypay’s are aligned here in that we can only achieve this goal by integrating the coins that people want to use the most — the ones with real community and people focusing on using cryptocurrency as cash in their day to day lives. For this reason, we believe SmartCash and Anypay can benefit each other, and we humbly seek the opportunity to work together with you to grow the SmartHive one business at a time.

Looking forward to a productive discussion on a partnership that grows the reach and utility of SMART!

Hi,

this is our 2nd proposal for the Balkan countries promotion. The first one has failed, and we weren’t funded while other ‘shady’ proposals were funded and never updated anything on this forum.

We will organize 3 big meetups in Belgrade, Sarajevo and Zagreb.

We want to make a big SmartCash community in this part of Europe - Serbia, Montenegro, Bosnia and Croatia.

We can’t do it without meetups and showing what SmartCash can do on the spot!

These countries can be the ideal country to spread the word about SmartCash.

That’s our main goal and we won’t let you down!

We are experienced IT professionals with more than 10 years experience in GSM field, and we have been operating as company since 2000.
Last five years we gained so much interest in Blockchain Technology and started developing blockchain based networks, decentralized apps, and distributed ledgers. We believe that these technologies are changing the world.

4. Our SmartCash Experience

We’ve been interested in Bitcoin, SmartCash and other cryptocurrencies for a few years. SmartCash surprised us with it’s cheap transactions and great stability. Community focused hive team concept is successful in decentralization and it’s very helpful for any cryptocurrency project.
SmartNodes and SmartRewards are also huge step forward for steady network growth, but we still need to work much more.

5. Budget

We need monthly income for our projects to cover expenses on monthly basis for next 6-month period. However, we will keep track of our financial activity and will make all transparent during the period.

The money we get from SmartCash we will use in the best possible way. We will try to promote as much as we can and we will try to include as many media as possible.

result.title: Open Sourced Development of Cryptocurrency Services
result.summary: Open sourcing a total of 5 cryptocurrency services, 4 of which are 80% - 90% complete. SmartCash will be integrated in all services, and advertised within the open sourced github repositories.
result.description:
Description

While developing web services for various cryptocurrency teams I realized most cryptocurrencies already provide the functionality to replace many online payment processors ( middle men ) but there are very few applications utilizing the potential.

A few API's are starting to pop up from services like Coinbase but the user friendly application or killer app department is still lacking.

During talks with various cryptocurrency teams I realized each team is attempting to launch similar "killer" apps but each team is working independently.

This proposal is an attempt to fundraise the development of open sourced services "killer" services that support multiple cryptocurrencies.

 

PDF

I have refined my proposal to include my linkedin, links, research, examples, mockups, and proper formatting. The proposal editor removes a lot of these details making the text harder to follow. I am hosting the PDF through Google Docs to provide full access to all of the information I have included.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AsRHXKm1TkGa9R54PonCqeZCrQuAMDHb/view

 

Milestones

The dates provided for each milestone are estimates.

 

Disclaimer

If you disagree with a milestone, or the proposal as a whole please voice your concerns within the proposal comments before voting no/abstaining. I am developing these services to address the problems I see within the ecosystem and I am open to suggestions if you have a better idea to solve xyz milestone/problem.

result.title: SmartCash Powered Patreon
result.summary: Patreon began receiving criticism late 2018 after banning a user for posting content on Youtube that violated Patreon's "guidelines". Enter "Patreon issues" on google and you will find plenty of information around this topic. Creators have begun looking for alternatives in order to avoid losing their monthly income. This provides the perfect opportunity to offer a competing service powered by SmartCash.
result.description:
Preface

My previous proposal contained multiple services in a single submission. I chose that route to avoid the 14 day waiting period between each submission ( ie: proposal voting process ). Under this model I would be able to complete a milestone, submit the proper SMART documents, and begin the next milestone.

Based on feedback from the community, and the advice of a few SMART team members I have closed the previous submission in favor of creating separate proposals.

In the event of multiple proposals passing the community is protected by the SMART team. I must complete each milestone in order to receive payment. Thanks to this rule I will be able to go through the voting process ahead of time, and the SMART community is guaranteed the delivery of each milestone.

 

License

Every milestone will be open sourced!

 

Opportunity

A SMART powered competitor eliminates the censorship issue while also reducing fees to nearly 0%

Patreon ~10%+
Patreon transactions are subject to a 5% fee by the company + paypal/stripe fee ( 2.9% + $0.30 ) + additional fees for creators to withdraw their money from patreon...

SMART $0.00X

 

Milestones

Send SMART using social media accounts
- Allow users to verify their social media accounts through social logins/API’s
- Send SMART using twitter @
- Send SMART using Facebook username
- Send SMART using Twitch username ( targets gaming community )
- Send SMART using Youtube username ( targets all creators )


Patreon like donation incentives

In order to compete with Patreon this service must offer the same ability to provide donation "incentives" someone like Omar Bham ( Crypt0's News: https://www.patreon.com/crypt0snews ) provides access to a private telegram group.
This milestone covers the ability to offer incentives for x donation "tiers".


Transaction details stored within QR codes

Services like Patreon, Twitch Bits ( https://www.twitch.tv/bits ), and Youtube donations exist to combat the transaction fees charged by paypal etc. While these services provide some value the fees involved eat into the revenue earned by the creators themselves.

Streamers like Shroud ( https://www.twitch.tv/shroud ) bring in hundreds of thousands in donations via twitch bits, youtube donations, etc. I would like to create a competing feature powered by SMART QR codes.

Streamers/youtubers will have the ability to enter a tip amount $1 - $5+. Streamer can post their QR codes on their twitch/youtube profiles ( scroll down https://www.twitch.tv/shroud ) When a user scans this QR code they can verify the QR code details and send the payment.

result.title: Fiat to SmartCash
result.summary: Thanks to a ruling made in Pennsylvania the barriers to compete with Coinbase ( fiat to crypto ) are slowly crumbling. ( https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-pennsylvania-rules-that-crypto-exchanges-atms-are-not-money-transmitters ) This provides the perfect opportunity for SmartCash to reduce it's reliance on exchanges.
result.description:
Preface

My previous proposal contained multiple services in a single submission. I chose that route to avoid the 14 day waiting period between each submission ( ie: proposal voting process ). Under this model I would be able to complete a milestone, submit the proper SMART documents, and begin the next milestone.

Opportunity

I developed BuyPivx.site as a MVP for PIVX ( I own the source code ). The goal is simple, Pay in fiat using an online payment processor, receive PIVX sent directly to your wallet address.

Online payment processors accept any online transaction, some well known payment processers have gone as far as partnering with cryptocurrency projects directly ( https://blog.sendwyre.com/wyre-partners-with-bzx-the-protocol-that-powers-decentralized-margin-lending-f838e72b6d63 )

I believe there is an opportunity for the SMART team or community to begin selling SMART directly. This will eliminate the direct reliance on exchanges while also providing users from around the world a wide range of payment options.

Paypal and Stripe have already been integrated. The API's to integrate each of the payment providers listed below are open. If accepted I will start with the list provided below and I will introduce new proposals to integrate additional payment processors once this proposal is complete.

 

Milestones

Convert PIVX to SmartCash
