Integrate Wyre
Integrate Dwolla
Integrate Square
Integrate Adyen

result.title: SmartCash Cryptocurrency Market + Social API
result.summary: Most cryptocurrency data providers now charge a monthly rate to access market data ( ex: https://coinmarketcap.com/api/pricing/ ) I believe this provides an opportunity to advertise SmartCash by providing a free to use API that includes market and social data for multiple cryptocurrencies.
result.description:
Preface

My previous proposal contained multiple services in a single submission. I chose that route to avoid the 14 day waiting period between each submission ( ie: proposal voting process ). Under this model I would be able to complete a milestone, submit the proper SMART documents, and begin the next milestone.

Based on feedback from the community, and the advice of a few SMART team members I have closed the previous submission in favor of creating separate proposals.

In the event of multiple proposals passing the community is protected by the SMART team. I must complete each milestone in order to receive payment. Thanks to this rule I will be able to go through the voting process ahead of time, and the SMART community is guaranteed the delivery of each milestone.

 

License

Every milestone will be open sourced

 

Opportunity

Nearly all cryptocurrency services ( including news outlets ) require realtime market data. Charging for API access will begin turning potential customers/developers away. Instead of charging a monthly rate for API access I suggest making the API free to use if the customer/developer adds a "Powered by SmartCash API" badge to their website/service.

By doing so SmartCash will enter the "cryptocurrency utility" space. The SmartCash API badge will begin boosting the seo of SmartCash when developers search for "cryptocurrency market api's" launching SmartCash to the top of search engine results.

If the SmartCash team creates a documentation page for the API ( ex: api.smartcash.cc ) the team can provide a section outlining the SmartCash governance portal.

This process will create a funnel attracting potential developers into the SmartCash ecosystem. The developer will enter by looking for the SmartCash API, and they will become interested in the possibility of developing x, y, z service for the SmartCash community in exchange for funding. The low cost of creating a proposal is also a very large incentive to create multiple proposals.

 

Milestones

Cryptocurrency Market Data API

I have already created a basic API that can be seen here ( https://cryptofeed.io/json ) I will expand on this API to return the exact prices from multiple exchanges.

Cryptocurrency Social Media Data API

This same service aggregates the social media data of each cryptocurrency and displays it in a central feed ( https://cryptofeed.io/eth ) I will create a JSON API that returns the social data of multiple cryptocurrencies.

Content Delivery Network ( CDN ) Caching

If the SmartCash team would like to host this API the costs need to be kept to a minimum. When this service begins gaining traction the server bills can quickly add up if the API is not cached properly. Once the API's have been completed I will create the "public access" part of this service in a way that relies on the caching of CDN's. Once complete a free service like CloudFlare can be used to carry the heavy burden of handling large amounts of API calls.

result.title: Web Hooks + Paywall Removal
result.summary: SmartCash's low transaction fees and near instant payments make it one of the best candidates to replace online payment processors. I would like to develop several services that enable the use of SmartCash on any online web service.
result.description:
Preface

My previous proposal contained multiple services in a single submission. I chose that route to avoid the 14 day waiting period between each submission ( ie: proposal voting process ). Under this model I would be able to complete a milestone, submit the proper SMART documents, and begin the next milestone.

Based on feedback from the community, and the advice of a few SMART team members I have closed the previous submission in favor of creating separate proposals.

In the event of multiple proposals passing the community is protected by the SMART team. I must complete each milestone in order to receive payment. Thanks to this rule I will be able to go through the voting process ahead of time, and the SMART community is guaranteed the delivery of each milestone.

 

License

Every milestone will be open sourced

 

Opportunity

All online services accepting payments need a system to tell them “Hey! user x just paid you y” this can be described as a web hook, event system, and within paypal this is known as their Instant Payment Notification System ( https://developer.paypal.com/docs/classic/products/instant-payment-notification/#why-use-instant-payment-notification ).

Simplified example using paypal:

When a user makes a purchase paypal will send the ecommerce site the details to trigger an event. For example:
- You join a website that charges $10/month to read news articles ( bloomberg )
- Bloomberg sends you to paypal with your Bloomberg ID as a cookie or url parameter
- Once the payment is processed paypal sends a message to bloomberg’s servers saying: “Payment from Bloomberg user ID x was completed successfully”
- Bloomberg can then activate your membership and you can begin reading articles.

Implementing a web hook will provide every web service the ability to accept payments from SmartCash powered wallets.

This is a very simple idea with extremely powerful results.

 

Milestones

Web Hooks

Paywall Removal Through Tipping

If a site/service has to jump through hoops to adopt a payment technology adoption will take much longer. This milestone will include the "paywall removal" code that can be copy/pasted into an existing site to begin using the SmartCash Web Hooks immediately.

result.title: AL Local Artists Virtual Artist Marketplace featuring "InstantPay" technology provided by SmartCash
result.summary: AL.LA is the only Virtual Artist Marketplace currently featuring artists from Alabama. AL.LA provides the artists with a platform for global exposure & the consumer the ability to search all artists from the states in the SEC in USA on one site. Within 10 months, we will have travelled the entire state of Alabama & held a SmartCash panel discussion at our hub, the Montgomery Museum of Fine Arts (MMFA), scheduled for January 25, 2020. Also in this, our 10th month & final milestones, we even begin our expansion into some of the major cities surrounding Alabama: Oxford MS, Memphis & Nashville TN & Atlanta GA.
result.description:
AL.LA sample graphics

On April 1, 2019, we begin our tour in Alabama visiting every major city in each county in each state of the SEC. We are personally visiting museums, art guilds, city programs, community centers, collector societies, schools, pre-k to assisted living programs, local consignment stores, flea markets, listed artists, art stores & speaking at town meetings to invite all artists of all ages to join this Marketplace for FREE. We would be honored to have a SmartCash Ambassador speak at these town meetings with us. This provides the perfect opportunity to sign up the artists ready to become a part of the Marketplace & educate the public about SmartCash’s global economy & educate on the intricacies in SmartCash technology. 

We have a very high expectation of Marketplace merchants & artists acceptance for “InstantPay” as well as their ability to assist their customers set up wallets of significant values. In the great southern states, face-to-face conversation is the most effective way to convince very traditional minds to accept, support & adopt anything really new into their daily lives. There is a unique dialect & frame of mind that exists down here, so the only really effective way to make change is by word of mouth & taking the time to assist everyone individually. This means alot of foot traffic which is one of the major advantages AL.LA offers. We expect those minds from the artistic community & the residents of the rural communities to have a lot of questions as they become not only educated but also involved in the cryptocurrency movement.

The time is now for Alabama artists to receive world-wide exposure. The road to AL.LA’s success has been paved by the current global interest in the indigenous artwork by Mose Tolliver, an artist from Montgomery. We are targeting not only those from the artistic realm, but also all young minds currently enrolled in a SEC college who are setting up their lives to enter the professional world. We also have the opportunity to capitalize on the national popularity of the Alabama Crimson Tide football team & SEC they are a part of. AL.LA will travel exclusively using Air BnB Vacation Rentals during our tour of the Southeast. We propose that just as SmartCash is exploding onto the scene in the financial world, it also does so in the south in the local art communities, music scenes, college towns & Air BnB Vacation Rental locations.

Cryptocurrency has only begun to be available in the artistic communities & has yet to tap into the rich traditional culture in this part of the country. This region of the country has yet to be targeted by any ICO campaign to date. Our hope is to establish and sustain a successful long-term partnership with Smartcash beyond the Alabama tour detailed in the milestone timeline & budget table that can be found by clicking the link below.

AL.LA Virtual Artist Marketplace Vetted Proposal

On the heels of a devastating tornado that ripped through the very states in the SEC we are introducing SmartCash to, it is a telling sign for me. There could be no better time to bring & ignite creativity in communities that have lost everything, including 23 lives. We often think about creativity as making something, but in fact the root meaning of the word means ‘TO GROW’. AL.LA wants to show how creativity can help find ways around obstacles because they are seen not as roadblocks, but also opportunities. While we do our part to help rebuild the cities & the moral devastated by the EF4 tornado, it is the perfect time to implement the infrastructure SmartCash needs to establish itself as the digital currency of the South on a hands-on basis.

Please check out our website & get in touch with me for any reason through the contact information found in the proposal.

Thank you very much

-Drew Mulligan, Proprietor

March 5, 2019

result.title: Sponsorship for Brazilian digital influencers

result.description:
GLOBAL VISION

SmartCash Brazil started a program of dissemination with the biggest Brazilian digital influencers with youtube channels to develop a series of explanatory and educational videos showing the use of SmartCash in Brazil.

Each influencer has popularly known language in the Brazilian crypto market where the contents generated in each channel help with the solution of doubts and clarify in a didactic way each function developed by SmartCash.

THE GOAL IS

Continue to provide quality content, developing new themes related to SmartCash, and improving content education sponsored by SmartCash.

Thinking about these goals as a form of business, we highlight:

 

  1. Increased awareness of using SmartCash;
  2. Incentive of the use of the currency in Brazil by merchants and consumers;
  3. Addressing main doubts about the installation of wallet, commerce and popularizing standardized information.

 

THE PROPOSAL

Our intention is to continue with the dissemination work that needs to be constant and with maintenance on didactic content formatted for the development of each Youtuber.

The aim of the proposal is to encourage the production of quality content by providing easy-to-understand information to consumers, businesses, investors and the general population.

 

MAIN ISSUES ADDRESSED IN THE CHANNELS OF THE INFLUENZER:

What is SmartCash?

What are Masternodes and how to install?

Where to buy SmartCash

What service channels are available for discussion, doubts and / or solutions

What is the "GiftCard"

How to create a wallet?

How to generate and maintain secure access keys

And much more.

 

DISCLOSURE PLAN

All the digital influencers involved have as foundation to develop quality content, specifying important points of action of SmartCash as well as clearly and objectively teach each content demonstrated in their channels.

In addition, the SmartCash brand should appear on all videos produced regardless of the content produced.

The exposure of the brand as well as content essay, explanatory content and content developed should increase the flow of people interested in SmartCash and further improve the relationship of people who already invest in SmartCash in addition to more involving merchants and consumers.

result.title: Update MasterNodes.Online
result.summary: Update the SMART listing on MasterNodes.Online to reflect the collateral change and prevent delisting.
result.description:
Funding for the original listing on MasterNodes.Online was done via a community proposal. Since SmartNodes have undergone a collateral change this listing needs to be updated.

Listings that undergo a collateral change, chainswap or rebrand have 45 days to pay a maintenance fee of .05 BTC or be delisted from MasterNodes.Online. As it stands, SMART is scheduled to be delisted on April 8, 2019.

This is the link to pay for the required maintenance for price verification:

https://campaigns.masternodes.online/product/coin-maintenance-new-name-ticker-swap-fork/

 

If it's the desire of the community to keep the MasterNodes.Online listing and update it then this proposal is pretty simple.

result.title: Spanish Speaking SmartCash Community Growth
result.summary:
The problem: The Spanish-speaking community of SmartCash is almost dead, there is very little communication on the Discord, Telegram channels, as well as on Facebook and Twitter.
Why? One of the reasons is that we don't have SmartCash content´(videos, news, podcast, etc) that we can share in our social media networks.
Solution: We will do spanish SmartCash events, videos, and radio shows so we can share them in our social media networks
result.description:
I am Coach Digi and with Oremor we have been part of the SmartCash community since 2017 and we have been educating students and merchants in Mexico about SmartCash since 2018.  

The main target in this proposal are the students and spanish speaking SmartCash community and in another proposal we will focus on merchant adoption.

We have focused on high school and university students in Cancun, Mexico. At the Anahuac Cancun University we have a weekly radio program “Radio Cripto”

Radio Cripto
Radio Cripto is an 1 hour per week program (Thursdays from 4:00 - 5:00 PM), The radio programs are carried out in the university’s facilities and transmitted in the cafeteria’s speakers as well as being transmitted via the internet (Radio Anahuac Cancun).

Each program is divided into three sections and between each section a song is played.

  • News of the week in the crypto world: We talk about the market share and the most important news of the week
  • Topic of the day: Our guest talks to us about a topic related to Blockchain / criptocurrencies
  • How to get Smart: We talk about a SmartCash topic and we will be talking with Enrique

Some past radio Shows:

Program # 1 Guest: Oukan
Program # 2 Guest: Mariluna
Program # 3 Guest: Eiky
Program # 4 Guest: Cryptoconta
Program # 5 Guest: Pepecrypto
Program # 6 Guest: Cryptoconta

College SmartStudent: We had as guest the coordinator of the engineering school and he talked about the new engineering career, Computing and Digital Business, thanks to this we could plan a blockchain and SmartCash talks for engineering and all campus students. This SmartCash and blockchain talks will be at the university and they will start in april (date TBA).

Highschool SmartStudents
We will do a SmartDay, this SmartDay will be a blockchain/SmartCash Talk to at least 150 students, with this “Smarday”, a group of mine that studies computing (30 students ) will have a E-learning class and they will be learning how to us E-learning programs and apps. They will investigate about blockchain and SmartCash and create a learning program. The students will vote for the best program and the winners will receive a GiftCard so they can have a dinner at Woking Dead restaurant

What will we do?

  • 8 SmartStudent Radio Show
  • 1 SmartCash talk to college SmartStudents
  • 1 SmartCash day to highschool SmartStudents
  • 1 SmartCash E-learning programing competition

Budget

a) SmartStudent Radio Show "Radio Cripto"

  • Pre-Production: Research News, interviews, SmartCash theme and songs for the show

  • Production: Radio Show

  • Post-production Edition & SocialMedia

  • Crew: Oremor, Perla and CoachDigi.

  • $200 USD/Show x 8 Shows (2 months) = $1,600 USD

b) Blockchain and SmartCash talk to college SmartStudents at Anahuac Cancun University

  • SmartCash Mexico Crew (Eiky, Oremor, CochDigi and 1 crew) $100 x 4 = $400.00
  • 2 SmartCash roll ups $120USD x 2= $240USD
  • 1 USD in SmartCash giveaway to 50 SmartStudents $1 x 50 = $50USD

c) Blockchain and SmartCash talk to highschool SmartStudents at CBTIS #111 in Cancun, Mexico.

  • SmartCash Mexico Crew (Eiky, Oremor, CochDigi and 1 crew) $100 x 4 = $400.00
  • 1 USD in SmartCash giveaway to 50 SmartStudents $1 x 50 = $50USD

d) Blockchain and SmartCash E-learning contest

  • 5 Giftcards with $10 USD. $10USD x 5 = $50.USD

Resume Budget
8 Smartstudent Radio shows “Radio Cripto” $1,600USD
1 SmartCash talk to college SmartStudents at Anahuac Cancun University $690USD
1 SmartCash talk to highschool SmartStudents at CBTIS #111 $450USD
1 Blockchain and SmartCash E-learning contest $50USD
TOTAL $2,790.00

Why Vote yes?

  • We want to reestart the mexican and latam SmartCash community and with this proposal we will atack the young generations that already had heard of Bitcoin but doesn´t know what is a blockchain or what´s SmartCash.
  • With the “Radio Cripto” more college students will know about SmartCash and blockchain but the most important is that we will record “Radio cripto” and publish it in SmartCash Mexico/Latam social networks (FB, Twitter, Telegram, Discord).
  • We wil also record how to use the Gift Card (Receive and pay with SmartCash)
  • We will use the SmartCash E-learning programs for educating about SmartCash to more people.

result.title: Crypto Hunter Game Listing and Promotion
result.summary: Crypto Hunter AR Game with In game Promotion
result.description:
Crypto Hunter Has been created by the Swyft.Network formally Satoshi Coin World.

Crypto Hunter is an AR (Augmented Reality) game where players can collect masternode coins in their local area and withdraw to exchanges or local wallets.

The concept of the game is to turn Players into Investors by Educating them on the masternode world, tools needed and where to get started. This is done by way of pop on in game play Videos and Advertisements.

These Educational cards will cover off but not limited to:

  • Differences between Masternodes & Hardware Mining
  • Local Wallet Setup
  • VPS Setup
  • Dedicated Hosting Platforms (I.E https://satoshisolutions.online) 1 Click setup
  • Exchanges
  • Useful Community Engagement Tools (Telegram, Discord)
  • Download Links (Github)
  • Due diligence checking before Investing

Listed Coins get detailed descriptions of their project Links and Roi Stats supported within the game by way of API from https://masternodes.online.

Coin listings also benefit from full page advertisements that showcase there long term vision, current use cases and long term developments to encourage investors to turn collectors into full masternode holders.

We hope to branch out to a new volume of investors from a market of game play activity.

This includes an Apple Version and Android version appearing on the online Stores shortly.

Turning Hunters into Investors benefits the existing community and the project by converting more masternode holders and added buying pressure outside of the current incumbent market place which is becoming more saturated by further projects and the current growth rate of uptake. This is a new market to reach out to as more daily people become familiar with the technology but don’t know where to start and a great platform to reach into a new world.

This could change the face of the Alt coin Market and add to the growth rate of projects that are pursuing large developments and want a larger or untapped Audience. 

Smart Cash given its established background and developed community would be a great addition to the game and would enhance the partnership we currently have. Listing fee will be used to lock Coins into masternodes to create further coins for Game play. With an initial offering of 100K coins for collection in Augmented reality.

The Video Below will explain and show the game in its Beta form - We are at the point now of trying to reach out to early adopters for the Live game Launch and look for Listings. This includes a listing fee and coins needed for the game with an indication of denomination collection.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Q0vu6qBl2g&t=5s
